Polished the formatting.

Title: Power Returns
Synopsis: An ancient power returns to eath after a millenia gone, awakening old creatures and powers thought to be of just myth and legends. Mark toolis discovers he as a being capable of using this dormant power to control the physical world; Samantha watts must cope with being a creature of power and horror, and the social stigma that comes with it, and Tyler Dunn finds out his love for water might be less a passion and more a necessity in the coming days.

Title: Card master : The heir of earth "Tcg based cultiation/ monsters/ reincartnation."
Synopsis:
Follow Jason, a geeky man in his beginning thirties who love music and card games, when he is reincarnated in a card based cultivation world. After he was killed by a cybernetic creature while getting some new card game! 
This novel will be updated at least once a week, with some extra chapter between. There will be most likely a Dutch version in the future too.

Title: The Nefarious Saint
Synopsis:
Nakrul is a land of magic. Those who are lucky enough to be born with an elemental body can become a mage of their respective element(s). Aside from mages and creatures of magic who reign supreme in Nakrul, there are some even more revered--they are the Saints. Rather than elements such as fire and water, Saints are capable of controlling one of 4 laws--Life, Death, Space, Time. 
Our story follows an ordinary farm boy named Cyil, who falls into a deep coma, only to awaken and find out he had become a Saint! What will happen from here on out? Join us on this journey, where we try to stray from the convetional story arcs and have fun with our writing!
 
Cover Art done by: Rozart

Title: The Sage Goes Back in Time
Synopsis:
Our protagonist was at college in his physics class when his universe got fused with an alternate dimension. His new life started off with him being the first one to get a class (he was hit on the head with a crystal), it wasn't just any class his class was sage.
 

 
The cover was not entirely made by me, I got the phoenix pic off google images.

Title: Guild Name: Horacìon
Synopsis:
After the release of the patch 9.0 of one of the most popular VRMMO of the year 2063, The Forsaken Kingdoms, all the registered players have been forced to log into the game and trapped within without the possibility to log out.
Defending the world from the incoming new enemies that invade the whole continent, in addition to the fights between the countries, fights between guilds and PKs appearing from everywhere, what will happen to the world?
 
Notes: Long chapters need if possible someone who can readproof the released chapters.

Title: God's Trial (Rewrite V. 3)
Synopsis:
Larkspur Symphire is born a cultivation cripple. In a world of martial cultivation where practitioners can gather the spiritual energy of Heaven and Earth through their bodies orifices, and use martial skills by releasing that stored energy in certain patterns from them, Larkspur Symphire has a rare disease which closes his orifices as he grows older. Turning a genius into a pathetic worm. One day when he is running away from his cousins to protect his allowance, he stumbles upon a God’s Trial.
With the guarantee from this deity that if he passes he will gain the medical expertise to treat all ailments under the Heavens, his journey begins.

Title: Nature's Child
Synopsis:
In a far corner of the universe lies the world of Horos Ora. This world is very different from the other worlds. This one world has a single presence that alters every being on a fundamental level. This singular presence is the element of magic. 
Magic or mantanus is normally a highly radioactive element never synthesized in any amount, but in the extreme amount it somehow exists on Horos Ora, it completely stabilizes into the easily manipulatable force of mana. 
As mana existed and the world was very habitable once the mana stabilized, soon creatures followed. For the creatures that soon appeared, the stabilized mana didn’t affect them. Occasionally though, some mana would seep into a creature or two, and create a completely new creature. These new creatures would be much stronger. They could sometimes even control a portion of the world, through the mana. These creatures were much more fearsome than their original species. 
The first sentient creatures had a natural talent to manipulate mana. These were the precursors. They had unopposable power, but little control. 
Now millions of years after the precursors, when a boy, a precursor, and a dragon fight to the death, only to end up living as one, what happens to them?

Title: Hunters Of Reality
Synopsis: 17-year old Yoshida Ryou possesses an incredible ability---to be able to see the past of things or people he touches. Due to this, he avoids excessive social interaction, which may cause him to involuntarily use his ability. Everything goes accordingly, until he meets a certain Englishman.

Title: Seeking Elysium
Synopsis:
Elysium Ling is a returnee. She’s been to an alternate world, coerced into fighting their wars, and somehow returned alive.
Now, 13 years later, she finds herself again taken to a foreign world – this time, by her own choice. Not the same world that she returned from, but a foreign world nonetheless. There, struggling in an unknown world, utterly alone, she has a chance encounter with a young lady with a lovely voice. An encounter which would spark a chain of events that would irrevocably shape the world around them.
That young lady’s name is Rosalind. This is her story.
 
Disclaimer/Trigger Warnings (Please Read!)
THIS WORK WILL MOST LIKELY CONTAIN BOTH HOMOSEXUAL AND INCESTUOUS UNDERTONES. IT WILL ALSO HAVE OCCASIONAL DESCRIPTIONS OF GORE THAT CAN GET REASONABLY GRAPHIC.
PLEASE DO NOT READ THIS IF YOU ARE UNDER THE LEGAL AGE IN YOUR COUNTRY TO CONSUME SUCH CONTENT AS MENTIONED ABOVE, OR IF YOU ARE TRIGGERED BY HOMOSEXUALITY, GORE OR INCEST.
 
Notes on Relation to Lily Ex Machina
While this story is intended to be a sequel to my first work, Lily Ex Machina (LxM), I will be writing it in a manner that does not require readers to have read LxM to understand it. While having read LxM will likely enhance your enjoyment of this work(I hope), I am intending for this story to be able to stand on its own legs. As such, certain worldbuilding elements that I have expanded upon in LxM will likely be repeated in Seeking Elysium(SEly). As such, for newcomers, it should not be an issue to follow this story without prior knowledge of LxM. On the other hand, for my returning readers, I do beg your forgiveness for forcing you to read through stuff you already know. I’ll do my best to try and make it interesting, but no guarantees of success, I’m afraid.
On the other hand, if you’re a newcomer to this series and enjoy SEly, I do hope you’ll take the time to read Lily Ex Machina as well, if only to get more information of the backstories of some characters.
 
Update Schedule
I will only post completed volumes on RRL; if you would like to follow the story while it is ongoing, you may do so at my website. I update twice a week, on Wednesdays and Sundays. Supporters on my Patreon get access to chapters a day earlier.

Title: Vixen's Clan
Synopsis: Vala is not who she seems. While in her clan she's the charming vixen who is loyal and true, secretly she is gathering information to stop a war between all species. She is part of The Secret Peace Society, which is made out of animals from all different clans who have avoided greed and jealousy. While her friends, family and lover all believe in winning, all Vala can dream of is peace.

Title: Escape
Synopsis:
Nathaniel has used what money he had to buy a VR cocoon and to pay off the next few months' worth of bills. He has two ways to move forward in life- to find a new job, or to hope that he can make enough money playing Final Escape to feed his meager, human body.
He has rolled randomly, as only a fool would do, and finds himself playing a Kobold magus who wields the power of life itself. Hopefully, his role-playing is entertaining enough to generate revenue, because the game is changing his real self... or else, his real self is changing the human-shaped shell he used to wear.

Title: The Unpredictable story
Synopsis: One day Jinx was walking from school and got hit by a bus by accident and was send to the heavens only to find out that his time didnt end and was killed by mistake so god reincarnated him in a another world...

Title: Dice Roller
Synopsis:
"I'm definitely better than everyone."
It was Kent's favorite line. He was perfect in every way possible. In his grades, sports, and even on his facorite hobby, playing games. He is the pinnacle of all human beings. People are talking about how perfect he really is..
...
That was Kent's view on himself, and everyone surrounding him. He was the complete contradiction of his own view. Everything about him screams "AVERAGE!"
Games are his only strong point, and he's still average there. Luckily, a new game on the VR came out. Would he be able to carry out his ego, or would it be the exact opposite?

Title: Yowai - Season 1
Synopsis:
One day, before the end of the eleventh grade and the start of vacation, something changes. Yowai goes to sleep, as usual, but his awakening is anything but usual. Waking up at midnight, Yowai receives strange abilities.What will he do with this newly acquired power? How will it affect his life?Yowai’s journey has just begun, but many difficulties still lie in his way.
 
Note: Chapters come out when I get them ready, expect one chapter a week.

Title: The Red Lands
Synopsis:
The Red Lands
Starting alone from the bottom can be such a pain.
A story of being transferred to a new world.
If you are looking for a shocking OP character, this is not him.
If you are looking for a young master with abundant wealth this is certainly not it.
Maybe a poor slum child with a hidden past and bloodline. Poor yes, dirt poor. Full stop.
Incredible knowledge. Aside from some skills in business, nothing.
This is just a tale of an average individual trying to make the best of what he has.
An average human salary-man was transmigrated into the body of a boy from the slums. What made it worse was that it was a completely different world. Armed with only basic knowledge from his past life and nearly nothing from his present, he strives to survive.
Curiosity can become a deadly driving force for any human being. It all depends on who is wielding it.
Author Blog Link The Red Lands

Title: Facade
Synopsis: In a world full of lies, where does the truth lie? In the great unknown? In the minds of the rulers of the world? Or does the truth lie somewhere else? Somewhere....more obvious, where every single person can see and access....but do not realize?

Title: Lost
Synopsis: A short story about two friends who have an unexpected reunion a couple of months after graduating from senior high - unbeknownst to them how this meeting would lead them to rediscover themselves in each other.

Title: Field of blood
Synopsis: They can worship their God but call me crazy when I worship mine. They sacrifice civilizations for their Gods and call me a psychopath when I do the same. But tonight I will show them my devotion to God, the smell of blood will enrich the air when the corpses will pile up reaching the highest mountains.

Title: The Memoirs of Tiapa Kynos
Synopsis:
Hello, I'm Tiapa Kynos. My story starts in hell.
Not literal hell, mind, but the type of hell that only Destiny can create. The type of hell where every day is living agony and what burns the worst is that there was nothing you could have ever done to deserve where you ended up.   
But don't worry. Even though I started a slave, used in every fashion a female slave can be used, it ends in... well, I won't spoil it. Suffice it to say that recovering from 13 years of torture, misery, rape, and abuse is possible. It just takes a long, long time.  This is not the story of my time as a slave, but what came after. When I finally stole my freedom from those who never had a right to it. This is my story of learning that, even at 27, I was still a child, and finally getting a chance to grow up.
My story is of hope. Of finding a family. Of find my Destiny.
I hope it teaches you as much as it's taught me.

Title: ~I was Transported to another world and became overpowered thanks to my cheat skill~
Synopsis:
Person A was chosen, along with other 17 years olds, as heroes for a new world. Meeting cute girls, saving princesses in distress and other great adventures, follow our protagonist through the this amazing light-hearted adventure~!
------------
Parody of Isekai novels. Disregard title and description above if you're a synopsis nazi like myself. The tag for gore is not as a joke, don't read unless you like mass-murdering sociopaths. This just an attempt, so don't expect anything over the top.

Title: Disconnected
Synopsis: Grant never made it home. During his drive, he met what should have been a minor accident, but an unexpected failure left him crippled and without his only purpose. After reaching his tragic ending, he woke up in a strange new body. Given this strange new lease on life, he pledged to live the life that was torn from his grasp through whatever challenges it may bring him.

Title: The Playboy Bodyguard
Synopsis:
A mysterious 18 boy finds himself working as a bodyguard for the 17 year old rose hunt. Rose does not take kindly to a handsomely strange man coming to school and staying with her.
What type of problems might pop up when new and old realationships keep popping up all the time. Will rose fall for his manliness or will she hate him for the rest of her life.
What is this mysterious mans backround? Why does he have so many otherwordly women? And why is he so strong? The past will come to light the longer you read.

Title: The lineage of the Dunat Household
Synopsis: Essentially it's my first go at writing a story go easy on me? In a medieval world with swords and magic, among the many noble families there is one who has always birthed geniuses. This is a story of Jason one of those said geniuses as he goes to change both the way of the war and the continent. It is a story of morals, conquest, greed and the choices that Jason will make as he forges his way through history and leaves his name in search of the things he wants. in case you wish to assist me or simply talk to me here is a discord link you can contact me in this group. https://discord.gg/pu7Nza2

Title: Heavenly Will
Synopsis:
The world of five continents. It’s a world of no magic. A world were martial cultivators stand at the summit. A world where the strong prey on the weak. A world…of immortals.
Qing Yun. A name that stood at the peak of the world of the five continents. It was the name of a young man who stood between the strong. A young man known as Asura. A young man known as a heavenly saint. He killed millions, he saved thousands. He was known as the weak whom the strong feared. A young man who…reached the end of his life at the age of 21.
But…it was not the end. Who was the one that spoke to him in his last moments? It was a voice that sounded so domineering that it could shake the heaven itself. It was the voice that will change Qing Yun’s destiny forever.
Being given a second chance to live, Qing Yun was reborn in this world of immortals again. With a new life and a new family will he be able to protect his loved ones this time? Will he be able to save those whom he let down in his previous life?
Follow the story of this young man on his journey to immortality and his struggle…against the heaven…

Title: How i became a diety in another world
Synopsis:
One day. One man. Will experience something unnatural.
Join Cisk Kazzarch, as he is summoned to another world and in an ulikely turn of events, becomes the strongest of them all.

Synopsis: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaasaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

Title: Supervillain
Synopsis:
The world is broken and rotten.
It's supposed defenders are too weak willed to do what is necessary.
It's leaders are too corrupt to care for those beneath them
If they wont fix this world, then I will!
I will make the world a better place ..... by any means necessary!


Nice to meet you all. My name is Ginobi47. A lurker of fanfiction.net and now a writer of original fic.This is my first original work and I do hope you enjoy it!
Do remember that this is a fiction in the Superhero genre. Please expect the craziness that goes along with it.

Title: Binary Blood
Synopsis:
So a sad day begins when you wake up to find out you’ve been kidnapped, stashed with a bunch of strangers in a strange place, and you’re riding on a steam train headed God knows where.
An awesome day begins when you kill the crap out of a zombie, survive a train crash, outrun a hungry horde and wake up the next day with super powers.
A freaky day begins when you die without dying and a tank of talking fluid tells you you’re being recruited as a representative of humanity to decide if they’ll fight in a galactic war or get left in the dust.
I love my life.

Title: The Path Of Wolf
Synopsis:
Then evil is comming, fate will give a chance to loose or win. Join our adventure as MC will go and save the universe from total destruction!
note: English isn't my national language. So please! Inform me if you see grammar mistakes. Nice reading everyonone!
 
PS:Cover isn't mine

Title: Dungeon
Synopsis:
In the year of our lord ten-ninety-five it began; a holy war. One that would last, for three-hundred years. The forces of western world bearing down upon the holy land. For power, and status and glory; all men came seeking something, drawn to this new land and its new wonders to brave the horrors that waited within. Monsters, goblins, trolls, dragons, beasts the likes of which had long been slain in the 'civil' lands. And worst of all the place, a place of nightmare, that could drive men mad, that any soldier, no matter his mettle, fears; the gates to hell; The Dungeons.
  And amid this war, hidden in the storm and the slaughter, a man appears. A desserter, a bare faced recruit, a fool beyond measure. One who world change the face of the world.
  And truly define; The Dungeon

Title: Ever Upward
Synopsis:
All over the world of Wreath, enormous towers filled with mythical treasures and fearsome monsters shot out of the ground. It is said that those who reach the top of these spires gain incredible power capable of turning the tides of war.
Now, the nations of Wreath are locked in an arms race, trying to procure as many of these supersoldiers as they can for their armies. However, the gates of the towers reject anyone over the age of sixteen. Thus, the Seizures began.
Each major city in the country of Glasvain is required to hand over thirty children to be sent into the tower, usually decided by chance. The unlucky Seized are forced into the tower, given the choice of reaching the top, or facing certain death. 
Our hero, Kaila Linwood, is one such individual sent into the tower. Will she emerge with immense power? Or will she become one of the many Seized never heard from again?
*This is my first fic, so please keep in mind I'm still learning. Thank you and please enjoy the story!!

Title: Immortal Shadow
Synopsis: Shadow. It's not its name. It's just a shadow. What if someone told you that a shadow can actually practice Qi cultivation? This is about the path of a Shadow's cultivation to reach the apex.

Title: In a modern world with a game system!!!
Synopsis:
In a mordern world like our own, a young boy is walking with his dog trough the forrest arround his village.
But nothing would have prepared him for what would happen to him.
Follow the adventure of Dan Williams after he was struck by lightning and how it would change his live.
 
 
This story will be a weekly update

Title: Menstex
Synopsis:
An orphan looking for a home runs into a strange old man that gives him a beast spirit
Since he was young he never understood what it was ever since that day the boy was bullied because he didn't know his beast but today he starts the academy and he suddenly finds out he doesn't have one but two spirits.
Watch as he raids old temples, makes and discovers powers, finds ground-breaking beauties and his cultivation going sky high, in this extraordinary world called Menstex.

Title: A DKS Life
Synopsis: A group of guys called Dickolstavia (DKS for short) just live their everyday lives. Everything was going normal for them until a girl decides to join their group.

Title: Heavenly Artificer
Synopsis: A young boy suffering in a world of mortals, being taken advantage of and looked down upon by all was taken in by the worlds strongest artificer to become his successor but they can only share a short time together before a war strikes and the Realm of pangu falls into ruins. he takes on a new world and seeks to reach the apex to fufill his promise to succeed his master in his trade.

Title: World of Warcraft - VR
Synopsis:
Fan Fiction
World of Warcraft - VR
Set in the universe of World of Warcraft made by Blizzard Entertainment with a certain Virtual Reality spin.  Follow Kruichi (Orc), Thomas (Human), and Maallas (Night Elf) these three players are real life brothers adventuring and having fun within the game.
This fiction is for those who love World of Warcraft.  
I will be using a lot of WoW termanology.

Title: Totally Not Year 12
Synopsis: People tend to live life as they know it. Living with their friends, hating their enemies, and genrally just going along with the flow. So what is the big question? What if they lost all their memories? What if they forgot their previous lives, forgot their names, forgot all the experiences that made them who they are? what if they got dropped into a strange land, lost and alone with only a warning to survive? Would they remain true to themselves or would new experiences make them unrecognizable to their past selves?

Title: Was it meant to be?
Synopsis: A young man finds himself locked inside a chamber with no memories, after being released by an unknown female, he stumbles out to find himself trapped in yet another prision, a filthy room riddled with moss and cracks, but just before adressing that he may want to deal with the cable attached to the back of his head.

Title: Having a Farm is Easy Right?
Synopsis:
To have a farm is a dream for the young man named Raven. To watch his plants and animals grow and harvest them gives him the ultimate happiness. But this simple dream seems too far our young Raven..
Follow the adventures of Raven, as he tries to grow his farm and defend it from insects, beast, bandits, magical beast... and cultivators???

Title: Stella's Feathers
Synopsis:
A beautiful soul was born on Earth
The Goddess of Fortune decided to bless this soul to a life of fortune
But the Goddess of Beauty became jealous and turned fortune to misfortune
And so is the life of this soul lives, until at 16 where she dies to save a kind child from her cursed misfortune
Watch her grow as she learns to deal with her new surroundings, new friends, and the authors best attempt at a heartwarming story
-------------------------------------------

Title: A Blond Ray of Sunshine
Synopsis: A young, upbeat Pokémon Trainer named Antoshi travels around Kanto collecting Gym Badges with his best friend and only Pokémon, Fireball the Typhlosion. When Fireball is kidnapped by Team Rocket, Antoshi unwittingly unlocks superhuman powers within him. With the discovery of these powers, and family whom he never knew before, his life starts to change dramatically as he finds out he is destined for much greater deeds.

Title: A Wish Upon The Stars
Synopsis:
In a world not so different from ours, ages before the summit of man, a shower of meteors greeted the world. A sign of prosperity, an omen of the downfall of empires, a harbinger of good luck. Yet far beyond the mesmerizing sight of the night sky, none could know that it was the prelude to a catastrophe unimaginable to all. 
Frederick, a young man with an adventurous heart, had witnessed this event. From this began a tale of his heartwarming encounters.

Title: Tainted Bloodline
Synopsis:
Kori is the half-human daughter of a nobleman and the female demon who raped him. After performing an act of heroism, Kori is accepted into the Royal Castle. At this time a wolf demon and its werewolf minions threaten the entire realm. Can Kori defeat a demon worse than her birth mother? This story tells how Kori finds new family, new love and new troubles in the world of Royalty.
 
The following summer, Kori is scheduled to return to the Royal Castle, but evil is once more at work in their land!  Kori and her uncle Rudolph must fight the Swarm - evil cultists who are followers of the Lord of the Flies.

Title: Dawn of the Realms: Promised Daughter
Synopsis:
In the near future, the hottest new MMO is Dawn of the Realms. An action RPG with a fantastic new animation engine, it has finally arrived after months and months of hype to critical and commercial success.
And Susanne McDaniels, or Alkataia within the game, has just awoken within the game world.
She soon realizes that every night, when she falls asleep, she awakens within the body of her avatar within the game. For many, this would be a source of wonder and delight. For Susanne, though, it's only a source of fear.
For her eleven year old daughter also seems to have awoken within the game, and no matter where she looks, Alkataia can't seem to find her.
Where is her daughter? What is she doing every night? And why does she hear scattered fragments of dialogue about a Promised Daughter?

The first novel in the series can be found here. This work is a side story of that novel, exploring a different place, with a much different story playing out.

Title: A Dungeon's Journey
Synopsis: Follow the life of a dungeon crystal since its birth as he goes under the wings of his partner and guide, a pixie with grand ambition. Throughout their journey, they will face many dangers that will strengthen their bonds. Will they survive against humans, monsters, and even other dungeons?

Title: EndGame
Synopsis: You don't choose where you start out in life, that's just how it goes, but sometimes that starting point can be very, troubling. In darkness and mystery our character begins trying to figure out why he's in a very dark place with no way out, and no idea of who or what he is. It's a curious story where instead of things starting out easy and then progressively getting harder our main character must already find out how to get out of the dead end scenario with next to nothing to help. This fact and other horrors he learns along the way will make it clear he must already start preparing for the end or at least his own.

Title: Power is a Fist
Synopsis:
And, conversely, a fist is power. For much of human history, the fist has been a symbol of strength. 
It is used to represent the power of an army, and the unity of a nation. It is the salute of resistance, a show of solidarity. We clench our fists when we are angry or filled with righteous fury. To rule with an iron fist is to have total control. 
The essence of a fist is the desire to strike down those who wrong us and the things we hold dear. 
What to do, then, when threatened with death? Should one accept their powerlessness and resign themselves to their fate? Or, should they continue to fight tooth-and-nail despite the futility of their actions?
Sometimes, the actions of one can change the seemingly inevitable, purposefully or entirely by accident.

Title: Protectors (HIATUS)
Synopsis: In response to an alien invasion, the United Nations formed the Protectors of Earth Initiative.The initiative selected 40 of the world’s greatest heroes. These heroes, fought on the frontlines, of the three-year war.Through courage and bravery, seven heroes rose above the rest. Together they stopped the invasion and brought peace to Earth. From its humble beginnings, the Protectors continued, ushering in a new era of heroes.However, in a world where heroes shine in the spotlight, villains lurk in the dark. One war has come to a close, but another has begun. A war against villainy and anarchy. A war that will shape the world, in the year 2035, and for generations to come.

Title: Ember
Synopsis: I have no idea where this is going, the plot is random... dont expect much.

Title: H Y P E R S P A C E
Synopsis: Hyperspace is a serialized saga about... Oh, you know—love, friendship, betrayal, revenge, moral ambiguity. Basically, life. But in space. VIRTUAL SPACE! And with superpowers. And mechas. GIANT MECHAS! And sentient pandas piloting mecha pandas powered by dragon hearts! Oh, also, don't forget poor life decisions! Join us as we go full anime teenage angst in this true to life coming of (r)age story. The goal isn't to become the hero that saves the galaxy, it's surviving long enough while resisting the siren call of the dark side!

Title: average slime
Synopsis: Just a meh slime in a fantasy world what will happen to him in this new life.

Title: Mother
Synopsis:
Due to a series of events, a young girl of only five years old had been sacrificed to a local god so as to avoid incurring its wrath.
Now, young Ariadne is being raised as the daughter of the spider goddess, Kuukona.
A short and heartwarming slice-of-life about a little girl and a monster is about to begin.
With one feared and the other forsaken, this is the tale of a mother and child.

Title: God of Crows
Synopsis:
What happens when a god ends up in the mortal realm and all he really wants is revenge on his fellow almighty beings?
This is but a simple tale about a god who wakes from a centuries long slumber that was forced upon him.
---------------------------
This story takes place in a default fantasy setting: Medieval world, monsters, magic, RPG-style skills / levels.
It is also the first tale i ever wrote.
Feel free to criticise, it is greatly appreciated.
I hope you like it.

Title: The broken cycle,  Book one - The shattered moon
Synopsis:
Dungeon perspective, fantasy.
An ancient race awaits in hibernation in order to devour a new world, but everything is not going according to plan.

Title: The Project system: Data Reboot
Synopsis: The beginning of the end, I believe that is how it went. Prometheus and I are the last members of the Project System. This system was made up of a group that had individual species with unique abilities, there were 26 members including Prometheus & I. I was the first member of the program and the A.I. named Prometheus was the second.

Title: Maiden
Synopsis:
A young woman is sent to another world. There she takes up the mantle of a [Swordsman]. With force of arms and a knowledge of RPGs, she'll take the world by storm! ...then there's me.
The path of a [Maiden] is bittersweet. On the one hand staying in town while my [Champion] gets loot and levels is lonely. Then when I am out in the field I'm little more than a escort quest NPC! On the other hand instead of having to loot rats and strangle goblins to death I can relax and do more fun things. Like drinking! Or dancing! Or making cash! Or more drinking!
The problem is that people from another world get all kinds of attention. As do people who sell more monster parts and rare items than most see in a lifetime. And seeing as I'm the one who stays in town to sell all this stuff I'm the one who has to deal with the fallout. Joy.

Title: The Four Territories (Sample)
Synopsis:
He was like a father to me... and I wanted to cut his throat.
In a world divided into four territories, each with their own unique sun, color, race, and culture, Esh is born and abandoned in the cruelest of all. The red territory of Reah. A land in which every day is an absolute struggle for survival.One day, an elderly man discovers the boy mortally wounded on the side of the ash-filled streets and takes pity on him, a kindness unknown in the land of Reah. Then, using violent and unorthodox training, he teaches the boy the skills necessary to endure the harshness of the territory. Skills of a master assassin. Combat. Sorcery. Alchemy.All is going well until a dark and forgotten energy finds its way into young Esh's body. Wreaking havoc on his mind, it threatens to drag his spirit into darkness.If Esh doesn't use all his mental and physical strength to combat the ancient energy then he will surely be destroyed.
Available on Amazon for $.99 for a limited time!

Title: Avatar: The Wild Lands (A Medieval 'Avatar: The Last Airbender' Fiction)
Synopsis:
Stormy clouds hover over the Wild Lands. The Raiders of the North Sea, in the name of the Spirits of the Deep, ravage the misty shores. The Empire of the Holy Flame’s serfs hide in the fiefs of Fire Knights and guard themselves against the Dark Spirits that roam the wilds. The Caliph in the East, leading his Holy Army, heads towards the hopeless Heaven's Shrine. There, the beleaguered monks listen as the Voice of the Wind predicts the coming of a saviour. The saviour who will teach harmony to a world that has forgotten peace.
This savior is the Avatar, the ancient embodiment of balance: the one who wields the Four Elements to establish unity among the Four Nations, as well as between humankind and spirits.
(This is a non-profit fan-fiction. Avatar: The Last Airbender & Avatar: The Legend of Korra are a property of Nickelodeon, Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzk. We support the official release)

Title: Oblivion Void
Synopsis:
In the year 2048 the worlds third advanced virtual reality gaming device was created in an attempt to make the most realistic false reality. Along with the release of the device came the most anticipated game in almost eleven years, Oblivion Scale. Now, millions of Beta players are waiting to become the first generation to conquer the oblivion world.

Title: Mevhria
Synopsis: Conquered by the gods, giants, mortals, mythical beasts, and other beings; in Mevhria they take place. Different characters with different stories will be explored beyond the story. For good and evil they stand, there will only be one hero that will save them from darkness.

Title: A Bored Gods Tale
Synopsis: In a vast universe There was a God named Dom

Title: Tale of Yashima
Synopsis:
Tale of Yashima is loosely based on the Sengoku era of Japan. The power of the shogunate has crashed and the daimyos of Yashima are fighting for the survival of their clans and control of the land. However, they’re not the only ones. Yashima is a land where both man and yokai co-exist, and not always peacefully. As the daimyos are busy with each other the yokai are also planning their next move. The Night Parade is coming, and not everyone is going to survive.
 
Published every Monday, Wednesday and Friday.

Title: Chaotic Shadows (Temporary Name)
Synopsis:
Generic protag dies, meets a godlike being, reincarnates in new world with some form of system.  System is based on Shadowrun 4th with some alteration to the source material, and lots of custom stuff.  
 
I will not claim to be original, and will reference lots of other works.  If you spot one, call it out in the comments, first to do so each chapter might get a character in a future chapter.  The chapters will be sporadic at best, since i am only writing as a hobby, and when i am in the mood for it.

Title: Blackwood
Synopsis:
Caenerth is a world of wonders where magic and monsters have existed since its creation.
The world, however, is on the brink of destruction. Plagues have swept the world, leaving thousands dead. Famine left millions starving. Wars, nation against nation, brother against brothers have been waged across the world.
Lord Barnabas Blackwood, the most terrible dark mage in history of Caenerth, answerable only to Sendra, the god of chaos himself, decided to go back in time to seek one thing he desires the most:
Redemption.

Title: OverPowered
Synopsis:
Overpowered,
What else can I say?
Watch as the world trembles before the final bosses.

Title: Flaming Phoenix
Synopsis:
This is a story of two twins, it starts out with the dense younger twin in the beginning telling how the story began. Her older twin lived with their father is annoyed how easily influenced her younger twin sister is and by how useless her sister is. Frost the older twin lives in the Higher worlds known as Realms, her younger twin is in the middle world known as Worlds. These two are separate places and a known fact for it's  residents except the middle world. Realms use portals to travel through worlds. Whereas Realms if you fly high enough you end up in another world. 
Frost hates her grandmother who cast down her mother to marry a human who threatened her. They were of the proud royal Phoenix lineage. Her hate of the humans is cause by this and how they so easily manipulate her younger twin. Cecilia lived with her mother in the duke's house spoiled rotten and is confused when after her mother's death her father turned cold. He introduced her adoptive brother to her. She is love struck for the first time and not wanting to believe a word anyone says about him being bad for her. He takes away her affection from her father (he's not really her real father but she doesn't believe her mother's words) and takes everything she cares about yet she doesn't understand why he does this to her. 
(This is a girl and girl story so if your expecting them to be with a guy be ready to be disappointed and it's about the cruel reality of how life doesn't go how you expect it.)

Title: Magus Scholar of the Mirror World
Synopsis:
The man who seeks the truth of Magic. The man who will accumulate all the mysteries in all worlds and solve all of its puzzles. The man who will overturn the Heavene with insight alone. 
Not believing in fate nor in Akasha but only in the Sixth Haven.
His name is Kir Avram, who aspires these dreams.

Title: Agent: Novack Ardrew
Synopsis:
Ardrew graduated top of her class and has several inventions pending with the Ministry of Science. She has recently been pulled from classes to become an Agent for the Cosmic Military Task Force, or CMTF.
I reccomend we have her become a field agent, he work in the field will stunt her inventive mind. Our world is not ready for such violent contraptions.

Title: Hearth's Odyssey
Synopsis:
Miloh - a foul mouthed college student from Earth, throught the faults of some messed up science experiment on part of his eccentric father, an inventor, gets his teleported to a parallel universe.
Though this is the least of his worries...
Not only does he wake up on the most forgotten and remote human colony / scrapyard planet in the sector of a galaxy overflowig with "space-zombies", he also wakes up in the body of a teenage girl!
The journey to get home is a trecherous one, not counting the death droids, raiders, space pirates, or even game-esque screens that bombard him every waking second!
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Author's note: Hello there, just to note, this story will be updated alongside another one of my stories, in other words, im gona try and take turns updating them and I'll see how that works out.

Title: Reincarnated as a Team Rocket Member?!
Synopsis: Hi there, I'm a NEE- *ahem I uh... mean a hardcore otaku.  I don't know how to say this but, I've been reincarnated into the world of Pokemon!  That's right!  I'm gonna catch them all!  But first I have to train hard, even with all my knowledge from my previous life I've never heard of how to train as a member of Team Rocket.... and it doesn't end there, soon after my rebirth my new family was attacked by some shady figures with martial art skills.... huh? I thought this was pokemon?  Just what is happening here?!

Title: Dungeon of Lights
Synopsis:
Dungeons are strange and mysterious things. From the great Labyrinths that span between continents to mist shrouded valleys Dungeons come in many forms. A new dungeon has woken up far far below the earth with no idea of what she is doing. How will this young dungeon survive let alone devour adventurers when her birthplace looks out upon a sea of magma?
This is not the first story I have written, but it is the first on this site so please feel free to critique and review. 
When I inevitably make mistakes in chapters feel free to tell me and I will see if I can fix it.
 I do not own the picture, cover picture is temporary until I figure out a better cover.
While not a fanfiction this story is heavily inspired by countless hours of playing Dwarf Fortress and even more playing Terraria. Also a lot of insperation from having repeatedly read the omnibus form of 'A Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galexy' By Mantle I love that book. Tags are for later chapters. Reader discretion is advised.

Title: Lavenza
Synopsis:
In the world of Heimer, the decadent four Grand Empires maintain themselves engulfed in war and constant strife while monsters roam the earth and the minor Kingdoms try to seize power for themselves. Strange portals transport whole three men and they find themselves lost in this foreign world, without neither powers or godly favor.
However, this is not a story about the heroes that saved the world, nor about the legendary adventurers that shaped the history to come, neither is about the great conquerors that unified humanity.
This is the story of three separate men, strangled in a strange land, by a struck of bad luck.
How will their story unfold?

Title: Sprouting Magic
Synopsis: A young man finds an escape from his boring life on a farm.  The world of magic and technology unfolds. What was a myth is becoming real again. What was lost is being rediscovered.

Title: The Realm
Synopsis:
If you had an ability that far surpassed others what would you do?
 
Would you let it be neglected or would you choose to use it to become something more?
 
Welcomed to The Realm where your natural gifts will be enchanted beyond there past capabilities as you have to struggle in foreign worlds with a given mission if you wish to keep what you have gained through it.
 
follow the journey of Zed a man with a gifted body that believes the mind to be the superior means of the human race as he struggles in these foreign worlds with his superior regeneration as his tool to find the truth behind his abonnement.

Title: The Demonologist: The Beelzebub Job
Synopsis: Bert is just your average, everyday working-class demonologist, a magical practitioner who specializes in the study of demons. He lives a comfortable life in Appollyon, the city where mankind and demons exist side by side, earning his living tracking down rogue demons. But his life is turned on its head when the Azerak, daughter of Satan and Bert's best friend, calls on him to help rescue her apprentice from the clutches of the Demon Prince of Envy. Together with a biblical antihero and an angry demon intent on devouring his soul, Bert will need all of his skill, training, and a pinch of luck to save the girl and get out alive.

The world has been corrupted for far to long and it has anger the gods so it was decided it was time for judgement and now human got to fight for a chance to survive but the god of mercy and god of love gave a lil chance to live when all hope is lost.
Lee soo Kim is one who thrown in such a world, he got to fight unknown monster in hope survive in a world where bloodline class determine ur might watch Lee soo Kim destroy his enemy whether it human or monster alike

Title: Hollowed Out
Synopsis:
Desmonde Sixte is an orphan whom is forced to work in the coal mines by his aunt and uncle, beaten by them continuously throughout his life. One day after the backbreaking labor he is forced to endure throughout the day, he ends up finding a man eating a young womans corpse...

Title: Of Blood and Body
Synopsis: Hidden within the Kartse Plains, lie the crumbling remains of anceint ruins. Withered away by the forces of nature, wind chipping at the stone walls and moss growing upon the decrepit remains, the tragedies of the past have been lost to time itself. Nobody remembers of the kingdom brought to ruin, of its culture and legacy. It is but an idle tradition, to speak of the city that only sleeps. Kingdoms war, trade commences, adventures brave horros to discover untold treasures. The ruins are of idle concern. The proliferating undead that roam within crypts and leftover tombs are of little interest to grave robbers and adventurers. Anything of value has long been taken or wasted away. Yet the ruins claim dozens every year. Would-be treasure hunters filter in, not for the trinkets or baubles of the bygone era, but for the mystery that lay deepest within the ruins. The depths of the ruins hold questions that have yet to be answered, of what lay underneath, and of what.. the ruins did not yet forget..

Title: Universe! - Tales of the New Dimension
Synopsis: Karma "K" Narsu, a junior in highschool, finds himself in a daily schedule. A schedule of no change, a schedule of relaxation. Though, just like everything else, it will have an end. Just like anything, and everything, it will all change. Many friends come, and many friends go. Many things will change, such as friendship, logic, and even relationships, so watch as everything will eventually unravel as Karma, "K", finds his way through an unknown, and new 'Dimension'!

Title: A Good Bargain [HIATUS]
Synopsis: Warren, A 34 - year old stock market trader, lived a life of riches until he's coerced into doing actions that would look good even in a 'Wolf of Wall Street' movie. As the market crashes on a faithful day in 2008, his action comes to light. His superiors make him take the fall using their financial powers. He finds himself with little to no money, disgraced and hated by the populace. He dies saving a young woman from being hit by a freight truck, pushing her out of the way whilst leaping thinking at least he'd saved a single life after everything that has befallen him.Yaksa is a god of a different world and is in dire need of souls to balance the yin and yang on his planet. His search for souls with extreme yang brings him to ask other gods for cooperation. This is how he finds our MC. He takes pity on the poor man and gives him a single cheat! In the world, he has reincarnated people develop 'gifts' that come from their desires and experiences. The cheat he gains is a 'gift' that will develop from his first life on earth! As a former stockbroker that learned how much money means in life, he gets the gift of Appraisal! Follow Warren as he starts his life in search of wealth and status in this world of power and magic! Here starts the story of the King of Wealth! "A good bargain!" - Warren

Synopsis:
?Warning contains ero scenes?

Title: The Wager For Everything
Synopsis:
In all the universes, from their beginnings to their ends, one exception will be made. Precisely one. Not more, not less.
Can you imagine the importance of such an event?
If in real life, death, for instance, makes one exception, just one, how much is the worth of the person who comes back from a place, no one ever came back from, nor ever will again?
Something unique by definition, breaking the rules, is of immeasurable rarity. Exactly once. Out of all events that ever happened or ever will.
I hope you get the same feeling of melancholic awesome when you read this.
This is the story about a girl, who will be THE exception. She just doesn't know it yet.

Title: Lorian Ellins [Dropped]
Synopsis:
Lorian found himself in the medieval European style world, thinking he went back in time.
However, upon inquiring, he realized history, customs and as such were different.
This was a whole new world he knew nothing about. A place where powerful were respected and feared, a place where monsters and different races existed.
After a lucky encounter, Lorian manages to secure a job, home and survival.
However, the world is large and ready to be explored. Lorian won't be lost in mediocrity. This is his destiny.
Nonetheless, everyone starts at a low point in life.
Fast growth and OPness seemed impossible even with the help of the system.
, Life is neither a game nor a bunch of numbers. It's far more complex and unpredictable. We don't know where we stand in the future, or is there even future prepared for us? I always thought that overused motto in wuxia novels, '' I want to control my destiny '' was cliche and we had less control over our lives as they are dictated by many other factors. This world taught me otherwise, thus this place shall be my new beginning. ''

Title: Realm Of Olde
Synopsis: Danny was just a simple nerdy pervert who preyed on videogames and the sight of cute girls. After purchasing a really suspicious retro VR headset from a fleamarket on a whim, she'll find that this atari-like knockoff is a little more than it seems. Traveling across space and time, luckily inhibiting the body of a stuffed toy bear of an adorable girl, becoming a legend with the very chuuni name 'Van Vanderbelt'; she discovers that maybe this new life isn't all that it's cracked up to be… but throws that idea out the window when seeing all the skinclad babes and cuddly eye-candy who just love toys ("the teddy-bear kind, you pervy lech").

Title: Ethereal Reality
Synopsis:
One mystical object from one different dimension in one blank room, telling one past about one person’s alternate life.  Nobility and honor?  Or agony and despair?  For every person, the story and the quest within oneself differs.  Depending on the item, the end goal within each person will determine the outcome of life or painful death.
19 year-old college student Suzume Akihiro is a kind, caring and overall friendly girl who puts others in front of herself.  Everything seems to be heading in the right direction with her life, but one unfortunate day on the way back from college, an incoming speeding car crashes into her and her boyfriend, 20 year-old Sanjiro Nakada, leaving behind two lifeless corpses.
It’s her turn in this so called “Purgatory Room”, and the item that rests on a marble pedestal tells a story much contrasting to her personality.  She realizes the painful trek throughout an incredible dimension that she must journey across, hoping that one day she can rest peacefully.

Synopsis: These are just short stories. They do not continue together. I just wanted to see what you guys think about my writing before I create a story. Hope you enjoy them :)

Title: Tangible Dreams: Erotic Short Paranormal Romance Collection
Synopsis:
Princess Mia must choose from six princes to marry and she must do so by the next day. Feeling overwhelmed and lost, she is granted a gem that will show her a glimpse of married life with each prince.
Surely, she can't base her decision off a dream alone can she? What if she had the power to taste, touch, smell, hear and see into the dream would that help her choose?

Title: The World beyond the Veil
Synopsis:
This story is deprecated
After this story was published (and a lengthy hiatus), I have rewritten the story from scratch, with both minor and major changes. I have decided to keep the first version of the story here for several reasons. Just know that this is unfinished and a "better" version of it, at least in my opinion, exists. 

After witnessing a brutal massacre, Martin's life would inevitably change. He just hadn't expected exactly how much it would change. How much he would change. How different the world really was, beyond the Veil. 

Slightly more in-depth spoiler-ish intro: 


As Martin will learn, magic is real. As for why most inhabitants of Earth was unaware; the very presence of mundane individuals dampens magic around them. That problem, as it turns out, is pretty exclusive to Earth. 



Regarding genre
I find it hard to decide exactly which genres to apply to the story. The ones I have put on the story (Contemporary, Adventure, Fantasy) are the ones I'm certain about. In addition, it arguably contains elements of Drama and Psychological, at least according to their descriptions: 
Drama: Dramatic stories focus on emotional themes and interpersonal relationships. These stories feature realistic characters and their emotional development.
Psychological: Psychological stories focus on the inner action of the characters, including motives, thoughts and emotions from which plot events result. Characterization is particularly important to the story. (...)
On the topic of Gender Bending
There is a gender flip fairly early in the story (Male to female, chapter 7). This is an important aspect of the story that I want to explore with respect. If the very idea of gender-bending bothers you, please feel free to ignore this story. 
As a result, the story has a Male Lead up to chapter 7, and a Female Lead afterward. 
Release schedule
I post a chapter every Thursday at 20.00 (8 PM) CET. I may occasionally release two chapters at the same time if they're particularly short.

Title: The Tower of Gaia
Synopsis:
A game, a game, a game. So many stories about life in a game with status screens. This is a game too, a cruel, dark, bleak place where survival is a thread away from death. All living things live in the tower of Gaia. No not that goddess... Gaia a being that truly loathes all of existence. Our prisoner outside the cell, the warden.
 
The tower of Gaia isn't just a large tower. This tower spans galaxies in size, every floor flooded with the living, the cursed, and the truly unfortunate.
 
This story is truly not for the faint of heart!

Title: The Divine Path
Synopsis:
A game that boasts about having the perfect combination of realism and fantasy, becoming the leading game with over 2 Billion players worldwide. "The Divine Path". Follow the story of this games epic adventure through the eyes of Sora Yazuki, a man who is reborn 10 years before a tragic accident, leading him to start the game anew with years of experience under his belt. What tricks will he play to repave his path to eternal glory and smash those who opposed him in his previous life?

Title: The Swimmer and the Manager
Synopsis:
The Prado Maranhão Aquatic Sport Club, a place where those who aim at the top of the water sports gather. Nelson, once called the future of Brazil’s swim, is near the end of his recovery after a serious accident that almost costed his life. But with the beginning of the new Olympic cycle, he needs to show he can swim at the same level, or his contract might not get renew. To his surprise, the club assigned him a manager to help him on his recovery. And the surprises don’t stop there, since the new manager is a boy.

Many Gods rule the universe but only one God stands at the top. The Supreme God. The God of Creation and Destruction. No one can question his existence No one can overpower his existence.

Title: Shadows of Naamor
Synopsis:
In Naamor, many secrets remain in the ancient realm.  Few are meant to be found.
 
With the demise of the Dream Hoarder, peace has been restored to the land since the celebrated founding of House Ravenmane, yet a new horror emerges as rumours of treachery surface against the fledgling noble family.  Its closest retainers squabble over the frivolous while the nature of war stands to be changed forever with a discovery curious merchants from around the world call black powder.
 
As all this unfolds the young lord, Klaus of Lysenia, has journeyed there to continue his pursuit of knowledge on Ishian artifacts believed kept within Naamor Castle itself, yet his very presence may embolden what few thought existed.  An awakening of evil there so great may test the aspiring warrior of light and threaten all he holds dear.

Title: Curiosity Didn't Killed the Dungeon
Synopsis:
Matthew Johnson, born with curiosity of a cat, bored with things fast, and lazy. Not a genius but above average, he has fine grades and living his life normally. Bored with it, he reads fantasy novels and played games.
However, his daily life changed when the whole people in the classrom got summoned into another world.
With the summoner not having enough mana, some of the summoned lost their physical body, and reincarnated instead.
This is a story of Matt, given the chance to select the race he wanted to reincarnate into, he become a dungeon to fill his curiosity.
Note: This story is just something that I write in my free time so, no schedule. And, I used this story to learn more how to write.

Title: The Enchantments(Volume One)
Synopsis:
In the city of Sector Seventeen magic and science work hand and hand to change it from the ground up. Creatures thought to be made up from nightmares and fairy tales are all real as any human. Living. Breathing. Dying.
Born a human but now confined in a body made from the newest tech and ancient incantations Suki can't help but see the irony in the world's advancements. Discrimination against the inhuman kind is at large and no one seems to care. As a student of a prestigious military she's forced to look the other way when these things happen.
However when met face to face with these attacks will Suki and her two companions a semi psychotic shifter cousin and a witch with tricks up her sleeve be able to stand tall and fight for what's right?

Title: Worldfall Astraea
Synopsis:
It has been approximately twenty-five years since the advent of full-immersion virtual reality pods. Artificial intelligence on the level of independence is also available now. It is a case of Sky-Net will not occur because of all the counter-measures and unless someone programs an A.I. to do so, then there will not be a terminator movie coming to life.
Despite with all these advances, society is still stumbling along the second millennium. People live their lives normally like always; going to school, going to work, going to play, chatting from friends… and playing full-immersion virtual reality games with complete-body capsules.
Worldfall Astraea is the newest, most anticipated ultimate full-dive virtual reality roleplaying game in the year 2075. This game is not only for made for normal entertainment, much of the systems are also customized for professional gamers that use and earn real money as well.
This is a story, however, of one special player that had become integrated into the main storyline, giving rise to an epic within the game that intrigues both the developers and gamers alike. The intrigue soon spreads beyond the game and into reality, where a single person, regardless of what others may say, can make a difference.

This can be considered a reworked, off-shoot rewrite of Polaris Dark with a unique style and storyline. One of the other reasons I dropped the Polaris Dark is because it already had a couple of mishaps that felt a bit like a Deus-Ex-Machina. The profession choice and quest line of the main character was also a bit too unrealistic. The main character from Polaris Dark and this story will be similar in their current life but there are very prominent differences in the lives of both.
This is a slow-releasing series as I have much to do for school. Please do not rush my work as it will have no effect on my writing speed and spare time for writing.

Title: A Wandering Soul
Synopsis:
Hello everyone.
Let me introduce our protagonist, Matt.  An ordinary human who is forced to wander through space and time. Not with the help of some spacecraft or time machine, but with his newly awakened powers. Will he be able to ever return to his normal life? Join him in his adventure and find out.

Title: Sector 27
Synopsis:
It wasn't until June 3, 2101 that World War 4 ended. This was not a war that ended in peace treaties or truces; this war ended with disease. The atomic war caused plague and disease that crippled major countries. The generals and great leaders of the countries at war died from the radiation that penetrated every part of the globe. It was only then that humanity realized what they had done- what they had created. The first ever mutant was publicly executed the very day the war ended, and a new war began: the war against mutants. 
The surviving nation of Japan quickly rebuilt their country by dividing it into safe zones, or Sectors. There are currently 26 livable sectors in Japan; Sector 1 is the richest sector and the only sector that has completely rid itself of all radiation left over from the war. In fear against the threat of mutants, the once small section of the police force grew until it became the main police force in Japan. After all, humans shouldn't be blamed for crimes when the real threat to society is mutants. This police force that goes by their motto: Special Treatment Against Mutants (STAM) is comprised of agents that go about their work to capture and detain all mutants. Sector 26 is the poorest sector that humans can barely survive in; but there is one more part of Japan. This "dead zone" has such a high concentration of radiation that if a human were to step inside the barrier, they would die in mere moments. But within this dead zone, this 27th Sector, there lies a secret organization of mutants that fight against STAM and protect all mutants from their grasp. The Mutant Recovery and Protection Agency (MRPA) operates to hide mutants in society and allow them to live human lives. The only thing that stands in MRPA's way is STAM and its agents who hunt them down ruthlessly, so MRPA has their own set of skilled agents. And the battle rages on...

Title: Runes like Veins - HIATUS
Synopsis:
AN: This is on indefinite hiatus/cancelled due to lack of time and motivation.  I like the premise and might eventual continue it, but don't hold your breath. Sorry.
-----
"She was tall and lean, with an intricate pattern of scars upon her chest.  Runes, like veins, covered her arms.  There must have been thousands of them, pulsing, filled with magic instead of blood."
Anael ru'Vorgin had learned many things by the time she turned 19.  She had learned blacksmithing and a bit of weaponsmithing under the tutelage of her father Vorgin ru'Harkovir.  She had learned basic alchemy, and where to find the necessary ingredients for it, from the town healer.  She had become quite adept at hunting, initially by attempting to emulate her older brother Harvin, and later by practicing it while searching for herbs and such.  Yes, Anael has learned many things, but the knowledge she treasures most, despite it's deficit when compared to her other skills, is her knowledge of magic.  She may know less than would be expected of a first year student at the Academy of Sigilry and Elements in the capital city of Balriet, but when her home is attacked and she lies on the cold ground with her blood seeping through her clothes, it is not her knowledge of how to hammer steel which might save her.
 
Author's Note:  I don't have anything particularly gruesome or horrifying, as I see it, in here, but I decided to check the content warning boxes since people's values vary, and there will be a focus on Anael learning more about magic, which will sometimes (maybe often) involve her carving, burning, or tattooing runes and sigils into her skin.  I don't go for gore, etc. for shock value, but I don't really pull my punches either.  I didn't check sexual content, because I have no plans for that, but I also don't promise it won't ever be added, so if that's an issue for you then definitely recheck the tags before reading a new chapter, in case I change my mind once the story gets off its feet.

Title: Choice of Fate: Online
Synopsis:
Jacob Irwin loves his teaching career. The experience and joy of helping others understand mathematics keeps Jacob going through the long hours of his job. Give Jacob a problem or a student in need and he will throw himself into finding a solution. This focused dedication to his career and students has helped Jacob excel as a teacher for the past ten years.
Unfortunately for Jacob, these tendencies to throw himself into his work has left him single and alone. Now Jacob finds himself experiencing a quarter-life crisis at the age of 34. He yearns to live more now than ever. At least that's what he tells himself when he reflects on the time spent towards his career.
During one of these moments of reflection, Jacob found himself reminiscing about the games of his childhood. Caught in the pull of nostalgia from games of old and the desire for change, Jacob throws himself into the world of gaming again.
Now we see Jacob spend his money on a new high end computer with the latest in immersive virtual reality hardware. His goal is simple: find the joy of his childhood through gaming once again. His game of choice? Choice of Fate: Online, a virtual reality massive multiplayer online game. The game of 2027 that promises, "The freedom to play the way you want!"
Will Choice of Fate give Jacob the happiness he seeks? Or will Jacob's foray into Choice of Fate drive him further from his pursuit of happiness? Only time will reveal Jacob's fate...

Hello ladies and gentlemen! Welcome to my first attempt at writing a novel. I am preparing to participate in the 2017 NaNoWriMo event so enjoy the first chapter as that's here early only to ensure that I have a place to post once the event starts. This means the first novel/book will have a target of 50,000 words. I'm excited to attempt this challenge despite the hurdles I will have to overcome. I do have a demanding full time job so planning time to write and make weekly releases starting in November will be my biggest challenge.
Also, please accept my apologies on my cover. I'm not an artist and the only digital tool available at my disposal is the stock microsoft paint. So I did my best to create a decent cover as I did not want to steal the work of another. If there are those interested by the end of November in donating a new fan made cover then I will look into replacing the old cover.

********* Author's Note *********
This is my first published book so feedback would be appreciated. A couple of caveats. First this story is about the details, if you don't enjoy reading and finding the easter eggs or just like to speed read through the chapters you will probably not enjoy it. Title: Journey to Elvander
Synopsis:
Journey to Elvander will be available on Kindle, iBooks, and Print on 2/14/2018. If you read it here, please leave a review on release day. Your help is greatly appreciated! Feel free to contact me via Twitter to get yourself a FREE advanced eBook copy.
 
Deacon Maynard may be young, but he is hardly idealistic. A Tech Repairman, he spends his days surrounded by tools and broken phones, watching the news unfold on the television while carefully trying to avoid the reality that seems inevitable.
There is a war out there… and it is creeping closer and closer to his home. 
Elvander, a high-tech country miles away, is locked in a colossal battle with the deadly terrorist organization, Shadow Cannon… and it’s a war Deacon wants nothing to do with. 
Until he spies a flash of light outside his apartment window and discovers Ragnar, a giant machine Golem meant to be a Shadow Cannon secret weapon – a machine that is now asking for his help. 
Suddenly thrust into a war he wants no part of, Deacon must struggle to discover the truth, save his strange new friend and possibly save the world.

Title: Interstellar Transmigration of an Office Lady
Synopsis: Yuling (??), certified paperwork hater and cannon fodder casualty of the apocalypse, is reborn some few thousand years later during the Interstellar era of humanity.  With most of her previous life's memories intact in a dog eat dog world of survival of the strongest, Yuling has one goal - a life without paperwork!

Title: Sinner's Resolve: An Agent's Wish
Synopsis:
A demon that had never batted an eye while mercilessly reaping the lives of many. A prodigy who accomplished the impossible. A hero that dutifully followed his orders. A messiah of the people.  Many titles were given to him, whether it be in praise or in fear, but only one thing could be agreed upon by the people...All who he had ever crossed paths with had met an untimely death. He slowly rose to the top and earned himself the name of Black Death. A nameless person who was eventually awarded a cursed and bloodied name...
Must this continue?......
He stared at his hands before turning his gaze towards his next three targets. Their photographs were neatly aligned along his makeshift table, accompanying him inside of a dimly lit room. Each one of them had earned their seat as the best special agents within their respective organizations.
There must be a way...There has to be a way...
Shaking away his thoughts, he quietly pocketed away the photos before exiting the room.
A chance meeting that would forever change his cruel fate, and a wish that would transcend worlds. This is the story of a man who had nothing yet lost everything but a single wish, a silver lining that would completely change his life.
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Author's Notes -
Hello everyone! This is my first work and I will hopefully stay around for a while. I will try to finish or at least expand on this piece of work for quite some time, expect a few hiatuses in between though, still have a bit of schooling to do. Expected release dates will probably be once a week(not sure yet) after I stabilized the novel a bit as I'm still debating on how I should handle this. I prefer fleshed-out works compared to quick releases, but it also depends on how I'm feeling. I don't have a lot of confidence in my writing skills and I believe that my writing style is a bit weird, but I do want to try my best to tell a story that's worth telling. I will gladly accept criticism but please try to pull the punches back a bit! I'm still only human after all. Very excited to work on this, please take good care of me as I proceed on this journey with all of you!
P.S. 
If you're going into my series, expect to see cliches sprinkled here and there. I personally love cliches and a few tropes! But, that goes without saying, I want to put my own spin on them. Be ready to feel the edge!!! Heh.

Title: Dogs, Gods, and Dyslexic Editors
Synopsis: What would you do if you had the chance to save the world? Would you jump at the opportunity? Would you wrap yourself in a soft cocoon of denial? Or, would you grab a bowl of popcorn and opt to watch the world burn? Whatever your choice- or lack thereof- just remember, even the best laid plans have a tendency to go horribly wrong.

Title: Integrity and Solace
Synopsis: A son of the Two greatest Magus named, Katsurou Aino was forced to be apart of All-Father's All-out War. As a result, He suffered physical trauma that led him to Amnesia. After a year had passed, He regained his memories except for the memories he had when he was forced to be apart of the All-out War. due to that, His parents died due to All Father's curse called "Apostasia" where those who have this curse only have 2 more years to live. Katsurou knowing that his parents died, he suffered another Amnesia but was quickly recovered by his little sister with methods that no medical expert can do. After having two Amnesias, He was under an effect by a spell that allows him to be immune to any physical trauma by an unknown magus whom his little sister called for help. Now that he can no longer suffer Amnesia, He can now participate again in All-Father's All-out War but things have changed. All-Father chose random people from another dimension to be Arcanas. Somehow, Katsurou learned that this "All-out War" has been around for hundreds of years. After that, He was given an artifact by his little sister that let him activate his true power back when he received his First Amnesia. With the help of the artifact, He can return to the All-out War but with less experience due to him being able to have Amnesia. With his motto, "None is Absolute" the questions surround him that will he survive? or will he die? Kill with faith or be Killed with faith...Comments,Criticism and Corrections are acceptable.No schedule so yeah...

Title: Experiment 347
Synopsis:
Year 2043. A scientist is running a secret laboratory. But things just aren't going as planned.
He leaves a last command for his AI before he leaves the laboratory - in hopes of everything staying operational until the time he manages to return.. or at the very least, that nothing can be tracked back to him..

Title: The Harbinger
Synopsis:
Small Introduction to the World:
The Magic Continent of Marar is a humongous continent over which many kingdoms rule. It is populated by Humans, Beastman, Dwarfs, Elves, Fairies, magical creatures and various other races. Typical fantasy world, but with no levelling system (to tedious).
Synopsis:
The story follows the adventure of a boy/man (he grows older in the story) named Ankou. Born in a small and remote village to the east of the Tharon Kingdom located in the west of the Magic Continent of Marar. One day before Ankou's 5th Birthday the village gets attacked by bandits who massacre his whole village and burn it to the ground. Ankou at that time was oblivious to this fact, as he was playing in the woods north of the village with a magic creature double his size, strangely though he wasn't attacked, despite the creature being the most savage magical creature in the entire kingdom. What will he do next, when he finds out that his village was raided?
Author's Notice:
This will be my first fiction story and I hope you give me some advice in writing and rate my story and leave critique in the comments aswell, so I may improve myself. I write out of pure fun so updates will be when I have time and lust to write something. English is my second language so I hope you have some understanding if the grammar is incorrect or might have used some words wrongly. IF, a big IF, IF names are the same as in works of others, that is not intentionally so, but i found the name cool and used it and it has nothing to do with others work.
COVER IS NOT MINE AND CREDIT GOES TO THE RESPECTIVE OWNER
