Title: Unrivaled Existence  (A World Ark Tale)
Synopsis:
A boy is mysteriously released from a seal. Possessing no memories of his past, he must explore the Bailong Continent in search of a way to reclaim what he has lost. But will the truth be to his liking? And what will befall the land when an unrivaled existence such as him finds what he is looking for?

Copyright © 2017 Clement D. Laus

Title: Legend of Oryn - Conquered
Synopsis:
Book 1: Part 1
Captured and enslaved, Oryn was once an innocent and mischievous kid. When his village became a casualty of war, he could no longer resist being involved in the war that ravages his kingdom. Oryn is forced to fight trained men and enraged, mystical beasts- to kill not for survival, but for the amusement of others.
 
Note: Both Title and Synopsis are temporary. Constructive criticism would be appreciated.

Title: Strange
Synopsis:
To say here is far, and to call yonder nearby. Stories on the edge of the every day, strange tales you may or may not be moved by. Strange, curious, fantastic stories told by me, you, him and her. There are many stories but they’re all concluded within a single page, each story around 200 to 1200 characters in length, a short story collection you can easily read. Please enjoy them. Updated every Saturday at 6pm.
This series was originally written in Japanese by Ukari and has been translated with the permission of the author. You can visit the original here. Please show the author support for his great work!
Also published on Kowabana.

Title: Venture with Anime System
Synopsis:
What!? You're saying that earth was only one of the tiny worlds in the outer realm?
 
Various things suddenly happened in the world. A vortex suddenly appeared in the sky, followed by a strange voice. Because of this phenomenon, the earth was put in a dangerous situation. The vortex was releasing a strange gas that gave birth to countless strange creatures. A continuous evolution of various animals, plants, and trees. The worst part was the vortex which is a tunnel to another world, and Earth was suddenly found by other races, endangering people from the earth in becoming slaves.
 
Fortunately, humans also gained different abilities, but Is this enough? Of course not! Their enemies could fly in the sky, with a single flick of their hands could smash a mountain and split the sea. 
 
An ordinary youth gained a peculiar ability, an evolution that different from others. What would happen if a person could wield different abilities that came from anime? 
 
What bloodline? I don't even care about that! Your father here had many choices. A blood of Saiyan? Vampire? Ninja? Mafia boss? Magi? Titan? Hahaha, scared? Unfortunately, that was only a tip of an iceberg.
 
So you're fighting me with numbers huh? Hahaha, what an idiotic decision. So what if you have an army, battalion or people you could use? I, your father had Gundams under my leadership!
 
Oh, now you're using your servants, huh? I, your father had Archer, Saber, Gilgamesh, Lancer, etc. under my hands!
 
Magical beast? Fear, not my brothers! I, your Grandfather had Pokemon and Digimon in my sleeve!
 
You dare to barge in my home? Received my wrath! I would show you the different super powers and characters of anime!
 
What would happen if all the anime characters abilities gather in one body?
 
With the Anime system in his hands, Luan Jose would venture all the world to create his own history; protecting all the people he cared while slaughtering those who block his path.

Title: SaintHeavens' Records
Synopsis:
What would you do when something went wrong with your plan? Something that you least expect to happen. Something that's not suppose to happen. Entrapped of a room of judgement, which door would you open? The door that hides the goal of your plans? Or the door that keeps the sudden change of plans?
A collection of one shots and short stories about friendship, love, and fate.

Title: A Magical Place
Synopsis:
Congratulations! You've been reincarnated to the same world! Not!
***
Irregular updates.

Title: The allrounder wizard
Synopsis:
Andre a normal boy just graduated from highschool was killed by god
And was reincarnated as luke filsh-warhead in lestriand world.

Title: The Zodak
Synopsis: Six generations after the founding of the New Zodak. Tragedy has struck the hearts and minds of Lockhaven. The original twenty-five Lords are now twelve, with some family lines near extinction. Adventures both inside and outside of the council will try and administer a new keeper of Coin. Deal with the bad history of their founding. And hopefully end the split between themselves and the old upstarts the Free Masters.

Title: The Time I was Reborn as a Genderbender Demon Prince
Synopsis: A god killed a boy to become the demon prince and stop the war between humans and demons. While he did grant him three wishes to help him on his journey, there is one secret, which unfolds in his life.

Title: In The Tall Grass
Synopsis:
Elizabeth Wilson is golden girl among her peers in Darkwood, Washington. A role model who is the exception to the cynical and degenerate peers. A beacon of hope. All of that changes when her trust is slowly broken and the facade of the perfect girl starts to wear down. Explore the tragedy of Elizabeth's emotional and psychological breakdown that led her to take her own life. A story about succumbing the malice and hopeless cycle of suffering we all unknowingly drag each other to live.
 
This is the prequel to the main story, Petrichor and was never intended to be made. I wrote this because I wanted to explore Elizabeth's character and show how the main characters have changed since this event. https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/49146/petrichor-act-one

Title: i'm supposed to be the hero, so why am i a skeleton!?
Synopsis: a new adventurer who had dreams of being a hero became one, but at what cost?

Title: Joker's Potpourri
Synopsis: A random collection of short stories in no particular order or genre. I will add more infrequently.

Title: The Creators Path
Synopsis: When one is infinitely strong. The peak of what any being could be capable of. Having absolute power brings absolute isolation. Following a mysterious being who goes by many names. It walks a magic filled world. The being truly wants to bring people happiness. The being failed in this journey over and over. The being is filled with loneliness and sadness. Will it be capable of succeeding in the journey of bringing prosperity or will it fail, as it has many times. The world filled with crime, corruption, and endless greed. Anyplace with light will have the darkness, can he rewrite that truth?

Title: Prima Materia Broken Vessel
Synopsis: The search for ether isn't simple. Neither is the truth about the perfect element. Histories tied together, bound by the adhesive of intrigue and secrets, the world isn't as simple as it seems. Who massacred the Ebisha? Why? What are these tattoos? Revenge is the only answer to them all.

Title: failed world
Synopsis:
i lay dying inside the hospital.
before i close my eyes for the last time god give me a new chance.

Title: Hope
Synopsis: Two men faced off in the open plains of Camlann, both perished. One left the world with his legacy and legend whilst the other left with only his act of betrayal. Who could have known that a simple game of Chess would have determined the fate of Arthur and Mordred before the final battle even began.

Title: The Hybrid
Synopsis:
The Hybrid likes people. In fact, he's come all this way, to this tiny, insignificant planet just to meet them.
But it's not a very nice city. In fact, it's far smaller than he'd been led to believe. He would have called it a village, but who is he to judge?
After all, he's only making contact on behalf of a complex network of extraterrestrial intelligences.

Title: All Roads
Synopsis:
Dying in our world causes a teenager to be reborn into a fantasy world of swords and magic. Starting from infancy with memories of our world intact, the life of an adventurer calls. The destination? Hub, a neutral trade town at a crossroads between several nations, acting as a melting pot of all the world's cultures, and home to the adventurer's guild known as Vagabond's Lantern. In a world with no big bad, dark magic, or exhaustively quantifiable concept of good and evil, conflict can only come from political intrigue and clash of ideals. It won't be easy, but one way or another, all roads lead to here.
 
Themes:
-Slow burn
-Worldbuilding
-Lore
-Roads we take in life
 
 
-Misfortune can be overcome
 
Trigger Warnings
-Polyamory
-Homosexuality
-Transsexuality
-Implied sexual assault
-Implied child abuse

Title: Right Hand of God
Synopsis: Ghosts, demons, and all things that go bump in the night crawl the Earth. Rarely, some people are born with the ability to see the supernatural no matter what form it takes to conceal itself, including invisibility. Even more rarely, some people are also born with the ability to exorcise any supernatural entity. This ability always manifests in the right hand and arm, and so in some circles it has come to be called the Right Hand of God. Jacob Davidson, a black seventeen-year-old living in Normal, Ohio, has been secretly fighting and exorcising ghosts all his life using this power. One night, however, a seemingly average job takes an unexpected turn when Jacob meets the sarcastic, suave, and ironically named Agent Mann, a revenant who hunts other supernatural creatures, and has his first encounter with the denizens of Hell itself. Now Jacob and Agent Mann must team up to stop all Hell from literally raising. But with the mysterious power known as the Left Hand of Lucifer also rising in Normal, Ohio, do they have any chance of success?

Title: From Slimes to Gods, the saga of a abnormal Dungeon
Synopsis: Eleanor was once just your average Slime infested cave, not strong enough to be considered a dungeon but still not weak enough to be left alone if discovered due to the usual nature of the species of monster inhabiting her. But that all changed when due to a series of events she came into existence and a unique variant Slime was born inside her... it was a reincarnated soul that possessed the corpse of a pair of Slimes that had died in the process of her conquest over the wild Slimes that had inhabited her, causing it to become the variant known as a Ghost Slime. it was during this moment when Eleanor had become a true dungeon where the terrified soul in the body of a Slime sought to understand what was going on and she felt a strange sense of compassion and comradery towards the poor thing. With that over the many years to come the dungeon Eleanor and the Slime that would come to be named Arora became gradually closer till they were practically family and would stay by each other’s side for the rest of their lives along the road they faced with the many friends and even enemies they were fated to make.

Title: The Random Romps of Reckless Randy
Synopsis:
In a world quite similar to your usual table top rpg campaign, Randy Dragons, a young and somewhat foolish rogue sets off on an epic quest with his four closest friends to become the top adventureres in the land. So pull up a barstool and bear witness to the completely random adventure where everything is decided by dice rolls.
Note: There will be no set release schedule as of right now, as I have a lot going on and my schedule is rather unpredictable (just like the events of this story). Also I suck at coming up with names for just about everything, so I welcome any and all suggestions in the comments. Hope you enjoy!

Title: Abyss Core
Synopsis:
The year is 2071 and VRMMORPGs have been illegal for a while.
A young man named Aylen lurks around the Internet underworld, playing illegal distributions of once popular online games, but none of them really attracts him for a long time until he discovers Abyss Core, a pirate version of the Nightmare Online, a grostesque Victorian era VRMMORPG that used to be the most played game in history.
Although the game was known for its highly advanced AI and ambiance, some details seem too impossible for Aylen and other players around him and they rapidly discover that Abyss Core may not be a game just like any other, breaking the frontiers of what is real or digital.

Title: I might be Overpowered
Synopsis: Shou Matsuri, a math teacher, dies and wakes up in a young boy's body in a different world. What will happen next? Find out next time on.. Oops my tongue slipped. Enjoy!

Title: Code Jumper - A GameLit Novel
Synopsis:
The year is 2036, and half the population of the United States of America is dead.
            Re.Generation killed them.
Code Jumpers, skilled hackers who meet strict criteria, are the traffickers of the new world. Guns, drugs, just about anything else you might need or want in the heavily moderated base game world of Re.Generation, the Code Jumpers can get it for you.
As one of the very few people in the US who can dive into Re.Generation without getting stuck, Eddie is one such Code Jumper.
Eddie likes his job, he basically gets to be a demigod who sells weed and guns to mere mortals every time he goes to work, but following a catastrophic event that affects both the real world and Re.Generation, access to the game is restricted and he becomes locked outside in the dreaded real world.
Fast-forward five years to a world where certain cities are becoming more and more dangerous to live in, and Eddie is forced to go back.
Before he knows it, he's jumping around Re.Generation and many of its expansions in a last-ditch effort to stop what promises to be Hiroshima compared to what was a slap on the wrist with the last event.
A video game. A terrorist. A hacker and his AI.
What could go wrong?

Title: The Knight is the Hero's Hero!
Synopsis:
A certain Knight, was just camping his way to the kingdom, when he suddenly encounters an unusual situation and an unusual character.
A hero in the peaceful world of Alorn? What is the purpose of the girl who was brought here by an unknown magician.
Join our protagonist as he teaches the hero the world of Alorn, the culture, magic, combat and love? 
[This is an anime-like light novel-ish creation. Hope you guys like it.]
By the way, this was just something I wrote on impulse, I won't be leaving my other series.
The cover art is drawn by me, using the templates of project cow and Shamira g in deviantart.
Genres: Romance, Comedy, Action, Fantasy

Title: Demons of Zenora
Synopsis:
In a faroff village in Rize, a 16-year-old boy named Kei lives a peaceful life until an ancient demon awakens nearby and destroys his hometown, killing everyone in it. Spurred on by vengeance, Kei soughts the help of legendary Witch, Lilionel, to aid him in his quest to slay the demon responsible.
A/N: Thanks jehuty0o1 for helping out with editing!!

Title: Cursed Children
Synopsis:
A Cursed Child - a person who was born with a disability that can neither be explained nor cured by the laws of our world. This "Curse" as they called it, could also temporarily afflict the people around the Cursed Child's surroundings.
Twenty years ago, the emergence of these children born with curses sent the whole world into disarray, with every following year the frequency of being born with a curse increasing. Today, some cities enforce special rules to protect the rights of these Cursed Children, providing them ways to be on equal footing with commonfolk, while discouraging them from afflicting others with their curse. 
This is the story of Lina, a 16 y/o high school student, who moves to a city where these special rules govern the citizens, and her encounters with Cursed Children.

Title: Passing Onto Fog
Synopsis: This is another attempt at the world travelling reincarnator. I dropped my other story because I didn't like where it was going and I felt trapped in the Narutoverse. This time, I'm going to have the main character travelling to more than just one world and they won't all be action based. Have fun and thank you! The first chapters are rough, but I believe I'm improving! Please stick around while I find the style I wish to write in!

Title: Death's Oracle
Synopsis: On hiatus till unspecified time.

Title: Black Home
Synopsis:
This is the story of a guy…
Nah, just kidding. I’m Neant, nice to meet you. I know, weird name, didn’t choose it… Actually, I did. Well, I’m probably not one to be trusted blindly.
What follows is some sort of summary of my life, narrated by no other than good old me. You get the privilege of learning about my story from my own point of view, isn’t that great ? How I vanquished galaxy-sized foes, how I met extraordinary people, how I created entire species… You know, regular stuff.
If you’re reading this, know that what I did wasn’t exactly pro-bono. Sure, it felt nice to do good for once, but I expect a lot in return. I expect a thriving world, a sane society, and a solution to our little problem.
So, don’t slack off !
Neant, out.
 
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
 
Chapters between 8k and 10k words
Currently 204 pages

Title: The Ratmen
Synopsis:
At the depths of ever interwinding tunnels, a pregnant rat stumbles upon a large gemstone. Within its glass surface rages a whirlpool of green light, beckoning the rat with its glow. She draws closer, urged on by a strange power, to find a puddle of green goop leaking from cracks in the stone.
hesitantly, the rat gnaws at the liquid, and reels back from a sudden power surging into its small body. It sprawls, claws scratching at the rough stone floor in an attempt to leave this strange room, to flee from the gem, to no avail. The power pushes from her insides, forcing the rat to twist and expand with each step as she grows beyond a wolf, beyond a bear, ever beyond as she keeps running.
Prematurely, the giant rat gives birth, but it’s young are alive. Creatures, bearing eerie resemblance to rats. However, not quite…

Title: Tale of Lolicon in Another World
Synopsis:
Preface :
Fanfiction yet Original.
Fanfiction because there'll be a lot of character and town name that taken from popular game/manga/novel. Only the character name is same. Character personality is following mine (Author) dream.
Original story created by me. Based of my unique dream 10 years ago.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Synopsis :
5 years after the dissapeared of his father, Ryousuke Akira got a mysterious package from him. He then knew the existance of the another world Edea. With the help the item power he then train himself untill limit.
10 years after that he meet the self proclaimed goddess in the hospital room after 2 months hospitalized because of traffic accident. Using the ability he got toward the goddess he then obtained a 'cheat'. Using his cheat he 'collect' his dream as a gentleman (Lolicon).
Starting the journey with destroying a Kingdom that hunt him, he leisurely go tourism while adding more harem member to go to the promised place Midgard

Title: WriTE Halloween Contest
Synopsis:
Hi Everyone! Writers to the End, the largest group on Royal Road Legends is happy to announce the start of the WriTE Halloween Contest!
Write a short story, submit it, and try to win! 
Everyone can take part and anyone can win so go, check the rules and write… 
To The End. 
Submitted stories will be displayed on the 30th of October from noon GMT. Note: Please submit the stories to WriTE, not RRl, to ensure everyone begins voting at the same time.
Readers can rate the stories from October 30 to November 6. 
Some stories may contain mature content so we advise the readers to read the author notes before every story.

Title: God Chef Rordon Gamsay
Synopsis:
Rordon Gamsay is your typical, swearing, mean chef. Of course, that's all just an act, he has a wife and loving children. But one day, he is killed and sent to another world! This is the world of Beauchorus, where many great nations are located. After meeting with the main god, he gets special powers, in this world created by the cooperation of many other gods! This novel chronicles his adventures as a reincarnated individual.
 
(Keep in mind, this is a comedy novel. I don't have scheduled releases, but once a week is a good guess. Have fun!)

Title: Fireborn-Birth of Flame
Synopsis: In the beginning Jason was an ordinary child who just liked to adventure and play until he learned something about himself. He was fireborn and he had powers that people only dreamed of in comics and stories. What he discovered would lead him down an entirely different path than he could ever imagine, as he seeks the truth to who he truly is and how he became the person he is today.

Title: The Immortal Epic
Synopsis:
After all that happened... I do think I would thank dr Errhart if I were back to the day this all started, knowing all that happened after. Of course, if I were back on the day this all started with the implied knowledge, I would take and play with his soul in retribution. Oh, how have I grown since then. I'm almost nostalgic.
Almost. To tell you the truth, I don't really remember the first days. Yes, I remember me working at the facility, with all the downs and downs but after the experiment, those first days afterwards, I can't bring for the life of me those moments in the cold dark broken room to mind. I never did discover what happened during the experiment. What could occur to burn the whole facility to a crisp and shut down both the main and emergency power supply? Dr Errhart always seemed to fail in impossible ways.
When I got out of that underground tomb, I discovered what the experiment did to the world. Beast and monsters feed on the unprotected if left to fester, powerful men from the remnants of my old world have risen up to take their own and might takes up new forms.
Oh, and here you must be perplexed. I totally forgot to tell. While the experiment doomed many in the facility and the world above, which wouldn't have happened had they not ignored my notes on the project, I feel like it was all worth it. For at the cost of the precious but secret arcanium, we got our greatest tool yet. Magic.

Title: The Phantoms Net - Book 1: Rise of the Fallen
Synopsis:
Blue is a nobody 16 year old kid living in the giant metropolis of New Tokyo, or at least he thinks he is. Making his day to day winning in Gun Royale tournaments, he somehow manages to survive. That is until one day he finds out his real life was hidden away and that now he has to unlock his potential with a mysterious orginization and this one girl. But what about the Phantom and who is he really?
 
This is my new series that I will be puting a large focus on and never give up on it. This will be in a lite novel-esc format and will still have tinge feelings of anime, but I am not trying to make this into a full anime trope story at all. This is all me only.

Title: Hidden Forge: Lucem Ac Tenebras
Synopsis:
Upon discovering a strange portal one morning, Ian Hayes begins traveling between a near-future Earth and a world of magic known as Regnoras. Amazing creatures dwell in this new land. Incredible opportunities await. While trying to establish a new way of life as well as new connections and relationships, things slowly spiral out of his control. As worlds collide, Ian must learn to overcome his own failings and struggle to come out on top in a world different from his own in more ways than he could imagine.
Note: Currently working on rewriting the story and releasing it on creative-novels. Chapters will be available there two weeks in advance.

 
************************************************************************************************************
Vote on topwebfiction! vote
To support my work on patreon and receive access to advance chapters: patreon
You can also join my discord for announcements and discussion: Discord invitation

Title: Who said life was fair?
Synopsis:
Ah, life, so interesting, so everchanging. Who would ever want to leave such a entertaining thing? Well some do, and not an insignificant number. So God has enacted the 'Stale Life Reform' for people who think a life is boring and would much rather have a blood racing life. A life of slaughter, death, and a chance - one where you can actually fulfill any ambition no matter how insane. Their are no limits, their are no boring moments. A hell for most, but a land of pleasure for the truly wicked.
 
The 'Stale Life Reform' renamed the 'System' has a history dating over aeons . The System is evergrowing, ever expanding! Can you see the heights 'The System' has reached?

Title: The Last Lie
Synopsis: Eric has been suffering from terrible night terrors for the past several weeks. These nightly torments only grow worse with each passing day, until they eventually grant him a purturbing moment of insight that changes the way that he views his life and the world around him.

Title: Task Force 1228
Synopsis:
Tristan Machagon is a martial arts prodigy trained from a young age and he has loved every moment of it. Having just won the championship he has been working to for the past 4 years. His life takes a sudden turn throwing him into a world he thought was nothing but fantasy and horror. The world of monsters has always been there just outside of the light. Hidden in the shadows. It's kept in check by a dedicated task force that works dilligently to keep monsters in the realm of fiction for most people. Thrust into this world Tristan learns he wasn't as far from it as he initially thought. 
 
 
------------- Please note this is my first fiction and also a rough draft. I appreciate any and all constructive criticism. ---------------

Title: Burned Phoenix Rises
Synopsis:
In modern times, Sheng Fei believed in the power of the individual and valued strength above all else. His skills made him a formidable soldier and a deadly foe. When he discovered others that followed his doctrine, he created "Black Phoenix". The Black Phoenix Clan grew and acquired much power. But at the height of his life, Sheng Fei was betrayed and died at the hands of someone he trusted. When he wakes up, Sheng Fei is bound to Li Xiu, a girl down on her luck. Now together, with Li Xiu, Sheng Fei seeks to carry out his revenge. Even if it means to fight all of Black Phoenix. 
I'm trying to test out fight scenes in this story.

Title: A Dungeon Tested
Synopsis:
Its a hard life balancing all the things a successful dungeon should be doing. Will our newest addition to the dungeon race even survive let alone make it to the top where dungeons such as the megafauna roam? Or will our main character suffer in the dust till some inauspicious and ignoble death at the end of some F-rankers sword?
Note this is me having some fun while I wait for new releases of dungeon stories. Feel free to comment on that basis. I will be keeping the first few chapters slow so as to give me plenty to build upon later. I have tentatively given this the gore tag for now. With that in mind "Let the games begin".

Title: The Great Angel,The Great Devil And Me
Synopsis:
I Was The Second Most Intelligent Entity In Heaven,The Watcher Of Angels,The God Of Wisdom.
One Day I Committed A Sin But God Gave Me A Chance To Redeem Myself. 
God Wanted Me To Raise The Great Devil And The Great Angel As Humans. 
And So I Accepted But Their Power Was Equal To God And I Made A Plan To Make Myself God Using Them.

Title: Darkwalker
Synopsis:
Raphael isn’t dealt the best hand when he's adopted by an organization specializing in procuring and training children to become elite sentinels for the highest bidder. An environment where survival is far from a sure thing. Reduced to a product to meet an increasing market demand led by warring kingdoms, empires and clans possessing special bloodlines in need of special fighting units Raphael is taught to fight and kill without a shred of hesitation.
Everything, however, changes the moment he awakens his own bloodline abilities and he learns fate is nothing but a bitch that needs to be slapped in the ass, bent over and fucked – Hard!
And so he rises... from a child mercenary imprisoned since birth to becoming a free man with dreams of grandeur. Follow how Raphael discovers his path as a highly functional womanizer and crime lord unbound by space.

Title: Inhuman
Synopsis:
What does it mean to be human?
Is it in your blood? Is it to do with your ancestors? Is it determined by the planet you come from, or is it none of those things?
Is there a point at which you stop being human, or will you be human forever? If it's the first one, can you stop being human?

Title: Crash Alive
Synopsis:
Can you crack the code?
(Note: this book is available on Amazon: http://amzn.to/2z9eNhE)Meet Haylie Black, the 17-year-old hacker with a chip on her shoulder. When her brother vanishes trying to solve a mysterious internet puzzle, Haylie knows that she's the only one with a chance to find him. As she uses her skills to unravel the truth behind each clue, she's pulled deeper and deeper into a secret world she never could have imagined.This award-winning thriller fuses action, technology (including a collection of real-world hacking and code-breaking techniques), and a worldwide race against the clock to keep readers turning pages, trying to stay one step ahead. If you love Mr. Robot or the Da Vinci Code, you'll love Crash Alive.
**Gold Medal Winner, 2016 Operation Thriller Competition**

Title: Girka's Evil God
Synopsis:
This is the story of Astor, the person who was elected by the evil god to be the new evil god at world of Girka where the class of Astor would be summoned, except for Astor, who was summoned at the sealed continent of Nithea, a sealed continent where the races who adore the ancient evil god live. A desolated continent where time was accelerated by 100, in that continent, He will unify members of rational monsters races, demon race, and other ancient races, who want to survive in that place.  This is the story about a men who will be become from human, who want to survive in a desolate continent while meet some people from ancient races and grow a kingdom to will became the new evil god of Girka getting over all obstacles while fight against the world and his former classmates.

First before read my novel, I need you to excuse my errors in chapters because English aren't my first or second languaje. I want to grow my english level with you while write this novel, thanks for read it.

A love story, from the love between friends, war or otherwise. In the magical land of Sanctuary where a massive tower rises high into the heavens, vampires prowl the night. Ancient machines are discovered once again and other dark rituals are performed in hopes of one day overthrowing the mighty Mortem.

Title: Together
Synopsis:
Anya, for the most part, was normal...
Except for the fact that she is the youngest in an adopted family with 5 brothers.
Her brothers love her so much and won't let anyone hurt her. But their one nightmare came true.
Cancer is deadly, and can kill you. But it won't take your faith.

Title: Crystal Shards Online - A LitRPG Series
Synopsis:
ANNOUNCEMENT! Dodge Tank: Crystal Shards Online Book 1 is available on Amazon.com. You can grab it HERE from the US Amazon Store. For other countries please check your relevant Amazon.com site. [Book 1 sample chapters available only.] 
ANNOUNCEMENT: Book 2 of Crystal Shards Online, Shard Warrior is also now Available on Amazon.com. Grab it Here!
 
"There's only one rule...don't get hit."
 
 Ryan's life sucks.
His brother is a jerk, his mom is sick, and his legs are next to useless thanks to a neurological disorder. His only escape from the hardships of reality is the massive VR world of Crystal Shards Online.
When Ryan discovers an item that grants the ability to dodge any attack, however, he has the chance to become one of the game world's most elite and sought after players: a Dodge Tank.
But for someone who's never played a combat class, success isn't so easily had.To save his mom's life, Ryan will have to overcome his disability and level his way to the top. But the real-world consequences are more far reaching than he ever could have imagined and the fate of not just his mother, but humanity itself, may be resting in his hands...WARNING: Contains RPG mechanics, detailed party combat and giant boss fights. If these things do not interest you, then this is not the book for you!READ DODGE TANK TODAY!

Title: INCARNATION :  ANOTHER DIMENSION
Synopsis:
A step at a time, struggling to survive... memories of his past hidden, the only path is forwards.

Title: My boring fantasy adventure
Synopsis: The story of a guy that is reborn in a fantasy setting, after he dies and with the grace of a white fluffy ball, our chacacter gets transported to a magical and beautiful new life, to become a side character.

Title: Death touch
Synopsis:
Warning: Profanity, Tramtizing content, and gore.

Title: The Void
Synopsis:
Ever wondered what will happen when you look at the void?
Have you ever thought of it staring back at you?
In this epic dark short story about betrayal, lies, and death...
Who will you trust?
Follow the story of the bounty hunter, the vixen, the dragon folk, and the infamous assassin in this epic story.

Title: New Way of Life
Synopsis:
Times are changing and we need to change with it. We need to steel ourselves, for what follows change is always chaos. Change forces us to travel an unknown path and on that path we must have the courage to walk forward against all that stands in the way. If change appears, don't fight it. You won't win. All you can do is walk on its path, through thick or thin, for none can stop change. 
 
Author's Ramblings
Hi everyone! Thank you for taking the time to read my synopsis. It really doesn't have anything to do with the story but change is in the story so I guess it sort of has some meaning. I was also thinking of what to write for my synopsis that related to the title and it just came to me, so I went with it...
I am a novice writer and I love reading the stories that have been posted on this site so I decided to try to create my own. I did try once before but I didn't really like it so it was scrapped. Hopefully I do better this time and you all enjoy my work. 
I will try to post chapters at least once a week but I may not always be able to do so.
Please let me know if I made any mistakes with spelling or grammer. I usually check but who knows what might slip through.
If you could leave a comment on how to make my work better, I will try to improve in that aspect.
The content warnings were selected as I may include gore and sexual content in my story though I'm not positive. Profanity will most likely happen.
Once again, Thank You for reading!

Title: Technological Monstrosity
Synopsis:
A futuristic 'god' decides that his mission in life has been accomplished, but cannot find a way to die. However, this does not stop him from creating something that, given enough time, can end him for good.
Thus, Alk'abaar was born. An extremely powerful, self-evolving intelligence, Alk'abaar received a single purpose to fulfill no matter the price: To kill it's creator. 
This is the story of how an extremely advanced and powerful entity drives forward humanity, how it learns that not everything revolves around a single goal and about several people that cross it.

Title: Halfblood
Synopsis:
The War between Beastkin and Humans is on going since centuries. No one remebers how it started, but the hate between the two races deepend with every bloodshed. 
In this time of hatred a child was Born. A Halfblood destined to be hated. What path will he walk?

Title: Caerestra Chronicles - Book 1
Synopsis:
In the very beginning, there were 10 gods, the first who were able to use magic. As time went on, the gods passed on their magic to humans, some were based on personalities, others were based on natural affinity to the element. Years went by, and by the year 298, the gods began to learn about their weaknesses towards each other. It was at this time that the 10 gods, and those who followed them had a enormous clash. God against god, brother against sister, mother against father, and even took the lives of many innocent people, some human, and some who weren’t. As a precaution to something similar happening ever again, the gods decided to split one world, into multiple, separating it off into worlds of different elements, races, and sealed Umbra onto an unknown planet. 
In the year 700, on a planet called Hateni humans of all different elements lived together, worked together, and even learned together. For the most part, it was peaceful, until one day, a mysterious figure covered with purple skin appeared. This figure was known as a Shadow Beast.  While there were many magic users, no one was prepared for the almighty power that a Shadow Beast contained. When it arrived, it killed millions of people in a short amount of time, and suddenly vanished. After the Beast vanished many other creature from other races invaded our home world and began committing heinous acts. We named this incident, the SB-4 Incident. Ever since this incident, humans banded together and created one country that refined magical powers in order to stop the invading races, this country was known as Caerestra.

A office auxiliary, comming late at night suddently gets transported? summoned? reincarnated? Doesn't matter! What matter is that he is now trapped in a post-apocalyptic world that belongs to one of his favourite game universe, where the world was destroyed by an atomic confrontation.
Using his game knowledge and timeline of the history where he must use all his knowledge to survive and come on top in the Mojave Desert now called "Mojave Wasteland"

Title: Sword
Synopsis:
A boy who finds no meaning or purpose in life finds a sword handle by the side of the road that changes his so-called pointless life forever.
-----
Sorry about the small Synopsis, but I'm still trying to figure the story out, no Idea where it's going and don't expect much from it. Writing to waste time. 
May not be anymore chapters or may be 100s of them, idk yet.
Thanks for reading if you do, if you don't, no biggie. ^^

Title: A Misguided Record
Synopsis: This is a series of events in a fantasy world.

Title: History From Above
Synopsis: A young man of talent and privileged circumstance feels the urge to make his own way into the world and leave his own mark. He follows the path of a mystic warrior, equal parts wizard and martial artist.  His saga is unique in every way and will shake the foundations of the entire world, but is that destiny toying with him or his own free will?

Title: Moon Song (On Hold)
Synopsis:
In the world of Selaria monsters called Grim occupy more than half of the entire world. These monsters were born out of negative emotions thus earning the nickname. To counter this darkness, warriors rose from the dust and were called hunters/huntresses. They were gifted with two powers named Aura and Semblance. With these two gifts, humanity managed to claim themselves havens. Though no one knows how long will that remain true. 
Ellis Moon, a young man from a no name town came to Vale in hopes of enhancing his power to defend his little town. In this kingdom, Beacon academy stands which trains countless warriors from different places and different races. In this place, Ellis' dream may come true or shatter altogether. Watch Ellis as he tries his best to gain power just for the hope of defending the little town he came from.

Title: Prime Magus of Earth
Synopsis:
"In the beginning, I had no idea what was going on. My brother and friends were gone, my sight was gone, and yet I still saw things, things about this world that no one else knew. I'm not special, or gifted, anyone could have done what I did. I just got lucky, especially after everything that happened afterwards.
Magic already existed, it always had. Humans just didn't know how to do it, didn't know how to nuture that small spark in them. Now you do."
- Prime Magus of Earth, Alexander Sorin.

November 2021 Update: So, it has been four years since I stopped working on this. Reading back, the first "book" is finished. It has what feels like an ending to an arc. Now it isn't a perfect story but I still like it and I can see myself starting the second book, might even this on Amazon or something. My biggest regret was never coming up with artwork for the cover though. Maybe I'll look into it.

Title: Cold
Synopsis:
Ivan had always been cold and he never knew why. Shortly after starting the first semester in senior high, he was about to find out when a team of self-proclaimed government officials led by Rhodes dispatched themselves on his school looking for 'volunteers' in a government project.
Ivan was chosen but before Rhodes could isolate him, he was saved by his classmate, Melissa who knew more about Ivan's situation than anyone.

As they flee Rhodes and his men, Ivan finds out that there's more to his coldness than just cold hands. There was a power to it that the government wanted to erase and Rhodes wanted to possess.

Title: NINA
Synopsis: As a person who had always been fixated on her weekly routine, Nina felt stranded when she was dropped to the unfamiliar world below. With no other choice but to accept the help offered by a local courier business, she soon finds that the group of women she works with have a lot more to them than what meets the eye. Promised that she can return home after her contract is finished, Nina’s chaotic time at The Cloud Orchestra begins. But will she really want to leave when the time comes?

Title: Parhelion: Stories from Another World
Synopsis: A collection of short stories from the same universe as Snowfall in varying timelines.

Title: The Rise of the Heavenly Monarch
Synopsis:
One day a beggar was killed when he saved an old man being held by thugs, tired of living unrecognized by the people, the beggar tried to save the old man but died a dog’s death.
“Am I going to die like this? Aaaah, I should’ve raped that girl…”
“I should’ve also snatched that woman’s purse…”
“I should’ve also robbed that roasted chicken when the owner was taking a piss…”
“Why the fuck did I lived an upright and honest life? I didn’t even have a food to eat every night!”
“Oh fuck it when are my thoughts gonna end? Wait…. I see light!”
“Ohhhh I’m coming closer."
“Oh shit it’s pulling me!? Wanna suck me huh?”
Witness as he live another chance in the… same world! Maybe...

Title: The Immortal Ninja of the Elemental Nations
Synopsis:
In a world full of ninja and wars, how will an assassin from our world survive as he is reborn as an orphan in the village of the Hidden leaves, Konoha. Watch as he lies, cheats, manipulate, kill in order to survive in a world where child are professionally trained to kill at the age of five.

Title: Inquisitor [HIATUS]
Synopsis:
Troley, a young and eager boy, lived a mundane life as a farmhand, working year after year in the fields growing the same crops in order to survive. Life was simple but boring.
 
That was until a band of exhausted knights came charging in through the village with a horrible decree. The King was dead, murdered on the same night the country had held a celebration for what was to be newfound peace with a neighboring nation. With the death of the King, a now dangerous and potentially hostile country marches on their borders. As if the threat of war wasn't enough, a plot for the throne occurs. All the while, an unfound assassin is hunted down, and Troley, believing that he could make a difference in the war effort, sets off with an unsuspecting ally.Join Troley as he learns of the many dangers of the world. During his journey, he'll discover some of the greatest treasures hidden throughout the land while also uncovering a terrifying plot along the way.
 

??????

Title: Virtual Life of a Harem Boy Fighter
Synopsis:
Lu Ren is a pretty effeminate guy. You could easily mistake him for a girl. But don't get things wrong, he was once one of the top players in a highly successful VRMMO called <Arcana Gate>. However, the company behind the game, Fortuna Corporation, has suddenly decided to shut it down and replace it with a more advanced version called <Eternal Arcanum>. Hyped and pumped for a new land to prove his mettle in, Lu Ren eagerly acquires the new game by having his VR gear patched. Due to his position in Arcana Gate, he receives a very mysterious reward, one that could be considered game-breaking.
However, all powerful artifacts have drawbacks. The heavens have forced Lu Ren to play through the game looking like a cute, possibly sexy harem girl, despite his character still being male! As a one-of-a-kind harem boy, will Lu Ren be able to make it to the pinnacle of Eternal Arcanum like he did with Arcana Gate? Will he face new challenges outside of the game world? Find out in this wacky story.

Title: In the Ogre's Cave
Synopsis: It is a time of famine and Jett has been cast out by his relatives. Pursued by a werebear, he his captured by an ogre who brings him to his cave for dinner - it turns out that this ogre has impregnated all the women in the neighbourhood and a bunch of his green skinned daughters are visiting. They all take a liking to Jett, but will they save him from their father?

Title: Magic Continent Zero
Synopsis:
Long ago the world was in peril with infighting and bickering.   A great war broke out when the invading demon continent attacked the human continent.  The demons are much stronger than the humans but the humans were able to hold off the demons with their ability to use magic.  It all seemed lost until a great wizard rose up and helped lead the humans to victory.  A talent like the world has never seen.  His profound understandings of magic made him respected by all the nobles on the continent.   After the war he turned down all positions and decided to only teach the students he wanted noble or not.  These were the choosen 7 children and only them were given his direct knowledge on magic.
However, 20 years ago a great tradgedy befell the human continent.  No one knows the exact details but what was known is  a great magical barrier went up over 1/3 of the entire human continent that has stood ever since.  The teacher was betrayed by one of his students.  Himself and the rest of his students scattered across the human continent and into obscurity.
Our protagonist is of low birth and has no talent but longs to learn magic.   Usually only the rich nobles can afford magic teachers and the books needed.   Will he ever become the great wizard he wishes to be?
*****
There are no release dates for this story but I tend to try to drop 3 chapters a week spaced 2-3 days apart from each other.

Title: A Song of Goblins and Skeletons
Synopsis:
In a world where "might makes right" the downtrodden often war amongst themselves in order to gain what little power they can. Goblins and skeletons are among the lowest of the low and they have hated each other since. When a clan of goblins ambushes a minor lich during a summoning ritual, the two leaders were bonded into one body to show the world that sometimes one plus one is so much more than two.
************
For those put off by the short chapters, just know that from chapter 3 and on there's at a minimum 750 words but at an average of a chapter will slowly become 1.6K words.
I'll never break the fourth wall, I hate it and I'll try to keep my stories the way they should be written. This isn't a satire or a copy of someone else's joke.

Title: Crafter's Passion (AKA Gleaners' Guild)
Synopsis:
2038, California. Stan is doing his mandatory "volunteer" service years on a collective farm when he encounters Thousand Tales, a game that offers immortality to the super-rich. He can't afford to have his brain uploaded like those elite customers, but maybe he can turn a profit out of the game instead of just playing it. Not as a legendary swordsman or a brilliant wizard, but as a dealer in the junk no one else seems to want. If he plays his cards right, he can draw the attention of both the farm's supervisor and the game's ruling, meddling AI. Should he, though?
LitRPG. Part of the world of "Thousand Tales", a novel series on Amazon, though no knowledge of it is expected. This story is around 12K words long. I'd appreciate feedback to help write a much longer version! Updates every few days. Cover art from game-icons.net, by Lorc, CC-BY.
Update! This story was originally called "Gleaners' Guild". It came out on Amazon under the name "Crafter's Passion" and has many reviews there, thanks in part to the support of RR readers like you. Thanks! It even has a sequel, "Crafter's Heart".

Title: Another Poke Adventure
Synopsis: Dieing never seemed so good with a chance to no go to the world of pokemon and have your own adventer.

Title: Dunrealm : The Chronicles of the Wanderer
Synopsis:
The Wanderer came into being on top of a mountain. For a long time he wandered alone talking only to Geoff, the best friend he had in the world now, sadly, confined to The Wanderer's head. Yes, he is confused. A chance, and it must be said, unpleasant encounter drags The Wanderer into a world he'd hoped existed but not in the odd form he encountered.
A tale of the Elder Races of Dunrealm, Elves, Dwarves, Giants but, at least for now, in human form and on a quest to find out where the hell all the people went and what exactly they were supposed to do to make sure they are not the next on the list to do a disappearing act.
Why are they in human form? There is a reason but all will be explained as the Chronicles of the Wanderer unfold.
Classic quests in a modern setting with no humans, a hero who doesn't know his own name and whose proudest achievement was being taller than Tom Cruise but who is the key to the survival of the peoples of Dunrealm and all set in the Lake District of the UK and all with a smattering of humour and plenty of bad language. What could go wrong?
I am intending to publish a chapter every couple of weeks, time permitting of course and would welcome any input from the fantastic community here.

Title: DEAD WORLD
Synopsis:
WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO IF THE GOD WAS SUDDENLY RETIRED AND THE ONE WHO REPLACE IT WAS THE GOD OF GAME?
WILL YOU BE HAPPY?, EXCITED?.
MAYBE YOU HOPE GOD WILL TURN THIS WORLD INTO THAT OF GAME?
WELL I'M SORRY BECAUSE YOU WILL BE DISSAPOINTED.
WHY?.
WELL JUST READ AND YOU WILL KNOW

Title: Just Monika
Synopsis: This is a fanfiction of the Game Doki Doki Literature Club

Title: OP player in another world!
Synopsis:
SLASH was the most famous VR in the world.
Luke dias was a god class player in the game but he died after soloing the last boss.
Then he get reincarnated.
release atleast 3 time a week
AUTHOR NOTE:
In hiatus for atleast 2 month

Title: Re: Virtual
Synopsis:
Life is quite strange, isn't it? We make so many things to make our lives easier, knowing full well that it's destroying what it meant to be "human".
What IS a human? This question's been asked for a long time, lots of answers popping out as time flies, yet we haven't deciced what exactly it means to be one.
Regardless, being human isn't what's important right now.  What if you were given a chance to live a new life as a different person?  A different race? A different planet? A different reality? Would you agree to it?  
Annoying, huh. So many questions you have to consider, but you don't really need to think too much about it. I clearly didn't. Not like it mattered, it all went well in the end. Technically.
Reincarnated into a virtual reality. Sounds weird, probably because it is. I agreed to it, so did a few others, wasn't much of a problem to any of us. But that doesn't mean we don't other problems, does it? Look at me, acting all mysterious. Anyways, it was a very fun experience that we were willing to deal with, it was filled with a lot of sadness and a lot of other negative emotions, but hey, such is life, even in a faux one. Here's my story, I guess.
((Thanks for reading the half-baked description~! I'm YeOldeCaptain, more formally known as TheEccentric, invite you along this wacky story of mine! Excuse my lack of ability when it comes to proper explanations, I'm quite dense when it comes to most things. Also, I'll try to get better with the tables ;-;))

Title: Fruitful
Synopsis:
The Hunt, a system by which the world operates.
Hunt to survive
Hunt to grow
Hunt for power
 
Whats a plant lady to do... all I want is to just eat sweet things.
 
 
Hi, I'm Hydrox, this is my first time writing on this site after having been reading for a long time... I have pretty bad anxiety problems so don't expect much in the way of releases I'm doing this to try break out of my shell a bit.

Title: I Will Live to the Fullest in This Beautiful World`~!
Synopsis: Kagayaki Sora, a NEET, pessimist, and a loner. He  died saving a girl from raper and has revived back on the otherworld. He swear that he will be a better man and live to the fullest as thanks to the God that revived him back and give him a will to move on. Will he be able to succeed what he dream of? Or will he meet despair and fall into the depth of darkness awaiting for him?

Title: Sins of the Mothers
Synopsis:
This story is set in its own parallel universe with a matriarchal culture.
Mary must deal with the consequences of using a male prostitute and becoming pregnant by him. Before you blame her, know that she is already asking herself searching questions.  Was this just a business deal or did she exploit him? Shouldn't she try and help him?  Morally, doesn't he deserve paternal rights?
Mary is a shy mild-mannered girl, unless she is in the guise of her alter-ego, Cutie the Clown.  In her clown costume, she becomes brave, sexy and outrageous.  She got herself into this as Cutie the Clown, now as a desperate clown, she has resolved to sort things out.  But how?

Title: Gaia's Shield
Synopsis:
Countless years have passed and untold numbers of civilizations have risen only to fall. Ancient technology lies hidden within sprawling ruined cities. The world is dark still feeling the after effects from its previous rulers timely demise. The ever present blanket of snow will extinguish even the brighest man's future.
With 12 summers under her belt Vyla feels like she were meant to do more. She learned how to forage and survive in her harsh homeland. Still there was something missing. All the hunting and following the caravan on the same path every year quickly loses its luster. Vyla knows that there is more to this world than what she's seen. Thanks to Mac who allowed me to use his artwork!Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/mac Tumblr: http://spacethatneverwas.tumblr.com/

Title: To Love & to Relive
Synopsis: Every time Rin Kazuma falls in love with a girl, but the moment he gives his answer, he gets killed by something mysterious and unexpecting. As his life reset again and was reborn again to relive a new life and falls for another girl and die again,  he Failing to figure out why.

Title: Reborn in Dreams
Synopsis:
In this normal world . A world without any fantasy , magic or superpowers .
Unlike a normal person , I can see someone's life through dreams .
Experiencing lives of people I never met , from kings , people from distant future , to even the poorest ones .
In just one slumber , I fully experience what they went through from birth to death .
An accident happened , I died and met the one who gave me the power .
She said :" You will be reborn as one of the people in your dream , when you die , that process continue , it will stop when you have lived the life of all you had experience through sleep and when that's done ."
"You will be reborn on Earth once again "

Title: Pulled Along by the Tide
Synopsis: This is a story about a man named Jack who was hit by a truck.  What happens to him is decided by the comments.  I choose the one I like and have him react to that scenario.  If there is a good scenario I will maybe run with it for a few chapters or even an entire arc.  This is my first fiction on this site, so I am looking forward to your feedback.  Thanks!  (I will update the synopsis as the story continues so it fits what has been written)

Title: All
Synopsis:
There is no such thing as nothing. 
By defining it as so, it has become something.
In that sense, is nothing not the same as everything?

Title: Love 1
Synopsis: Two young boys, in a search for LOVE are about to go on a crazy adventure to find their lovers. Old love is rekindled & explored. Hearts are broken, friendships are tested, and love is the only their only drive. Have these boys found their true loves or is this just the beginning of a greater story!

Title: The Magic Of Science
Synopsis:
When humanity had advanced their technology to such a level that they accidentally destroyed themselves, just before the planet collapsed, the two smartest people came up with a plan.
The last survivor of Earth, Titus, was sent to space as a baby, the only hope left for humanity. Their son. 
Little did they know that twenty years later, he'd start a journey that would put their past accomplishments to shame.
This is a tale about Titus's pursuit of science as he tries his best to come to terms with his new life on a planet pulled straight out of a fantasy novel.
AN: This is my attempt at first person and sci-fi while also attempting some comedy, maybe, we'll see how it goes.
(I do not own the cover art and all credit goes to the original artist.)

Title: Creator’s Legacy: The Esper’s Era
Synopsis:
Synopsis: A baby was born, things disappeared and reappeared in different locations. Another baby was born years later, a meteor crashed into a secluded field on earth, causing a heaven shaking explosion and leaving a huge crater.Twins were born, the days seemed so short, the night appeared too fast, and disappeared after a few hours.It seemed as if the days and nights were on for only a few hours and switched places, only stopping and returning back to normal after a week.Ming Burong, 39, and the mother of all these abnormal children, gave birth to another child, a boy. When the boy was born, there were no cries, no movement, only silence.But out in the universe, the sun and moon seemed to have some changes, and countless universes kept appearing one after another.
 
(Title is temporary until I figure out a better title. Release is random as I am just a kid doing his hobbies. As introduction, I am TealRiff, and I’d prefer to be called Teal. This novel is just for fun until I decide if I want to keep writing novels or focus on real life, society.
 
Chapters are around 1k to 3k)

Title: The Egg Guardian
Synopsis:
First and foremost, I must apologize as this story is currently on an indefinite hiatus. School, work, and writer's block have gotten in the way. I was rather unprepared when I began posting this and kind of just did it on a whim. Thus, I shall ensure I am thoroughly prepared before posting anything else, but I plan to return to this someday to continue it.
What better retirement plan for a scumbag than to become a demon? Whether he likes it or not, that's Berrick's only choice. Heaven thinks hell is getting a little lukewarm and Berrick is just the guy to heat things up again. Follow Berrick as he works for home and hell as one of the few Egg Guardians.
Author's note:
Are you looking for bad writing, terrible dialogue, short chapters, and slow releases? Then you've come to the right place! This is honestly just something I'm writing for fun and figured I'd publish while I'm working on my main project, but I always appreciate constructive criticism so I can improve.
Picture obtained on google.

Title: Womanizing God
Synopsis:
The Story  About a genius Scientist who was trying to travel to the past and bring his knowledge with him to 
make humanity more knowledge to change the future, but how tought that his machine transferred him to Xianxia
world with game system .

Title: Didactic Duplicate
Synopsis:
Space, the final frontier. Floating in an endless void, is the last salvation of humanity, the spaceship Gaia and its seven orbiting sub-vessels. 
In this bleak and confined space, our hero treads the fine line between reality and virtual. Will the world continue its descent into cyberpunk madness or will it turn towards a new brighter future?
Follow our hero from sci-fi hell to agrarian survival. The journey within the journey begins.

Title: Mod to King
Synopsis:
This story is the traditional video game character made real in another world. However it has a couple differences.
First the main character in question hails from the US in the year of 2029. So this world makeup is relatively the same as our modern time. It is just set a decade into the future where virtual reality has become a marketable product.
Second the main character hails from a mod of the vr-mmorpg Roundscape. A "mod" is basically a hacked version of a game. Think of these as being in the same mold as the Elder Scrolls franchise.
Think of the Roundscape game itself as if one of those old school rpg games incorporating many elements found in the D&D franchise.  But the game still has that old Final Fantasy feel to it - just in a VR setting. 
The story will read from the first person point of view (usually from main character) in the past tense but in concurrence. What this means is events of the story are happening in the present but the character in question is speaking of it as though it already happened. This is just a personal preference in writing style.
In terms of summarizing the story overall - it is the classic overpowered main character in a power fantasy setting.  I would say this is a +18 story but do not expect really detailed scenes or even gory gory scenes.  It is a bit "haremy" but not full on of that genre.  And do not expect this as a /hentai series but there will be lines indicating provocative scenes are happening.
The story overall has a dark edge but it is not about a guy who is full on evil.  It is more about a main character who toes that line and how his mere presence can affect everything around him.  I would describe him more as an anti-hero or an apathetic villain.
 
Please keep in mind this is just a hobby of mine done in the little spare time I have and even this first chapter is still a work in progress.  So do not expect daily or weekly updates.  I hope I can push this as a monthly installment.
But I do thank you for your time for reading this and I hope you enjoy it :D
And any feedback is always welcome.

Title: Smoke & Fire (Hiatus)
Synopsis:
Note from the author: Currently this fiction is under hiatus as I focus my full efforts on "The Adventures of a Dhampir." I'm sorry to all who were looking forward to this, I hope to be able to revisit this novel one day.
 
LitRPG with a twist. 
Florian 'Smoke' Kuklinski and Joshua 'Ace' Kuklinski are the sons of hitman 'The Iceman' Richard Leonard Kuklinski. After they were initiated into the DeCavalcante Family to whom their father was employed, they quickly gained rank as two of the top “Gifted.” However, tragedy struck the family as they were betrayed by their former allies which lead to the two brothers being stranded in an unknown land. How will they react to their new environment? How will their new environment react to them? 
This is a story of two brothers' struggle to create a home for themselves in a distant world. Watch as they build a mafia family from the ground up in a fantasy land!
 
Note: Some characters are borrowed from real life but outside of their name and a key defining elements I reserve the right to use them to develop my fiction. I do not condone the actions of their real-life counterparts nor do I disrespect their personal integrity.

Title: Shriek of the Harpy
Synopsis:
The tale of Johnny, a precocious seven year old boy, his stepmother, Steffi and their first adventure. What is the mysterious flying creature that stalks the streets at night and what does Steffi know? Johnny must find an answer to this question and save his stepmother from its clutches before it is too late.
Johnny must also come to terms with the fact that his stepmother is not all she seems... A story of supernatural intrigue seen through the eyes of a child.

Title: The Editor Said No Clichés
Synopsis:
People that create stories have a great power they could never have imagined. And with great power comes great responsibility. But not everyone follows the same motto with our red suited friend, which is how shitty stories are born.
To save his world from shitty stories full of clichés, Thomas decided to become an editor in a publishing company. Sadly, he was killed by an angry author. After his death, he learned that he can still continue his job. This time, he will take a more direct approach.
-----------------------------------------
Our character will visit different worlds and try to steer the story to a better direction. At least, to a direction he thinks better.
My sources of inspiration for this story are Re:Creators,  Side Character Transmigrations: The Final Boss is No Joke, Deadpool Killustrated, How to Kill Reincarnators from Earth and Quickly Wear the Face of the Devil. 
This is my first story. There is no schedule for releases, and I might take breaks during mid-terms and finals.

Title: A Greater Game
Synopsis:
The world burnt, it burnt to ashes, the sky turned black and the air was choked, the earth overun in flames. The ancient cities of man crumbled, the forests and the beasts died, the oceans boiled and hell descended; that was how things were meant to end. And where was humanity when this happened? Where were the keepers of earth? Once again humanity chose to do what it did best. When you cannot not fight, when you cannot not run; you hide and you wait and one way or another you survive. 
  They built a new city, like none that had been before, a city that existed in absolute silence; well almost. A gentle hum surfused it all, rising in defiance of the quiet, the last embers of life amid the cold streets of machinery. There they were: the last remnants of humanity, an endless stream of ones and zeroes sequestered in their iron highrises, in endless databanks and supercomputers raging in the ashes of the earth. A digitsed humanity living within a binary world. A world filled with impossible things pulled from the forgotten legends of humanity, monsters and dragons, and treasure, love and war , and of course heroes: Super heroes, to defend the day and drive off the night, symbols of hope and peace and survival. 
  But where there are heroes there must be villains. 
  And then the only question left is who?

Title: Base Affection
Synopsis: Death is not an end, but a test. Mortals upon death in their initial world are sent to another to suffer some sort of tribulation to decide whether they are destined for heaven, hell, or something beyond. Some believe they are meant to complete some unknown task, others simply do deeds. The answer is never clear. Each mortal is given a tool of some sort for their tribulation. Some its a weapon, forbidden knowledge, a power, or even a system of a kind. Thus, is the fate of a mortal whos flame of life had been extinguished, only to be rekindled elsewhere.

Title: The Duals by Karen Hayes
Synopsis:
Urban fantasy thriller
A young man and woman regain consciousness almost simultaneously in two different neighborhoods of NYC. They can't remember their own names; they don't recall anything that happened to them. They've no idea why they're being hunted down by "gorillas", as the girl nicknamed their mysterious enemies. But both can sense the primal, inhuman force that courses through their veins. The force that unites the two into a single higher being, making them Duals: the prehistoric forerunners of humanity. The powerful entities who are about to transform our planet.

Title: The Forgotten World
Synopsis:
Jason has always like Fantasy but as we all know it just fiction right?

Synopsis: A mouse, a narrator and and author, all wrapped up into a story that just doesn't make sense. Will you read it?

Title: Decimation Mortism
Synopsis:
17 year old high school kid Barry Allen has a brain that can't shut up. One day his mundane life gets turned around when the world as we know it ends and a new era begins. But in a very cosmic 'merge' or 'die' way. Inter dimensional energies leak causing a rift from which monsters, humans, mutants and the like emerge. Will Barry and his friends adapt to the new meta 'fight tooth and nail to survive'? or Will they succumb to the endless mysteries of the universe? Who is this Trevor guy we keep hearing about?
 

About the Novel
Decimation - end of world
Mortism - is a concept, where understanding of life is better after experiencing death
Fitting title for my story i suppose.
 
I like having quirky titles for my chapters. They may sometimes have spoilers and twists, beware.

I am new to writing stuff in general. I will probably have lots of grammar mistakes since English is not my first language. I am writing as a hobby. I release atleast one chapter a week. I planned volume 1 to be about 60-70 pages in my google doc. 
Character inspiration from myself. I literally have a brain that does not shut up. 
I do enjoy a lot of novels here especially : savage divinity and paladian. 
The cover page is my own design. I am happy with it, but feel free to suggest/show something better. I will try to do an art of my characters, especially Trevor, so you guys can also see what I see. But that will take a while. In the meantime, keep reading!

Title: OF THE LAST
Synopsis:
It wasn't hard for Xiao-Ping to realize he wasn't his mother's son. He looked nothing like her, where her hair was white his was gold, her eyes were dark as coal and his seemed to shine under the sun and the most obvious part was her white ears that stood high in the sky while his were small round and at the side of his head.
So one day he decides he's had enough and sets out on a journey to find out who he really is.

Title: Nico, The Lord of Nothingness.
Synopsis:
Nico has decided to go against his Aunt's will and enter Japan's Kakashi College of Heroes. This college has been made to train different types of Heroes who wish to go into different fields with the three main fields being The Nature's Bane, The Defenders of All, and The Creators respectively. Nico entered The Nature's Bane course to hopefully one day become one of the 10 Lords and take down whatever Mother Nature has in store to destroy humanity.
There is one problem, his Affinity for most Magic is zero. The only thing that allowed him to pass the Entrance Exam was his unheard of Affinity for the relatively unknown Soul Magic and his inhuman physical abilities. These specialties barely got him into Class F, which is considered the weakest of Nature's Bane and has never had any students actually make it into Nature's Bane.
Will Nico be able to survive the harsh environment of this college and be able to surpass what low standards it has pegged for him? Most likely, since they don't know his true power which links to his Affinity for Soul Magic, The Eyes of Nothingness.

Title: Harukaze 春風 V2
Synopsis:
Kazuo, a boy forced to live by himself after his parents divorced finds out that his old friend, a girl named Haruka, from back when his parents were still together had transferred to his high school. They encounter each other but it isn’t an easy reunion as Kazuo had forced himself to forget about his old life after living alone for three years. However, Haruka who felt betrayed when her friend left her brutes her way into his life again as she herself left home. Things turn out to be more complicated though as the two of them must keep the knowledge of them living together away from Haruka’s best friend to avoid a clash between their respective families. This is however easier said than done, especially when old feelings start find their way to the surface once again.
(This is the second version of an earlier fiction that goes by the same name.)

Title: Flaming Light
Synopsis:
After an elemental distortion, humans can now wield the power of the elements (supernatural and natural). In a world where many strong people exist, a girl and some friends want to stand at the top and achieve strength powerful enough  to protect life from any universal pandemonium.
This is a tale of humans, beasts and beings from other worlds, this is a tale of a girl who wants to surpass the strongest, this is a tale of Flaming Light.

Title: Queen of War
Synopsis: A traumatized soul that has known only conflict dies and is reborn in a new world. Perhaps here it can finally find peace

Title: Ultimate Kinetic
Synopsis:
Somewhere on the remains of earth stood a man. He stood in the field of debris and corpses. The sky was red from the flames and clouds were stretching as far as eye could see.
This world of kinetics was destroyed by a single man. Driven by his wrath, searching for vengeance and killing every human being on his path.
He was kneeling. Kneeling because he was dying. He knew that his journey would end with death of everyone, including himself. 
But he did not feel anger and sadness. He felt delighted. He was smiling. This was not a smile of madness. He was smiling because he finally rid the world of a disease called humanity and now could finally relax. None shall be betrayed anymore, none shall be abused and none shall suffer from others. He made the world as peaceful as he could and now he would die.

Title: The Freed Dungeon
Synopsis: Dungeons, a great place for any adventurer to go seeking fame, fortune and power. They have been a part of this world since time immemorial.

One day when he was thinking how to make more money he died and was send to another world.

Title: Powerless
Synopsis:
Salem Isaac Burroughs, or better known to the crime world as Belial, The Lord of Lies, is confused. He had one last stop, Casablanca, before he could take some much needed time off. Instead of making his delivery and jumping on the next jetliner out of town, however, he wakes up to find himself strapped to his airline seat and in a desert. Little does he know it only gets so much worse.
