(Yuri novel, 18+, overpowered mc, First novel sorry for small synopsis havn't seen many yuri novels so i thought i'd give one a try)!
Yuki died sacrificing his life for someone he doesn't even know. Now hes been thrown into a fantasy world without even meeting any gods.
Wheres my cheats? where the hell am i? What the hell am i?
Follow Yukis journey in a new world filled with magic and monsters!
Cover picture: (https://www.pinterest.co.uk/pin/494059021615394110/)

Title: The Reincarnated Heroine Runs from the Plot
Synopsis: If you were to be reincarnated as the heroine of an otome game, what would you do?If it was me… I would be too embarrassed! Knowing the romantic stuff that is going to happen to you is seriously too embarrassing! But, thinking again, I would be a completely different person from the original heroine so unless I was good actor, even if I trigger an event, it wouldn’t go as in the game. Really, the heroine is many times so naive, how could a corrupted girl like me pretend to be like that? If I could act… aaah nononono my face is flushing already…With such circular thoughts I stand at the door of the magical academy.Having reincarnated as the heroine of the otome game ‘Captive Hearts ~for you only~’ I interact with troublesome ladies, unnamed characters and the dreadful capture characters, all the while avoiding flags and worrying about the lack of adult material on libraries.“She is so innocent. I must protect her!”…What?

Title: Hayato the Chibi who became a Great Demon King
Synopsis: Hayato Hibiki caught a disease called "The Chibiness". This disease turns the infected person into a Chibi making them powerless in there current form. But what happens when he started going in his own adventures?

Title: Spiritual Point
Synopsis:
Kyle has always been an unlucky boy. Ever since he was young, he has already experienced countless unlucky situations. Getting Crashed by a car, being a victim of landslides, and even creating a massive incident just by slipping on a banana peel. however, all of these jinx will suddenly show a massive change in his life with one simple incident. One which before he'll know it, will change the world forever.
(This story is completely fiction. Anything that is remotely similar to real life is purely coincidental. With that said, please enjoy.)

Title: The Costa Brava Scenario  ( formerly: Space Opera )
Synopsis:
Angie’s heart started beating again. After the betrayal, she almost wished it wouldn’t.
Angie had spent 6 years of her life getting ready for this moment, the moment the competition would start, the moment her team would prove they were the best.
Now, instead of supervising the engineering team, she needed to lead a squad of in-game players.
It would be hellish, but she would go through gaming hell to lead her team to victory in the Space Opera VR systems challenge.
 
The Costa Brava Scenario is a scifi littpg-lite story.  Peviously this story was called Space Opera and it now has a new cover too.  The title was changed 11/23

Title: Kain, the Caveman
Synopsis:
Take an early hominid sponsored by the spirit of Progress, drop it on a spacefaring civilization.  Prepare for hijinks to ensue.
 
*Dry prologue warning!*

Title: The Road To Be the King -- one piece
Synopsis:
When I was given a second chance to live again in another world and I realized that it was a world with boundless adventure. Well what is there but for me to aim to be the king of kings. And have the greatest adventure there is while fulfilling my goal. 
And to help him fulfill his dream is a gamer system.

Title: Seele Under The Rain
Synopsis: Derleib meets a weird girl under the rain

Title: Cartilage Of Life
Synopsis:
Two brothers wake up in a dark room, a creature drags them out of there room
a quick little death battle

Title: My Sister from Aetherium
Synopsis: Josh's life is turned upside-down when the super-heroine Teramaiden leaves a young alien girl from her own planet with his family for them to adopt. How can Josh handle having an alien as a sister and make her feel welcome, especially when she has lost her entire world and nameless horrors have followed her to Earth?

Title: Tower of fate
Synopsis:
Ah... the fallen Kingdom Of Vireweth, many years have passed since someone asked me about that.
Spoke the old man as his flowing beard rippled slightly with his movement.
"why do you want to know about that? There are few things i know about it and none of it is good "the cursed land" they call it for a reason."
The old man shifted as he looked at the person sitting across the table, he wore a well worn leather armor that was covered in a tattered dark gray robe, most likely it was another color when made. His face could not be seen clearly as the hood was pulled down and covered everything but his mouth that had a short unkempt beard growing around it.
".. why i want to go there is far too complicated to explain right now, nor do i want to explain it anyway, all i want is to know where is the old road that leads to it. "
Staring at the man across him intently for a few seconds the old man finnaly let out a long sigh as he spoke,
"Very well..then listen carefully for its a complicated and dangerous journey to the old road "

Title: Stories of the Realms
Synopsis:
A variety of short stories set within the universe of the Realms of Mordred series.
The first novel in the series can be found here. It's not necessary to understand the stories here, though it does expand more on the rules of the world and first introduce these characters.

Title: Illusory
Synopsis: f

Title: Nomad Dungeon
Synopsis:
The World where Dungeons exist, an existence that has been a thing of mystery to the populace.
Sudden appearances can cause disturbance among the populace.
If a Dungeon has grown strong enough, it is capable of birthing even Demon Lords, Immortals, Dragons, Devils, etc.
The Populace has experienced such things in the past, resulting in dungeons becoming a mark to be destroyed before growing too powerful.
Now a new dungeon is born, housing a lost soul from Modern Earth.
How will this new sentient dungeon survive in this world?

Title: Dive Sasquatch God!
Synopsis:
The veil thins between two worlds, as a cataclysmic event threatens to engulf a world teeming with monstrous creatures and magic. A bizarre dimension of unique existences and a vast amalgamation of energies is starting to bleed through to this world. 
Kimarya, a Bigfoot enthusiast, is reborn in this fantastical land due to mysterious circumstances after her untimely death on a futuristic earth. Armed with the knowledge of a futuristic society, an unexpected alliance with the creature of legend, and an enhanced subconscious mind called Sunny, Kimarya needs to master the art of weaving technology and magic to survive in a world teetering on the brink of pandemonium. But even the gods themselves aren't safe from the encroaching chaos. 
Can Kimarya save herself and uncover the mystery of Sasquatch's origin?

Title: Epic of Necessity
Synopsis:
Fortis World.
A land ruled by swords and magic.
A place where men walked their own path as they discover new knowledge that would bring their selves to greatness.
Different from these men, Bellwick is a young boy, born as a slave, inherited the status of a slave. 
In a world where words like freedom and equality are superficial and only for the strong, he thrives to carry on living with his mother.
One day, everything changed.
He found freedom, yet the price was too big.
See how a slave boy used his newfound freedom to mark his name as a legend.

Title: Troll Wars - The Gnome Saga #1
Synopsis: It is the end of the Dark Ages. While most of the Gnome men are out on patrol, Trolls kidnap Brodo’s wife Ada and his sons, Morel and Rada.Led by Toki, a small group of Gnomes track the kidnappers through the forest to a cave at the foot of a mountain range. The ensuing battle, together with an earlier similar attack, marks the beginning of a war of attrition.Trolls are five times bigger than Gnomes, but they are rather stupid and somewhat cowardly. Intelligence, bravery, ingenuity, poisoned arrows and a little bit of magic gives the Gnomes a small advantage.This thrilling action-packed drama will keep you on edge as you see how the tiny Gnomes cope with the Troll bullies…

Title: Fall from Grace
Synopsis:
Synopsis: Everything has its end. Every rule has its conclusion. Every kingdom has its downfall.
“Through them, you met your end. It is only fair that you will rise through them.”

Title: The Divine Apocalypse
Synopsis:
Be careful what you wish for. The old saying holds true for many people, but none more so than Jaxon Stratford. An avid fantasy writer and reader of LitRPG and post-apocalypse novels, Jax always wished for the chance to attain power and abilities like the heroes of the stories he read and wrote about. 
Then, he received his wish in the form of the prophesized Mayan Apocalypse. However the truth of reality in this new ‘System’ dominated world, is something far worse than he could ever imagine.

Title: AI immortal god soul
Synopsis: Our MC the creater of the most advanced AI dies in the process of merging his body with the AI system but to his surprise wakes up to find himself reincarnated into a new world,a world of cultivation. Watch our MC grow with the help with the AI system and his innate ability the immortal god soul.

Title: Hey,
Synopsis: A prose about love and depression.

Title: I'm A Superhero
Synopsis:
One year ago, a wormhole opened up on one side of the island country. Aliens started swarming the city. However, even before the government could react, a team of superheroes called the Super Hero International Team (S.H.I.T) appeared and took care of the aliens popping out from the wormhole. Nonetheless, without a way to close the wormhole, it stayed opened as the other side of the city prosper under its geographical advantage as a port.
One year on, the government decided that it needed to start its own superheroes unit to combat the need of an unsanctioned superhero team. The sudden appearance of the wormhole and the International Team was suspicious to the state, so they headhunted for a team and provided them with superpowers to put the International Team out of business with the intention to take the city back under their full control.
Follow our main character as he was chosen by his government to be part of the response team against the rising threats as a superhero.
What happened when a team of superheroes took on another team of superheroes? 
This is my first try on writing a novel. I will try to update weekly with a chapter each time.

Title: Reincarnated in One Piece
Synopsis:
This is a one piece fan fiction about an otaku who dies and the gets reincarnated in one piece with a game system. That's about it.
This does not have a schedule and is just for fun may have mistakes.
Inspired by lia and Lara will seek the one piece.
Disclamer: this is a fanfiction of One piece.

Title: Raven and Wolf
Synopsis:
Logan Black is the bloodblade to his half sister Leanna Russ in her own right the Queen of the Northern people. Life is good for them but when betrayal strikes they must both flee from their land they known as home to the very heart of their enemy's to find out mroe about their enemy and about their own family.
Author notes: Please have mercy on me frist story and time. Also warning i have dyslexia so forgive my spelling. Hope you enjoy

Title: Sundown
Synopsis:
She had been known as Neira Sunkin, the golden princess, the heart and sorrow of the realm, the girl who vanished.
She had been known as Neira Lifesbane, the witchqueen, the deceiver, the necromancer, the heretic, the woman who was defeated.
She would forge a new legend for herself, this time in secret. She would spread her influence from the far north to beyond the blight, free of her previous burden. She would carve the most exquisit souls and craft the most abtruse spells. Deep in her dungeon, hidden from the gaze of the Divine, she would finally be free ! Free to uncover the truth of the System. Free to explore the bounds of space and time.
Free to reach transcendance...

Quick note : this is just a beginning, as I'm not familiar yet with the intricacies of the RRL editor, or with writing in general, I may take some time to experiment with a few things before really getting into the story. Tags and warnings may evolve.

Title: Small Cell in a Huge Ecosystem
Synopsis:
A normal ten year old boy dies while playing with his friends by a river. He is sent to a place that is neither heaven nor hell, and is given a chance for reincarnation. Unfortunately, out of the thousands of organisms he could be reincarnated into, he is reincarnated into the smallest and weakest one - a bacteria cell. God, having pity for him, gives him the chance to become something better.
-----------------------
This is my first attempt at a story, so there will be a lot of errors and failures with it, but I hope you will still read it and help me to get better!
Although the story will start off with a singular character, once he evolves from being a bacteria I will introduce more characters.
I am not a biologist, so there will probably be a lot of errors with this story, so please feel free to correct my misunderstandings!

Title: King of Heavenly Realm
Synopsis:
From the World Of Beginnings, The Realm of the Ancient Fallen Gods, Demons, and Angels
The Continent of Ancients, the Archaic Wastelands, humble home of Immortals of the Great Heavenly Dao
The Realm of the Universe, divided and separated, in a lonesome world, a great golden era of immortals are born a new,
Radiant Divine World, a great world in ancient times reduced to a state of a small being named as, Radiant World.
Divine Light Continent, Azure Life Continent, Blazing Wastelands, Dark Forest of Demonic Beings, Forest of Magical Heavenly Beasts

Title: Deep And Dark
Synopsis:
A boy is born in an age of bloodshed and cruelty, and the world he calls home becomes a deadly game of violence, death and betrayal.He is often underestimated, but sometimes, those who don't begin a manhunt for "the boy who won't die."

warning: it may not seem like it at first, but by the end of this story, you will be scarred in ways you can't even imagine. it involves children and they are not safe from pain, injustice and death. you have officially been warned about the contents of this piece.

Title: The Daily Life Of A Socially Awkward Nerd Reincarned Into A Fantasy World
Synopsis:
Derrick was what you could call an average if not somewhat below average excuse for a human being, when he wasn’t at school he was skulking around in his parents basement which he had converted into his private gaming room 
 

 
Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Title: My Own Dragon System In Anime Worlds
Synopsis: My name is Lux V. Dragon. Age 25.  My parent wanted me to soar in the sky like dragon, but I was a good for nothing son.  I didn't have a job or friend at all because I was an anime otaku freak.  I was hopeless and wish to die.  I dare the god and devil to stirke me with lightning in the cold thunder storm.  During the storm I was hit by a red golden lightning and I fell into a deep coma.  When I woke up, I was in an anime world know as One Piece. The Dragon system connected to me and told me very important infomation. Dragon System tell Dragon, that if you can get stronger, then you can go to other anime worlds by using point Anime Point (AP) collected.  I will start my journey to become the strongest Dragon god of all time with this system.  Killing everything in my path is the way of the Dragon.  I will leave a path of destruction for my emeny.   Also adding some of my own idea to the System too.  Bad Gammer!!! Xuanhuan too and changing technique abitiy too.

Just me writting mostly eroticas and when ever i want with whoever i want in them.
the style will be the pre note is the prolouge, action is the main part, and epilogue is post note.

Title: WELSH MAGIC
Synopsis:
A barely literate pyromancer struggles to avoid expulsion from the prestigious Crymych School of Druidic Sorcery; but when a murderer begins hunting her more talented classmates, exams become the least of her worries. (Especially when her friends are the next to go missing.)
A Mythological Whodunnit. (completed)

Title: When you mess up in your reincarnation
Synopsis: So do you know the common cliche of being send to another world after risk yourself someone from traffic. Then you get any wish, from super power to legendary weapon, then save the the new world with that power. My incarceration was the same only in meeting the God after death, but the rest, is go way too wrong.

Title: A Paladins Cultivation Guide
Synopsis:
As Adam woke up he realised one thing, he had reincarnated.
The story of Adam Fuller's reincarnation as he uses his knowledge from earth and his newly found gifts to tip the scales of fate and overcome his weak, sickly body and pathetically low mana as in this world you can’t increase the amount of mana you have from birth. How you ask, by inventing cultivation of course!
(Cover is from Google Images)

Title: The Villainess Defeats the Demon King
Synopsis:
Born with memories of her past, Bellamy Valmet was reincarnated into the popular game of 'The White Rose Heart and the Golden Eyed Demon King''. However, this didn't matter to her. It didn't matter she was reborn as the villainess, nor did it matter that all routes were death routes, and it absolutely didn't matter that the capture targets were pleasantly similar to their in-game characters. It really didn't matter. 
Not when the story already strayed right from the beginning. Rather than stress about those things...
How did I become childhood friends with the demon King!? And... oi.... your sticking to close!

Title: New Beginning Online
Synopsis: New Beginning Online gives players a new Beginning in the apocalypse, the world is not controlled by developers and the NPC's are truly living. most people wouldn't willingly plung head first into a apocalypse unless they are desperate or thrill seekers, our MC is both. Bishop Wells a 24 year old male that has a dark past plunges into this new world to literally have a New Beginning, as time goes by he finds this ruined world his home and the real world a distant dream but how will he change this new world?

Title: Escaping Reality: The Conquering of the "New World"
Synopsis:
Our protagonist; Joseph, 19 Years of age.
Bored out of his mind going through life with his tedious fast food job having to wait on people, listen to them complain about the food; "What's the point of going through college if I'm going to be stuck with this job? all I ever want to do is go home and play video games; it's a boring life, but he manages to suck it up; one day however his life gets turned upside down.
"Joseph, are you really content with living through life this way? wouldn't you rather take over the world perhaps? maybe actually be free?"
And to that Joseph responds with: Hell Yeah!

Title: Rain Revert
Synopsis:
Rain Revert an ordinary orphan and was working while studying at the same time.
Suddenly, one night, he was struck by a truck and end up dead...
However, it seems like that was just the beginning of the story made by God (Mr. Author) since he woken up and found out that he was already in a different world.
A world completely different from his original world - A world only found in movies and games...
And now, as an ordinary human, how would he be able to continue surviving?
This story is about a boy who would one day heralded a great change into the new world he was in called <Fantasia>.
Just what kind of change would he bring when Human and Monsters are at the edge from each other?
... ...
I'm not really good at writing synopsis XD... Anyway, I'll just change it if I thought of a good one later on. This is another story I made... Hope you will like it...

Title: Shattered Mind
Synopsis:
When John Foster has a seizure for the first time in years he is transported to a world unlike anything he could imagine. After successfully fighting off a monster with a group of fellow adventurers John is surprised to find out he’s in a hospital back in Los Angeles.
Unable to figure out what is happening to him, John walks a path between two worlds. One is the dull world he has lived in his whole life, while the other is a vivid world full of adventure and danger.
***
Not the greatest synopsis, I'll eventually write a better one.

Title: Armageddon Online - Escape
Synopsis:
Sean Cullers is the leader of the elite raiding guild the Misfits in a VRMMO, Champions. Craig Tiel, their eccentric billionaire boss has hired them to test out a new Reality Controlling game - Armageddon Online (AO).Things go unexpected wrong when Aeon, AO's AI, malfunctions. Aeon, now merged with a rogue AI, transforms the world into a hellscape from humanity's worst imagination.To get through this, Sean must deal with his own demons even as his team struggles to survive. Fortunately, the Misfits are not only top players, but also close friends. Sean will need every bit of their support to find their missing employer and stop the rampage of a former guild member now under the control of Aeon.
New chapters daily.

Title: Breath
Synopsis:
I am Breath. The breath of life. The one in everyone and everyone in one.
I am Breath. I breathe life into everyone. From the smallest bacteria to the Giants of the mountains.
I am Breath. You need not worship me, for I live inside you. Would you worship part of yourself? 
So be at ease...
And breathe...

Title: City

Regular residents include but are not limiteded to vampires, werewolves, necromancers, succubi, immortals, serial killers, and of coarse talking cats...
Normallacy is only relative... But don't worry because they are totally normal.

Title: Journey of the Black Rose
Synopsis:
I lived a good life until the royals' betrayal. After that, everything went wrong, I couldn't trust anyone and had to live in the wild for five long years. One day, when I went close to a town an adventurer couple found me and took care of me... Will I be able to live a good life after these ardous years?

Hey!This is the first novel I wrote, so please write in the reviews how I could do a better work:)As english is not my first language(third, actually) I will have some problems with grammar, but I'll try to correct them all before posting.

Title: The Winding Path
Synopsis:
This is a story about a dungeon. A very mean, nasty dungeon. A dungeon that doesn’t like most things. A dungeon that likes to find new and interesting ways of breaking most things. It is a very cruel and intelligent place, who has a most horrible sense of humor. It’s delights are very likely your horrors, and frankly you likely won’t like it (the dungeon or the story). But, if you’re so inclined, come with me on a journey; a descent, if you will, into the underworld, into madness.
—?—?—?—?—?—?—?—?—?—?———————————————————————————
This is my first publish so constructive criticism is warmly welcomed. I’ve got a couple different ideas for other stories I’d like to develop, so let me know if y’all want to see more of this or not. I know this snippet doesn’t touch on world/dungeon building or plot at all, but I’m more worried about characters and tone at this point. Thanks!

Title: I'm a zombie
Synopsis:
The world changed, all the people of the world got a "system" making them be like RPG characters, but this "system" that brought emotion and happiness also brought with it an apocalypse of monsters, zombies, mutants. To fight against this apocalypse humanity had to use the "system" and become stronger, but this also brought the true face of humanity "The strong eats the weak and the weak is eaten" the world lost its morale and is a all against all.
I, who should have obtained the "system" like everyone else, but instead I got "zombie system"

Title: The Athreal Codex
Synopsis:
"What does it mean to be ethereal?"
 
Kane is a member of the Athreal of Steel, eager to prove himself worthy by trying his luck in the Destiny's Conondrum. Through this he learns secrets that entail the destruction of all the Athreals.
Vivian is a member of the Athreal of War, the prodigy that successfully went through the Destiny's Conondrum. Now in search of greater worlds, her journey leads her through divinity.
Aurora is Vivian's sister and a member of the Athreal of Peace. Living under her sister's shadow and regarded as a "cursed child" she finds friendship with Kane and through it discovers her true purpose.

Title: Closed Beta [A Star Nova Prequel]
Synopsis: Charlie and the Misfits have been invited to join the closed beta of a new space-themed MMO, Star Nova Online.  Together with hundreds of other test pilots, they hope to defend Earth from a descending menace.  The Roth—a lizard-like warrior race—has nearly wiped humanity from the face of the universe.  However, in a special event, the players successfully destroyed the alien outpost on Mars.  With nowhere to retreat, the surviving Roth forces are left with one option.  To destroy what's left of mankind in an all or nothing battle set to take place over Earth.  Charlie and his crew have just seven days to train and prepare themselves.

Title: My Innocent Lover
Synopsis: A lovestory of a young love that disguises in many ways.

Title: Demon King Reincarnated as the Hero's Child
Synopsis:
What is the point of life if you're going to die in the next minute?
I don't know either, but I'd sure like to curse the Hero, the one who's going to kill me, in a way that would last him an eternity.
"Any last words?"
"I'll curse your child! Your harem member no. 1's child! He will forever be weak, ugly, and stupid!"
*
Good, I reincarnated. It's time to get my revenge.
...Wait, isn't this the arms of the really cute harem member no. 1?

Title: A Dragon With Fur
Synopsis:
Amit has always wished to see the fabled beast said to be sleeping under the Frozen Lake. When a man he saves turns out to be a vampire, and he becomes curious about the true identity of the newcomers to his village, Amit just might get a chance to fulfil his wish.

Seiren killed her mother and trapped her sister's soul in a stone. She will stop at nothing to atone for the greatest mistake of her life and restore Madeleine to life, even at the cost of her own humanity.
The magic-wielding country of Karma and demon-commanding country of Hanna are on the brink of war. Civil unrest and increasing pressure from the king catapults Seiren into a terrifying game of deception, politics, and betrayal. The battle may be against the demon summoners, but the war is against something far darker and more powerful.

Watch Eznho as he grows from a timid boy into the most feared man in the world which would lead him to the truth about his purpose in life.

Title: March City (Project Lunation Book 1)
Synopsis: In the technologically advanced March City, academic achievements and abilities determine your true worth. Sixteen-year-old Ari is a high-achiever who gets by doing the minimum. When her sister, Mina, is kidnapped during a series of terrorist bombings, Ari has to defy the law and delve into the dark secrets of the city in a race against time and the city itself - and Mina's life may be her price.Book 1 of Project Lunation. Magic has come to earth and Jack and his brother Bryan have to traverse a postapocolyptic U.S.A. All while making friends, meeting old ones, adjusting to the new world and of course making some pretty serious enemies.

Title: The Sage and the Sword
Synopsis:
Every great story begins in tragedy… A story of true heroes, forged through hardship… A story of a world thrown in turmoil… A story of heroes, battling the forces of evil…  However, every great story has a humble beginning.  In the Ancient Times, the world was in turmoil. Only through the efforts of a martial hero, wielding the Flaming Medallion and the Heavenly Sword, was the Dark Lord slain.  Now, eight hundred thousand years have passed…  Yang Jing, a Mount Kunlun disciple, dies on a mission. However, he finds no rest after death. Reincarnating into the body of Cheng Yuan, a mere mortal, will he recover his martial prowess, or is there a deeper meaning to his reincarnation?  Will he answer the call of a world thrown into turmoil? To follow in the footsteps of those before him, and defeat the Dark Lord once and for all?

(Xianxia/Fantasy story. I do not own the cover art, all rights reserved to the owner. Thanks to Danetello for the synopsis.)

Title: Slightly Contradictory
Synopsis:
I did not expect to die, but for the same outcome I would die once more.
I did not expect to wake up again, but as soon as I did I was told to die.
I did not expect anything from this new life, which has since given so much.
I still do not know what the future holds, but there is one thing I am certain of;
I will fight to get there if I have to, and I will fight twice as hard for my family!

Title: Vacilations
Synopsis: The short story of a man, whose life was toyed with.

Title: Gravewalker
Synopsis: Blake Wesley, a 27-year old detective, was one of the victims of the North Bound Massacre. Mysteriously, he managed to survive and gain uncanny abilities but lacking memories. Piece by piece, it all returned to him by touching certain objects and seeing different places through the guidance of a mysterious old man that poses the same kind of nature. In his vendetta, he discovered  a war that he must fight alone.

Title: Camelot Defiant
Synopsis:
Book 3 in the Camelot Saga.
Sir Gorrow of the Bloody Field has levelled up his dungeon and his town. He has the mysterious smoky crystals looted from the enemy but doesn't yet know what they are for, though he suspects it's something very important. 
Everything is going well, except that now the enemy know where he is -- lurking behind his dungeon and he knows it's only a matter of time before they come and get him.
Breaking silence, he finally reaches out to the other Knights of the Round Table and lets them know that he is still in the north, resisting the Evil One.
In this book, Gorrow builds Level 2 of his dungeon, goes raiding to find out the function of the smoky crystals and then when he knows, has to embark on a deadly quest to craft the crystals to their true potential.

Title: The Echelon Tower
Synopsis:
Our MC is one the people that were able to quickly get their hands on the newest VR technology, the Phantasm. However, the headset turned out to be a trap which teleported all of humanity to a different world! Jonathan now has to survive in a place were death is the only thing that will keep you company for long. He will have to battle through the ruthlessness of men and the viciousness of nature as he discovers the secrets within his body...
AUTHOR'S NOTE: I am intending to rewritte the entire story since I am not satisfied with what I have outpouted. Sorry for the low quality.
Volume 1: Blood Settlment
Volume 2: Azin Seighart (Unreleased)

Title: Even In Lipsi There Are Graves
Synopsis:
Two men on the run try find solace and humanity in a corner of paradise in Greece, but their time on earth is limited as they find out they cannot outrun predestination... even in the most idyllic of places. 
The title is in reference to the painting by Nicolas Poussin (17th c.) called The Arcadian Shepherds. It depicts what the Greeks considered a utopia in the mountainous region of Arcadia in Greece; shepherds gathered around having a good time while a grave sits next to them. Under the painting is inscribed "Et in Arcadia Ego" - Even in Arcadia There I Am, symbolising that even in utopia there is death.

Title: Dive in the Afterdark
Synopsis:
A young man starts playing a Full-Dive MMORPG to escape from reality. Sadly, the use of a game feature that is frowned upon by other players lead him to being bullyed.
Having lost faith, he decides to quit from everything, but to his surprise, the game developers send him a message: "We're sad to see you go, being the only one who managed to explore the game feature we are more proud of in its entirety. To complete the procedure, please play through this especially made farewell dungeon."
Little he knows that crossing that last gate would lead him to a way of escaping he never imagined. 
Author's note 1: English is not my first language, so this story could use the help of an editor. 
Author's note 2: It's still undecided if the story is going to be R-15 or R-18.

Title: OCTRINE Archives
Synopsis:
What lies below Kent is a collection of short stories following different characters within the same city/region in the distant future of our world.

Please let me know which character you like the best.

Title: The Conquering Dungeon
Synopsis: What would happen if you woke up one day with an offer that you could refuse, but if you did you would be giving up the opportunity of a lifetime, something that people dream of, but can not have. But at the cost of war. Would you agree?

Title: Drifter
Synopsis: I’ve been living such a boring life. My parents are never home and I get lost in time with all the novels I've read. Some people may envy my life, but I don’t. I don’t have to worry about bills and I can do what I want. However, have you ever thought there should be more to life than just the everyday thing we do? I just get lost in time.

Title: My Sister's An Alien
Synopsis: Josh's life is turned upsidedown when his family adopts a lovable green alien girl with super-powers.  The surreal siblings get up to all sorts of wacky adventures.  Read how they fight evil aliens, deal with school woes and learn to love one another and eventually save the world as often as it needs saving.  Will Josh's sister become a super-heroine and will Josh become her sidekick?  Find out!

Title: Irobu's Odyssey of Deceit
Synopsis: Irobu Vikria led a model life; she dutifully worked in the mines and devoutly worshipped her patron deity Hekal—that is, until a cave-in unleashed the spirit of the ancient King Thrun. A victim of circumstance, adolescent Irobu is possessed by the archaic regent, which results in the unlikely pair sharing body and mind. In order to escape the cave-in, Thrun tricks Irobu into casting spells—a dangerous and sacrilegious act in a land where magic is extremely erratic. Irobu’s life continues to unravel as Thrun commits further heresy while she is sleeping. Determined to banish the uninvited guest, Irobu flees her homeland to join the one group that might be up for the challenge. To complete her quest, Irobu must embrace her nascent magical talent while trying to win over her newfound allies. Her faith, compassion, and, above all, patience, are tested throughout her continent wide odyssey. Along the way, Irobu begins to see that there may be more to the world than either Hekal or Thrun would have her believe…

Title: The Snare that will Someday Catch the Sun
Synopsis:
*Female Protagonist*
Power Systems, Magical Experiments, Contractual Beasts, Revenge, Political Intrigue, Romance. I have reached the pinnacle of magic when everything was taken away from me. If the world wills the extinction of my people, then I will destroy it and create my own. A fate of my design.

Title: A Bittersweet Hero Series : The Slumbering Champion (Fate/Grand Order/Fate CYOA)
Synopsis: He was just a normal human before the war happened. Before he filled the cursed sheet. Before he need to watch his master, his lover, sacrificed herself for him, and when he won the war, he thought it's all over, he thought could meet his lover again, imagine his suprise when he woke up in a middle circle, surrounded by numerous servant that whatching him like a hawk.

Have you ever wanted something but found out it was unattainable for you? But, you REALLY WANT IT!
Well, that's what I've always wanted until one day god spoke to me.

'I don't believe in god, ah whatever yes I want what others take for granted' (Me in my brain)

'that's really suspicious but whatever yea sure, not like anyone gives a sh*t about me anyways.'
"alright good luck, in your new world make sure to look down k?"
'wait... why would he do that? My fu*kin d*ck bett...'

Being told that she suffered a near death disease and traumatize by magic. What will Elithia do to save her country or simply sits back and enjoy her life as a normal girl?

this short story is twisted and the main character ends up regreting everything.

Title: Joker
Synopsis:
A story I have intended to write for a long time.
A normal kid. That’s what he was before all of this right? Chase was a kid. He might of hit a couple bumps in the road in his childhood, if you can call the death of both his parents a bump in the road, but beside that he was normal. It’s surprising, he’s the joker? ‘Couldn’t be’ I thought. But I guess that doesn’t really matter now. We’re going to have to kill him.

Title: Energon
Synopsis: Let me just say that this is my world and not the world we currently live in my friends. It’s a brand-new world filled with mystery and adventure! This is the story of a young boy and his goal to become the number one Energon Warrior.

Out of agony he devoured everything and became supreme...
Wishing just to be with his family in peace.. 
 
Will it be possible for someone who stands above all...

Title: Mourning Glory
Synopsis:
A year and a half after Elizabeth's suicide, Sara Mera's life settles back to normalcy from a battle of depression. Sara's life is thrown back into that pit of darkness when her hand in the suicide is exposed to the world. In a negative state of mind, she meets the girl who was Elizabeth's best friend who is still suffering from her death.  Afraid another tragedy will happen, Sara selfishly becomes friends with the girl but never expected that she would be the one who light's up Sara's world in the darkness.
-

Title: Anno Iudicio
Synopsis:
Latin for In the Year of Judgement 
What is reality? Eve and Michael (?) awakened in what seems to be the distant future. Remembering only their sheltered life together, seeing the outside world was like a dream come true. A peaceful world or so they though. As they slowly uncover their clouded memories, a bloodstained world awaited them. A long battle against the laws of the world, their fate, the so called Gods, and their own selves have only just begun.

Title: Guardians: Rise of the Forgotten
Synopsis:
Among the eight continents that make up the world of Risfell, in the continent of Melvotz on the borders of two kingdoms, Sarvarria and Radia, nestled among the foothills of an ancient mountain known as Mount Ladrian lays the village of Bryne. Six childhood friends discover an ancient ruin that had been hidden within the forest at the foot of the mountain, unknowingly becoming embroiled in a conflict long thought over in ages past. Beings long thought dead are rising up once more, gathering their strength and making their presences known. An age of strife is starting and the inhabitants of Risfell will only have a few years to prepare before those ancient beings march to war.

Title: Shadow’s World
Synopsis: Think of avatar the last air bender vs pokemon/digimon cross over. But instead of pokemon/digimon it is movie monsters better yet fantasy monsters. With a story.

Title: Era of Conflict
Synopsis:
In 2212, humanity achieved a dream: it created the very first fully immersive simulation, capable of hosting billions of entities, and with a realism never thought possible. Era of Conflict would be the first game to use this system, a giant sci-fi game where imagination is the only limit.
Adele was an unfortunate girl. At 17, she managed to get into one of the top colleges in the world, only to be left completely paralyzed on a hospital bed by a crazy driver.
However, she was given a chance. She would play Era of Conflict as a tester, allowing her to make something of her life, and above all, walk again.
Will she be able to fully grasp the full extent of the chance that was offered to her? Will she be able to survive in an unforgiving universe? Or will she just die on the first encounter?

Title: She’s a Zombie.
Synopsis: Zero Mitsubi and Shuu Kenki are both students of Grenare High, a private school for students with decently good grades. Neither of the two are aware of the others existence, that is, until a fateful interaction between the two occurs, beginning a deep connection between them.

Title: Angelica the Techno Ghoul
Synopsis:
Angelica is a ghoul, but she doesn't think that it's a bad thing, in fact, she is only alive today because she is a ghoul. Sealed away from the rest of the world with only one job, to invent weapons to fight mutants. However, while she is enjoying the execution of her foster father with a bowl of popcorn she is interrupted by the mysterious Angel System and for the first time in her life regrets becoming a ghoul. Thrust straight into the deep end, how will this technology loving ghoul cope with the Angel System as her heavenly shut-in lifestyle is blown straight to hell.
 
AN: This is my first story and I hope you forgive any incompetence on my behalf. I look forward to getting the hang of things.

Title: The Berserker
Synopsis:
Cyran the berserker was once a fearsome warrior that laid waste to many of Astrya’s enemies. One day, he is falsely charged with war crimes, handed over to torturers, and left to waste by the very kingdom he once served.
Two years later, the old king has been assassinated, and his son Prince Anael has taken over the throne. He recalls a certain berserker and offers him a chance for redemption; serve under him as his valet and retainer, as well as his secret soldier, in hopes of avenging his father if the assassin ever returned.

Title: THE RISE OF A PROGENITOR
Synopsis: In the darkness of New York, settles a singular figure with a label that has frequently been given to him; freelancer. In the depths and darkness of mythical New York, Morius Shay has been dealt his cards and forced to play at a table he isn't in control of. Murder, twist and deception rains down on the city but a rude awakening beckons on the dawn. The everlasting peace has been broken and the sanctity of Morius' life is about to change forever. Past, future and present.

Title: The Rider with the Golden Torc
Synopsis:
Sons of a minor noble, Estrios and his brother dream of the glory on the battlefield. When the largest empire of their time sends a great army to invade their lands, they are called upon to stand against overwhelming odds and certain death. Estrios and his brother must survive the march to the coast while being pursued by a relentless rider bearing a golden torc. Failure means witnessing everything that they hold dear being laid to waste by the Elahkarian Empire and their subjects.
*Note: there is no magic in this story*

Title: The Golden Wolf
Synopsis:
The story revolves around the protagonist Jason's journey as his entire world is turned upside down. Things outside his knowledge drag him down into the world of werewolves and Lycans  and he is forced to abandon everything for their safety but little does he know he is leaping out of the frying pan and straight into the fire. Werewolves may be powerful creatures but dangers lurk around every corner. The hunters will stop at nothing to ensure werewolves are wiped from the planet, wolves have begun disappearing sent into the pits and forced to fight to the death for entertainment but the worst danger he faces comes from those closest to him.
As the golden wolf, he is a living legend, a descendant of the very first werewolf. Stronger, faster than the average werewolf many will look to him for guidance, for protection and celebrate his arrival but this fame makes him a threat to anyone in power. A threat that they will do anything to get rid of.

Title: Over My Undead Body
Synopsis:
The story of how a normal, plain boy get a new life in another, fantasy world... Or would be better to say "un-life"?
 
This is my first story of this kind. English is not my language, so expect many errors and slow updates. I promise that I'll try my best!

Title: Notes
Synopsis: Its time to take notes and be better prepared, more comprehensive and easier to understand.

Title: Contractor of Flames
Synopsis: A wish was answered and now Kyle Jared has become the contractor of flame. Sent to a world all on his own to explore and adventure to sate the boredom of a god. Kyle will experience both joys and hardships as he begins his journey into his new life as a contractor.

Title: Birth of an Immortal Ninja
Synopsis:
Well as all reincarnation stories go. Someone has to die for it to be a rebirth, I just happened to be that person. Though I was not expecting something like this to happen after I did.
Currently only doing chapters when I feel like it. I hope to soon get to atleast 1 or more a week at a minimum. Prologue length will not be the normal chapter length. I plan to have chapters be around 3k-5k words each. This is not counting tables or the ending statistics of the main character.
Still choosing a cover. PM me if you find one that might fit the story that will not have copywrite issues.
Synopsis is under revision till I get far enough into the story to have a decent one.
(I do not own a majority of the abilities in the point shop that the character can access. All of the owners work belongs to them not me. I will not be earning anything off of this webnovel. I will not even accept donations at this time. Once I make my own novel that is based solely on my own work. Only then I might change this.)
