Title: The Road Not Taken
Synopsis:
Left or right? Up or down? Backward or forward? 
Life is a branching road, laden with mysteries and qualms. New opportunities arise with every step we take, and with opportunities come decisions. As Sartre once said, "We are condemned to be free." Pitted against the infinities of choice, we must choose a single path -- a single life -- and reject all others.

Elijah Frost had long been averse to change: every day consisted of the same activities, diligently repeated without question. He'd wake up each morning, go to class, return home, and sleep. His classmates thought he was just shy, while his parents labeled him emotionless. And, for the most part, they were both right -- only one emotion pervaded Elijah's mind, and it was extreme boredom. His childhood dream was to explore the world, but his fear of change slowly overcame his desire for adventure. Unable to take the first step, he waited and waited, until finally, his chance arrived. Now, all that keeps Elijah from his dream journey is a couple of decisions: some small, some big, but all exciting and new.

Join Elijah on his adventure, participating in every choice he makes! You'll not only be able to vote on which path he takes, but also suggest different ones. There is no master plan for this story -- it's future will change with every poll. Tag along and find out where Elijah ends up!
Genres and tags are subject to change as the story progresses.
This is the first story I've ever written, so bear with me...

Title: Sod's Law (Dropped)
Synopsis:
This fiction has been dropped, you're more than welcome to read it anyway (there is sort of an ending). But you have been warned...

Sod's law is a more extreme version of Murphy's law. While Murphy's law says that anything that can go wrong, will go wrong (eventually), Sod's law requires that it always goes wrong with the worst possible outcome.
For example, concepts such as "bad fortune will be tailored to the individual" and "good fortune will occur in spite of the individual's actions" are sometimes given as examples of Sod's law in action. This would broaden Sod's law to a general sense of being "mocked by fate". In these aspects it is similar to some definitions of irony, particularly the irony of fate. - Definitions of Sod's Law on Wikipedia.
The protagonist, as many before them, and many who followed, thought they were just entering a VRMMORPG (Virtual Reality Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing-Game). Unbeknownst to them however, was a short paragraph in the Terms & Conditions, that, upon agreement, would actually transport them to a fantasy world, loosely based on the game they thought they were entering. - Something anyone could be forgiven for, no-one reads them after all.
In this new world, they discover that people are born with “Traits”, a System recognised, ability, skill, or talent, that they are born with. Sod's Law was not a trait they, or anyone else for that matter, would want. 
Pure madness follows.
Yup, this is about a character transferred to a fantasy game-world with the worst luck imaginable.
This is my first fiction so I apologise for any grammar and spelling mistakes that may be made. Hopefully it is readable, and if so please tell me! But if it's not, also tell me, but in a constructive way if at all possible?
Due to the nature of the “Trait” the story will be dark in places, with plenty of gore and profanity, hence the tags. There may also be scenes of a sexual nature, but nothing full on – sorry guys but you'll have to go elsewhere for that.

Title: Ghosts Over the Forest
Synopsis:
Anya is bored and lonely.  Her friends have gone away to summer camp and she is left alone in her tiny forest village.  When she meets Gabriel, the boy whose family has moved in next door, it seems that she has made a new friend.  But all is not well in the village.  Disciple Phobia, (pictured on the cover) an exceptionally evil spirit and a villain from one of my dystopian universes, manages to break through into Anya's world and her nefarious agenda of universal destruction threatens everyone.
Can Anya and Gabriel race against time to defeat Phobia?  For time is running out and if they fail, it's the end of everything.  And Anya is not all she seems.  Gabriel may suspect more about her than she knows about herself, but he isn't telling her.  Why not?  
This story is set in a parallel universe with less advanced technology than our own, in a forest that is meant to resemble old rural Saxony. Notice the way Anya talks, she sometimes addresses people as "Dear (insert their name)" Other slang will be explained at the end of each chapter.

Synopsis:
Elier, this planet had a certain system to it, unlike the way other planets worked, where people earned money from either working for other people or creating valued papers for themselves. This world revolves around gaining a certain currency called E(Eliets), this worked as a currency for the planet Elier. This was a currency that could only be gained by slaying monsters in dungeons and trading their drop, loot whatever you want to call them for E in the dungeon centers.
 
  In this world however, there lies a system on the levels or ranks in each and every adventurer explorer. The levels are unlimited but there were only 10 ranks in each level. G,F,E,D,C,B,A,S,SS,SSS. This ranks serve as a division in the different skills attributes you can attain. One must reach a certain threshold in their total attribute points to level up. G being 0 to 100, F 100 to 200. Till 1000 where the SSS is finally obtained. 1000 isn't the skill gap however, it can keep increasing. It's limitless. But not many attain the SSS.

Title: Sacrifice
Synopsis: Michael Strong never had a very good life nor he thinks he has done anything special. But then, something comes his way.  Something that will finally change everything that was bad. Something which will give him the meaning he always wanted. But every meaning requires a sacrifice...

Title: Demon of Blood and Silver
Synopsis: After dying in a car accident, Collin Parker's soul wakes up in another world... and inside... a female's body!? What will he to do now? Join Collin now known as Athena in this new world for the adventure of a lifetime!

Title: chimera
Synopsis:
it's a book about a man with a mission.

Title: Through Time
Synopsis: When she survived an accident that should have seen her and her father dead, Annabeth was first grateful. But then, that was before she discovered that they have traveled through time, and, were now several centuries behind the twenty-first. Was it really lucky to be living in a time when women were treated as an object and for men, power was equal to the amount of land they possessed? Her fear grew more and more when a man, out of nowhere, declared her a witch. Was she saved from drowning to die a more painful death?

Title: Northern God
Synopsis:
Besieged on all sides, a small village in the northern wastelands looked to have no hope of survival.
And yet, nobody gave up, for they believed that their imaginary god would save them.
The invaders laughed coldly as the gates of the city were torn down and hundreds of soldiers rushed in, ready to loot and rape.
As the high priest saw this, he heaved a sigh as he put his own body down onto the altar, took out a knife, and stabbed his own heart with a strangely peaceful look on his face.
As despair appeared on the villager's faces, all of the priests cried out as they saw a small, weak light raise from the high priest's chest...
This was the birth of a god, the birth of a nation, and the birth of a new future.
[Heavily inspired by Black and White 2 mechanics]

Title: Morlock
Synopsis:
What happens when in modern society, magic is discovered?
What happens when the gift of magic is centered around a small percentage of the population?
What happens when a kid who despises magic and magicians discovers his talent in magic?
This is the story of a youth learning how to make peace with his gift, his past, and his future.
 
As a new author any and all help is appreciated. If you see any mistakes, please notify me about them. Constructive criticism is appreciated. If you think my story sucks, tell me why it sucks. Hope you enjoy my first fiction.

Title: Dragon Hearts: Volume 1
Synopsis: The sun has begun to die out, and now someone has to relight it. Winter Shimo, a young girl from a very small village, sets off into the wild world to go and retrieve a Dragon so that she can use their flames to keep the sunlit forever more, however she doesn't have much time to waste, or else pretty soon her whole world will be plunged in darkness.

Title: Reborn in another world with a glass of water
I Help My Friend Get Together with the Girl I Used to Like
Clockwork's Dream
Synopsis: It is the secret kept to control the balance of all. Neither the people of now nor the people of the past knew what it was. A secret kept to hold the mask of peace and war. A knowledge burned to the ground to keep the sense of humanity alive. Years past by and centuries after centuries has come, and now the secret burned and buried by those long gone, the secret that kept the remaining ones hold to the ideals and virtue of humanity has finally risen out of its grave.

Title: The Four Phases
Synopsis:
Nanites have become mainstream. For the last 30 odd years they have started to invade every facet of life. Becoming so ingrained into our lives and culture that when a child is developing inside the womb there are already nanites from the parents body overviewing the health of the child. Repairing any small defects, preventing almost all non-genetic abnormalities that can occur pre-birth. In less than 10 years nanites were transmitted knowingly and unknowingly to every single person on the planet, even those in 3rd word countries with little to no access to technology were now able to enjoy one of the most technologically advanced pieces of machinery known to man.
Allen is a retired Sergeant from the Air Force. When news of a virus spreading through the nanites makes it public he thinks very little of it. It's barely a concern, a patch will be implemented and it will be removed. At least the virus seems to be benign. Months pass, the virus is gaining more and more momentum, a status bar is shown to every infected, moving slowly at first, months for a couple % infecting more and more at an exponential rate. When Allen gets infected he's a little annoyed but theres not much he can do except wait for a patch and deal with an annoying status bar hoving in his vision.
Things change quickly though. The status bar hits 25% what took hours to get a few percent before takes seconds, before he knows it the bar fills to 100%.
Phase One Begins.
 
_____________________________________________________________________
Hey guys, so my first story was a flop and I've had trouble continuing and creating a plot. Not only that but if it's already no longer enjoyable at chapter 5 I dont want to prolong the inevitable. With that being said, here is my second attempt at a story. Where I actually went through the process of deciding exactly what I wanted to do with the story beforehand.

Title: The Power of Boredom Is Limitless
Synopsis:
Hello, my name is Ian, I have no daoist title as I have chosen to forget it long ago
I over the time of millions of years achieved peak cultivation and ascended to godhood. However, after thousands of years of eternal life at the peak of strength, I feel only one thing
Boredom
I have never felt life was so boring, all the blood, sweat, and tears I made leads to this! A boring existence! I who cultivated a dao above the primordial chaos, the concept of reality itself, can't find a way to make his own existence interesting!
Why you may ask, I believe it is due to one thing. My moral compass, This "compass" has lead me on the path of righteousness and orthodoxy, however is this ever going to fulfil the word "fun"?
So I who can travel across realities, Worlds of Magic, Modern Worlds, Futuristic Worlds. Will discard my moral compass and strive for one thing. To cure boredom, No matter the cost
Physics and science? Dao Laws? Magic Laws? Love? Common Sense? None Can stand in my way!

Title: A festering world
Synopsis:
A story about the apparition of the system on Earth, and the adventures of John on a festering world.
Contain a lot of mythological figures like the four horsemen, eldritchs and a shitload of gods.
Warning: This is my first story and English is not my native language so the story will probably be bad but I will try to improve.
I write this story for fun, there is currently no release schedule.

Title: See Me
Synopsis: The myth of Medusa, through different eyes.

Title: Game of Hell
Synopsis: After his death, Lucifer, King of Hell, leaves his four generals, the Horsemen of the Apocolypse, to deal with the aftermath. Not only trying to figer out who killed her father, Thanatos must deal with the Court that makes nightmares hide; run-away creatures of myth and legends; and outside threats from every corner and turn. But what Thanatos doesn't know, that the Seven Deadly Sins that served her father and Hell itself are rising up and gathering their strength for one last stand that could win them the throne, could kill her and the few she holds dear. A kingdom of fire and despair without a king is thrown into chaos that only Death herself can save them from. But what happens if she can't?

Title: The Theoretically Badass Phoenix Archer
Synopsis: Our protagonist found himself somewhere he didn't expect to be again, the world of the living. After what happened in his last life he learned from the experience, being the nice guy won't get you far if you're not smart. He's going to go about becoming a legend differently this time. Either that or he's going to make no friends and look like an idiot trying.

Title: Transcending Chaos
Synopsis:
I who had nothing, obtained a new fate.
I who had new a fate, shattered reality.
I who had shattered reality, severed from Heaven's Way.
I who had severed from Heaven's Way, Transcended Chaos.

Title: Doors, The Labyrinth Between Worlds
Synopsis:
Three kids, Peter Haste, the oldest, is 15. Eric Coffin, his adopted younger brother, who is in the middle at 13 years of age. The youngest by one year, Julia Winters (or more affectionately nicknamed Jewel), their childhood friend. Will be thrust into horrors and monstrosities the likes of which only frequent your worst nightmares.... Will they fall or prevail?One day, these kids, were playing in the forest outside their house, it was their last day together and they wanted to explore deeper into the forest before Jewel left for the city. As they were going deeper and deeper into the woods, Peter had an ominous feeling... "Eric slow down! We are going too far! I am starting to lose the path back!" He shouted, yet Eric wouldn't listen. He kept running, because he heard a melodically beautiful voice desperately begging for help up ahead. "Wait back there if you are scared!" Eric shouted, he wanted to help this beauty, like any horny 13 who grew up on heroic tales of mighty heroes would do. As Peter tried to keep up, Jewel started to cry and fall behind. Grabbing her hand, Peter helped her keep up, which he would regret for all eternity. Suddenly Peter saw Eric stop up ahead, staring at something. As the distance closed between them, Peter and Jewel saw what he was staring at: a strange white door in the middle of the forest. Eric, whispering his bravery boosting sentence, 'I am strong, I am brave, I will win, I will rule!'. He stepped forward and, before Peter could say anything, he opened the door. Darkness. All those poor children saw inside was darkness. The darkness was terrifying, it was like it could suck away light, happiness, and anything good and pure. To their dismay it could also swallow children who lost their way... With the forest silent once more, and the children nowhere to be found, what happened to our lost little heroes? Find out inside.... The Labyrinth Between Worlds.

Cover is not mine, all rights and stuff to the artist etc...

Title: World Core AI
Synopsis:
In the 23rd century, humanity has pushed computing so far they are capable of simulating entire worlds. 
By using a variety of quantum technologies, companies produce and operate isolated AI systems which simulate hyper-realistic realities. These artificial realities are used for various things, ranging from military training to games and everything in between.
When the technology pioneering conglomerate Nexus Networks decides to try something new, Ashley Grove and her friends are granted the chance to play god and shape a new world.
Unfortunately for Ashley, the existence of simulated realities has raised many philosophical questions, and they often feel something - or someone - guiding their actions. Are they really in control? Or is something else guiding them?

Title: The Gambling Demon King is full of Misfortune
Synopsis: Our main character Damien Kruel gets reincarnated after dying. He receives a class with an ominous-sounding name, Demon King, and a special ability Lottery... but, his luck stat is -100! Let's see what happens :)

Synopsis:

He has no knowledge of his past or his identity, no obvious skills to speak of, and no idea where the hell he is. As he struggles to make his way through the world, he will find that there are designs upon his fate far beyond his imagining.

Title: On The Battlefield
Synopsis:
In a world ravaged by the damage of past wars and the monsters it created joined by the constant greed and corruption of mankind a "solution" was needed, that solution is the phenomenon at the end of the  21st century , Mercenary wars.
The historical year of 2085 , exactly 50 years after the great war that took the lives of more than a third of the entire world , the Council of Revived Society  or C.R.S have deemed that conflict ,especially violent conflicts , shall always be in human nature. As such rather than try to forbid it they decided to limit it by creating "Mercenary Wars". To avoid repeating the mistakes of the past and sending millions to their deaths  small controlled 'wars' with predetermined numbers in a isolated environment shall serve as the new means to solve conflicts between countries as well as corporations .
Overtime this became an instant hit in the entertainment industry , as the depravity and adrenaline it offered it's watchers was unmatched.Naturally such a system is bound to be filled with flaws and it’s share of corruption and young Zayn is about to be thrown in the midst of it all.
 A word for myself : I am a fledgling writer from Romania and this is one of my first babies so i'll appreciate any comment/criticism on how to improve my writing . Do note that english is not my native language as such i'd love it if you would point out any gramatical errors or things that feel out of place. Thank you for reading this and i hope you will enjoy what i have to write.

Title: ValorVale
Synopsis:
Hi readers,
Thanks for reading ValorVale. I'm taking it off RR and refining it to be released on Amazon.com. If you're keen on finishing Cal's story, search for "Orc Glitch" later in the month.
I appreciate your support!
-KJ.

A Level 5 Orc Wanders Into The Forest...
 
Lured by limited-edition legendary loot, players have flooded into the virtual reality MMORPG ValorVale. Not that Cal cares. Wheelchair-bound by an incurable disease, he's playing just to experience walking again. Not even the glitch that has forced him to play as an Orc will stop him.
 
Armed with a hatchet, he grinds and levels up in his own little corner of Terrafaytum. Casting newly acquired Earth Craft, he helps a winged warrior moments from death escape from a tribe of bloodthirsty Werejaguars. With this, the gears of fate clunk into motion.
 
Cal becomes trapped in ValorVale, unable to exit the game. Looking for answers, he accepts a mission that will take him deep into Dresham, where an usurper sits atop the throne. Terrafaytum will be torn asunder if a hero doesn't rise. Problem is, it's chosen a level 5 Orc to be its saviour.

Title: RECALCITRANCE
Synopsis:
{COMPLETED}
Alaina wishes to be more than a mere icon for her kingdom, believing a princess should be much more than a fragile lady in a dress. The king wants no more than for her to marry in order to succeed the throne, but she has other things in mind -- such as her thirst for freedom and adventure.
But when one of the neighbouring kingdoms demands that it's time for a change in the land of Asteria, her entire kingdom is shaken. To worsen the situation, the king is somehow caving in to the demands irrationally. Stubbornly refusing to resign herself to the kingdom's seemingly inevitable fate, she is forced to leave her home in search for the root of the problems.
Along with people of diverse backgrounds she comes to trust and a hotheaded boy with pyrokinesis named Kai, Alaina joins an uprising rebellion against the forming empire. But the rebellion is only the beginning of the end, for the end result isn't as perfect as how they have proudly perceived and imagined it to be - some sacrifices are destined to be made.

Title: Bad Girl Magic

Which is easier said than done when almost all her classmates are half-baked criminals. The allure to commit crime, and finally prove she's good at something, is around every corner at Munnins. Desperate to stay on the straight and narrow, Allie turns to the one thing she's always ignored. Books. The last thing she expects to find is a plea for help, a chance at love, and questions that will rock her to her core. Is having magic really the only thing special about her?

Title: Plight of A Lost Soul [Hiatus][Co-Author Differences]

Title: John the Average Knight: Marvellously Mundane
Synopsis:
John is an average knight.
He believes in the honour of serving his Queen. He believes in the duty she bestowed upon him to protect a sacred location. He believes that he'll do anything for his task. But when a strange portal opens mere feet in front of him, John's world is turned upside-down, flipped inside-out and switched left-right. 
How will John cope with his entire view of the world being shattered, time and time again? Will he crumble under the onslaught of impossible objects, events and people, or will he adapt? Learn, even?
Join this average knight on his unwilling and unknowing quest as he is pulled into a world of magic, mayhem and mystery! Join John in the world of the Drift!

Title: The Demon of Shadows (Hiatus)
Synopsis:
Spartans.
Genetically modified supersoldiers who participated in the spartan program, which aimed to reinforce and compensate for the humans capability of emotion in order to create the ideal supersoldier. The program itself resulting in the implantation of a limiter for a certain individual, which acted in limiting that persons emotions. Replacing it with a cold logical based calculative mindscape. The limiter aimed to support the ideal supersoldier in completing the objectives assigned to them. Be it mass slaughter, or assasination.
One such man who had volunteered to participate in the program to provide data in return for a large sum of money to save a precious friend, has his life lost in battle after years of service and mindless violence.
Death, however, was something he usually gave, not to receive.
So when death comes to take his life, he awaits in silence, only to be dumbfounded at what is to happen next.
This is the story of Nicholas Gray, the Shadow Demon.
Note: Story is based on other LitRPGs found on the site such as Dante's Immortality, Necromancer and Co, etc. and on Halo for the majority of the first chapter and possibly later on down the road, I only borrowed things such as the armour and weapons used in the game itself and all credit goes to them for that kind of stuff. I will also perhaps use it to explain his backstroy to further character progression if I can.
The cover photo was also a picture I found on the internet and if you wish for credit or for me to take it down just say so and i'll do it as fast as possible.
I also don't have a set schedule, and this is just being used to improve my grammar and just as a hobby, nothing more. I will also appreciate feedback in regards to grammar, style, and story in general as this is the first time I have created a story apart from at school, hope you enjoy reading it as much as I enjoy writing it!

Title: The Fascinating Tale of Mathias Silver [DROPPED]
Synopsis:
ON AN INDEFINITE HIATUS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
Mathias Silver had always been a quiet, well-behaved young man. Living a daily routine that would take him to and from work, with his day always ending the same way, comfortably in his loft, until one morning when he had overheard something about a dead girl, killed by a man who the police had given the name 'Night Hunter'. He decided to investigate, as the good samaritan that he was, only for things to spiral out of control. 
Join Mathias Silver as he descends further and further down the rabbit hole.

----
Last, final word.
The Fascinating Tale of Mathias Silver will seem extremely boring at first, and even the first chapter is quite rough. I understand this, that's how it's supposed to be. You're taking a look at a man's life as he lives through a boring and meticulous routine. 
This is an original story, and will absolutely earn it's genre tags. If you've picked up the story on day-one, make sure you return often for the continuation. 
 
Thanks for reading.

Title: Ladder
Synopsis:
VRMMORPGs are what's in nowadays. Everyone seems to want to get a piece of the huge, immersive fantasy worlds that accompany them, as well as the unique skills and abilities that make the player truly feel like they're someone else, someone different, someone more important. 
But they require teamwork for important quests. And for someone like Emma, that isn't an option she wants to deal with. 
Instead, she's recently become addicted to the PVP battle royale game, Melee of the Ages, and the thrill that accompanies it. A ruthless player who will do anything to win, she aspires to climb the highly competitive ranked ladder of the game and one day become its top player. In order to gain MR (Melee Rating), she has to perform well in more games than she performs poorly. The quickest way up, however, is winning games and being the last man standing. 
Though it was originally diagnosed by her psychiatrist as an outlet for her violent impulses, it only makes her worse. Follow Emma as she attempts to overcome the challenges of living with a mental illness, as well as those that she will encounter on her journey to reach the top.

The game she's playing is basically The Hunger Games with magic, skills, and weapons found in tiered chests around preset maps. 
And, let's be real, there aren't enough ruthless anti-hero female leads on RRL.

Title: Total War Online: The Warchiefs
Synopsis:
Can the will of one man control the fate of millions? The barbarian tribes of Yunnan plain spent centuries entangled in their own petty feuds. Lantis Shimray, a humanities student plus gamer attempts to assimilate the various neighbouring tribal fiefdoms into his own tribe, which he then must defend from the machinations of other player states and The Holy See itself. And should he accomplish all of those feats, there is always a world conquest to wage.
 But the question still remains how can a tribe of mere rabbles using spears and cotton armour for war, could possibly overcome the military might of other tribes? let alone the technologically advanced empires of other veteran players?
Dive into a game, where you are not a hero or a dark lord but a simple observer changing the course of the world, your tribe and your people. Realise that what you are doing is not for the greater good or any of those cliché shits but for your people’s survival.
Know that you are not a conqueror but a starved wolf in the wilderness.
Sense and feel the ultimate desperation and hunger to call a land your own “home”.
This is an age of Total War.
 This is Dominations!

Title: Love Gone Wrong
Synopsis:
A young high school girl gets caught up with mafia prince, who is soon to take his fathers place. So many secrets, so many lies, so young and niave, so in love. What will happen when their love takes a wrong turn?  
PSA: this story is written like a script. Its just the way i decided to write it.

Title: I Didn't Mean to Answer the Call.
Synopsis:
A Russian policeman in a small village in the Siberian Highlands misjudges a situation at ends up in the middle of nowhere.
This is a short story I wrote simply for the sake of writing it. I was given the first line of "I didn't mean to answer the call", and I had to write something based off of that. I didn't exactly use it as a first time but it was the theme of the story.

Title: Redone
Synopsis:
Recorpse. A term used to describe someone is continously reborn over and over as a new person. They can be easily distinguished by a mark that is always present in their reincarnations.
This creatures are made from the evils of sorcery. They are a insult to a world where magic is shamed and disencouraged.
This is where Alpha finds herself in. A world that hates her.
However theres something else going on. How did this Recorpse thing start, and who is this metsis person anyways?
 
(This is my first published story, First chapter is a bit small as its only there to introduce the player and show some key aspects to the story)

Title: Dungeon Island
Synopsis:
Reincarnated into a dungeon core beneath an island after losing my memories. I don’t yet know what happened to me, why I am here and the likes. But one day I will find out and then I will settle on my next actions. For now, I just have to take care of my little crabs.
 
Warning: the 'Grimdark', 'Gore' and 'Traumatising content' are not there for show. They may not be fully relevant in the first chapters, but they are definitely there for a reason.
 
Schedule: when I feel like it (usually between Wednesday and Friday night).
 
This story is not a really serious work, I will use it to train my writing skills before going back to my other stories (Jezoi, and Vlaryne) that are currently on hold.

Title: My life as a male harpy
Synopsis:
I have been reborn! This is my chance to shine! To truly show how I CAN be amazing! Goodbye boring old life as a loser stuck in a pigs ass and hello to new fantasy life! WOOOO!!!...?
wait, something's wrong, where're my arms? These are... Wings?
 
tis just a random story, don't think much about it, just kinda making it up as I go...

Title: Magus of Soul
Synopsis:
Fate has never been kind to the Top Experts.... Their paths have always been filled with blood and betrayal. Only the strongest, sharpest and toughest have been able to survive the journey to the top and keep their little lives.
As the Plane prepares for the next Inter Planar War, a young boy embarks on his own journey towards the top.
 
(Synopsis is a work in progress and maybe changed several times to better describe the storyline)

Title: Miniature Maker
Synopsis:
One day a beautiful lady stops by his store, she asks to see his last creation and that is the miniature of earth. 
She makes a deal with the old man, she will show her world if that world is better than his, he will give his miniature world for free and if his world is better than hers she will give him,her world. He accepts thinking he would win but all of a sudden he finds himself in another place, she shows her world, it is the original world and that woman is a goddess, he surrenders to her but the goddess has another plan for him, she offers him another simple deal. 
He will be great in every way in his next life and he will be a prince and every year he has to make a miniature or she will kill him and so he opens his eyes to the new fantasy world.

Title: A World With Nothing Normal
Synopsis: Going to school, working, gaming and repeating the same thing over again. Would you want to keep living a life like that? If the answer is no, then imagine dying and being reincarnated into a different world. Legen Dalta is the protagonist of this story. 35 years of age. Never taking risks and always working. During his suicide of jumping off his apartment and smashing his head, he slipped and didn't smash his head but broke his legs and arms and maybe a few ribs. As the internal and external bleeding slowly took over his body, he saw a beam of light. It was a black with a purple glint. Then he saw clouds. He thought it was heaven. As he turned his head he noticed he wasn't in heaven and you can guess what happens next.

Title: Pandora Box
Synopsis:
the old gods , the new gods , the titans ,   all of them are here and together they control and even change the law of the myriad of universe.
they control all things but also  fear something because they knew some terryfying secrets.
and very soon these secret may reveal again and become the worst nightmare of these almighty beings.

Title: Thicker Than Water (A Superhero Story)
Synopsis:
Sometimes, I wish I was never born with my powers. I mean sure, they can be awesome at times, but they come with quite a bit of baggage, for me at least. The problems start with my parents, kind of, my mother, bless her heart, was normal, my father however was a Superhuman. For the short time he operated he went by the name Soldier Boy, had enhanced physical attributes and such. It is with their parent however that it gets interesting, my paternal Grandfather was a WW2 vet, not only that, but he was one of the first public Superheroes, my maternal Grandfather, was one of the first Supervillains.
That would not be a problem, except at that time, few if any laws or codes about Secret Identities existed. Sure, they each had one, but it was more of a formality, the public new who they were. My Dad’s dad was the Commander, had powers similar to my father, but more advanced, though not a one man army, he was as effective as one. Mom’s dad was called the Phantom, no one was sure what exactly his powers were, but during his time, he was nearly uncatchable. If it was just this, I could live with it, but nearly every member of their families had powers, an anomaly and were involved in crime, fighting it or committing them.  As for who I am, I am a man, with powers far beyond my understanding, trying to live my life separate from the squabbling Hero and Villain communities.   Hello, this will be my first story here with this account, but not my first posted story on the internet.
This will be a story that i work on in my spare time, and thus will have a lower priority in general, than the main story, i will by writing, which i will post at a later date.
This story will be a somewhat lighthearted action oriented Superhero story that will follow the MC, who has great powers, when he just wants to live a normal life, but such things are difficult.

Title: Lainzax
Synopsis: Symphony; Melak, the region torn by the war and the brink of a civil destruction, the leaders, clashing are tearing apart the very people they have sworn to protect and in the midsts are the ones who fight to dictate the win. With one man standing in the middle of it all, working for a side of mystery, will he be able to find the truth amongst the war, emotion, logic and reason from the bordering influenes around him?

Title: From the Final World
Synopsis:
I have lived a long, long time. Longer than the universe knows; longer than any star has seen or traveling light records. My memories; that is all that is left that knows that length, and that which was seen within it. Then again, that is all that ever did. When I am gone, it will be forgotten, a truth and a history lost forever no matter who or what tries to find it. I think that is why I write this now. A record, or a lament, of the most significant being of all time. It is a prideful exaltation of endless triumph, or the dread condemnation of infinite evil. I don’t know which; I shall leave it for others to judge. 
I could explain further, of course. I could list the sins that have been committed, the deeds that have been done. Yet for now, I believe this is enough. Her story will speak for itself. About the good, and evil, in the heart of a single girl burdened with more than her fair share. And how she reacted to it. 
So, I will tell her story. Of gods and devils, mortals and monsters, of legends long forgotten and civilizations long turned to dust. And in the end, I hope she knows herself, whether it is salvation, or destruction, she should receive.

Title: White - Infinite
Synopsis:
There were many beings who had thought they had reached the peak.
The “final truth.”
The “greatest strength.”
The “ultimate power.”
They believed they had reached the end of their chosen path. 
But there was one person out there who didn’t believe in limits. 
“No, no, no! That’s not the end! There’s always something else!”
So he decided to gather those who believed they’d reach the end of their paths and those who believed they hadn’t even fulfilled their full potential yet. 
He wanted to put them in a place where they could thrive and grow and learn endlessly.
He wanted to see what would happen. 
Would they falter realizing there was no end? 
Or would they continue to pursue the ever-growing heights?
Most importantly…
“How would they entertain me?”

Title: Utopia
Synopsis:
It's the 20th century, and the world's first perfect society has already been established. It is a country that is governed by a perfect system that has no fault, nor flaw; one that strives to keep the public happy, and to maintain absolute peace within the safety of its tightly closed borders.
Enter Intelia, an industrious country that has long since surpassed all other countries in terms of technology and social structure. Here, no-one has to worry about going to bed hungry; here, no-one has to worry about whether they are going to make that one job-interview in the morning. In Intelia, everyone is free to educate themselves at the expense of the state. Anyone dealing with anything can rest assured that there is a professional ready and willing to guide them through their troubles, because in this society there are no abnormalities. 
Everyone is equal. Everyone is happy. Everyone is free.
Utopia is a collection of short stories that attempt to grap the nature of the utopian society known as Intelia.

Title: Story of Elon
Synopsis:
A tragic foe, or a new friend?
After a rather rough start to his morning, Elon finds himself start on a path that he will not soon forget, even though he wants to.
Follow Elon as he starts a normal day, facing off against the true menace to all: ALARM CLOCKS!
In all seriousness, however, the story that you are about to read has 3 major flaws.
1) I am very lazy and probably will not be updating this all that much.
2) I am very new to writing, so expect a few errors here and there.
3) 1 & 2.

Title: Oneshot - Jack of all Trades: Magical, Mystical, and Miscellaneous Services (Complete)
Synopsis:
Inspired by the following writing prompt:
Your car changes slightly to accommodate your day, the day it snows, it magically has snow tires, the day it floods, it becomes a four by four. Today you walked out the door, and it's a tank.
 
(Complete)

Title: Ancient World (Cancelled, kept here only for information)
Synopsis:
For a thousand years, the Reverend Emperor Tang Jiang ruled the entire World with his Divine Legion, capable of vanquishing any foe. 
However, as all mortals do, they die eventually, and as the Reverend Emperor did so likewise, the Divine Tang Dynasty crumbled into Thirteen Empires.
Now with the Thirteen Empires each controlling one of the Thirteen Islands, there has been a fragile but holding peace. 
But, an auspicious sign from the East arrives, with Purple Qi, he comes.
A World Traveller!
 
Yes, there is a System
 
Inspired by The Nine Cauldrons and Chronicle of Primordial Wars.
Wondering about some things. 
 
Also, this is Wuxia to a high fantasy level, but not to the point of Immortals, or World Destroyers.

Title: Strongest Sorcerer
Synopsis:
Tens of years, thousands... even millions! Deaths, rebirths... none shall hinder me. To find you... to see you... to hold you in my arms! Nothing shall block my path even if I go against the "will" of the heavens again! -The Strongest Sorcerer-
This story is about a mysterious mage named Gin, in his journey through the vast realms of the Myriad worlds in search for the reincarnated soul of his beloved. From betrayals to conspiracies that involve the heavens and the hells, enslaving ancient dragons, killing gods and facing the first fallen.

Title: Weeaboo Wars
Synopsis: For lack of a better name. Reeeeeeeee.

Title: Neiero: The Journey(Dropped)
Synopsis:
What would you do, if you were sent into another world?Freak out? Good answer.But what if, you were seperated from the rest too?Also freak out? Yeah, alright. 75 Points on repeating answers.To put it simply, this is a story revolving around two main characters, each of them being a student that was sent into another world, the world of Neiero. However, due to odd events, one of them gets sent to a completely random area, away from the rest of his fellow students. Meanwhile, his friend who was summoned with the rest of the students and teachers, quickly realised that he was missing, and goes out to find him, only for something else to occur, truly kicking the story forward.
In this new world of Neiero, these two students will bump heads against many different obstacles, get dragged into unfortunate situations, and ultimately discover more of this world as they go! 
Oh? You're asking what're their names?
Hehe...You'll have to find out...
Okay, no. This story revolves around two close friends, Damian Alexander and Jake Darryl, and their different stories as they are seperated from each other, with Alex being sent to an unknown location, while Jake safely landed with the rest of his classmates. Alright, enough descriptions.
In simple terms, this story will jump between two different characters. They will get sucked into different situations, and ultimately make stupid mistakes.Well, that's enough of me.*Knock, Knock*Oh, it seems my lunch has arrived too. Well, enjoy reading!

Alright, enough stuf. Time to eat!

Title: The return of the Demon King
Synopsis:
The world of Echeus. This world was invaded by the Great Demon Lord once, the humanity can’t fight for themselves until the heroes comes out. Each of them had different characteristics that they hold. Faith… as long as one doesn’t give up he will definitely win. Hope, can turn imaginary to reality. Charity, the noble medic of the field. Fortitude... The greatest knight that the world has ever seen, can block even the most powerful spell of a dragon. Justice, the sword of the group, the bearer can travel through speed of light and attack as if he was the death itself. Temperance, the wise sage that everyone can rely on, one can made meteorite out of nothing by having this gift. Prudence, can see through lies and predict the future the strategist of the group.
The seven heroes fight the Great Demon King and after the hellish nightmare they manage to seal the Great Demon Lord and cast him away from the world.
After that the Heroes whose origin is from the parallel world decided to stay at the world of Echeus. 5 peaceful years have passed and something strange happens.
Heroes start to pop up in different empire and continent of the world. And soon the Heroes became the main forces of the country. Although those heroes cannot compare to those first 7 Heroes they still possess a tremendous power that can invade a small country. The natural balance of the world starts to distort due to Hero summoning and as the consequence the seal that stops the Great Demon King from appearing starts to crack.

Title: Step
Synopsis:
It's a quite beautiful world out there. Only problem is that I can't exactly move. Not when I'm... stuck. Somewhere. But I'll persevere. 
And thrive, someday maybe. I want to live my life. And travel. Actually, just being able to walk would satisfy me for the moment.
Blue had a normal life, until he was ended by a derailed train. Now he's stuck in a box, without any form, and a whole lot of questions. 
There's something coming...

Title: The Shieldmaiden's Song
Synopsis:
The petty kingdoms of Karlund have been united beneath the banner of a single king for the first time since the earliest days of the country. The Golden Bear of Eadric flies from Sulheim in the south to Eirsmet in the north. Many changes are brought upon the land. The old ways are crushed beneath the might of Eadric's armies. Old familys are cast down. The last whispers and shadows of a time of legends and myths are driven off.
Sigrid, the neice of one of Eadric's defeated foes, flees to far off shores. She leaves seeking the excitement and adventure from the tales of her youth. She returns on a foreign merchant's vessel, without any of her original companions, but accompanied by a young girl. Her daughter, Nal, a woman fated to shake the northern kingdom to it's core.

Title: THE MERGED
Synopsis: akadire was unsuspecting on the fateful day his soul and mind was merged with someone from earth with and average knowledge of physics hundreds of years ahead of his time. this is thier story as one.Warning: Tagged [17+] for Violence, Sexual Content and Language.

Only time will tell...

Title: One Piece: Pursuit of Justice
Synopsis:
The Pirate King, Gol D. Roger, last words sent thousands upon thousands of pirates searching for the legendary One Piece. Of course, these pirates had to do something while they were searching for the legendary treasure, most of which included crimes.
 
The World Government isn't happy with this rampaging influx of piracy, and naturally, have their own means of squashing this new "Golden Age of Piracy". What is this solution, you ask? Well, the Navy of course.
 
This story follows Akura D. Kenji and his brothers living in the remote Uxopia Village. With this golden age of piracy, both he and his brothers are exposed to these engimas called "pirates".
Kenji decides he wants to capture these villainous pirates in the name of Justice. And thus starts his path of becoming a proud soldier of the Navy - a Marine.
 
Schedule: I write whenever I'm available, but if I see a large amount of support and feedback I will make a conscious effort to release faster!

Title: The Fate of Gaeis
Synopsis: All Fanur wishes for is to get accepted into Kunnana Academy yet he's failed his family and barely struggles to not be the worst in his class. Will his fathers strange gift help him? Or will it simply lead him to a worse fate?

Title: NeoRealm - Staring back into the Future
Synopsis:
The only places I have posted the story and allow it to exist are on RoyalRoad, Scribblehub, and my Patreon.
Jason has just turned 18 and will be finally be able to play The biggest VR game out there, NeoRealm. Using a bit of knowledge from his past (life) he wants to start his adult life with a bang. Taking the road less traveled will sound quiant compare to where he wants to go.
~NeoRealm~ the most realistic VR game to date. A Fantasy world which even after years of exploration is still mostly unknown. Want to experience the mysteries of the Arcane? Become one of the many types of Magic Users and work to improve your ranking till you can move mountains, or just flatten them if you prefer. Do you just desire to wield sheer physical power? Then train your melee skills beyond all others and decimate towns with a single swing. Or maybe you just want to know what its like to be a cat person. We have those too. Come on in and join us at 5x the speed of boring old reality (you heard us right, not your average everyday 4x time compression!). *WARNING - limited to those age 18 and up, we are not responsible for any minor losing their grasp on reality, sanity, or species

Title: Kage in another world
Synopsis:
Transported to another world, Akazawa Ren suddenly woke up in a large grass field surrounded by trees. Receiving a new cheat-ability from the VRMMO game he was playing called "The Naruto World", he'll build his own village to peacefully live in the other world.
A/N: This is a fanfiction based on Naruto. Since I also love Wuxia stories, I intend to put Qi cultivators as well as magicians and other classes.

Title: (Indefinitely paused) The Stone-hearted Enchanter
Synopsis:
Capra, a man with no connections but a lot of dedication and heart hopes to change his life and leave behind a legacy in the world of Chaos and Fame— a vastly popular VR game as of the last three years. But in a world where every class and skill has been meticulously studied and optimized, and vast resources have been carved out by major guilds and corporations… where, and more importantly— HOW... will Capra be able to carve out a legacy of his own?
     Is he three years too late? Or are there still mysteries remaining in the world of Chaos and Fame to be discovered?

Title: N/A
Synopsis: N/A

Title: I’m a girl, but I like another girl?!
Synopsis:
For 16-year-old Aya, life was simple. Academically gifted as one of the top students in the nation, and heralding from the renowned and wealthy Kuramoto family, it was like she was playing life on easy mode. Oh, and it didn’t hurt that she was also a complete beauty by all standards of the word, catching the heart of almost every guy in the school.
Everything was going according to plan, until the new transfer student arrived...
~~

Title: In the End the Truth Remains
Synopsis: We all have our own philosophies that we subscribe to. We either create them ourselves, or we stumble across ones that resonate with us. Some may be evil, some may be good, some may be neutral, some may be incoherent, and some may be inconsistent. With this in mind, to what extent will we defend our beliefs? At the cost of our lives? Or at the cost of others? Beliefs are one of the most powerful and destructive things in the world. It drives us to act, pushes us to continue, and can lead to fulfillment. At first these things were only concepts that gave humanity meaning, but now they have become so much more…

Title: The Artificer
Synopsis:
Namar Brandy an apprentice smith in a humble village learns during his coming of age ceremony that he has a talent for magic, enamored with the idea of fame and riches he sets off to the Academy and the big city, having unknowningly stepped into a world steeped with backstabbing and treachery, he must do his best to protect himself and his friends from the shadows that roam the market place and most importantly, turn a profit while doing it.

Title: I Came, I Ran
Synopsis:
As they were summoned, the old king in front of them said to the "Young heroes, I have summoned you here to fulfill a great prophecy, you have to defeat a coming evil, foretold by the by our High Priest, Ursum."
The heroes, as observed by the king, looked around the room, and said out loud "Where are we?"
"You are in the great kingdom of Vo-". Unfortunatley the king stopped before he could end the sentence.
There was a dagger sticking out of his skull...

Title: Therapy Park
Synopsis: Helen wakes up in an unfamilar place, chained to a chair. Why is she here? Is this hellhole supposed to be an amusement park? Without being given any answers, she's forced into the most intense ride of her life.

Title: (Oneshot) I Shouldn't Have Pretended to be the Female Lead
Synopsis: Some dude falls into another world and decides he’d rather live as the Heroine than go out and fight to death as the Hero. He might have changed his mind if he’d read the terms and conditions, though.

Title: Harry potter and the wizard of iron
Synopsis:
This is a fanfic from harry potter so ill be following the story. It will change a bit but the maine point will stict to the scrip. Disclaimer I hold no right to any of the story of harry potter this is simply for shit and giggles.
Dallin Cross, is yes you guest it a transmigrator. For the first nine year he thought that he had simply been reborn on earth again only earlier than before. Until the day where a invisable bubble save his life from a nasty fall from a tree. Their he discover that he was a wizard only the comme to realize that he enter the world of harry potter.

Title: A Gray and Grey world
Synopsis:
What if adventurers are not as they seemed. In the tales of old, adventurers were the ones who vanquished the demons and beasts from the land, the ones who sealed the great evil away, the ones who saved the world from destruction and kept peace within the lands. But, what if that wasn't really what happened?
What if adventurers are selfish, narcissicistic, and- depending on who you ask- evil. What if they weren't the paragons of good that their history books show. As they say, it is the victors that write history.
In this world, this broken world, the true nature of adventurers will be told, unveiled to the masses. In this world, where history has yet to be written, the true heroes will be shown. Or- at least, that's what should've happened.
But then again- heroes, villains-... everything is relative to the one who sees it. Everything changes depending on who's perspective... Perhaps the heroes of this story- may not be the heroes that you might think.

 Author : Hello everyone! I just want you all to know that this is a first time story. I'm the one who's doing the draft, editing, proofreading and revisioning! I do aim to have a chapter up every week or so, thus I look forward to showing everyone the world I created!Editor : ^
Proof Reader : ^

Title: The Heroic Tales of Silas Horne
Synopsis:
In the year 1858, the system came to the world. It brought with it beings from fantasy and mythology the likes of which the world had never seen before.
In the American frontier, a place already known for being a dog eat dog world the system gave bandits the capacity for untold violence, not to mention monsters and system loving fanatics hell-bent on the murder of the innocent. But are they truly so innocent?
No one knows what the system is or why it came, they do know one thing though. That the world post system isn't a place for a hero.
Luckily for the world, U.S Marshall Silas Horne is no such man.
-----
AN: This story is a litRPG inspired by "Randidly Ghosthound" and "The New World" but after reading many such stories and finding them to be a tad samey I decided to write this in a new setting, the Wild West.
Also, my release schedule is chaotic, expect at least one 1000 word chapter each day but probably like two more will also be released.

Synopsis: In a world which is filled with greed and lust came to end with the outbreak of an epidemic. Follow the world as it drowns in the blood of those selfish mortals and see the beings commonly termed undead(zombie) rise at the top of the food chain.Involve yourself in the tyrannical ventures of the deep,dark world and the struggle of humanity to protect its own existance.

Title: A Magic Sniper in Another World
Synopsis:
Zack Blake, a boy of contradictions. Stupidly smart, selfishly selfless and responsively reckless.
How will he fare up in a world where he doesn't belong?
Caught in the crossfires of a conspiracy, follow his adventures as he tries to save the two worlds he holds most dear.

Above is a new, shorter synopsis whilebelow is the original one.

Zack Blake.  A normal high school student, was leisurely studying in his classroom.
Or that was what's supposed to happen if he was normal.
He was the son of a Major Genral and became a Special Lieutenant at the age of 17 and saved his school from terrorists, only to die due to a bullet wound.
When he awoke. Yes. Awoke. He was in a completely white space and saw a white haired girl looking at him.
"Hello, Zack. I'm an Overseer named Alia. And welcome to my realm"
Given a choice to die as is or be sent into another world, what will he do?
Watch over Zack as he tries to survive and enjoy a world of swords and magic full of action, mystery and adventure by battling demons, humans and even Gods.

Constructive Criticism is accepted. I wish to improve my writing, and this story would be the first novel i've ever written...

Updates will be posted very erratically.
If you will rate this story less than 3 stars, please do leave a review so I will know what the problem was in the story.
Cover art is not mine and I found it here. If the artist wants it taken down, I shall comply.

Hiatus until summer kicks in. It's a bit of a mess right now. Also,please check out my other fiction, Alice in Magicland. AIML will be active since it's much easier to write than this novel.

Title: Lordrian  who was.
Synopsis:
Another Monday, a myriad of colors came through the stain glass window, every wakening moment an eternity, a slow monotonous climb leading to a finite result, nothing, for him at least. If there was a God, and conclusively it seemed there was, well, he didn’t take charity and he knew there was no penance for genocide, for no right can undo a wrong, for even if you heal one-hundred thousand, the glassy eyes of a small girl lying along a river bank with a crimson stream feeding the fish, her parents hung above her, that never will leave you. He knew,.. it never had.
As opulence surrounded a poor man, he went to his desk and wrote the last thing he would write in this world, and if there was another,.. perhaps he would no longer be the man he became. A sigh escaped his lips and the quite sound of a quill scratching on paper stopped every-so often for the need to dip the tool, for that’s all it was, just like man, a tool to be used then,.. no he needed to think not as he was but whom he remembered, and wished to be like.
“The last memoir of Lothal Smith~ Let the last memory of me be used in textbooks, papers and for those who are learned to teach those who are not the one simple truth, in my wealth, my kingdoms, my harems, and my vain appearance there is and was no joy, for man has always searched for acceptance, but I would cation you to look instead for those things that cannot be taken from you, peace, serenity, joy, and memories of love. For all my life, I have found and sought lust, wealth, and power. It brings a deeper emptiness after the deed is said and done then you can possibly imagine. Though there are and will be those like me who cast off the wisdom of those who were before I pray you return to words of wisdom in your age, and hope you live long enough to do so. For many I had foolishly called friend, for one is not your friend if they are a lover of themselves, died along the same path it is that I have tread.
May I be remembered for wisdom and not wealth. ~Lordian the hand of death.

Title: Legacy of the Ancient
Synopsis:
In the world of Nazula, where magic and beasts exist, a hero left behind his legacy when he mysteriously vanishes.
Thousands years later, when abilities and talents are absolute necessities, a talentless orphaned boy named Cain is given a book by an old man who teaches him about fighting and magic.
Little does he know, the very book he is given is a useless treasure left behind by the hero.
With the help of useless treasure, Cain the talentless is ready to change his fate.

An original series by me, and Mega Chintasih as my grammar police(up to ch. 3). Cheers!

Title: Conquer Everything
Synopsis: An ex-chubby guy tries to sit at the throne of his highschool's life

Title: Bigoted
Synopsis: If you're easily offended, this is not the story for you. Fictionalized content told like an autobiography and most assuredly offensive. So if ye do doubt your courage or your valor, turn back now and come no further.

Title: I'm A Professional Gamer, So How Did I Become King?
Synopsis:
Watch as an Immortal, near All-Powerful being recounts the tales of his and his wives rise in power.
 
I don't want to make the MC OP, but he will be incredibly strong and fight really strong beings.
I make no promises when it comes to release dates, just so you know, however I don't plan on dropping this, as it contains ideas from multiple fictions I've written but never posted.
I don't own the cover picture.

Title: John Smith
Synopsis:
John Smith woke up with a pounding headach and a beautiful woman. Soon the day turns sour as the system decides to implement itself, join John as he struggles to stay alive and gain levels in the not so popular new Earth.
 
This is my first time writing and I realize there is much I could be doing better so constructive critisicm is very much appreciated.

Title: Chapter and Verse
Synopsis:
Anu dreamed of escaping the mining town, running away to the city of Verse. With no skill for the sword, and absolutely no talent in magic, she set about learning to forge magical circuits. The one thing she could do that would get her into the Academy.
She was crushed to learn that it wasn’t enough. Without money, or connections, she would need to find a loop-hole in the entrance examinations, or worse, spend another four years trapped in the mountains.
After scouring the regulations, she’d found a way to leave: she would have to contract a beast. Anu hadn’t much mana to offer, but with no other options she stormed into the forest nearby, hoping to contract a beast.

Title: The man who stared at the Abyss
Synopsis:
In an age of blood and fire, a kind and generous hero was summoned. His name was Hiromi.
Through his multiple mind-boggling actions, he brought about an era of peace in a mere 3 years.
Making the Demon King his best friend, having the Elf Matriarch and Fairy Queen as his harem members, he united all the races under one banner.
After he had achieved everything he could, the Goddess decided to grant him three wishes for his services to her world. 
His first wish was to make the world a better place.
The second wish was to make him immortal, and under his own words, "So I can forever enjoy the company of Maria-san, Yue-san and all of my friends!"
Since he had no real other wishes, he decided to casually ask, "Mmm... I also want to know the truth about everything! Grandpa has been searching for it since, like, forever, so maybe I can help him!"
Despite the goddesses' warnings, he persisted. Hence, the goddess gave Hiromi a small mirror and said to look into it when he was ready.
After getting back home, he looked into the mirror. In it, he found nothing, just a black background. It was just like an Abyss...
And after looking into it for a while, the Abyss stared back.

Title: Losian
Synopsis:
It's been a while hasn't it? Since I disappeared.
Sorry this couldn't be under better circumstances, but let's just agree that it's better late than never.
I've been finding my way back since then, traveling across worlds of magic, science, even eldritch locations. I've seen things you wouldn't believe, and some I'd prefer you didn't. I'll tell you everything, even what I became in the dark.
A long, long time ago, hahah... Never mind. Let's just start.

My intention is to explore every. single. world I can think of from scifi to high fantasy, hopefully forming an overarching storyline along the way. I hope to be able to explore most of the settings, most of the tropes, and play with them in multiple different ways.
However, this also means that many of the tags will only apply for specific sections of the story... As the first arc is now completed, chapter titles will be slowly edited to include the world involved, and then any relevant tags.
Also exists on wordpress here, will update both sides simultaneously. Constructive criticism welcome and much appreciated.
20/3/2018. Previous cover courtesy of Archmage Naoki, also Bobb on the Discord RRL server.26/3/2018. Current cover courtesy of ssddx. Thanks for the cover.

Title: The Revolutionary Dice
Synopsis:
There is a gray place filled with white mannequins, and there is only one exit, The Gate of Life. But to get through that gate first, you need to roll The Dice of Life, the higher your number is the better is the thing you are rolling for. 
One female mannequin finds a trick, a trick to cheat life, all she has to do is the roll the "Luck" dice six and the rest will be easy. And so she passes onto her next life with an almost full score. 
The one behind the female mannequin is a male mannequin, he wants to be like her roll everything six and have a great life but when the dice stops, the female mannequin accidently steps on the dice, leaving him with the score of zero and so the rest of his rolls are ones and he passes onto his pitiful life.

Title: TRAF  Isekai Fanfiction
Synopsis:
Automatic translation English: Spoiler


 On a rainy morning on the estate of the mayor of the city of South Apollo, it is full of police and investigators isolating the mansion.
The disappearance of Wagner Clarimond and all members of the party, some policemen work with the theory of some file burning, because the policy in Brazil and a nest of poisonous snakes.Some reporters treat the mystery with sensationalism to draw the population's focus from the crisis's problems to alienate the population.
And some youtubers treat as an alien or supernatural conspiracy to gain some likes in your videos, but no one on earth could confirm that they are close to the truth 
 
 
Author's Fanfiction note





What would you do if your life suddenly changes in front of you and your eyes as you participate in a fancy party in the city of South Apollo. Being played in a fantasy world, and in the other world you receive the powers of the character who was fancy to party.I would certainly go mad.Keep track of what most of the party guests will do with the change in your life, and what changes will make the fantasy world dragon cave style without the master of the wizards, to give a compass where to follow
 
Based on the game Trajes Fatais   da Onanim  @TrajesFatais








                                                                                      [pt-BR]
 Em uma manha chuvosa na propriedade do prefeito da cidade de Apolínea do Sul, esta cheia de policiais e investigadores isolando a mansão.
O desaparecimento de Wagner Clarimond e todos os membros da festa, alguns policiais trabalham com a teoria de alguma queima de arquivo, pois a politica no Brasil e um ninho de cobras venenosas.
Alguns repórteres tratam o mistério com sensacionalismo para tirar o foco da população dos problemas da crise para alienar a população.
E alguns youtubers tratam como uma conspiração alienígena ou sobrenatural para ganhar alguns likes em  seus  videos, mas ninguém na terra poderia confirmar que estão próximos da verdade...
 

Author's Fanfiction note: Spoiler


 O que você faria se de uma hora para outra sua vida muda diante e seus olhos, ao participar de uma festa a fantasiam na cidade de Apolínea do Sul. Sendo jogado em um mundo de fantasia, e no outro mundo recebe os poderes da personagem que se fantasiou para festa.
Eu certamente enlouqueceria.
Acompanhe o que a maioria dos convidados para a festa fará com a mudança em sua vida, e que mudanças farão ao mundo de fantasia estilo caverna do dragão sem o mestre dos magos, para dar uma bússola para onde seguir
 
Baseado no jogo Trajes Fatais   da Onanim  @TrajesFatais

Title: Cards of the Mobius
Synopsis:
Cards of the Mobius, an online card game. It's different from usual card games because of the way it's executed. The main objective of the card game is not the cards itself, it's the setting. Servers are opened up for a month at a time, and inside the server, every player is given a set of 15 temporary cards, alongside a totem which they can carry from server to server.
The maximum deck size is 40 cards, and you'll want to use all 40, trust me. Each server has a unique map, although I'll probably just be using one throughout the story and hope nobody finds out. Spread throughout the map are pillars, which generate energy over time, and the energy goes to the player in ownership of the pillar, with a small 'tax' being spread across the other members of the team, so you'll profit if your teammates play good. 
There's a main totem in every c-
Am I just info dumping the game rules?
Nobody's gonna read that!
Read this story. I'll info dump the rest of the rules in the prologue.
There's a guy. He plays cards of mobius. He's good at the game. Something about goblins. And poverty. Mostly goblins.

Title: Yojana Online: Lawful Neutral
Synopsis:
Rajan is a 17-year-old high school senior, he is rich, privileged and social. However, underneath the quick smiles and the fast friends lies a scarred heart from losing the only woman he ever loved.
Join Rajan as he delves into the world of Yojana Online in an effort to grieve for her, but what he finds when he plays the game is disturbing. Ugly truths are revealed about the world, in-game and out.
Sometimes, you should leave Schroedinger's Cat the Fuck alone.
*****
This was my Nanowrimo 2017 project that I stalled at 30k words. I want to finish it hence why I am posting it here. I'll update once a week on Friday.
The writing is choppy at times but I want to soldier on and finish this story that I have in my mind before I go back and do the edits.
Constructive Comments and Reviews are always welcome.

Synopsis: The world changed overnight in California's Bay Area. Monsters have begun to spawn everywhere and every person has gained some sort of unique ability. In the midst of all the chaos, the situation for the rest survivors have quickly escalated when the state wide black out revealed that electrical technology and devices have completely ceased to function.

Title: Vampire's Maid
Synopsis:
Miyuuki Misamoto, 17 years old woman who works as a maid in Egothirus Mansion, hence should not serve the family's personal accounts. The family hold dear to their traditions but hardly protested by Marguerite, Lawrence and the twins because of its unlawful rules.
Soon, digging into the Elmada's top secret, she realized mysterious things happened in the mansion. Magic and fantasy were unveiled in the shadow, darkness blew through which invited Marguerite, Hideki and Lawrence to an enigmatic events. Miyuuki the noisy maid also realized that her life and death was tide to this event for digging the family's histories.
In order to survive in the vile world, what should Miyuuki do and will she be able to find out more about the secrets?

Title: Violet's story
Synopsis: Based on my last story (When there's quiet) This book is based on Violet's life story. ENJOY :)

Title: The Chaos Theory
Synopsis: The world was perfect, even if it was all artifical. The children's laughter, the sun glistening on the water. It was everything he was used to seeing, and it everything anyone could desire at their finger tips. But then a hole opened in the sky and out tumbled a strange being. Angels, Ancient humans called them. But the boy he met was not an angel, and soon he would find his society to be collapsing at his own hands as he desperatley tried to dig up the truth. What had happened last summer?

Title: Riftworlds Online Book 1: Space Opera
Synopsis:
Riftworlds Online is an action-packed ride that combines Escape from New York and Tron in an epic adventure spanning worlds of Space Opera, Fantasy, the Old West, Post-Apocalypse, Cyberpunk, Steampunk, and Super Heroes.

In 2028 Riftworlds Online is the most popular virtual reality MMORPG game ever. A week after its release, millions are playing in a game that spans seven unique universes. But now people can’t log out. And when they die in the game, they die in real life.
In prison for manipulating real-world currency through VR-MMORPGs, gamer Rick Danburg just wants to serve out his sentence in peace. But the President’s daughter is trapped in the game. Secret Service agents drag Rick before the President who offers him a deal: a full pardon for finding her and keeping her alive until people on the outside get Riftworlds back under control.
That will be much harder than he is prepared for.

Title: Am i spoiled?

I am Kaito Jin. I along with my sister were dragged off into another world by two unfamiliar beings. This wasn't intentional. No, it was actually suppose to be only me to be forced into another world but this didnt spare my sister from the summoning. Encountering an unusual situation I decided to do what I could for both of us. These beings we were called by granted us power to survive in an entirely new world with but a simple request to my self.... Or so it was said.
But is it really so simple?

Title: Endurance
Synopsis:
The rules are simple :
1) Killing is not authorized in here
2) There will be different stages, each with random levels. There will be 3 types of stages; simple, intermediate, and tough. There will be also special stages that will grant any wish
3) Brains and brawns are needed to continue each stage, consider this when gathering your team
4) One team consist of 10 peoples, no more than that
5) If you are acknowledged to break one of these regulation, punishment won't be avoidable, please remember this
If you want to turn back, turn back now, and if you do, there's no more chance for you to survive this place.

Title: Transcendent Fiendgod
Synopsis:
In 2370, Earth has long adopted the use of futuristic technology and virtual reality was a commonplace. The century's greatest VR MMO Auora Online had finally ended, ready to be forgotten in the ravines of time as civilization continued growing at an accelerating rate.
However, there was one player whose name struck fear in all those who heard it. The great demon king Azaroth was renowned for being the strongest existence in the game. An emotionless, ruthless war god who cut down massive guilds and challengers like flies. A mysterious persona whom never revealed itself to the world and whose fame was greater than even the most popular celebrities.
One day, unbeknownst to anyone, that player had vanished from the face of the planet. Meanwhile, at the far edges of the greater world Uvenia, the arrival of a single man took place.

Title: Alex Qin's badass adventures
Synopsis:
There was once a badass. His name was Alex Qin.
Armed with superhuman abilities and an IQ of over 10,000 he was a true badass.
He was so badass that even the coldest of beauties with icy personalities fell for him at first sight.
He was so badass that even the most arrogant of young masters kowtowed for him at first sight.
This is a story ofAlex Qin's badass adventure's as he crosses dimensions, picks up chicks, fights monsters and rekts absolute ass.

Title: Arch Magus, The Wich Hunter
Synopsis: Sebastian Thorn, a mage forced to hunt down his own kind, the power of a mage must not be unregulated for the sack and saftey of society. Title: Warlords Era
Synopsis:
I remember like it was yesterday, on the 1 of january of year 2047, the Moon became blood red and human started awakening an Ability System.
Then one week later the Moon became ice blue, and hell descended upon Earth.

Title: The Strongest Warlord
Synopsis:
Dan Core, a multi-billionaire loner whose empire crashed as he donated all of his money when he knew he was about to die but did he really died?
NO! he reincarnated in a world filled with wars, countless kingdoms fall, and rise! countless geniuses died and rose to fame, countless of things were lost in time and waiting to be discovered.
Let us witness the adventure of Dan Core, The Strongest Warlord!

Title: Astral Arcana: Ethereal
Synopsis:
|"In this world, there are two sides. But it's up to you to decide on which side you're on."|
In a world between old and new, there are six main Kingdoms. Sora, Gaia, Underworld, Corinxida, Aqua, and the Celestial Kingdom.Those six kingdoms held something extremely dear that cannot be replaced. Other than the fact that 75% demons and other spiritual beings follow humans orders.
But one of those major kingdoms is called Corinxida. An island away from the other kingdoms.
And without warning, just fate, there was a girl named Aiyana Mariotthe.
A 'pure-minded' but strong-willed pre-teen who owned a healing demon familiar named Celeste. On the day of the Queen's ceremony, she'd encountered what the world was really like. On good and terrible terms.

Title: Blood Gods
Synopsis: Robert was a student being bullied because of his talent for the computer game Blood Gods before he gets forcefully taken to the greatest adventure of his lifetime! Now trapped in Blood Gods world will Robert find the fortune he wished for? Or will he be a stepping stone for others to reach their dreams!?

Title: Death Mark
Synopsis: Synopsis:The tragic death of his parents left Dante alone in this world were Cultivators capable of sundering the heavens and Gods capable of sealing an entire realm weren't just the stuff of legends...With the loss of his aunt, Dante’s childhood was short lived as he had to deal with the world’s harsh reality and fend for himself.His only hope was to cultivate and become a Dungeon Soldier, proving himself on the battlefield, his weakness had made him realize that revenge was still too far away for him.However, fate was cruel to him as his cultivation was to never advance to the next realm due to his body's constitution. Dante’s condition didn't stop him though, he still persisted hoping to achieve a breakthrough under the pressure of life and death battles.After more than a decade since his parents’ death, Dante is still nowhere close to his goal. Will he give up on his vengeance and live a quiet mundane life or will he take his fate into his own hands?Watch him as he embarks on a journey filled with legends, magic and ancient secrets!!

Title: Dragon Slayer in the Abyss
Synopsis: Meet Grey Frost, a very animalistic man. Our mc and a person who can use dragon slayer magic, or at least has the potential to. And after a lightning bolt to his face he awakens it and discovers the Abyss.

Title: There is no Time
Synopsis:
Another first-line generated story.
An accident occurs at a laboratory, sending Artemis running in evacuation for his life.

Title: EARTH SAGE DOESN'T WANT TO BE BOTHERED
Synopsis: Ash Sage dies in a tragic accident and is reborn in a new world and given a second chance. Seems pretty fimilair right? Well, instead of trying to better this new world or going on a quest to slay a demon king all Sage wants is to save up enough money to buy a house and live far away from everyone. He'll have to make use of his only skill, Earth Magic, to try and get money so he can live a life where he won't be bothered by anyone. Much to his dismay, to make money he'll have to deal with his least favorite thing, people. It's a fantasy comedy with a lazy hero who justs wants to be left alone.

He was suppose to work there as an office worker for 20 years, but he was fired for no reason at all by his new unknown CEO, but he has a contract with his ex-CEO that he was suppose to work there with a 'no fired' contract.
