Title: Anime World?
Synopsis:
In this era, anime has spread to the entire world; people are indulging themselves in anime so much that they’re calling themselves as ‘Otaku’. They’re going to conference and events that’s related to anime.
 Some people quit their social life and choose to indulge themselves in figurines, manga, light novel and animes. Some of them are teens that are been bullied or has the same circumstance, some of them just choose to be a ‘Hikikomori’ (People who withdraw their social life) just because they wanted to.
But one day, one after another, people who called themselves ‘Otaku’ starts to disappeared. Their relatives are confused since they never see the person leave the house so it’s still a mystery on why they suddenly went missing.
That strange phenomena continued until it finally takes it final victim, Carlo Delacruz suddenly disappeared. When the people around him got interviewed by the reporters, they said something like “That guy is a thirty years old virgin who has no family left beside him” or “I always so that guy loitering around the park meeting with his nerd friends, maybe they’re the one that took him”
But none of them surely knows what happened to Carlo and the other person that went missing, but there’s a fact that only a little of people knows, and in fact all of them are the ones whom went missing. All of them, all of the ‘Otakus’ that went missing knows this. The fact that all of them are transported into a another world.
But not just any other world, they have been teleported to an Anime World.

Title: The Immortals' Poison
Synopsis:
Immortals, gods, devils. All of them have escaped the grasp of time and transcended the limits of mortality. Existences that can see a bug on a leaf thousands of miles away, beings who can create and destroy on a whim, entities of such awe-striking power that you can only tremble and await your demise.
Reality is at their will.
However, there is one thing that makes them cower in fear, a creation of utter darkness and endless malice:
The Immortals' Poison.
Said to be the soul of The First Dragon mixed with the remains of the dead Arch Pheonix, two items which shouldn't even be possible to gather. It is a sentient poison capable of killing anything it infects, giving the afflicted being, whether mortal or immortal, exactly 50 days to live. 
One day, the High God of Light, king of the gods, was afflicted with the poison. It caused the entire god realm to be panic-stricken. Searching for any cure to this legendary poison, they found one against all odds. For locked away deep in the forbidden archives, there was a sinister method of removing the infernal poison. The way they found was quite terrible. It was to find someone with a magnificent destiny and transplant the poison to this someone with a magnificent destiny, thereby going against fate, which is something the poison loves.
However, he chose the wrong person to use, and now... The reckoning is coming.
 
 
 
 
 
cover art isn't mine, all rights go to the artist etc.

Title: Thoughts of the worthless
Synopsis: Because it would be funny if the guy who wrote the fidget spinner story actually wrote some poems.

Title: The Mystic War
Synopsis:
This is my first story. It is pretty bad and probably difficult to understand but just give it a chance the story is sort of interesting in my friends' opinion.
The story is about a new assassin named Yuki who follows in the footsteps of his hero assassins. It begins with the story of Yuki's hero assassins' actions that lead to the events caused later in the story. This is as much as I want to say without spoiling the story. Hope you enjoy! (grammar may be off but it's not my strongest suit.)

Title: Masks: Greed
Synopsis:
Is this your first time visiting Yikensworth?      Yes.
Are you passing by through Yikensworth?        Yes.
Will you stay for more than a week?                Yes.
Hello dear traveller. Welcome to Yikensworth. A paradise made by our exalted lord, the Blue Flame of Ansdrovea, the Duke of Yikensworth; William von Solus. He shares his lands, food, and riches with the poor and unfortunate. He protects the weak and ensures that his citizens are well taken care of.
True to his words; "every persons shall be taken care of as he takes care of his neighbor" the Duke hereby commands you to assert yourself in a profession of your choosing so that, during your stay here, you may give back while you enjoy the priveleges he provides you.
Are you: Tailor?
             Smith?
             Butcher?
               .....
             Mercenary?   Yes
Do you bear any arms? Please provide your license for carrying them?      Yes, they are...
Please ensure that you have the proper identification as required by the Mercenary guild. During your stay you must complete at least 1 quest issued at the posting board. While at your stay you are prohibited from entering: the cemetary, the walls ..... & women's bath-houses.
Do you agree with the terms?          Yes.
Have a nice stay dear traveler.

Title: Dungeon Quest Online
Synopsis:
Tristen Alexander is a GameMaster and Techno-Genius that sets his sights on creating technology to bring players into a fully immersive game world. A game modeled after Dungeon Quest, an epic fantasy board-game he and his friends played religiously through childhood.
Can he create the technology to achieve this feat?
Will his pursuit of a self-aware Artificial Intelligence culminate in the evolution of a sentient digital life form to create his game world?
Ultimately, can he really bring his favorite pastime to life and truly experience the life of his character?
Follow along with Tristen as he sets out on a journey capable of changing the world!

Title: RE:BORN
Synopsis:
[Interactive] The Cosmic Cycle has begun. Earn or lose karma. Unlock traits and develop talents.
Find your soulmate. Journey to other realms of existence. Your destiny is yours to command.
Welcome, homunculi.

Title: Antimatter Xmas
Synopsis:
>>Taken off line at this time. Will be made availiable through my Blog at: https://ascensionnovel.wixsite.com/scribblings <<
 
A man, kidnapped and forced to work in a secret underground bunker for a rouge government agent effects his escape, and gives himself his own freedom for Christmas.
 
>>Taken off line at this time. Will be made availiable through my Blog at: https://ascensionnovel.wixsite.com/scribblings <<

Title: The Forgotten Monarch - DROPPED
Synopsis:
Ludwick Rongraden, the prince of the Sicilion Empire, the continent's strongest nation was betrayed and an attempt on his life was made.
Follow his story as he was forced to flee from his home country and survive alone, building his strenght, counting the days until he would finally have his sweet revenge for the wrongs done to him and his family.
Shall his goals remain the same or will they change as he grows in power and character? There is only one way to find out.
This is a story about the survival and adventures of our main character around the world of Nede. It will follow closely the main character's growth in both strength and personality. How his goals and views on the world change with both age and power. The story will mostly be in a third person narrative with occassional first person insides of the characters' minds.
 
 
(The story doesn't have a cemented plotline to follow, therefore I am open for suggestions by the readers, provided they work out well with my ideas! Plus after the prologues I will aim for 5-7 chapters a week ranging from 1000 to 2000 words each.)
*Do not be afraid to give me constructive critizism and please do point out any mistakes in the comments so I can fix them and improve the reading quiality.*
 
Note: I do not own the cover painting. If the owner wants it removed then do please do send me a pm.

Title: The Ark of Worlds
Synopsis:
Hey everyone, long time lurker. I've been wanting to write a story of my own for quite awhile, and have had much more spare time than usual for such purposes.
First off, I wanna talk a bit about the story itself. The Prologue is merely intended to set the tone, and tell you a bit about the setting. Im going to address a few of the tags beforehand, so people arent entirely unaware. The vast majority of what I have written so far is merely to test the waters, and gauge reactions. I have included a gender bender tag because it's going to involve the main character, but the story itself wont revolve around it.
A bit of warning to readers; First off, plans for later parts of the story are hazy at best. Finally, I have no plans on abandoning this story, as I dont think its really fair to the readers to up and abandon a story. Ill be sure to tell you guys whats up if that occurs (Which I hope does not, barring RL circumstances).
 
EDIT 2019-Feb: So RL did end up happening. Jinxed myself I guess. This story is on indefinite hiatus until I can work up the drive to continue this.

Title: Twilight of Dystopias
Synopsis: After he finished writing the third and last draft of his sci-fi book, Jun Zi barely managed to make himself comfy on his bed before thick smoke began rising from his computer.Swearing upon all gods he is aware of existing, Jun Zi hurries to check the disaster before remembering that he had saved the chapters in pendrive just before exhaustion overwhelmed him.Hurrying to save the fruits of his sweat and tears, he rushes through the smoke and tries to reach for the usb using a towel.The last thing he sees is his computer exploding after the crisp sound of the usb snapping in half.Never did he expect that the explosion would send him to the same dystopian future he had imagined.

Title: Earnmight: Awakening
Synopsis:
What if a simple app could change your life? 
Would you play it? Even if it meant facing your fears and possibly your death?
Follow Leaf as he gets roped into this crazy, absurd world of Ea*$#&ght.
Do you have the strength to battle in a nightmare!

Title: AlterEarth:Revanant
Synopsis:
Centuries have passed since the Convergence, when the world of Alteron, and the world of Earth were merged together in a cataclysmic explosion of science and magic.  In the aftermath of this event, the dimensions are shaken, rifts between worlds are opened, and dark entities with mysterious motives move on the face of AlterEarth.  
Fade, a defender of a lost city, sets out to find a being that could bring a plague of evil throughout the lands, plunging the world into a desolate wasteland.
Dante, the lost prince of an ancient line, returns from another world to find the creature who corrupted his sister and threatens to tear open the Sunward that stands between Riven, and the world of Darkmoor.
Bhal’Rune, a Shaoryn master searching for the Apex art, the ultimate expression of chi and style, is sent by his order to advise a king.  Unwittingly, he stumbles across a plot to gather all of the Spheres of Creation together to birth a new Ascended.
As these stories unfold enemies will emerge, and unexpected allies will join the fight.
 Welcome to AlterEarth.

Title: Paradoxes have unlimited power...(dropped because whatever... or is it!?)
Synopsis:
If you were to die and was given one wish, and answered.
"Absolute."
If that was granted, then you would technically have the potential to be more powerful than god... well only if we accept that side of the arguement where this concept of god can do everything and anything, that would mean you could do more everything and anything it, but that would mean there was something more powerful than god, and that's where paradoxes come in, you get what I'm saying?
(This story is based on what I would do with the power of paradoxes but not as an all powerful being, but as a person. I will warn you though that this novel will be bad since I'm not being serious about writing this, so I'm not going to be spending a week or a couple of weeks trying to find inspiration, it'll just be on a whim.

Title: StarPath Online
Synopsis:
StarPath Online is a Virtual Reality Massively Multiplayer Online game created by Ventrical Studios. It's been live for over a month and has had record-breaking sales thanks to its mixture of Science Fiction and Fantasy elements. The players can wield magic, use massive weapons that border on artillery, wear power armor, pilot giant robots, and even buy their own ships and fly through uncharted space just to explore the unknown. It has something for everyone and with a focus on game-play, creativity, and exploration over leveling it offers a new and unique experience not offered in many games. However, the main thing keeping Darren from purchasing the game has been a distinct lack of information on the crafting system in the game. Still, with some convincing from Jeff, Darren has decided to purchase the game and give it a try, he has little else to do in his free time. Join Darren as he ventures into a completely different galaxy.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Release Schedule - Fridays at 8 PM EST.

Title: The Blood Born Magus
Synopsis:
Had a story idea, and took a break from editing my current story to quickly jot it down.  If people like it, ill put out chapters occasionally (maybe 1-2 a week? idk, we will see)
Im not good at the synopsis stuff, so Ill cut out the fluff and BS by just giving an overview of current plan.  (probably fix this up later as well)
Magic/fantasy world with Magus' at the apex of power. 
Magus are created through the enlightenment of... something(?) and it allows them to channel mana through that enlightenment.  (ex: find enlightenment in fire = become fire mage)  Finding enlightenment is exceedingly rare, and almost never happens, but when someone is enlightened they can pass the power down to their decendants, with a generational deterioration.
This really only affects... skill/training/power-gaining proficiency?  I'll likely be putting in a power/progression system, but as of writing the prologue, i havent flushed it out (lol) I'll be putting some thought into it before i do anything though.
Use title to draw other conclusions

Title: The Greensdale Project
Synopsis:
Bone-breaking training, blood-curdling workouts, and no time for the ladies. This was the hell Chase endured for the last few years after his little brother Andre died tragically. Training, that was his life to compensate for his averageness. But when reality hits him like a truck he finally understands that no matter what he will not be powerful enough to equate to the Heroes that guard us.
Taking the first step in applying to the Greensdale Project in Arizona to become a Super, but as he learns that superpowers don't make the Super he has to use his wit, strength, and will to push through outside forces and inside ones to enter and graduate from the Greensdale Academy for Supers in Arizona.
If he survives that is.

Title: Tired Emperor
Synopsis: A shadow was currently sitting in a thin electric wire amidst the destroyed Z city, wearing ripped jeans and a topless torso that was filled with horrendous scars, despite the appearance, the guy was still 17 years old but has deep mysterious eyes accumulated by millions of battles that happened everyday. The person sighed as he gazed through the burning, destroyed city and countless of corpses scattered everywhere.   After a long time of serenity, he muttered.  "So tiring. Resting for a while may be good."

Title: Am i a goddess? A devil? No i am a lizard
Synopsis:
Summary:
 
A rotten country has summoned heroes without anyone’s permission like usual. 
Typical.
The three heroes are like any normal heroes - They accept their task to save the world.
However, when the fourth hero appeared...
"AAH! NOO ONIICHAN! THAT PLACE IS..."
She got caught in the middle of playing eroge.
This is a story of a girl who does whatever she wants, whenever she wants, to live the way she wants.
Not as a villain or a hero, but as a pervert.

Title: Silver heart of oblivion
Synopsis:
Belladonna amaryllis, last member of the belladonna family and also the current ruler of sofia city.
After being brutally murdered by the people of her own kingdom, she founds herself in a place between hell and her own world, it was a place to imprison those who lived without any aim or the will to achieve something, and many more thing of the kind.
There she meets Alex, who'll help her get out of there as she wishes for another chance.

Title: God Particles
Synopsis: The year is 2218. After the "Idiopathic Apocalypse" that happened in 2118, more than half of the human population was erased. A few years after the IA, unknown creatures started attacking humanity's remaining cities. Humanity almost ceased to exist, but a new light shined in the kingdom of darkness. Humanity discovered "Ability Users", people who had supernatural powers, much like the unknown creatures known as "Mutants". Humanity used its remaining technology to study both Ability Users and Mutants. Soon, they created a gigantic barrier that keeps humanity isolated from the dangers of the wilderness. To this day, humanity is trying to reconquer the world that they lost, but a new rival appears! Another race of sapient creatures, much stronger and more intelligent than any human. What will humanity do?

Title: Spirit Empire
Synopsis:
Lin lives in a world scarred by war. Being raised in a thief's guild, he plans to claw his way from the bottom of the world to the top.
Will write a proper Synopsis when this thing is longer than 1 chapter.

Title: The Meteor That Gave Powers
Synopsis:
A meteor falls from the sky, it makes a beautiful pond and the water from that pond gives powers, a king on the run is thirsty and he decides to drink from that pond but not only this removes his thirst, it gives him powers, every female in the world is in love with him, he can fly, he can cast magic and so he conquers the world in a month, he creates a harem for himself but his lovers kill him and his children do the same. 
A simple cowardly farmer wins a mansion and a chance to get a county for himself but things are not that easy...

Title: Karma Online: Awakening
Synopsis:
Not sure who he is our hero awakens into a strange new reality. He is given a task to level get stronger and find out who he is. Our hero wakes and soon finds he has no memories of his life. He must adventure and remember, but the whole picture will not be reveled to him until he is much stronger. Follow my hero as he learns how to operate and use his powers, the only thing is he has no class how will our hero progress?
 edits in process...

Title: Tale of the Stone-Born
Synopsis:
(ABANDONED)
 
 
Terra was your typical alternate earth, with wars, monsters, and even God's. However, the balance of powers are suddenly shifted when stonesof unknown origin fall from the sky in the hundreds. 
Those who touch such stones are granted immense boosts to their powers, or even new powers all together. The stones that are never touched and absorbed turn to dungeons, enhancing and multiplying the power of monsters..
However, what happens when someone is accidentally BORN from these mysterious stones? Join them as they grow, learn, and make new connections in this "Strong eats weak" world. Will they survive?
I am starting this story cuz it's been stuck in my head for a long time, and I finally have time to do stories again.

Title: Geo's travels through an unfamiliar continent
Synopsis:
After getting saved from the sea, the earth magician Geoffrey attempts to make his way back home.
Join him on his attempt to get home as along the way he explores this new world with diffrent cultures and identities.

Title: Path of Philosophy
Synopsis:
Dropped.
I hate myself. I hate this mine. I hate whatever brought me here. What is a darkin even supposed to be? Someone to save this world? I hope so, if I could just murder both. But why is philosophy even an option? Any other ability probably isn't as useless as this one!
For example this skill! A passive skill called "freedom"! But even though I'm free, I'm just being shuffled from prison to prison! Where is my freedom in that! Or another skill, "Interpreting"! But all it does is add meaningless words to every single situation! How is that making me stronger?

Title: Grand Soul
Synopsis:
A dark green leaf fell.
A loud howl was heard.
The rumbling of ground was felt.
And the beating of a small child’s heart trembled.

Title: I Came Back In Order To See You
Synopsis:
1980, a new land appeared in the Pacific Ocean, alongside specials abilities. Humans capable of creating fire with only a simple thought, or others with senses greatly enhanced.
40 years later, a student from this new land disappeared from the surface of earth. After working in another worlds for 50 years and gained colossal powers, she finally came back in order to see the one that she longed for the most. However, only 10 days passed in her world. 
 
*Will NOT contain : rape, attempt of rape, NTR      WILL contain : Yuri (Girls Love)*
**English is not my native language, so I might make mistakes. I will try my best on this point**

Title: fantasial rise [HIATUS]
Synopsis:
grode was a highschooler known for never being seen or noticed, a shadow hiding within the minds of he classmates and those "knowing" him, however, one day, the gods gave up on this world, and let the void's influence slip in it, grode, then started to realise that, things may become more interesting than he thought.
this is my first time writing and english is not my first language so do feel free to point out my mistakes

Title: Blood
Synopsis: In a world where science and cultivation coexist ,no matter how advanced the civilisation ,the rule of the jungle still applies. The strong preys on the weak how ironic that till my final moments did i understand how helpless had i been. If there is an almighty then answer my prayers and grant me a second chance for i have much left undone....

Title: Infernal Reboot: Rise of the Hellwalker
Synopsis:
The end didn’t come with fire or flood. It came with a System. Stats. Skills. Levels. Quests. Loot. Earth transformed into something monstrous—an infinite dungeon with no escape. Humanity fought for scraps, leveled or died, and watched cities fall to beasts from myth and nightmare.
Cain Mathers fought for fifty years—through dungeons, monster hordes, and worse. He outlived his friends, his enemies, and even his hope. He killed gods and became a terror whispered about in the night. And when he finally slew the Demon Lord—everything ended.
Now, Cain wakes up at the very beginning. Day Zero. The System Notification flickers before his eyes once again:
“Welcome, Survivor.”“Mode: Infernal. Difficulty: Hellbound.”
But this isn’t the same apocalypse. Stronger monsters. Corrupted zones that shouldn’t exist. Factions forming too early. The System itself seems... aware. Worse, something from the endgame is already hunting him.
Cain survived Hell once. Now, he’ll break it.

Title: The Dark Prince
Synopsis:
Jake is a young fugitive who is content in his life. He has a job that is difficult, but he doesn't mind, he finds it rather exciting and it keeps him entertained. He has a few good friends and they all live in a peaceful neighborhood.
All of those taken away from him when was removed from earth and transported in another realm. A realm overflowing with magical elements inside what he assumed is a RPG. The amount of fantastic things is only equal to  the amount of breathtaking views, heavenly food, otherworldly creatures and items and of course, beautiful women.
It was totally fine by him, trapped in another world. A reality that operates similar to the multitudes of games he hacked and played and broken. He always dreamed of ruling his very own magical realm as a kid, and now his long forgotten hopes and ambitions are awakened once more. Until he finds out about the curse that comes along the class he obtained.
The currency he receives turn into useless dark crystals, tokens and stones. He is unable to gain XP like normal players, leveling up was almost impossible. Players wouldn't accept him in a party and guild because of his affinity to the dark arts. And no re-spawns. So much for being the last Necromancer.
With nothing to do and nowhere to go to in a beginner level town, he is forced to embark on a journey, arriving to dangerous areas too intense for his power level in an attempt to find his place in the realm. Travelling from town to town not knowing that he awakened an ancient power upon his arrival to the new world, a power that longs for its revenge.
All of these while he attempts to build up his power somehow through morally ambiguous methods.
Will he be able to own his own kingdom? Would he one day obtain the power to rival gods? Would he try to find a way home eventually? Can he still survive to see tomorrow?
Will this world mutate him into a worse scoundrel than he already was? Would he perhaps find it in himself to be a true hero? Or just be none of the two?

Title: The Legend of Talon Man
Synopsis: At the turn of the year 2020, the Japanese took advantage of the world’s fear of nuclear warfare, and converted back into an imperialist nation. During this new era, which is presently named the Ashita period, Japan conquered Taiwan, Korea and Australia, putting Japan and China, once again, on horrible terms. Ep Man's immense influence swept all across East Asia, inspiring the majority to look down on guns and settle disputes with their fists. Asian prejudice spread worldwide, especially in America, where the Chinese were looked at as “weak” and “cowardice” for not standing up for Taiwan or Korea. Two nations which are on the brink of a nuclear war to end all wars, and all life, on Earth. However, there are two young men who have devoted their lives to ending these tensions and restoring peace at all costs.

Title: Bloody Killing Game
Synopsis:
Ryo made a big mistake. He confessed to Luna Iwasaki. Now he's going to pay.
~x~
Enter a modern Japanese school setting. Ryo Otsuka was your average everyday 16-year-old. He fell into a crush for his classmate, Luna Iwasaki, and decided to confess. Next thing he knows, he finds himself thrown into a world of superhuman killing machines. And the girl that he thought was perfect isn’t so innocent after all…
Contains coarse language, gore, nudity and a psychopathic yandere.
Rewrite of Luna

Title: Thousand Leaf, Qian Ye !
Synopsis:
Emperor of the wind, Destroyer of the evil that lurks in the shadow
Let it be known that I am the wind that command Thousand of Myriad world, i am Qian Ye !
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hope you guys enjoy this story it will be a bit of a joke on Cultivation stories.
Purest Regards,Little Tomato

Title: The New Form
Synopsis: One day, Blake wakes up in the body of a hummingbird in a mysterious new world. Follow Blake as he looks for a way to return to his human body and on the way conquers the world.

Title: We Are Sad Robots
Synopsis:
A girl that wears a mask and a boy that tries to hard to make friends. A dark past and futile future. They roam the earth like sad robots, too useless to be used or loved. When they're necks are strung with string and hopelessness descends upon them, do they ever wish to sacrifice themselves for there other self?
 
Cover: https://www.pinterest.com/pin/285063851383783954/

Title: Rotten Era
Synopsis: A rotten world where corruption has spread to the farthest reaches of humanity and become normalized.  Men who call themselves gods, virtual worlds, our reincarnated protagonist and a land filled with people who might as well be zombies.

Title: Sekai - Christmas special!
Synopsis:
Here it is, the time for me to celebrate Christmas with this short, special of Sekai.
Enjoy!

Title: Happy Christmas!!!
Synopsis:
A short story for Santa's Gift Exchange party.
This is 5k+ words story, divided into 5 chapters and an epilogue, with a first person POV, and a light plot line. Actually it's really just a simple story that wants to share some filling experiences on such holidays.
Special thanks to my gift exchange partner, @btwonderkid, and his lifting message:
"It was a nice heartwarming story..."
 
Thanks to you, too. Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to all!

Title: MagicTech User in a different world
Synopsis: Saha died on Earth and got reincarnated into a different world.Due to some weird luck, I gained some awesome abilities and became an epic badass.

Title: The Keeper of the Forest
Synopsis: After waking up from a deep and long slumber, Actaeon has no memories of himself nor his purpose in life. He wanders around the region seeking any clue about his past self and memories but all of it was in vein. The only thing he found out was that he had the power to control nature and enrich them. He soon meets with a group of adventurers who was escorting a merchant and fell in love with both adventuring and the business. Now seeking a new purpose in life, he started his new life as a merchant that wanders around the world meeting new people and exploring new places. But soon his dark past will catch up to him.

Title: Summoner with Warhammer 40K System/Dropped/
Synopsis: At The Ageless World, there is all kinds of job uses—qi, magic, esp, summoner and other unknown arts.Vance Ironhide was the secret son of Ironhide family, overshadowed by his genius brother and sisters. Every day he waits to receive the strong job from a temple.But he only returns to the family as rank 1 world summoner that can't use any magic with familiar without rank. Everybody sees him as waste but only Vance knows truthWhat? You rank ten world summoner! and can summon dragons and titans !? Then meet my Titan killer tank Doomhammer !!What? You have impenetrable fortress ?! Say hello to my Emperor Battle Titan!What? A genius that multiple jobs? How about TunderHammer to your face ?!!

Title: My Magic Trip Abroad
Synopsis: Watch as Hachiro Nakano rises to the peak of Magic and Martial Arts in his attempt to stop the raging war between the two great countries Heimsted and Favrir. Ordered by his father "The King" Hachiro Nakano was shipped of to Arkandria to attend their prestigious and renowned Martial Magic Academy. Arkandria a powerful neutral country whom no one dares oppose would take in students of nobles houses from many countries including Heimsted Hachiro's country of inhabitence and the country they're at war with Favrir. Tensions grew between the students from the warring countries but with the assitance of his friends and the school's strict rules about fighting the threat of the lonely Favrir student dissapeared.Will Hachiro and his friends grow powerful enough to be able to stop the two countries and bring about peace or will this power have the opposite effect and strengthen the war efforts beetween the two countries.

Title: Blood
Synopsis:
Latifah - a sweet little girl, whose life was perfectly fine; not knowing her father wasn’t a big deal. Her mother loved her enough for two people. That is until said mother was killed in front of her and she herself was shoved inside a carriage to be brought to a father she had never met. Suddenly she finds herself one of the many princesses of the Opal’s Kingdom.
     Karim – a tormented little child and crown prince of the Opal’s Kingdom or so said the king. He is the sole son of the queen who preferred to cut her own wrists rather than living in Opal. His days, he spent them avoiding people, hating company and most of all, hating that monster’s blood that ran inside his body and the bodies of the whole royalty.
     But when the king died and it turned out to be a scheme conspired by his own brothers, all the king’s children must flee for their lives. Yesterday’s enemies were now today’s friends and in that quest of survival, the foe’s blood must be spilled. War is coming, for a kingdom in turmoil is a great prey and to seek peace you must first fight for it.
     And Latifah and Karim’s fight had just began…

Title: Twisted Fate
Synopsis: Althrá is a world suffering from an invasion from the lower planes has turned to many different forms of magic from gathering beings from other worlds to bolster their own to turning to the same powers that caused the invasion. Twisted Fate follows the story of Twisting Fate's Adrian Ravnos in his adventures through this world as he learns who he is along with several other characters.This story is a sequel to Twisting Fate though only its protagonist continues onto this story. There are multiple different systems of magic used within the story and sometimes convoluted reasons for why things unfold as they do. For those who read Twisting Fate, Twisted Fate is a continuation of Adrian’s story but the actions of me-but-not-me have significantly changed many things, there are many differences between the Althrá of Twisting Fate and this story's.

Title: Ascension Online
Synopsis:
Titan Incorporated, world leader in technology and science, has just released its newest creation and design. Ascension Online. With a surreal 98% realism, Ascension Online is a world of possibilities. One that hundreds of millions are throwing themselves into. 
Tyler Mori, once known as Akuma in the world of Combart Sports Association, is one such individual. While his goals and motivations are dead, Tyler is a man of unmatched ability. Ability, that shall be pushed to the limits in a game world, where friends are easy to be made, and enemies even harder to kill.

Title: Dungeon Mastery
Synopsis:
If this was a light novel, it would probably be called something like "Why Won't Those Adventurers Just Let Me Build In Peace?!"
Unfortunately, even though I have a cheat, my life isn't quite that charmed.
Herein are contained the chronicles of one very exasperated Dungeon Core, formerly a human of Planet Earth.

Title: Naruto, The Mercenary of Fate.
Synopsis: After The Nine Tailed Fox invades Konoha The fourth Hokage seals the Nine tail Into one of his twin children, Naruko, the Shinigami does not take Minato and Kushina's soul as payment, having claimed that the debt will be payed for in the future. Years later we follow the story of a young child named  Naruto. Having been Neglected by his parents his whole life in order to train his twin sister as the child of Prophecy, he becomes distanced greatly from them, and losing his standing as heir to the Namikaze clan was the last straw, so he runs away from home and stumbles upon a cave, the inside made of glass and he finds a contract, one that makes him a mercenary, to fate.  Now Naruto finds himself completing quests in order to obtain great power, many of the quests themselves however...are literally out of this world. Watch as Naruto changes not only his world but many more.

Title: Nebulous Fate
Synopsis:
The once galaxy spanning civilization of humanity has been shattered upon the face of an implacable enlightened race known to us only as the Eradi.
This is a story about finding the will to live on. To cling to hope even after crumbling in the face of imminent destruction.
This is a story about adventure.

Title: Gameworld
Synopsis: Twenty years ago something had happened.  The land and everything in it had changed.  Magic was real and Technology was limited.  New Races arose from the old and everyone was brought to an even playing field.  Everyone starts at level 1 and levels up from there.  Most folks will choose their class by level 5 and begin to grind out higher levels as they struggle to survive.  Omachiw was different, half human and half elf he had been raised by the Elves he had once hunted.  With no class and no family, he has become a jack of all trades, trying to survive in a world that had turned into a game.  Based in part in the city of Regina in the Province of Saskatchewan Canada.  This is a gritty urban fantasy story with horror elements set in a game world.

Title: Project Looking Glass: Freelancer
Synopsis:
When a game can set you up for life, a man with a talent for analysis gambles his future for a new lease on life.
While traveling on the colony ship Pioneer Michael Wolfe and many others are logged into Project Looking Glass, a fully immersive Virtual Reality MMORPG set on the world they are traveling to.  At the end of the journey all players will be permitted to keep the land they hold in the game as their homestead for the new colony.  Michael Wolfe must put away the books of myth and folklore and push himself to his limit to achieve the start to his new life.
Updates will come by chapter as I write them, so don't count on a solid release schedule (though I will try for a few chapters each week).  Edit advice is always welcome, but please keep it polite. 
 
 ((Cover is just a working cover until I can get some decent artwork))
 
Be advised that I am currently focusing on Hero's Call.  Project Freelancer will continue/be rewritten in parts when I have finished the story arc I intend for Hero's Call.

Title: Another World but this time Another World?
Synopsis:
He had attained near infinite power and to erase his regrets, he turned back time.
In the end, he succeeded.
However, he found himself in a different world than he had predicted.
What will occur now?

Title: An Undying Coward in the Apocalypse
Synopsis:
Under Construction: This is long overdue for a rewrite. There's a lot of grammatical errors and just plain bad writing here. I would berate my younger self for daring to post this unfinished story here.

All of us have our own inherent traits that existed from young. These traits, good or bad, are what made us as individuals.
What will happen if a coward to the bone is thrown in a cruel apocalyptic world?
Will he bend or will he break? The answer is that he will run away at any given chance.
When responsibilities and loved ones shackled Kriss' feet, will he leave the restraints and run away as he always do or face the tide called fate and fight not just for himself?

Title: Alice in Magic Land [UNREVISED]
Synopsis:
When Alice, a smart – though mildly sociopathic – college girl, stumbles upon the hidden world of magic, she quickly got engrossed in it, not caring about the consequences of her actions, she finds out that this mysterious world was  hidden for a reason.
Will Alice uncover the world's secrets? Or will the world uncover hers?
Follow Alice as she goes through this wonderland of astonishing spells and creatures, finding herself companions on both normal and magical sides alike, all while battling evil mages and corrupt politicians.

Read the prologue for a better synopsis.

Releases will be erratic,  constructive criticism is welcome.
Art is not mine and if the artist wants it removed, email me here

Unrevised and unfinished version. Check out my new account, "Alter-Ego" for the new and revised version!
Long live the Empress!

Title: Tales of Ofir
Synopsis:
Welcome to the world of Ophir, a land of magic, a land of danger, a land with a man named Ofir on a journey leading nowhere.
Each of these tales is its own story with some characters that will apear now and again.

Title: I am Urist
Synopsis:
Placed in the new world created for the god's enjoyment, Urist must settle these lands for all of Dwarf-kind. With no preexisting factions or governments, the world is at it's most primal where beasts stalk the lands. Prepare for a world full of strife and slaughter. Who will go extinct? Who will prosper? Welcome to the primordial world! 
If you want you can follow me on twitter and facebook following these links.
Link to my Twitter Profile
Link to my Facebook Profile.
Link to my Discord Channel

Title: The Nugget
Synopsis:
Our brave hero is not your average man. Rather he is not a man at all. Our hero is a nugget. An edible monstrosity, doomed to wander a world of horror of his own imagining. Will our hero find salvation? Or will he be eaten alive by the ravenous beasts around him.
 
(This is a oneshot. If I get enough people saying they want more, I will write it)
(Adapted from my submission to a contest on Novelupdates awhile back.)

Title: Lost in Sin
Synopsis: You were granted redemption, yet you refuse to atone.

Title: Twisting Fate Rewrite
Synopsis:
Through the planes another world lies, fighting for survival from the taint their ancestors unleashed on their world. For generations, they have called beings from other planes to bolster their forces, but now few answer their calls. So, they turn to what their ancestors did in desperation, the very thing that doomed them originally. Forcing a planar junction, so they may retreat there to fight against their enemies.
They turn to the plane their ancestors were thrown out of, a plane where magic is no longer. Earth, now a land of technological marvels unprepaired for both the demonic taint and the shattered kingoms of theirs. 
Adrian Ravnos a young man who wants little more than to have some fun playing games and reading books must survive in this world rapidly returning to the state his ancestors lived in, reality and fate in flux. Can he even survive let alone thrive in this twisted world?
As the plane of Althrá has been dragging beings of power to their plane for centuries there are multiple systems of both magical and physical arts known by characters within this story. Likewise, many ideas have been adopted and implemented by the dying deities of Althrá.
This is a rewrite of Twisting Fate, the end of the story will be the same but the start of this story is different. More details of some of the things brushed over in the prior version of the story will be given.

Title: Journey of the Elements - Ifrit
Synopsis:
“Humans were born with the fire of passion and ambition, lived with it and died with it
Life can be lived like a blazing flame causing great changes to the surroundings and standing tall no matter the wind
Life can be lived like a mellow flame being pushed around by the wind and ready to die out and be extinguished any time
Fire can be warmth that shelters others or it can be a blaze that consumes and destroys
And no matter the strength of the blaze in the end all it can do is to be snuffed out with the ravages of time.” 
“Isn’t fire akin to the life of men?”      ~D.K.Y.

Title: TELEPORT
Synopsis: A boy dies, gets reincarnated, and gets teleportation powers. simple enough for a synopsis, right?

Title: Codex of Shadows
Synopsis:
"All who dare block my path shall perish, all who dare chase me shall feel remorse. I am my own justice, my enemies, tremble, for i shall come for you."
Comedy, tragedy, drama, for everyone their own, stay tuned to check out what new events might pop out for our imperfect MC!

Title: Knights of Last Hope
Synopsis:
If you expect some story about valiant knights in shining armour, princesses locked in tall towers and dragons miraculously defeated by some magical sword, you will be disappointed. 
We are no heroes nor do we fight for glory. We fight to see the next day or at least to the bitter end. We are band of outcasts and leftovers with nowhere to go and no other way to make living.
I am writing these pages to record the story of our company in hope that one day someone learns about us while tending to dusty library. In other words I am trying to carve a little piece of history about our little group between those incompetent kings, lords, who never cared about anything but their own purse, and great prophets, in fact crazy fanatics with lust for power.

Title: The Little Spirit
Synopsis: The Little Spirit gets removed from its soul and gets pushed back to another world.

Title: My another start in another world
Synopsis: In our world, A young man "natsuke",is  nothing special, normal,and easy going. In our world, one could only say he's a supporting character. But, One day, upon arriving home, his parents left a note at the front door. After opening it, he looked behind and there was a kid. The next thing he knew was that he's in......another world??????

Title: Sins of the Father
Synopsis: This story follows a girl named Jade, she finds out mysterious secrets about her past...and her father. She has to get to her mother and father to save them before its too late! The hardest part about this is that the bad men that have her father and mother are hunting her, she has a little help from her trusty horse, Rowdy. At 13 years old, she is facing the impossible. Questions remain as we go through the story with suspicious minds, and saddened hearts.

Title: Mindfull Mage
Synopsis:
Story of a man with too much on his mind.
 
 
 
 
*I take no credit for the cover art*
*Just trying out casual writing not quite dedicated to the story though criticism is still appreciated*

Title: The white ground
Synopsis: The story is centered around a school where magic users attend to. The main protagonist is Ice Nikolaos who is unable to control necron (it is like mana) which is quite a misfurtune because all necronmancers (no, not necromancers) are trained to be soldiers of the goverment.P.S: I've marked all Content warning because I intend to add most of them to the book. Though I don't know if there will be or how much there will be etc. I hope from the button of my heart that you will like the story.

Title: Fate Cannot Bind Me
Synopsis:
Background is everything
From a 10th generation family? Rule a City
From a 100th generation family? Rule A Continent
From a 1000th generation family? Rule an entire world!!!
But from a 0th generation family? Unfortuately fate will eternally bind you.

Title: Melted Silver Spoon
Synopsis: A boy is born to a family of nobility and given the chance to inherit the legacy of a fire wielder that could make him the most powerful person in the world. But he is one of many children, and he has no talent, for his fire burns everyone, even him.

Title: My Journey
Synopsis: In this disgraceful world, everything is determined by power.The noble scum arrive at each shop walking in with a smile knowing that no one would dare to oppose their power!They always get their money,always. I can't stand it! My father always says his goodbyes to my mother, sister and I right before he goes up to his.... his own front counter in his own store! Fully aware that he could be killed at any time they please! Why,Why....Why must our own house be unsafe! Is there no place to go to!?I'll save my family from this hell and give them all the life they deserve.

Title: Rune Master
Synopsis:
Evo had resigned himself to his fate when Earth was conquered by the Empire, even being made into a slave and shoved into a strange white pod thing wasn’t a cause for concern. Then a chance came along and gave him a stupid thing like hope. In the artificial world of Eden’s Promise Evo can live a full life and even find freedom, but he’ll have to kill the unbeatable hidden secret boss known only as the Warden and obtain a rare drop item to get that life of freedom. Easy-Peasy.
Luckily his mysterious sponsor Alice seems to have his best interests in mind, it’s just a shame she can’t afford the fee to have him respawn…

Side Project
Random Releases
Reviews Appreciated

Title: A meaningless mage
Synopsis: i use this to test tables

Title: A sky as blue as ours
Synopsis: Isekai story. Just for the hell of it. Also, so I could at least acquire a decent grasp of writing without stopping arbritrarily (hopefuly). I have a skeleton of a plot in my head, but I am open to suggestions. I won't take too many though, as this lowly lurker had seen many stories destroyed because of too many ideas being crammed without being fleshed out. This story will be slow, like me. And I'll also update this synopsis when I am at a decent number of chapters. For now, I'm just going to have fun.

Title: The Last Evil
Synopsis:
Helena Rukh is the Last Evil,  the Black Queen, the Leader of the Dark Pact… and half a dozen other equally silly titles. Or at least Rukh thinks they’re silly, but then, she’s never thought of herself as the villain, despite all the things she did back in the War.
A war she lost. The treaty was signed. Her attempt to conquer all Reality aborted. Rukh’s retired now, to a hell-hole world called Sansara, a place where it rains ash and chaos-rents mar the sky, though the liquor is surprisingly good. But an old enemy is on her way to end that retirement, to drag Rukh back into everything she left behind.
Trouble is brewing and the self-styled good guys are at a loss.
Set a thief to catch a thief and all that....

Title: Veneofel: A Wonderful World of Magic, Imagination and A Certain Overpowered MC
Synopsis:
Johannes Aarvold is a normal student who yearns for knowledge on every medium possible. He is having the time of his life when he figured out that the girl she loves also loved him. But because of an Unusual Blue Book that he borrowed from the Library, he was transported to a different world called Veneofel. But the moment he was transported in Veneofel, he fell straight towards the castle of the Final Boss, The Demon King!
Let's join Hans and their comrades in their various adventures and misfits in order to search for a way back home and, at the same time, conquer the world itself!

This is my First Work so it is not that polished. The grammar can be wrong, the writing style can be messy, but still, I really want to write what's in my mind. For those that will take their time reading this, feel free to tell me all my flaws and I will do my best to correct it. Thank you very much and Enjoy Reading! ^_^

Title: Can I Borrow @You?
Synopsis:
you don’t notice important people around you and how much they are helping you or screwing you. but when you get aware of their presence, sometime you can’t take eyes off that person. that person is a certain girl who is pestering for a while to write about this. so here goes nothing. 
    this is a story about a college freshman boy which is me. he worked hard for an entrance exam only to find out its time for his semester final exam. to cool his head and of course his frustration he went for a stroll in the evening. but his luck played trick with him. he got caught by two masked men. our protagonist here cannot fight and really scared of violence or else he could've fought them off...
   that’s it. my embarrassment reached its limit. I can’t do it anymore. I’m done
    "where are you going?"
    "sorry, my bad. i forgot your presence."
    "you just wrote you can’t take your eyes off me."
   "embarrassment my lady."
   "whatever, you are writing this right?"
   "a little break ma’am?"
   "mmm... okay"
 
  *author change*    
   there was a rumor that our protagonist brought an anonymous girl in our classroom in the middle of the night and he got suspended for that. and he’s way too much of a wimp. it took a whole year to have a chat with me.
  "I’m back... wait, what are you writing?"
  "my contribution"
  "gimme that... ... ... what did you wrote that for?"
  "spoiler..."
          *author change*
  well so this is going to be a brief(slap)... elaborate story of my so-called contributor here and the situation our first meeting lead to. not actually first meeting. more like first time we talk. enjoy the ride.

Title: Black Feather
Synopsis: In this world, a select few people are able to use a power known as Aura. People called Slayers are essentially super soldiers that fight for and protect the citizens of the world. Follow Team Black Feather on their journey through Slayer Academy West as they face threats of every kind in order to achieve their dreams. (Synopsis still in the works.)

Title: Digital Magical Scientist
Synopsis:
̿̿ ̿̿ ̿̿ ̿'̿'\̵͇̿̿\з= ( ▀ ͜͞ʖ▀) =ε/̵͇̿̿/’̿’̿ ̿ ̿̿ ̿̿ ̿̿
BexEehl is not normal. She certainly tries to be, but when you can hear the magical language of the world you get sucked off the rails quite easily.
This is her time finding herself in a way only possible with the freedom present in the world of a VRMMO.
Join her as she finds meaning and purpose and probably quite a bit of power.

Title: Project Etho
Synopsis:
A boy was created in the year 2000 and lived until the year 2278, how can someone live for so long you may ask; well he was artificially created to become the longest living human that ever lived.
He was created as a vessel that could house numerous abilities. He will hold secrets that are untold and mysteries that need to be solved.
He is the.........

Title: True Dungeon host
Synopsis:
Always unfortunate, had to live hard, however he was still trying to change his destiny. But unfortunate, it's too unfortunate that somehow his spirit and mind are caught in the visual reality game, the first attempt to find a gaming experience, where the purpose of the game is to conquer all the dungeons in this game.
Oneday, 
[Congratulation , you have crowned As Great Dungeon's host for entire life]
P.S. cover above has nothing to do with this story. 
P.S.S. cover not mine,  I got at website,  because it cute I take it As cover.

Title: Sir Skelliton
Synopsis:
Necromancy is an old but simple practice. To be a necrotic spell master requires only three things.
Magic, a limitless yet difficult power to master.  Raise undead, one of the first and most basic spells any magic user will ever learn across their lifetimes. An open class slot.
But this isn’t a story about an up and coming necromancer. No this is about the faithful minion that’s been summoned by their fledgling master.
If you think being a Necromancer is hard, just imagine how hard it must be for a Lv1 Skeleton.

Title: Fallen From Grace - Blood Beginnings - Book 1
Synopsis:
We were outcasts now, forced to once again live in the shadows of the night. The world was changing thanks to the Shield of Humanity, and whether or not it would be for the benefit of the supernatural community was yet to be seen. There were still vampires, still werewolves of all kinds, but the humans – the humans were changing. So many experiments done in the name of helping mankind, so many failed attempts at eradicating supernatural and humans alike.
We were the chosen ones, those Fallen From Grace, those who would rise up against everything meant to destroy our world. We were just the beginning, the first few who would discover the dark secrets left behind in our city, the front runners of the battle which was yet to come.
Aleria had been around the vampires for nearly a decade, welcomed into their world if still slightly apart from it, until one night she happened to be in the wrong place at the wrong time. She saved him, giving up her own mortal life, and he in turn gave her an immortal one. Now she was part of his coven his coven, but not everyone was so eager to welcome her with open arms.
Addalynn had run for her life after watching the townspeople slaughter her father right on their front lawn. Terrified she would be next if they discovered her secret, she fled the city, scratching out a meager existence in the forest on the outskirts of the city she once called home. Then he found her, welcomed her into his pack, and her world was never going to be the same again.
Who would win in the war to save humanity when everyone seemed hell-bent on destroying each other? Who could be trusted when no one was what they appeared to be? In this new world where the lines of humanity and the supernatural have been blurred, it was becoming increasingly harder to figure out who were friends – and who was the enemy.

Title: The Crimson Hawk
Synopsis: Elli has recently amassed a huge sum of problems- not through her own devices, of course! It just seems that fate has it out for her, with her childhood friend starting to avoid her, her superhero life getting compromised by a strange woman, her new team seeming to hate her, and her beginning to hear a mysterious, disembodied voice of a ghost. Having obtained all these issues, what's a super-enhanced, super-regenerating woman to do?

Title: Writer's Block
Synopsis: Any amount of experience and understanding can provide the impetus for what might be the greatest story that you shall ever put to paper. To the test of time and tastes.You could be a retired sailor who pens a tale about a man and a whale that depicts a tale of unrelenting self-destruction.Or a child who had no parents to spin you warm loving tales ... forced to blanket yourself in tales of your own creation...Follow the story of one such individual and his attempts to churn out a story worth it's telling.Mature language and themes, but no raunchy sex. Constructive criticism would be appreciated.

Title: Divine Sparks
Synopsis: Prometheus descendant of the original god seeks revenge on Zeus who had an affair with his beloved and continued to hunt him down and end his life. Desperate to save his research on magic he throws himself into a space crack landing in the lower realms fusing with the soul of a mortal. Will manage to attain Godhood and complete his revenge?

Title: Shifting the future
Synopsis:
This is the story of a girl who wakes up with strange powers and the events that follow him.
[This story includes my own political viewpoints. Please do not take any of this seriously.]

Title: Poison in Paradise - A Star Wars Fanfiction
Synopsis:
Set after "The Last Jedi", Rey leaves the Resistance in order to complete her training on Ahch-To. An unmerciful fate awaits the Galaxy, but deceptions conceal the truth in order to keep in the secret of who the Hero and Villain truly are.
Lies will be told. Destinies will be written. Allegiances will be made.
Nothing is at it seems.
The Galaxy is full of mind games. But who creates them?

Title: Stars' Boundless Domain
Synopsis: For all that exists there is a star, be it human beings, plants, or even a single person, be it a group or a single existence, there is a star that represents it. This story is about the star that shined brightest of them all, that burned with all it’s glory and endless streams of powers on the road that is cultivation, the story about how he, Lios, made the world of cultivation turn upside down.

Title: Divine Salvation
Synopsis:
Ensen, the legendary midnight sorcerer, has an untimely death when a kid he is teaching mistakenly causes an explosion, ending his life before the set time. 
Emilia, a newly appointed creator-god tasked with the creation of a new universe. To help accelerate the development, she decides to choose five people from various species to assist her with that task. However, her first pick has a twist of fate and died decades before his time. She decides to rush the creation of the universe. 

This is my first time writing a full novel, so please rate harshly. Make sure to leave tips in the reviews to help me. Thanks!

Title: Heroic Chronicles Volume 2: Dawn of the New Beginning
Synopsis:
Volume 2: Dawn of the New Beginning. 
[A High Fantasy + Non OP MC + Worldbuilding + Harem Novel]
[This story is written in a Light Novel style]
Heroic Chronicles tells the tale of a 17-years old protagonist, Claude Leonheart, a lowly Initiate of the Brotherhood of the Sun whose whole world became one of many trials, and challenges after saving the Kingdom's only princess. As he becomes a hero, a new world now awaits him.
Follow his adventures of epic proportions (maybe not) as he encounters various adventures upon adventures and meeting new people during his journey as his life would then be shaped by these encounters for better or for worse. Take the journey with him as he learns his power and responsibilities that comes with it.
Becoming a hero is not just about saving girls and slaying monsters.
 
The cover is commisioned and done by: Artist: FatCatInTheBox
 
*****
 
Before you lot bashes me up with my English etc., consider this:
1. This is my first novel. First conceptualized and written some 23 years ago. Only until last year that I did some improvisations and improvements to what I had kept in the dusty corner of my room all these while. This story sees the light of the day because I challenged myself, that's all.
2. English is the 6th language that I speak.And in RRL, I'm using British English mostly to write my story.
3. Easier said than done. Rather than subjecting me to subjective comments/reviews about the language, point it out and suggest an alternative. One or two would do just fine. It goes a long way.
 
The Pledge - This story shall continue till it ends properly.

Title: Legacy Online
Synopsis:
Legacy Online is not only the world's first VRMMORPG but also the world's current most popular game that gathered over three billion players within the time span of half a year.
An absurdly realistic game where real-life skills and talents mattered; its popularity was so high that jobs and schools were created just for the sake of getting better at the game.
Yin Xian is a young adult who recently returned from studying abroad overseas. However, when he returned home after four long years, his family was shocked to find out that his knowledge of Legacy Online--- a game with influences all over the world--- was nonexistent.

Title: Hidden Adversary
Synopsis: "Hidden Adversary" is a story of a world of heroes and monsters hidden in the deep shadow of the earth. Various species of such beings that have not been found,waiting for its time to destroy mankind take back what is theirs. People all over the world have witnessed people with special abilities and share it through the media of social networking site "Utube" and "Popbook". Nobody believed the existence of such beings and the people that were caught on camera some claimed hoax and some claimed it true who knows? until monsters,devils,mysterious creatures slowly appearing in the world tormenting the existence of humans not until a 15 year old boy named Takoshi Kouno with other humans with special abilities appeared at the surface of the earth.

Title: The legend of Paul J. Raizer
Synopsis:
[ This story is completely unrelated to Julius Caeser ]
The setting of this story is mainly situated in a sci-fi universe with certain parts in a fantasy-like setting. Basically guns blazing with swords and magic as well as world-devouring Xenos.
 
The legend of Paul Julius Raizer, Legatus pro Praetore of the 13 Legions, Legion Master of the Black Legion, and saviour of the Great Arcadian Empire in it’s darkest hour.
 
Every legend must have a beginning and an end, and his... is only beginning.
Read on to uncover the past of Paul J. Raizer and the story of how a boy, became a living legend.
 
Book 1 - The making of a legend
 
Release schedule : Irregular

Title: Shinia: the tale of Dalton
Synopsis: What is the purpose of life? Do people have destiny? Is there a freedom of choice or everything is written in the book? Watch now as the protagonists try to forge their destinies... or at least they believe to do so.  Dalton was a mere farmer boy, but his parents were brutally killed and this led him to a journey. He eventually became a mercenary and now... he is the captain of Lion's Pride royal guards! He tries to do his best to protect his Highness however the king dies and with no legitimate heir a question arise: Who shall be the next ruler? The daughter of the king? Maybe one of the barons? Or by any chance Dalton seeks to claim the throne for himself?  Ps: The book will contain Gore, Sexual content and a lot of things that children should not read in my opinion. I hope you enjoy it. :)

Title: Late Night at Lund's
Synopsis:
Book 1 - Late Night at Lund's is available for sale on Amazon. 
Book 2: The Lockwood Quest continues the story! 
A dental hygienist walks into a bar.....
Dental hygienist Isa Chamberlin thought the biggest challenge in her life was getting over a messy breakup, but when she pops into a new neighborhood bar, she finds herself in a different world, one filled with wizards, spells, and monsters. Join Isa as she explores unfamiliar surroundings, uncovers new skills, and learns to level. Magic and monsters, allies and enemies, romance and danger, all of it just on the other side of a simple door. 
"Wear these bracers with pride.” the half-orc slid first one bracer and then the other over Isa’s forearms. “Fight with your heart,” he said as he pulled the laces tight. “And come back with a story to tell. That is what an adventurer does.” .......
****
Thank you for reading, and if you like the story, please rate and review. Isa and I would both like to level up!
This story uses the 5th Edition Open Gaming License for game mechanics. I roll dice for combat outcomes and all skill checks.... which is sometimes surprising!
 One side note - I don't have a "sexual content" tag on - this is more romance than romp. But that might change!

Title: Half Hit Human
Synopsis:
One human, one volcano, will things get hot and spicy? Find out if you dare. 
Also if you read this entire fiction you will find a hot goth gf in the span of two minutes after you finish it.
Also, also,  I plan on updating everyday with chapters around 1500 to 2000 words after new years.
Also, also, also if you have read this far just now you're incredibly sexy. 
I am an incredibly bored person

Title: The Corruption Game
Synopsis: An old politician gets accused of corruption, he denies it but nobody believes him and one month later he is found guilty of corruption, he commits suicide to die as an innocent man, he wakes up in a bed and he is in a different world, different body, different life. And he has to do quests to survive.

Title: Waring Cities
Synopsis:
i was a normal archoligist until i died. i was some how brought back to the time i studied. Aceint Grece. if you read the story of how i faught, killed and sluaghtered my way to the top of Acient Grece. oh by the way the Greek myths aren't myths they're as real as me or you.
authors note: i try and post every sataday and sunday. at least once a weak.

Title: Foodie in a magical world
Synopsis:
Foodie dies from the North Korean missile attacks in London while touring food places.
now he tries to live in a new world looking for the best food in a new world where he is living in.

Title: The Only Real Cultivator
Synopsis:
Vincent was relaxing in physics class when he and his entire class were teleported into a vast other world, where everybody called themselves cultivators and fought with magical martial arts.
Vincent gained power over plants, allowing him to turn seeds into all sorts of vegetation. He ventures out into this new world filled with phony cultivators to set the record straight. He can make one declaration with absolute certainty, “I am the only real cultivator!”
-
You will see an overpowered main character with a cheat ability.  You will see "comedy". You will see a normal guy who gets teleported to another world. You will see classic wuxia elements like Qi cultivation and alchemy.  You will see grammar from a native speaker. You won't see a ruthless MC who kills everybody that offends him. You won't see harem. 
It's essentially everything I like about light novels, web novels, and wuxia all shoved into one story. 
If you’d like an unholy mix of overpowered main character, wuxia, fantasy, and LitRPG - give The Only Real Cultivator a try.
6/1/2020 edit: Some bloke plagerized this book and put it on amazon, titling it "Ancient Cultivator." tbh I'm kinda flattered that I'm worth plagerizing. Still, don't buy the book. The whole thing's available here for free.

Title: forgotten
Synopsis:
A story, a legacy, of people from a forgotten generation. One who's many great, and horrific accomplishments lay still, unnoticed by all but the most fervent of historians. This is the story of there most great, yet evil invention: modern war
 
(short stories of first world war soldiers)

Title: All Stats Random
Synopsis:
Un-reality, the greatest game in the century just launched and Chris starts to play it. He wants to change his circumstances, which are through no fault of his own.
But fate doesn't let it be that simple. He gets a hidden unique class, but that class has a special ability, one that randomizes all his stats whenever it wants? What?
The world truly can't be fair to him. Not even in a game.
Now he has to figure out a way to make this odd quirk of his class work.

When he smiles, the world loves him.When he laughs, the world fears him.

(and that was my stab at trying to imitate those chinese synopses)
Regular chapters, once or twice per week. On the weekends usually.
I will finish this novel, be it takes 1 year or 2. It will get a proper ending. Afterall, the ending is paramount.
Also, the readers might feel rewarded if they look closely while reading. I try to be quite mindful and put in interesting details or things that would come into play later.
And, personally i think that reviews on this site might as well be pointless. Unless you know the reviewer and think that you share his views. Your thoughts on a particular thing (like a novel) can differ from others. So, do give it a try before arbitrarily deciding.
This is my try to perfect the 'master of all/everything' type of MC, inside a proper, realistic VR world, from a game design perspective and immersion and no convenient 'convert gold to irl currency' button.
It is going to be a game first of all. Not a fantasy world overloaden with status screens and skills you can't possibly keep track of. A game with all of the real world aspects to it. Not a cheap fantasy world with shoehorned in stats.

Title: Gods' Plague (Hiatus- 2/01/18)
Synopsis:
Let me give you a scenario.
Let’s say you are in a city or a town commuting to work when several black-holes break into the sky. Something pours out of them that turns the air into a slightly grey color and it falls to the ground. The unsuspecting elderly and children underneath them just stop and begin to twitch before they begin attacking anyone next to them.
You see this happening in a daze, wondering what could possibly be happening, when something else drops down from one of those holes in the sky. It lands on the ground perfectly. You see that it kind of looks like dog, except that it has black and grey patterned skin with no fur. Its claws look more like paws with knives sticking out of them and its mouth cannot fully close as its teeth are too large. The eyes, with frog-like pupils, are already choosing their first target, and they finally land on you, who is inside a somewhat safe vehicle. However, you can’t drive out of the situation because of the already chaotic traffic rendering the safe haven useless.
The black-holes are open all over the sky with that grey colored air spreading everywhere and more variations of those creatures are dropping down from them. Some of them land on two legs and some appear able to fly.
You finally begin to react, but what should you do?
(Reader Beware: The story of this world takes place 700 years after this premise and is not written in second person. Also, a different cover will be made.)

Title: Flameheart
Synopsis:
The Lady of Havan, the paragon of unity, has disappeared for two decades.
In her absence, great powers clash: the technologically advanced and atheistic Daim Imperium; the Church of Corinthos that upholds the worship of the deity known as the Halar with its legions of zealots and fanatics; and the Aesir warriors of the East that bind the elements of Gaia to their will.
Amidst a world rife with war, an ancient enemy slumbers and unlikely allies must put aside their prejudices, dark secrets and bloodstained histories to warn the nations of men of the threat to come.

Jessica is a young peasant who has worked in her family’s fields for her entire life. Recent events have increased the burden resting on her family’s shoulders, but she retains her free and unbridled personality. That day, however, her path crosses with circumstances beyond the control of most beings. Will the trials she faces grind her down, or will she emerge out of the whirlwind stronger than ever?
Flow is a web serial written by Kay.L. The story will be updated here with a new chapter every day (except on Sunday). Some of the tags come into play later in the story. Patreons have early access to a number of chapters.

Synopsis: Magisterium[?mad???st??r??m] noun1. the authority and power of the church to teach religious truth.Rebellion[r??b?lj?n]noun1. an act of armed resistance to an established government or leader.2. the action or process of resisting authority, control, or convention.

Title: In The Light Of Fire
Synopsis: Cecilia Brandet has long since suffered through the taunts and hurtful treatments from everyone around her, until an incident occurs that throws her life around, allowing her the opportunity to finally dabble in the luxury she had cone to know as "friendship".Little did Cecilia know that through this incident, she'd managed to unlock an ancient bloodline running through her veins, her birthright that had been kept from her for a long, long time, and cementing her place in a part of the world that she didn't know existed, but now fills her life with excitement, wonder, and a very, very real danger

Title: He's The One™
Synopsis: Kaia, Head CEO of an entertainment business, was forced into an arranged marriage. Her fiance turns out to be abusive and nothing but a cheater. After her high school crush saves her life on the streets, he comes up with the Idea of marriage. What would people do if she found out that she married her company rival? Though, even with this trial in the way, they accept their fate they decide and begin their lives as a married couple. Will they survive or will they falter?? Only time will tell...

Title: Hybrid Summoner
Synopsis:
All his life it seemed like the gods condemed his existence. One thing led to another in an endless spiral that would break nearly anyone, and yet it only taught him one thing. The strong make the rules and the weak get eaten by them. He never wanted power, fame, or glory. He wanted a happy life with a family that loved him and he finally thought he could get it. Until she slept with his best friend hours after his parents funeral. It took years to peice himself together again but he did it and just so the gods could get the last laugh and end the world.
Now thrown into a world straight out of some fantasy VRMMORPG like he read about online the skills he created to combat depression will now combat monsters straight out of a story book. Follow Niko Bolas as he crawls through a world overflowing with monsters- and not the human kind either. Watch as he turns all the pain of his life into a strength that will make the world itself tremble. This is the journey of a man that finally is where he was always meant to be. Even it that is at the end of a world and the begining of another. 
 

Quick shout out to Deviant art cause they make so much awsome artwork. The cover is theirs and i just used it cause it felt in tune with the MC. Oh and this my first book so i'd appreciate some good solid constructive criticism, ENJOY.

Title: The Witch and the Executioner
Synopsis:
In the Kingdom of Makelty, witchcraft is a crime punishable by death, and a young, newly-appointed Royal Executioner, Rodyle, is tasked to execute a young woman, Aura, who has been condemned for being a practicioner of witchcraft. Despite his misgiving on his given task, which amounts to executing an innocent woman whose only crime is simply existing, Rodyle hardens his resolve and performs his duty, promising to the condemned that her death will be quick and painless.
Little does he know that by executing Aura, he will unwittingly uncover an ancient conspiracy involving the royal family, witchcraft and the truth behind Aura's existence. Completely out of his element, Rodyle will have to rely on Aura, the witch he has supposedly executed, to survive the ordeals and discover the truth behind everything.

Title: 200X300
Synopsis:
Welcome to the world of Fantasiaia, a world full of magic, epic monsters, heroic battles and more! It's the new, cutting edge VRMMORPG world what everyone has dreamed about!
And now welcome Markus Fickus, your average young man in our average and boring world! He was just an ordinary man, until one day, something changed his whole life. As he ate his breakfast on that fateful morning, little did he know that he would choke on his coffee and die—just to be reincarnated in the world of Fantasiaia!
"Wait, what?" Mark said, looking up from his bowl of cereal. He didn't follow the script properly, and forgot to prepare his coffee.
"I thought Fantasiaia was a VRMMO," Mark muttered as he made his way to his coffee machine. "How can someone reincarnate into a game?"
Of course, what Mark didn't know was that logic and reason didn't matter. It was magic! Besides, everyone loves virtual reality stories and reincarnation novels. So why not have both?
Mark shook his head sadly, but prepared his coffee in silence. When he finished, he looked up at the sky—and saw only the dull white ceiling of his apartment. He felt utterly cheated that the last thing he would see in this world was the peeling paint on the wall.
"They are not paying me enough for this," Mark grumbled, then drank up his coffee.
And then he died.

Title: Lackluster Adventure of a Side Character
Synopsis:
In a world where RPG-like elements, magic, monsters and gods exists, people who are bestowed the title [Hero] hogs the spotlight all to themselves. Truly, it's a 'fantastic' world to the very core... for the leads that is.
 
Behind the scenes, a certain individual struggles on his daily life. Without a cheat-like ability, a sacred weapon, or the divine powers given by the gods.
 
Join Hiraku on 'his 'adventure' of purging cliches--, I mean climbing away from his shameful title; the title of a side character.

Title: Exousia
Synopsis:
The Gods have cursed the world of Salome. They have used the planet and its inhabitants as their playground and toys for thousands of years—inciting wars between nations because of their stubbornness and pride and creating creatures of destruction that threaten the peace, tranquility, and existence of humanity. When granted the opportunity to acquire the throne of the Gods themselves, Captain Kyros Aleister of the Soterian Military seeks to take full advantage of that precious chance.
He is more than willing to forsake his humanity, become what he despises, and rid the world of the cancers that are the Gods. However, he must battle against over one-hundred other people blessed with the same opportunities as him.
(The lovely cover art is provided by https://zinganza.wixsite.com/portfolio)

Synopsis:
Old Man: "Hahaha! Boy, accept me as your master!"
MC: "Why should I?"
Old Man: "With my power you can acquire riches, territories, and every women out there!"
MC: "Oh, it's unfortunate then. I reject."
Old Man: "Hahaha! Good choice! Now, just kowtow-- Cough cough, wait what!? WHY!?"
MC: "I'm not interested in women."
Old Man: "Cough cough. Aiyah, I know you're still young right now. But, in the future--"
MC: "I like men."
Old Man: *Chokes on saliva* 'This, this is simply too much!!' *Faints out of blood pressure*
At that moment, the old man realized... he had screwed up!
