Title: Conflagration -  A Fantasy Haven Series part 1
Synopsis:
With the rug effectively pulled out from underneath him, Gram thought he was at the end of his life. Battle scarred, still mourning his recently deceased wife and unborn child, Gram finds out he has terminal cancer. With so many blows to his psyche, Gram thinks he's finally lost his sanity when a transparent blue screen appears in front of him that no one else can see.
“Congratulations! You are one of a few hundred to be selected to participate in the Fantasy Haven Migration Event! Participation is mandatory and you will be transported in 23 hours 59 minutes.”
Welcome to Fantasy Haven, Gram. We hope you enjoy your stay.

Title: The Elder of Mediocrity
Synopsis:
In a world of cultivators, psykers, mages, witches, conspiracies and a Cold War, everything is extraordinary. Well, most everything. Oz “Da Shan” Elderweiss is just your average guy in a not average world. He’s not that strong, he’s not that weak — and he’s not getting any better. Da Shan discovers that you’re never too old to have your own coming of age saga. Filled with a burning desire for revenge, but the inability to carry it out, he hatches an insane scheme to change his potential and achieve exponential growth. But his enemies are quite literally the members of his own household and his close friends. He must fight tooth and nail for what he believes in and for the freedom to carve his own path. Join him as he battles people with both the best and worst intentions, with his life on the line.
Current Word Count: 136 000, First arc complete.
A lot of new content has been added to the early chapters since the end of May. The first chapters are still under construction and editing, but all the major changes are done.
 
 
 
I was a webnovel junkie for a long time, but I found it hard to find novels with solid characters, decent plot, philosophical underpinnings and a fully painted world to keep me going. I've taken from every genre I've liked to make a story that satisfies my own cravings for a good story. If you like the story or have suggestions please leave a comment or review. I hope this novel is fun, provocative but above all fun. Enjoy.
Yours truly,
James Paul Addington
PS I will release at least two chapters a week, or one really long chapter.
Concerning the tags:
The story is primarily Fantasy with Wuxia influence in some elements. Romance won't happen for the first two arcs or so (roughly 40 chapters), I want to build the world before I do that. Tragedy is because of an event that occurs in the book, not the tone of the book. The book is more lighthearted. Slice of Life doesn't occur till the third arc (the romance happens during that arc as well). Magic will also show up more in later arcs, but appears throughout. Reincarnation it's not a reincarnation like in the traditional sense, but it has a similar concept.

Title: Excstatsy - Maou no Mahou Shoujo
Synopsis:
After the war with the seven Demon Kings, the heroes of Paradiso and Earth managed to defeat them and sealed away Asmodai, the Demon King of Lust, into his prison for centuries. They have finally achieved peace on their worlds and leave behind the memories of the war.
However, many years later, the queen of Aurora foretells a new danger coming upon Paradiso and Earth as both worlds will be overwhelmed by darkness and monsters. Seeing no other options, the queen decided to release Asmodai from his seal and seek his aid to help the magical girls from Earth.
Thinking it will be interesting, Asmodai complies her request and reborn as a human named Nagumo Souji to join up with the warriors. See how the former Demon King helps out the magical girls from the shadows!
 
 Additional Tags: Drama, a bit of slice of life
Warning: Borderline H. Mild Profanity

Title: a New Light
Synopsis:
Strength is not the only thing one should seek. As knowledge is not either. But one should also not strive to know only a little of both. One should aim for only the very best. When people do that they will become what they want and better after the work is put in. 
Please give my story a chance. I'm not sure of it is worth it though.

Title: Transposition
Synopsis: Joseph a celebrity in his own world. Got "banished" by the so-called gods due to his arrogance and ego, he was hated by some people. Among those, he angered a scientist. quite a poor lazy scientist, but nonetheless a scientist. so this scientist wanted to punish him, but he didn't know how to do it since he was poor. but he soon remembered a failed experiment he did some time ago. He picked up the exterminator which shoots concentrated radiation beams. but this was too weak to kill that guy so he found a way around the problem and beamed him to death, literally. After that, he was sent to some other world by God

Title: Beyond the Star Ways
Synopsis:
Average high school student Kent was walking home, when he was abducted by the God of the multiverse. For his knowledge and understanding of Science, Math, agricultural, medicine. He was ripped from earth and forced live in a world of Swords and magic.
 How will he adapt to his new life?

Title: Adventures in the Pirate Continent
Synopsis: Dylan’s gap year is going great, yes her cruise ship was sunk by some sort of ancient evil sea monster and she had to spent a lot of time nearly starving to death. But she’s doing better now she lives in a world of mystery and wonder! In The Pirate Continent! She made new friends and is only almost killed now by Vikings and every once a while Nazis.

Title: Tale of A Guide
Synopsis:
Why do I have to do this?
Why can't I just sleep in or read some books?
WHY AM I THE GUY THAT HAS TO SAVE PEOPLE!?
 
 
Walk along our protagonist Dante Greene as he encounters some seriously weird situations and save the thing he hates the most....PEOPLE!

Title: Immortal Dynasty (Rewrite)
Synopsis:
The Tianyang Continent.
A place where the strong prey on the weak; where one life is more valuable than a thousand; a cemetery for delusional fantasies and dreams.
In this hostile and precarious world, our protagonist is transported. A young man who experienced both betrayal and tragedy, despite possessing all the tools to lead a successful and fulfilled life.
Watch this sad and broken bachelor get back on his feet, make friends, and redefine his presumptions on life.
Wish him the best on his journey of cultivation and discover secrets he wished he had never uncovered.
(If the owner of the cover Image wishes me to remove it, I will)

Title: Modern OP game system... With a glitch! (DROPPED)
Synopsis:
I just kinda had a wish and then it was granted, well guess what! I'm gonna become a powerful unknown force in the world. I also have a system and got a glitch and was able to add as many points as I wanted whenever I wanted.
(it's simple because I don't want to do math when writing when my mood swings a lot and keeping record of skills and and other stuff. Also I'll add other tags in the middle of chapters.)

Title: Parasite Paradise
Synopsis: Follow Booker And Veralyn as they escape one dying planet, only to end up on Earth. With trouble not far behind, they must find other survivors, and save their new home, as well as the rest of the universe.

Title: The Mormon Agenda
Synopsis:
Dr. John Haws, widower, and linguist at the University of Colorado gave up fieldwork after nearly being murdered in Guatemala. Now three years later, his best friend and survivor of the Guatemala incident asks for his help once more. A profound discovery in the Yucatan Jungle will forever change the course of human history.
Join John as his past and family confronts the greatest conspiracy in the world. Who was behind the Guatemala incident and why are they trying to kill him? What secrets are worth the lives of those who get in the way?

Title: Yuu-Mi, Anime and the Apocalypse
Synopsis:
Yuu-Mi was once the greatest hero alive until he died a tragic death. For the first time ever, he was killed in a match. The rules stated that the loser had to delete their character, thus he did. Except when his character got deleted so did Yuu-Mi.
Basically about a guy who dies and ends up in an apocalyptic world where he can summon anime characters.

Title: The guy who brings hope
Synopsis: The book is about a man who goes to a town called Riverwood his name is Ross he see's that Riverwood needs help so he goes out of his way to help them become a town that the village can call home

Title: The Power Within
Synopsis:
This story follows Arthur and Tom as they enter a world never before seen as a possibility. Both have survived as wanderers by choice, but now have a chance at a new lifestyle with the only requirement being their best effort. The destination is uncertain, but the journey along the way is what truly matters.
New chapter every day of the month ending in an 8
Cover art: IG @juneberry.seeds
patreon.com/ThePowerWithin

Title: Amusement Park
Synopsis:
AMUSEMENT PARK IS NOT FOR GOOD BOYS AND/OR GIRLS. PLEASE READ ANOTHER WORK OF FICTION IF YOU WANT TO REMAIN GOOD AND PURE AND HOLY. THANK YOU.
An anthology of semi-related writings ranging from the fairly ordinary to the experimental. You may encounter a short story, an essay, maybe a message of some sort, maybe something else, all taking place in a corrupt modern world that is hard to distinguish from nightmare and reality, which may or may not be close to our own. The views expressed in this program does not reflect the views of [REDACTED]. Please enjoy your time here at the Amusement Park!

Title: PenSmith Of The End
Synopsis:
Joshua, a simple high school student spends his days before new years contemplating what to do.
You see, Joshua is a hobby writer. An author of some small, little-known story somewhere on the internet.
At least...he was until a few months ago.
Joshua as a writer was met with the most horrifying of dilemmas, how does he end his story?
Asking himself, over and over..."What do I write?"

Title: From Squire to Hero
Synopsis: Can a hero wanna-be by the name of Eamon rescue the city of Kendrickstone, held hostage by an evil wizard and his troop of black-clad soldiers? Face down fierce foes with spell, sword, or silver tongue. Outwit cunning rivals, cement his fledgling reputation, and maybe, just maybe, make enough money to pay his rent!

Title: The Sword of Heavens
Synopsis: Born an auspicious day in a powerful family, Jiang Yun possessed everything someone would dream to possess. But on the day of his 3rd birthday, when every child of the world proceed to the Martial Spirit Awakening Ceremony, he who was the favorite child his rejected by his relatives because of his "trash spirit" and exhiled to a branch of the Clan. But what they never anticipated is that there unwise decision will give a child the encounter of his life.

Title: Scarlet Ascension
Synopsis:
To what extent would you go for revenge?
To what extent would you go to gain salvation?
To what extent would you go to Ascend to godhood?
How much blood would you spill?
How many lives would you take?
What would you sacrifice?
Your road is paved with blood and tears, the past and the future intersect.
This is your scarlet ascension.
...
This is a novel that sometimes doesn't take itself seriously, other times it takes itself too seriously. Like in this damn synopsis that explains nothing.

Title: Spirit Mage
Synopsis:
A teenager dies due to an accident after leaving his school for summer break. Then certain God has given him a second chance to once again live as a human in another world where magic and sword is a normal thing.
Follow his journey as he traveling the world and solve the mysteries in that world.

Title: Defying the Heavens through a Revolution
Synopsis:
Lu Geming is a 12 year old boy from a small village south of Lu town. He is the slave of the village chief, who treated him unjustly. One day, an assasin was sent to kill his master. He saw his master die, but the assasin also saw him. So the assasin had no choice but to kill him too.
Lu Geming's life was supposed to end there, but maybe not?

Title: NightWatch
Synopsis: A group of five supernatural kids, known as NightWatch, live on the streets of the festival city of Ceyore. They stay mostly hidden, until a baby is kidnapped from its home. NightWatch ventures through the city to rescue the child, and on the way discover a dark plot being carried out by the other supernatural beings on the street; now, it's up to them to not only rescue the baby, but also stop the monsters' plans to take over Ceyore.

Title: Commander Daggen
Synopsis:
-Orlando Daggen has been enlisted into the 489,098,678th founding of the Eternal Legion at precisely 1700 on the 4th of January to serve as its commander-
Those words would be the last sight to greet my eyes before the world exploded into a myraid of colors.
Orlando Daggen is selected to command a legion ordered to hold back a formless threat indefinitely. Failure would mean the end of everything. Can a Rookie survive a threat that has killed countless commanders before him? 
 
 

Spoiler: Spoiler


I'm a new writer who has been trying for quite some time to create a well thought out story. As such, I would welcome any criticism or advise i can get.

Title: Rise of the wyvern god
Synopsis:
A man named Damon was hitting on some girls in the club until he got punched in the face by her boyfriend as he was falling down he hit his head on a table and was reincarnated.
PS. i don't own the cover shout out to him who does and PLZ don't hate me for Grammar since this is my first novel.

Title: Anomaly
Synopsis:
Living an ordinary life our main protagonist mentally collapses under depressing news which warps his reality and him out of his home planet.
 
This is my first fiction on here. I probably will post once a week although i can't be sure as i can get pretty busy. I hope you enjoy. I know, very vague description.

Title: Re:Alchemist -A Certain Foolish Alchemist-
Synopsis: Reincarnation, magic, alchemy, monsters, and others. Those are just the things that are just on a world of fairy tales, fiction, and fantasy only. Things that can not happen in real life, life on earth.But what happens when it is real? All those fiction things, come true? Really there?Its existence is not mere nonsense?Andrean Putra Pramana, a young man who feels his life is no longer meaningful, bored and hollow, get a second chance.Opportunity to start a process called... reincarnation.How is the new story in his new life? Life after he experienced reincarnation?

Title: Happy Ending
Synopsis:
[You are mine and mine alone], a visual novel that was really popular and on top of the most played game this year, but out of nowhere, it vanished, alongside its memories from everyone's mind, except for a single player that found a glitch where one of the antagonists became a heroine.
Now that character, programmed to kill, has found him in real life and weird things are going to happen to his everyday life, without a screen in his front to protect him.
It doesn't matter if he wants or not; the game has already started.
[][][][][]

Title: Time-Leap With Certain Possibilities
Synopsis: This story is of a Certain Boy whose life changed drastically after an attempt of Time Travel which caused him to jump in Another Dimension and who would have thought that this boy was the one who was going to save the whole world.

Title: God of Battle
Synopsis:
Long believing themself to be the greatest and most powerful cultivator in existence, an ancient being is awakened by the discovery of a stronger powerful opponent. Knowing that they were completely outmatched, the ancient warrior sacrificed all their accumulated power to start from the beginning and reach new heights. They will regain their lost power, surpass their old self, for they were the God of Battle, and will be again.

I do not own the cover of this story, if you are the artist contact me and I will change it.

Title: Rise of Demon King
Synopsis:
By the stroke of fate, Ren finds himself in a world of demons, Kalkan kingdom. Damned by his circumstances and his human-like appearance, Ren struggles to survive in a world in which strong rule the weak. The Selection of the next king of the Kalkan kingdom is about to begin, bringing along many conflicts that make life much harder to endure, but unwilling to give up, Ren is determined to survive and prosper.

Title: The 13 Legion
Synopsis:
Light and darkness struggle to get the upper hand against the other. Every being in the multiverse forced to choose a side there is black or white not in between. But things might begin to change.
Note: This is my first stories so if you have anything to point out please do. English isn't my first language so if you spot mistakes tell me so I can Fix them.

Title: Kingdom Come: the Chronicles of the World Destroyer
Synopsis:
Lucifer Flameheart, the World Destroyer and the Imperial. Corrupted by madness, his tale is one anger, hatred, despair, but also of exploration, joy, and success. As a champion of the DaRkNeSs, he will meet friends, foes, rivals, kingdoms, theocracies, gods, demons, and all sorts.
And this era of the godstage, blood will be spilt...
--
Hey, this Tionas and this is my artwork. I intend this to be a dark fantasy, well a more realistic one, about world building at the later stages, but a hell lot of exploration throughout. Beware, this story is going to have romance and tragedy, but no NTR (Yeah, my heartaches when there is as well). I hope you enjoy!
P.S. More will be added to the synopsis later.

Title: New Journey
Synopsis:
Oliver Silver is a genius in both craftsmanship and martial art. Being a young master of a Silver family, he never lack anything. Being genius combine with all his effort and hardship in his training, he reach a completely different height in spear, sword and fist a realm that no human able to reach. Despite being a master craftsman and martial art he still love watching anime.
At the ages 70 Oliver battle against 8 head hydra god on mount peru. Although he defeat the hydra but the wound from the battle lead to his dead. On his dead bed he though that his journey had already come to an end but to only find out that it just a new beginning.

Title: The Exposer
Synopsis:
Forvest Lugenburg, the child of a general and a nephew of a city lord, a perfect man that every woman wants, he has a motto that he follows every day.
"Everyone has secrets. The greater the person is the greater the secrets they have." 
And Forvest Lugenburg has a secret class called "Exposer" The more he exposes people the more points he gets to use on his stats, such as charisma, strength, dexterity and much more.

Title: The Tale of Mally Biddle
Synopsis:
When Mally Biddle agreed to spy upon the King of Lenzar and his overbearing knights she knew she was heading into danger. She didn't know she'd find a family unlike any other.
Posing as a servant in Bosc Castle, Mally serves tea and restocks the fires for the most dangerous men in the kingdom. Her goal is to learn the truth of what happened sixteen years ago, when the infant princess met her death … a death that has more questions than answers.
Along her search for the truth, Mally meets the energized Lita Stump, the strict and matriarchal Meriyal Boyd, and the opinionated Archibald Diggleby. Then of course there are the knights: Sir Leon Gibbs who is slicker than a greased hog, Adrian Bayard, hot tempered and violent, and the worst of the lot: Sir Illius Molick, Captain of the Knights. And then there is Maud, a mysterious woman who just might know everything…
 
The Tale of Mally Biddle is also available on Kindle and Print on Demand via Amazon.com. Thanks for reading!

Title: My Unusual Classmate Hikari
Synopsis:
I am Yuichi Nishimura.
A 16 year old, high school student of Fujioka High.
I'm just you're average old teenager boy with a normal life.
Next to me though, sat Maeda Hikari.
A mysterious girl of many faces.
This is the story of my everyday interaction with Hikari and her unusual antics while sat next to me.
(Cover art drawn by me. I still have a hard time drawing hands and feet btw.)

Title: Numb
Synopsis:
Sacrificing his life to save his sister Will find out he is the unluckiest soul in the northern quadrant. Will he be able to change his fate and become immortal, or will he keep dying a miserable death like so many times before?
 
Release on Monday and Friday.

Title: Death's Door
Synopsis:
After he ended up in the realm of the Death, Nur became servant of the Angel of Death. Unlike what he hoped, this was by far not the end of his journey, but just the beginning.
Kidnapped from his loved ones by the Goddess of Time, trapped nine hundred years in the past, and cursed with coming back in time every time he dies, Nur Finnerman is stuck in a mad loop that slowly drives him to lose his senses, his humanity, and lastly his sanity.
A man with a heart of a hero slowly loses himself, piece by piece, until the only thing that remains is Darkness. From the weakest hero wannabe to the greatest villain.
This is the journey of how an everyman became the fearsome fiend who frightens even the gods, the Dark Lord

Title: Call Of The Ancient Druids
Synopsis: "All we ever wanted was a place of our own...A place we could exist in peace and be left alone...Yet the humans betrayed us after everything we did for them...""For as long as we have lived, we have fought alongside the humans...We would never have imagined, that one day the blades we forged would turn against us...How did this come to be?"

Title: The Digidream Chronicles
Synopsis:
The World Jumper, the first volume in the saga, is now out on Amazon! What you'll find there is the improved, edited and expanded version, so please check it out if you're so inclined. And stay tuned for new chapters of what will become volume two!

Right after quitting her job at Digidream, the company where the most innovative virtual reality universe is being made, Sarah will be forced to enter the game to save her boyfriend. Once inside, she will find herself in a world that changes and evolves constantly, according to the whims of the mysterious Game Master.
Sarah will have to keep moving and fighting to improve and gain the abilities that will let her win and get out, picking some friends along the way. Everything seems to be stacked against her as she progresses through the different realms, but she will soon discover that there are other enigmatic entities that might not be in line with the rules set by the Game Master.
Will Sarah be able to win and rescue her boyfriend, or will she fail and get trapped forever inside the virtual nightmare?

Title: Dungeon Core/Realm Heart
Synopsis:
Dao Lord Brandr has cheated death many times over the millennia, enough to know that this time he should have died. There was just no surviving what had happened to him.
Fortunately or unfortunately, he did. Well... that depends on what you call surviving really. His body is gone and so is pretty much all of his mighty cultivation base. To add to this, he has suffered severe damage to his soul and as if that wasn't bad enough he's lost, far away from any world he knows and maybe even his universe.
Now, he's just learned from a being called a sprite that he's some sort of sentient mystic realm called a dungeon and that just for the crime of existing, there would be legions of enemies planning to pillage and destroy him.
It's okay though. Apparently, he can make legions of his own. Seeing what he has to work with, Brandr decides that perhaps, all is not lost after all...

Title: Small Worlds
Synopsis: The end of the world is non-negotiable. How it happens is still up in the air.Every god has a nanoverse, but only one will give its wielder the ability to end the world. After years of searching, it has finally been found, with the power to kick start the apocalypse.They never thought to look in a gift store's box of Knick-knacks. Ryan Smith didn't expect anything interesting to happen to him. He was a boring guy. The only remotely interesting thing about him was the man in a suit that no one else could see. Always watching, always taking notes. Ryan didn't know it meant he was one of the candidates to find the last nanoverse. Now that he has it, he has the power of a god, and it’s up to Ryan to try and save humanity, even though he can’t save the world. At least things have stopped being boring.Now Ryan finds himself in a fast paced adventure, caught in the power struggle between gods as he is forced to battle for his life against forces he can barely comprehend as gods try to stop him from fulfilling his duty. Foremost among them is Enki, a villain so terrible he...wants to save the world.A high octane battle between good and evil ensues, where the heroes’ best hope is a kinder, gentler Armageddon.

Title: A Broken World [Dropped Pending Rewrite]
Synopsis:
This work has been dropped- because I am rewriting it.  Look forward to the new and improved "A Broken World," now available HERE on Royal Road!
 
Three thousand years ago, Demonic creatures invaded the world.  Though their power seemed irresitable, a band of heroes managed to steal the knowledge of summoning rituals and worlds from them and created, "The Millenial Summoning."  A powerful magic that would bring forth a being from another world with the power to change the world forever.
The first being summoned became known as "The Speaker," and he brought the power of the Gods with him.  Teaching prayers and invocations that blessed humanities legions and began to push back the demons, founding of the "The Church of the Spoken Word" rose to power and a stalemate was reached.
Two thousand years ago, that stalemate was broken by the second casting of "The Millenial Summoning," and the arrival of "The First Sorceress," who taught humanity the basics of magic and enchanting.  With the power of the Sorceress, the mages, and the priests the tide turned and the Demonic hordes began to be shoved back, signaling hopes of a golden age for mankind.
One thousand years ago, the hopes of final victory and a new dawn for mankind were dashed by traitors who slew the participants of the ritual and took their places, using the ritual to bring forth a godlike being from the demons home world, "The Demon King," for no human knew his name, erased millenia of growth reducing humanity to barely a fragment of its former glory.
Now the ritual is being cast again, and a new being is being summoned...
In our world, after nearly two decades of studious work, Luke Jaeger is making his dream come true.  Working and going to school full time, sacrificing his health and social life in his youth, Lucas obtained Doctorates in genetics and virology, as well as associate degrees in business and accounting.  The modern world is not easy, and despite it nearly driving him mad from stress, this was the bare minimum he needed to be approved for a business loan to start a company focusing on commercial genetic therapy.
Despite the challange of getting his business running, Lucas feels that his work has finally paid off.
Lucas's car never left the banks lot, nor was Lucas ever seen again in our world.

Title: Son of Solomon
Synopsis:
Babylon returns, bringing with it mystery and tragedy. A great battle between Heirs begins, each vying for a crumbling throne, their true enemy making plans in the shadows. And Ellis searches for the answers in all of it, surviving in this new world a hunted man, making a path of his own.
Reviews and comments appreciated.

Title: Lucid dreamer
Synopsis: Dreams are an expansion of our self-conscious. A series of images and ideas being projected in our minds during sleep. But a particular phenomenon occurs where one is aware of the fact that they are dreaming- a lucid dream. Meet Sammy. An average high school boy with the ability to see premonitions through his dreams. Follow his journey as he unravels the wonder of the psychic world, along with its dangers...

Title: Truck-Kun Becomes Human
Synopsis:
The infamous "Truck-kun" has killed too much and have sent countless innocent souls to various parallel universes. The balance of life was interrupted due to the souls not having their lifelines not yet used up. The excess energy is starting to spread miasma which is changing the planet to slowly dying. Such an event cannot happen because flying cars haven't been invented yet and only Ugandan Knuckles and cancer memes are made that are known to the world! Seeing this, the overseer of death and life, Anubis decided that it is time to stop it. Or at least, do so temporarily
Thus, he focuses all the miasma into one truck, drastically changing the matter within and somehow changing the protons and energizing it. Creating a what would be called as a life. Something that is not expected.
However, none of those matters. After all, the story will be focusing on "Track Carrier", A Boy borne into a fantasy world where magic, fantasy, and an exciting life awaits!

Title: Zeroth Knight
Synopsis:
Isekai, fantasy, with the core themes of Identity and Fate.       Story contains a, mostly, lesbian cast.

     Just when she was about to confess to the man of her dreams, Eve is taken by a light to another world. Swallowing her up, against her will, eroding her, it demands a life so contrary to her previous one. In a new world with the title of “Zeroth” forced upon her, she must rely on her newfound “friends” to stay sane and navigate her responsibilities.
     But bit by bit, the world loses sight of the girl inside; seeing only “Zero,” the person she did not desire to be, but the hero that the world needed.
     Will Eve let the title she bears consume her, or will she become the hero in both body and mind? This is the tale of her struggles, and a star-crossed love destined by Fate to never converge. This is the tale of Zero.

      This story is a slow-burn, meant to be a few hundred pages or more in length, so the plot isn't the fastest to move. It also has lesbian-themed relationships for the majority of its cast. This story partially falls under, "harem" with the main character being female and gaining the affection of other females, against (at first) the main character's (Eve) will.
      This first arc will be more focused on the mentality and emotions of the cast with battles spaced intermittently. The second arc will involve a lot more fighting.
 Arc two will be out in a reasonable timeframe.
I have another story up, a short story drama with light yuri and supernatural themes: https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/27010/escape-the-knight
I am will continue updating older chapters to make them flow better, and to just be more structurally sound. 
Follow me at: https://twitter.com/ozefen0 
Share the story if you think it's good. And please rate some stars and leave reviews guys. It will help encourage other people to take a chance with the story and get to know this wonderful journey with us. Also, a friend has made a Discord for the "Zeroth Universe" if anyone wants to join and hang out to talk about the stories, theories, or just general fun chats with us!
https://discord.gg/f3Bc4TR

Synopsis: A compilation of my own short ideas. Typically a chapter or few long kind of stories.

Title: HAREM IN ANOTHER WORLD
Synopsis: MC was murdered by truck-chan when he was about to go home. However by pure "coincidence" a goddess took pity and reincarnated him another world with a skill makes women fall in love with him

Title: Chronicles of Ionathan Spellweaver [pending rewrite]
Synopsis:
Ionathan lived an average life until he started to see glimpses of the life of an Archmage in his dreams… and decided to put this knowledge to use. Watch him walking on the path of mages, trying to uncover the secrets behind his visions. Will that what he saw become his destiny or is he risking a wrath of mages he might be unconsciously spying on?
 
---
 
Set in a world heavily inspired by d&d rules and cosmology, albeit with many tweaks. Even if not written as a LitRPG, if someone's looking for it, he shall see that there is an evil GM rolling dices unseen in the background when characters are taking (some of) their actions to determine their results.
 
Update 31.07
Pending rewrite.

Title: Loading...
Synopsis:
Everyone knows how the general story is supposed to go. A man, unwittingly going about his normal and ordinary life, is suddenly whisked off to a game style fantasy world where he is expected to become the unwavering hero of the realm. That is until the summoned hero throws a Hail Mary and gets himself transported to a tutorial world before the summoning can be completed. Add in a clumsy goddess and a broken planet and that is just where our story begins...
 
Greetings all, thanks for taking the time to read this. This is my first story here on RRL and it's becomming one of the things I look forward to working on each day. As of June 2020, the story description has been updated (now that the characters have told me what was actually going on this author thought it prudent to update this) . Updates will be sporatic as i have time to juggle real life with writing. You the readers have become an integral part of the story helping to decide how things will progress, so enjoy the story and please leave a review or rating so this author can continue to improve the story.
New chapters coming soon with edits to existing ones in process

As a side note, I wish I could add a science tag to this. While this is still fiction, I have been incorporating real life scientific theories and explanations for how things could be *plausibly* explained. (No, I will not lecture on these points, but they are added to author notes)
~badw0lf

Title: The Unknown Queen
Synopsis:
"They call me Queen," she declared with an air of nonchalance.
"Who are 'they'?" came the inquisitive response as someone took a step closer to her.
In answer, she fixed them with a blank stare, her eyes darkening noticeably. However, her expression swiftly transformed into a smile, and she retreated back into her room mere seconds later.
The incident left a trail of untold stories and family secrets in its wake. River's mysterious disappearances and reappearances, seemingly without a trace, unearthed the deepest, long-buried secrets. With no recollection of her past beyond a name, not her birth name, but the one "they" called her.
Now that she had returned, "they" wanted their Queen back, regardless of the cost. Even if it meant annihilating her entire race to achieve it, "they" were willing to do whatever it took.

Title: The Path To Extinction
Synopsis: Of the thousands of civilizations the Gods have witnessed create and collapse, this one seemed to be the most interesting one. With the power of magic at their disposal, this civilisation wanting not peace amongst themselves, but war. But as time passed,4 kingdoms were formed and peace was reinstablished. But as the years went by, the closer they got to the apocalypse, as predicted by the prophets, priests and overseers of the kingdoms. however, in the center of the world, there lies a relic, capable of saving one kingdom from the fall of the world. 4 kingdoms set out, armies were formed to find this relic. Other took this time to pray, while some who lost faith, set out to to take advantage of the hard times and begun pillaging. Some will meet, alliances will form, wars will rage, friendships will be built, other destroyed. It is truly, a Path To Instinction.

Title: Commoner's Dungeon
Synopsis:
Erik was a street urchin, and protecting his fellow orphans was his only goal. When he fails he swears he will do better and make nobles like the one reponsible pay. Even if it takes a thousand lifetimes. But what will he do when his next life isn't as a human, but as a dungeon?
 
This is my first time posting anything I've written, so please feel free to give me any tips, comments, or anything else.

Title: Live Life Homunclus
Synopsis:
The end is not always the end. Nothing is permanent, and even death itself is merely a transition.
This fact holds true for a certain young man who died quite tragically on Earth. Lucky for him, a new life was just around the corner. A world filled with magic, adventure, and oh so many dangers awaited. Everything would be perfect, if it wasn't for the fact that he reincarnated into a homunclus. An artificial life-form said to possess almost zero combat capabilities. An exemplary example of pure breed cannon fodder.
Surviving in a world where dragons roam the skies and monsters stalk the lands, wasn't this a bit too unreasonable?

Title: The Shadow Stone
Synopsis:
The Western Kingdoms of the Shattered Empire have been fighting each other for centuries. In Tariinvara war is about to break out against the Kingdom of Cuuln to the west. But another war is brewing in the kingdom, one which will have dire consequences for all kingdoms if it isn't stopped in time. The Shadow Stone, a stone with a demon sealed inside, is about to shatter and it must be destroyed before the demon can get free. The only catch is that there is only one sword in existance that can permanently kill the demon and that sword is hidden far to the west in the mountains that divide the western kingdoms from the Empire of Ingrew.
A force of seven individuals all with their own unique skills go on an adventure through the kingdoms and into the mountains in order to find the sword. Can they complete their mission before the stone shatters?

Title: The Commission
Synopsis:
Elias is one of the best agents in the Commission, a panoptic organization that offers its services to anyone around the world, provided they have enough money. He had always been strict with his clients, making sure they were aware of his code of conduct.
1) No overt discussion with the employer.
2) Make sure the employer stays safe from harm.
3) If the situation arises, protect the employer at all costs, even if it means the agent's life
Fresh off the heels of another successful endeavour, Elias is quickly swept up into another mission, one that would offer far more than he had ever earned before. The only caveat? His client was dead.

Title: Two Brothers
Synopsis:
DOING A FULL REWRITE.
 
Two brothers return home from a long day of work to be transported to a diferent world because of a tear in space and time.
followed by their loyal dog they must hunt and find resources to survive the upcoming winter, fight monsters that try to eat them and other problems along the way, since this world is nothing like Earth.
 
 Disclaimer: English is not my first language.

Title: Weakest hero’s tale: The Legend of the Powerless Hero begins
Synopsis: Not everyone can become a hero, some people don’t have the requirements on being a hero, despite trying their hardest their efforts will also betray them if it didn’t bore fruit and gave them the fame and glory that they seek. A young girl who lived in the country side joined the imperial army in hope on becoming a fine swordswoman, despite her being weak and unskilled with the blade she was given the rank of commander of the army. The people around her despised her for gaining fame without doing nothing, but in reality she didn’t any of these alone, with her brave companions she lead an army of 300 and defeated an army of 300,000 enemy soldiers, she also ended the 300 year long war between the kingdom and the republic, the people surrounding her were her childhood friend, an ancient dragon girl, a wandering samurai from the kobayashi shougunate, and an elf wizard that formally served the guardians. How will their rise begin? This is the story of the girl who became a hero, despite her weaknesses she overcame them and led her people to victory against their enemies.

Title: The Woman
Synopsis: Jack Barron is a district manager for a production company. Due to a horrific tragedy that transpired during his teen years, he is a very gloomy, and distant man. He is walking home from work one day when the past catches up to him and causes him to live a waking nightmare.

Title: A Fool fooling around in another world
Synopsis:
Do you think that a story, where the MC isn't dense as lead, would be fun?
Do you think that a story, where flags are intentionally set, would be interesting?
Do you think that a story, where the MC isn't a wimp, would be a nice change for once?
...No? Oh... that's not the answer I expected.

Title: Different World with Save and Load: A Horror Story
Synopsis:
Being strong and being weak is a form of perspective. Are you really as weak as you think you are? Do you really have the power to level mountains and rend the seas? If people tell you are god then you are god, if people tell you are nothing then you are nothing. But who actually sees the whole picture?
A not-so-good man (evil) managed to get transported to a not-so-real world (game-like) by a not-so-caring god (lazy). The world uses the all-so-famous “stats”, but he has no access to the so-called “system”. At least he managed to get a cheat from the lazy god, even if it took all his potential. What will a greedy villain with the ability to reset his progress do in a world that is more fake then real with a godlike hero, and a non-caring god?

Title: New Game+
Synopsis:
An alien race invaded the Earth on June 6, 2128. At the midst of this war, many nations allied with the alien threat and the war nearly wiped out the rebelling humans of the planet. At the edge of mankind's survival, the United Nations Army launched its forces to eliminate the immediate stellar threats that loomed over Earth.
General Seeker Carlean, commander and leader of the mission, risked and gave his life to destroy the immediate stellar threat. The battle was won though Earth lay in ruins. Perhaps mankind will live to see a a few years of peace before the alien threat returns to wipe out their existence.
At the immediate aftermath of the stellar battle, the fallen Seeker Carlean awakens and finds himself at aged 17, living the peaceful life he lived 16 years before he died.So begins a new game in the battle for humanity's survival.
---
This series is continued on Webnovel. Now over 260+ chapters!

Title: Steam Whistle Alley: An Adventure in Augmented Reality
Synopsis:
I want to thank everyone from the bottom of my heart for their support in this journey. The first book, of which a sample is included here, is available on Kindle in ebook and paperback form on Amazon and is now enrolled in Kindle Unlimited. Much editing and gnashing of teeth has taken place since the first drafts were uploaded here, so I hope you enjoy. I will continue uploading Book 2 as chapters are completed. 
Amazon Links: USA - UK - Germany - France - Spain - Netherlands - ?? - Canada - Australia
 
Most people saw just another lunatic on the street that day, wearing strange goggles and swinging an invisible sword. But Jacob recognized a gamer. After an unexpected job offer from the AR game’s creator, Jacob dons the steampunk goggles and watches as Seattle is transformed. Gone are the skyscrapers, replaced with towering Victorian monuments. Clockwork werewolves and steam-powered rabbits haunt the shadows, waiting to strike. But what started as a game quickly turns lethal. Jacob gets caught up in a turf war over the most valuable sector of the transformed city. Will he capture Steam Whistle Alley, or will he meet a death from which he can’t respawn? Maybe the onlookers were right. Gamer. Lunatic.Same difference.
Visit my website for more information and to join the mailing list.

Title: A World Without a Tomorrow
Synopsis:
In a parallel Earth, blood manipulating creatures exist. Feasting on the flesh and bones of humans who unfortunately turned into their prey, they strike fear into anyone's heart. Their only bane being the so-called borne-hunters who seemed to protect the existence of humanity itself, but the borne-hunters are still limited by politics and funds, opinions and paranoia, fear and intolerance from the world.
Will the humans survive this nightmarish situation? Or will they be consumed and be turned into food instead as a new species reach the apex of food chains and pyramids?

Title: Trying to cure my boredom, I try to find interest in the New World
Synopsis:
Haru whom is currently bored with his life finds nothing to do other than lazing around in his room. This is due to after completing his science degree, his parents kicked him out of the house in hopes of him finding something to do.Despite this, Haru does nothing.
And so looking at the wall in his apartment, he sighs lamenting over his boredom.That is, until the world changed.

Title: The elemental
Synopsis:
Hong jun was an esper his power was weight control but he evolve it to the point that he can control the fabric of space and even make a blackhole easily but then he was hunted because of how strong he was and in the midst of being hunted his ability evolve into time control but before it can be complete he was shot in the heart and then died.
Hong jun then reincarnated into another world  in the body of a 5-yr old child who died because his soul being to weak.

Title: Arcane's Heart
Synopsis:
Sometimes it's not wise to try and rescue princesses from their prison towers. It may as well turn out a girl was put there for a reason and not on a whim of a tyrant.
The crusade against ultimate evil is reaching it's climax. Empire to the west clashed against the ruler of the destroyed land, immortal and immensely powerful, the creature that is said to have claimed the world once and that owns magic itself. Heroic struggle which drained all of empire's strength unexpectedly turned successful, and evil was pushed back to it's dark castle from hence it came. A lone company is hired to kill evil's daughter locked away to the north while the world's attention turned away, but the plan is jeopardized as they intercept a message. The king, the evil incarnate, demands from his daughter's guards to kill her, just like company's employer wanted all along. As humans meddle in the inner workings of the arcane they come to realize that evil's offers are very hard to resist.
(formerly Arcana Progenita)

Title: Endless Possibilities
Synopsis: A world where anything is possibile or is it.

Title: The Throne of the Moon
Synopsis: Eustace is a humble forester whose village sits on the border between the human kingdom of Talden and the Seelie Court of fae, which stand in an uneasy truce while the Seelie war with their aggressive neighbors, the Unseelie Court. He is content with his life, until a prophecy convinces the wicked king of the Unseelie court to kidnap his daughter, Delilah, and his infant son and spirit them to an island far to the east. Armed with only a cold iron axe, a bow, and unyielding determination, he will undertake an oddyssey of staggering proportions to save them. Meanwhile, Delilah finds herself trapped in the capital city of the Unseelie, a place both beautiful and terrifying. Her life and her brother's both hang in the balance. If she cannot find a way to master the violence and intrigue of the Unseelie Court, and to please the king who rules it, then her father will have already failed.

Title: The Status Operator
Synopsis:
Have you ever wondered about the screens like [Level Up] [Class Change] [Charisma] that pop up in games? Stories? 
A god controls these things in a bubble-shaped house in the middle of the ocean. His duty was pretty easy, his job was like a teacher giving oral notes, so he only had to give the hard workers a good status or a good class but he lived for so long that he got bored of giving hard-working people high stats and so he started to give everyone else high stats and one day he met an old man named Luvern that was lying on top of his bubble house.

Title: A New Story
Synopsis:
~~DISCONTINUED ~~
Owen and his absurdly wealthy family move into a renovated castle, and he starts seeing some really weird things. Is there more to his new home than it appears? Or is he just going crazy now...

Title: My Roommate is a Reptile?
Synopsis: Rachael is a human. Kragar is not. Neither are any of the other odd guests Rachael will find herself living with in a world that is very against this sort of thing. They'll make do, I'm sure, but who can say what misadventures will ensue when you're a human living with a crocodile man?

Title: The Only Dungeon
Synopsis: After one of Dungian's creations destroys a powerful human nation the gods destroy all her dungeons and her mother is now in charge of reintroducing them back into the world. Now the Goddess of Dungeons must make do with only one and not everybody is happy about it.

Title: Mystic End
Synopsis: Local adventurer and opportunistic vagabond, Riverton, is jailed in the town of Red Hollow after a successful raid on Beleg's tomb, the remnant left behind by a dragon priest of an ancient past.  Incarcerated due to the schemes of a deceptive vixen, Riverton wallows in misery and self-pity within the confines of the cell each day until suddenly, in the dead of night, the traitorous witch visits him again. He knows not why she came to him, but knows only that he won't be fooled twice.

Title: Paladin's Sky
Synopsis: This is the first book within a fantasy series containing a Paladin and his adventures to unlock the prophecies of the one true God.  Selig Ulfson is a Paladin, a member of a militant order of holy knights who chances upon a mysterious foundling named Sky. Together they travel the continent of Accipiter to evade the forces of the Dominus di Obscurum to unravel the prophecy of Gainor.

Title: Dueling Spirits [DROPPED]
Synopsis: In a world where a trading card game has taken the world by storm, some people take it way too seriously even though it is an activity that is encouraged and not required.

Title: Insectasaur
Synopsis:
"I lived 64 years, served two wars, went to God damn church every Sunday since I could suck out my momma's milk for this?!?!?! I haven't been the best Grandpa, and maybe I could've groped a few less tits and ass in my day, and maybe, just maybe I could've stayed loyal to at least one of my wives. But I don't think nothing I've done could amount to being turned into this fucking shit!" 
This is a story of how a man reincarnated into a worm and thrived in this new world of magic, demons and extremely busty lolis.

Title: Legends of Tarthirious: Book Five of Kylia's Story
Synopsis: This book is now published on Amazon for $0.99 and is available on KU.

Title: The Hunter
Synopsis:
Our protagonist, having escaped from a battle of life and death, landed in a foreign world. Will he make a difference in this new world or will he ignore it like his previous home?
Follow his journey as he welcomes companions to accompany his long life and influences the fate of the world!
Watch him as he tramples on enemies and obstacles that stand in the way of his new family!
 
Follow the journey of a God that had once given up on life. Living quietly in a mortal realm and discovering new bonds of friendship and family. Watch him as he treads upon the corpses of those who obstruct him and faces forward to new experiences.

Title: The Five Secrets
Synopsis: Heres is a world that has potentially always been on the brink of destruction due to the unique nature of its divine constructs and magicks.

Title: DarkVoid: The God of Death
Synopsis: In the depths of hell was a man who was tortured for his sins. After fighting a demon, he was "saved" by a mad scientist, who experimented on his unconscious body and gave him incredible power. Now with the power of Exidus at his disposal, he will exact his vengeance on the deity that wronged him and regain back his sanity.

Synopsis:
i do not own the rights to the cover image

Title: Radioactive Evolution
Synopsis:
How far would you go to change humanity's fate?
Jared Cartwright has spent the last two years delving into the twisted, scarred wastelands of an earth ravaged by nuclear war. The rich and powerful have taken to the oceans and skies on floating utopias, escaping destruction and leaving the rest of humanity to fend off the mutated creatures that roam the earth.To face his new reality, Jared must become an apex predator if he hopes to survive. He must unlock his true potential to confront those that left mankind to die. With deadly adversaries above and below, Jared must evolve beyond mere human limitations to defeat the powerful rulers of the cities and the rabid beasts lurking in the shadows.Jared's quest takes a new turn when he discovers dragons are real.

Title: A Life of Terror.
Synopsis:

Retrieval of corpse: Successful.

Spirit: Sealed, awaiting transfer to council chamber.
