Title: Myriad of Possibilities
Synopsis:
Jonas is a normal man, one day he goes out to work, and finds himself in a difficult position, he sees a man getting killed, but not with a gun or a knife, with magic !
 
'Well, i will write this fic as you give me tips of what way i should go to, so if you don't give me tips, i will cry'

Title: Bomb
Synopsis:
An officer paces around a dim lit room stressed, as time ticks away. The scoffs of a man echo inside his head.
will the location be revealed or will it be too late?

Title: The Demonic World
Synopsis:
It all started as a crusade against the demons, the humans thought they could easily beat the demons but they were wrong. So they asked for help from other races and they accepted it and now they thought they would beat the demons but they were wrong again, now every race was stuck in the last city, their last stronghold against the demons. Everyone inside turned to Archpriestess Sevillia and she was the leader, they waited for her orders to attack but the orders never came, she put up a barrier around a church to save herself, she betrayed everyone.
Everyone thought the demon rule was going to be awful but they were wrong again, the demon rule brought prosperity, peace, and order. One day a demon child's ball somehow got inside the barrier, there the demon child met Sevillia, they had a deal, Sevillia was going to switch their eyes and she was going to give the demon child power.
And the demon child grew up to be the demon king, his bloodline continued this deal, After many centuries, an arrogant spoiled brat became the crown prince, he had a terrible personality, he saw humans as disgusting creatures and when Sevillia arrived to make a deal, not only he rejected the deal he insulted and attack Sevillia, she was too strong. 
Sevillia spared his life but he found himself in another time with stupid stats.

Title: The Bloody Flower
Synopsis:
Give me your opinion.
Once, a great man said that God made everyone in His image, but that does not mean that we are all the same. Everyone is the same at birth, but then you are wondering why there are differences in jobs and status partners? 
These differences are created in the scriptures, which have passed into society, but the situation is more complicated than that. People are capable of thinking and those who want to rise in social status are pushed from their ladders and knocked down to the very confines of hell itself that was created by these same people who are defeated. 
In other words, the word equality is full of false lies and ideals. I was trying to find an answer to this problem, but will be forever facing dilemmas and dead ends.We live in a world where possibilities are reduced to little more than crumbs and we just have to live with it. 
Of course we have exceptions, otherwise we would not evolve as a species, so we are always learning from the mistakes of those who passed before us.

Title: The Nightwatch Chronicles
Synopsis:
Long ago, all of the races and creatures of the worlds lived together in unity. Elves, Giants, Humans, Dragons, Sprites and so on all cooperated and helped one another build up their societies under their respective Gods which had brought them into existence. Forever back, this existence stretched, until one day, the race known as Human began to hide away from the others, having discovered the idea of Technology.
This Technology, when fed with thought and insatiable resources, made their lives easier and easier. Only, had they dedicated themselves to Magic, their lives too would have been made easier. But this difference in their ways made them feel more powerful and important. So they continued to develop their Technology until the demand was so great that they took from others and claimed land that was the home and nourishment of other races.
They dammed up the rivers and cut the forests and mined out the hills and mountains until eventually, it seemed that the Humans would consume all of the land and there would be nothing else but Humans left. Before a conflict could erupt, as it would have and left untold deaths on either side, the Gods intervened.
They split the world in 9 smaller worlds, each of them to be given to a particular group of races. Midgard, however, was given only to the Humans for it was a prison. They could stay there and do whatever they pleased, be it Technology or Magic, only they would slowly forget all they knew of the World Whole and the creatures and races they had once called friend.
And so it passed the the Humans were cast out and bound in Midgard as a dangerous animal is into a cage. As predicted, they forgot the truth and labeled their memories as fairy tales and myths. Sad but relieved, the other races replenished and undid the damage caused by the Human arrogance and greed, their existence all but forgotten by the very realms.
In this way, another long time of peace fell over the realms - other than Midgard, where Humans endlessly found new means and reasons to kill and hound each other and the very land itself. It seemed that they would burn out and Midgard would join Niflheim as a world of emptiness and death. Only, before the races could see that come about, they had a new problem to contend with.

Title: Fallen
Synopsis:
After her husband's betrayal, a wife must take her children and two remaining friends, to a land far away from her beloved. 
 
(This is a one-shot random story, that I decided to do. It is complete.)

Title: Lost in the Wind
Synopsis:
Who are you?  What is your mission?  Why are you here?  Where do you stand?
These are but a few of the questions that you'll try desperately to answer as you wade knee deep in the blood of both friend and foe, knowing that your past is slowly drifting away, helpless, soon to be lost in the billowing winds.

Title: Blood Drive
Synopsis:
Updates every Tuesday and Saturday on Tanverse. 
Nathan Westwood is a vampire hunter - one of the only two he knows. Alongside his mentor, a mysterious sorceress named Athena, he has pledged to fight against the colossal vampire organization known as the Family - a group that seeks to rule the world from the shadows. With only a few spells and a gun or two, the duo travel the world, working their way up the ladder to the leader of the Family himself. It's a fight that few know about, and even fewer care. But it's the only fight they have.

Title: Town of Geldwin
Synopsis: Adrain Hawke is a guard within Geldwin; a town neglected by an expanding kingdom, forcing them to fend for themselves. No trade routes run through it. The adventurers guild is long abandoned. Nothing of note exists, and gradually visitors vanished entirely, leaving the town isolated from all but a few. Then the undead lay siege.>The Siege of Antioch, from a 15th-century miniature painting

Title: Talus au bout de sa vie
Synopsis:
C'est vraiment court (un chapitre), écrit en cours et une fanfic que j'ai faite sur le jeu Paladins, où j'ai imaginé Talus, le personnage toujours souriant et rieur, être quelqu'un de triste...
Après ça se finit plutôt mal, mais je ne vais pas vous spoiler plus, bonne lecture :D

Title: The Eternal Vanguard
Synopsis:
Short Synopsis: An ancient vampire with immense power awakens to find a world rendered alien to him by the relentless march of time. As he struggles to find a place in this world, his decisions may alter the fate of not only the vampires but the whole world.
Long Synopsis: Under construction
 
What to expect - A vampire story in high/dark fantasy world.
 
 
 
The cover art does not belong to me. I will take it down the request of its original author.

Title: Legend of Yzer
Synopsis:
Yzer, a adolescent human, is a a full contact mage. That means that in contrary to "normal" mages he can fight on the front line. he uses magic to transform his body to fight evil powers that grow stronger each day. Knights, warriors and mages consider this type of magic taboo. Actually all other types other than healing magic is taboo and therefore forbidden, with the exception of creating magic items. Which is only done by archmages under the supervision of the king himself. They who even consider using this type of magic should prepare to face the consequeces.
This wasn't always the case, after the last great demonwar. When the Archdemon was defeated and his army of magic using demons was slain. The king suddenly started to promote "Anti- demon magic" propoganda. "Demon magic" users were arrested without good reason. Unless they let their magic be sealed they were held captive or worse.
Yzer his master Doman, A great "demon" magic user, noticed things going sideways before the magic users were hunted down. He retired from the royal army to live a secluded life in the forest of Fargo with his young apprentice Yzer. There they continued practising their art, hopefull that one day the king would see the error in his ways. That "demon" magic isn't evil, weak or dark. But that magic in all forms can be used to fight the forces of evil
But everything changed when one day the prince and his men find them. Master Doman is arrested for treason. Yzer who was hidden embarks on a epic journey, meeting new friends, fight enemies, save his master and try to convince people that magic isn't evil.
This is the story of Yzer and how he became a legend.

Title: Who Said Death Was Easy? [Death Note Fanfiction]
Synopsis:
Keiko Kagami: high schooler, wanna-be investigator, and classmate of Light Yagami. What happens when she gets tangled with Light Yagami and the Kira investigation?
OCX? to be determined. Keep in mind that things are not always what they seem.

Title: Children of the Forest
Synopsis: Back in a time when the Earth was at its youth there dwelled many magical things on this land and in the depths of our waters. This story is a love story between the next Queen in line to the Elven throne and a commoner elven man who is withdrawn from the rest of the elven kingdom. An unlikely enchantment that will ensnare you to stay in this mysterious and truly magical world.

Title: The Aspiring Scholar
Synopsis:
A man tormented by his past. helps the kids of his city to lessens his own pain.
P.s i suck a writing don't expect much.

Title: Level Up
Synopsis:
Virtual is Reality.
What would the world be like if video game rules suddenly applied?
Marcus is about to find out. After a freak accident he finds himself stuck between a game and the real world. He’ll need to fight his way through football hooligans, carnies and the dreaded RNG to get to the final boss and save the world. Anything less means it’s game over for good.
Along the way he’ll learn new skills, chase epic loot and most importantly of all, Level Up!
If you love LitRPG you’ll be sure to enjoy this humourous take on the genre.

Title: Greenblood
Synopsis: Drake Castro is your ordinary 21-year-old gamer, except that he's won the lottery... twice. After getting early access for him and his friends to the new VR game, GreenTree Online, he joins the game ready to kill some monsters and become a legend. However, when Drake and his friends uncover a sinister questline, they learn that the game is far darker than the cheery environment and cute monsters might make it out to be. Now Drake is embroiled in a plot far over his head, and he has to make a dangerous choice. When the stakes are high, which is more important; morality or freedom?

Title: Crumbling Foundation
Synopsis:
Glim has finally run out of luck. Caught unprepared and with darkness encroaching at every angle, he's on the verge of becoming a dead safeguard, a protector leaving nothing behind but dead bodies and the savage brutes who tore them apart.
Hunted in a bleak world where every shifting shadow could be an enemy, Glim will have to use every ounce of his training and knowledge if he wants to make it home alive.

Title: Demon's Life In Another World
Synopsis: In the vast continent of Egros, a huge variety of races existed. Through the years Kingdoms and Empires appeared one after another and waged endless wars. Each century, special types of demons are summoned in an altar and are given preferential treatment in a certain society because of their above average power and innate skills. Being summoned in this world as one of these demons after passing away from his previous life, Chris could not help but praise his luck. Though everything seemed to be going his way, does it really?

Title: The Secrets Of Finnley
Synopsis:
"Everyone has three lives; A public life, a private life and a secret life"
As a straight A student, Finnley never got himself into trouble. He goes to school, runs track, hangs out with his two best friends Cristian and Emma and studies; a lot. That is until Cristian decides it's time for Finnley to go out and party for once. They end up in a club and while Cristian is focused on the girl of his dreams, Finnley disappears into the crowd.
By the time the night ends, Cristian has been arrested for getting into a fight and caught for underage drinking. The next morning, after getting out, he finds out Finnley never came home.
As Cristian starts his search for Finnley, he finds out Finnley kept a lot hidden from him and he starts wondering; did he know Finnley as well as he thought he did? And exactly how important was Finnley to him?
 
WARNING: This story involves LGBT content. If you're not okay with this, please leave!

Title: How To Kill Boredom (And The Gods)
Synopsis:
Meet Galdir, master of none. Jack of.. also none.
He is not exactly strong. Due to his origin though, he is at least far stronger than humans.
Galdir has a problem. He is utterly fucking bored. So he thinks to himself: "Let's break into the heavens. Yeah, that should be fun."
Not the best idea, as it turns out. But at least boredom is banished from his life now. So much so, that he sometimes even longs for a boring day. Hell, a boring hour would be fine, too.

Title: Broken Eulogy
Synopsis:
A well of endless riches was discovered on the land of a small kingdom called the Jager Kingdom. It was Named the Eternal Dungeon after the untold number of lives it has claimed, and acted as the spark for a great war between two long fueding superpowers. Along with the war rose the seeker proffesion, glorified mercenaries, who risk life and limb for a chance at the riches contained within the twisting labyrinth. The area surrounding the cave system quickly turned into a No-Man's Land, and long existing powers of the Jager Kingdom have begun to train new seekers in a bid for power to reclaim their old land. One such seeker and his friends are on their way to what they believe to be their dreams, but the longer you dream to more twisted they become, and the harder they prove to escape.
------
I don't really know where this is going to go if anywhere, so it is hard to put labels on it. Consider this a warning of no holds barred.

Title: Rising
Synopsis:
"I quit!"
After 8 years sitting at the throne as one of the leaders from a major organization, Luca was already tired of all that responsibility.
But after quitting what comes next?
Businessman? Too much trouble.
Salaryman? As if I would be bossed around.
Student? We share the same interest for alcohol and women ... but I don't want to go to school.
Be a bum? I would prefer be called second gen rich but that suits me fine.
Let me live a leisure life filled with games, party and women then.
 
*DISCLAIMER*
This work is pure fiction and any place, people and organizations in it are fictional and have no relation with possible namesakes.
The world in the novel is based on our world therefore some similarities are to be expected but they have no relations with any recent events.

Title: Finding Home
Synopsis:
A young boy, once beaten and forgotten, finds himself in another place. He wakes up and feels no danger in this strange place, a vast contrast to where he once was. Many surprises, changes and challenges await this young one as he tries to find himself a home and the reason why he came here in this new world. Let us watch as he learns and grows in a land where danger may be, but still safe for those that truely need it.
--------
AN: Please note that it might take me awhile to actually make this tale. I'll do my best to pursue through till the end. Enjoy when you read, but don't expect a ton.

Title: The diary of a monster hunter
Synopsis:
In an alternative medieval world , humans considered the weakest race cowers in fear as monsters and demons roam the lands. Follow Jacque as he uses his wits and human ingenuity to make a living in this harsh world.
(A Witcher franchise inspired story)

Title: The Founding of the Bloody Promise
Synopsis:
This is a tale of Salt,Iron,and Blood a story of how a man went from the bottom of the latter to the top. The tale around the legend of a ship all feared on all the seas the Bloody Promise.This is the story of it's founding and it's deranged Captain Jack
 
This is my first time writing pls be gentle.. or atleast give me a reason for any negative reviews 
( See also don't expect to much true to life stuff ok 17th century technology is not my specialty)

Title: Lockzaga: Path of The Bull
Synopsis: Ben afflick along with the rest of humanity was mercilessly virtualized in accordance to Galactic Code 40.762473.9738 NW. Follow him on an epic tale filled with forced plot progression, shallow 2d characters, and not a little bit of plot armor.

Title: Steel Angel and Fairy
Synopsis:
When you know nothing, isn't it hard? 
When you know nothing, isn't it fun?
This is a story where an robot angel and a fairy become friends. 
And go on adventures together
And make more friends

Title: Rise of The God Emperor
Synopsis:
It is the 52nd Millennium and the Empire lays shattered.The various theatres of war have all suffered grievous losses and Terra has been forced to recall its forces back to Holy Terra, abandoning those that rely on them. The forces of Chaos lay waste to thousands of worlds who have no hope of reinforcement and as such, barely cling to life.The Golden Throne is failing, and the light of humanity seems doomed to be lost as Abaddon the Despoiler leads his vast host on a Black Crusade towards the very heart of the Imperium, Holy Terra, yet even in these darkest of times, there is hope. Roboute Guilliman, the Primarch of the Ultramarines and the leader of the Realm of Ultramar has returned from his seemingly deathlike state to take control just in time to consolidate what remains of the Empire and prevent its complete collapse. Not only him, but his missing brothers have made their way back to his side, in order to resist this thrust of chaos towards the very heart of the Imperium.On the eve of battle, something ancient awakens upon mars. With a heart containing vengeance and eyes containing cruelty, it vents its anger upon those around it.With the Empire barely clinging to life, it seems to only be a matter of time before all is lost, yet often is progress found in stagnation, strength found in strife.It may seem that there is an age of darkness upon us, but it may yet prove to be an age of miracles.......
 
-----------------------------------------------------
So, this is for all of the Warhammer fans out there. This is a fan fiction, not an actual novel, meaning that it contains my own views and explanations for things that aren't completely explained. As this story takes place through the eyes of the Emperor, I'll attempt to give him a personality fitting of Humanity's supreme overlord, while at the same time remembering that he is human, and not a god.

Title: Petal Fall: Eternal Border Of Life
Synopsis: An Otaku and a jack of all trades jobsman name Jake Smith, was rebirth after his death into the martial world as a girl name Yinghua, even in difficulties in acceptance in her fate, Yinhua strive to live by her past knowledge, cunning observation and clever thinking, as she become an enigma genius, that become a dazzling comet, reaching the stars and heavens, and stood  at pinnacle of cultivation of power.  She travels and gain the vast knowledge in becoming a supreme expert and a guardian of the Great Dragon Dao Library, but sooner she and her allies  confront the greatest enemy known as the Great Conqueror and his supreme army to stop the Eternal Border of Life that gives him to control life, realms, time and space, and to prevent the Great Conqueror to annihilate all the living beings, but the cost is great to bear for her after she kills the Great Conqueror, and destroy the binding chains of Eternal Border of Life that results to sacrificing her cultivation level and life, just to prevent the destruction of space and time.  After the strange phenomena that succumbs her entirety, she lost her consciousness  and later regain her sense, she then found out that she is floating in the sky and using  her divine perception, she then discover that she is in another world, remain calm and clear, she will find out about this new world and new adventures begins.

Title: R.A.D.E.
Synopsis:
As corporations grew and government debts skyrocketed, the balance of power shifted.
Giant conglomerates formed from merged megacorporations came to own most property on Earth, as well as control of utilities and politics.  For decades, the corporations pretended to follow the rules of the countries they were based in, but slowly the charade came to an end.
In a series of business deals, the vast majority of countries ceded their territories to these conglomerates leaving only a few nations remaining, though none of them remain unscathed.
In North America, The United States has been reduced down to the size of its original thirteen states.  Poverty and crime are running rampant throughout the remaining territory as the government struggles to keep control.  To the west, The Midwest Reclamation Corporation uses its PMC and Corporate Espionage divisions to sabotage and destroy the remaining power of the government.  In this new age of warfare, a new force is needed to defend freedom.
And so R.A.D.E. was formed, Recon Assault Demolition and Espionage.  An elite force of soldiers dedicated to preserving the freedom and dignity of the remaining territory.

Title: The Virtual Assassin
Synopsis:
Deep in the slums of Kore City, a young assassin wanders around doing jobs. The world was obsessed with virtual reality, which made the job easy for the young assassin. But he questions his own life once he meets a certain someone on the job.
 
A short story for now. I might write more if there's interest in it.

Title: Mystic Ink
Synopsis:
Life is hard for an orphan on the streets of Tyine, Capitol of the "Glorious Empire" of Haj, thirteen year old Cass knows this well and has managed to survive ever since her parents abadoned her five years ago.  She thought her life was as terrible as it could be, but now that she has been grabbed off the street and thrown into a dark cell with many other street children, Cass worries that life may get even worse.
Join Cass on her journey through blood and magic as she learns the power in the ink tattooed into her back and the horror of the worst kinds of people.
(please take the content warnings seriously, this wont be a happy one folks)

Title: The Best Man In Another World
Synopsis:
A man named "Kolsten" grew up in a poor family with no father, a sick mother, and siblings, when he grew up he started to do part-time jobs and as he got old he became a CEO of a company that he used to work for, he was already a kind, gentle and a great man but when he got money on his hands he didn't spend it on useless things such as cars, paintings. He simply used the money he gained for charity and again as he got old he became one of the richest men and now he was the biggest donator for charity in the whole world but he was on his deathbed, counting his last days but a tragedy was about to struck, an edited phone call made him look like a psychopath and everyone believed it, he died alone and hated but then God offered him a deal. 
It was a simple deal he had to go to another world and he was going to gain another wish right from God and he used that wish to remove his bad emotions such as anger, jealousy but there were some emotions that worked in both ways such as guilt and he asked the god to heavily lower them but this was his greatest mistake because "Love" was one of those emotions.

Title: Still can't say, 'I Love You'. (oneshot)
Synopsis: The feeling of loving someone is definitely precious...but to be unable to express it 'normally' can be hell!!

Title: The Life of Emily, Let's Conquer Earth
Synopsis: Sometimes, all humans need is a little push and some fine tuning.

Title: Amalgamation of the Marksman
Synopsis: Kelly Skutter is a soldier that specializes in long ranged combat. When she and a group of Elven researchers explored an Emperor tomb, traps and Ancient beasts isolated from the world emerge. Follow Kelly as she seeks to improve her body, skills, and weapons.

Title: Eternal Midnight
Synopsis: Willard Waters is a very distant and gloomy young man who runs a podcast based on urban legends told across the internet. One day he hears of two rumors circulating around his own home town. One about a mysterious man who haunts the streets kidnapping women, whisking them away to never be seen again. The other about a mysterious ghost of a woman haunting his local park. Intrigued by these rumors Willard decides to pay the park a visit around the time the woman is said to appear. The events throw him into a world of unimaginable horrors leading to his own death. Of course for Willard his story doesn't end there, the terrors death has in store for him outweigh any nightmare he's ever experinced in life.

Title: Funkocalypse
Synopsis:
Funkocalypse is the futuristic apocalypse the Earth was destined for. 
Mutants roam the land so humans take to the sky where the few live lavishly while the many live in squalor.
Still... I guess someone has to protect what's left.

Title: Dead & Gone This Project Is
Synopsis: R.I.P

Title: The adventures of a disowned duke's daughter
Synopsis:
Well, what I have to say?
Things can go worst?......yes
But still, this is very strange, I was only playing an otome game and go to sleep.
The next time I woke up, I changed.
Handsome noble?, charming prince?, a butler serving someone?, even a no face character would be great, or better, a simple commoner living his life working his field.
But no, I am one of these characters that was part of the story, I am the villainess and love rival of the heroin, the person who blocks the way for the heroin and the prince, but not in thi-.................
Hey!, the person who write this line forgot that I am a guy!
I will not live as a noble and have a family with another man!
Who cares that all other famous novels do it!?
No, no, nonononononon.
Goodbye, I am out, have a good life, but I am not going to do that, I will go with the story and live my life as a disowned daughter and will do my things in this world of magic, I will close the door.
“THUD!”

Title: Dream of the Abyss
Synopsis:
Elisa Mary Grant died in a hospital bed after being stuck in it for six months, and like any other, her soul drifted away from her husk when she passed.
For her, death was a release. It merely meant that she no longer have to wake up in pain, breathing through tubes and have doctors flood her veins with dubious chemicals for “experimental treatment”. Free from her mortal constraints and useless body, she felt… at peace, serene, even.
Death is bliss, after all, when objectively living sucked to the point of extreme. Therefore, there was no reason to mourn at all and she knew she definitely didn't.
...
That was until, on her way for a proper reincarnation, she found herself rudely interrupted and left stranded in the great NoWhere.
“Wonderful,” she remarked as she floated in the [Beyond], “Just when I thought that suicide is the answer.”

Author's note: 
Updates every Tuesday-Wednesday, probably some time in between.
...
P.S Notes: Contains existential questions and nihilistic themes, rather philosophical. Will be rather sluggish until the MC gets her shit together.
P.SS Notes: Story takes time to develop. And maybe uncomfortable. It's not gonna be action-packed or filled with battles, I think. Anyway, it is kinda unusual.
P. SSS Notes: It is not LitRpg. Don't be fooled.

Title: discontinued
Synopsis:
Edit: I will no longer be updating this story. 
Verlasen was at peace. The races were no longer at war and monsters of legends laid in slumber. Yet peace was fickle. It was longlasting for the world as a whole, but ephemeral for the individuals within said world. Our story looks into those whose misfortune has piled together to send a ripple through the Verlasen. A dog catching a break. A spirit ever fleeting. A street rat within a church. A flower in glass. A lizard lost. And a bug flying towards the flame.

Title: Life of The Game
Synopsis: You don't have talent in reality? You don't have money in reality? You were born with a weak background? Don't fret, you can have anything you can think of here with enough work and a little bit of luck.

Title: The Infinity Dungeon
Synopsis:
Thinking that the life he spent is stifled, Seira, a twenty-year-old young man, decided to make a wish to nothing in particular as he went to do the same routine he had for so many years.
Little does he know that his wish will be something that will change his life.

Note: I hope you like it, and please do tell me if there are any mistakes in grammar and whatnot, I'll fix it when I have the time.
I am not certain of how regularly I can release new chapters for this, but I'll try my best.

Title: The Witches' Rebellion
Synopsis:
In the year 2000, a mysterious phenomenon known as the 'White Fog' occurred which covered the entire planet for a week. Soon after, females on Earth start to exhibit magic abilities and some even able to transform into magical girls. However, not all of them are capable of magic. This led to a shift in power towards the magical girls. Males and the powerless are left to bend to the rule of the magical girls. There are also those with magic who oppose the new rule.
The story follows four main protagonists who fight the magical girls for their own reasons. Tsukiyo, a former magical girl enforcer who defected after losing someone close to her, Erika, a magic-user member of the organization Helios who give aid to people seeking protection from the magical girls, Aoi, a powerless freedom fighter who fights against the regime with her comrades and Takako, a powerful magic-user who calls herself a witch and the one who gifted the three girls their powerful magical artifacts to help in their fight.
The story takes place in a fictional Japan city named Meteo City.

Title: Reincarnated Dungeon
Synopsis:
He was once an immortal, a god to humans. Yet the true gods always play their own games and when they lost there was a steep price to pay. The immortals were slain but hope will still remain. Backed into a corner the hero's forfeited their lives for one final attack to even the score. Quality over quantity had always been their motto but when their eyes could not see the end of the enemys ranks it was only a matter of time until they fell. Expecting to join his fellows soon after he unleashed a final spell at the cost of his soul, yet the gods were not done with him. Now a mere side hero with a forbidden power has become the hero. Will this jouney end on a similar note, or will his own fate be chosen?
 
....
So this is kinds my releif story that i'm writing in conjunction with my Hybrid Summoner story set in the same world but from a different set of viewpoints. Not sure how this is gonna pan out but this is mostly just to help me as i brainstorm ideas. I'll take a poll after chapter ten to see if you guys like it so far then i might make it into a dedicated story. Until then just read and enjoy.

Title: A God's Pub
Synopsis:
A god's pub is place of mystery, full of wonder and adventure.
Those who wander inside shall find another world, both familiar and unknown.
Enter through the door and find out, just what awaits you on the other side.
 
Gods, spirits and demons live together in the one city that houses them all. A city with as many names as there are beings inhibiting it- the city of a billion names!
Located inside this extraordinary city which few mortals ever sat a step into is a certain pub in a certain city with a certain god serving as both it's owner and bartender. What happens if this god decideds to keep a young woman that mistakenly entered his pub?
 
The cover image is not owned by me, the artist is:

If the artist want's me to take it down I will immediately do so. Sadly I could not contact her to ask for permission. If anyone can do so in my stead I would really appreciate it!

Title: Ultimate system
Synopsis: this is a story full of adventure and a hack like system with a boy which becomes his life long partner and how the rule entire universe.when he is demeed trash by the world

Title: Terrane: Online
Synopsis:
Follow a girl on the cusp of adulthood as she experiences her first VR MMORPG game.  As she explores the world, meets new people, and discovers her own playstyle, she may find she likes fantasy, more than reality.
(Not an op mc, if you're looking for that, this story is not it.  Though if you do decide to give it a read, you may hopefully find something you like)

Title: Mauder
Synopsis: Reality shattered in 2020 with the first Mauder gate, or multi access universal dimensional etherium reality gate.  It's opening heralded unlimited energy for our world and more were created to provide the needs of everyone.  The world celebrated as the seventh and final in the network was about to be opened.  Or world was never the same.

Title: Cennet's Cyborg
Synopsis:
Jared Ugo, a child genius under the nickname ‘Ban’ is caught between his own haunting past and a bleak future. Whilst he dealt with the pain of guilt and suicidal thoughts over the years, a storm was quietly brewing. That is, until the person closest to him passed away in an accident.
His mind plunges, but alas, this creates an opportunity for him to close the distance between him and his mother, a chance to seize the motherly love he’s yearned for the first time in his life.
But that hope would be trampled over as he finally meets the ghost of a man forged from his own sin. He struggles to stay sane as the revenge-driven father seeks to mentally break him down. Jared fights the demon he created, David Cennet, and amidst the hardships, still tries to keep his sense of morals intact despite his growing inclination to disregard them.

PS: I've yet to properly proofread this one (when do I ever?) but I figured I'd upload it and maybe get some feedback in the mean time as I'm more focused on other stories and excessive drinking. Enjoy!I've begun writing the sequel!Check out my edgelord novel!

Title: D Days
Synopsis:
Dragons were the apex predators of the magical world, feared for their strength and intelligence. They stood at the pinnacle of creation, until mankind fueled by fear and envy banded together and struck them down as the greatest threat to the continued existence of their kingdoms. Peace reigned for many years across the continent, until an accident in the Magocracy of Ken turned one of the most powerful mage lords into a power mad lich. Raising an undead army and creating a cult that worshipped him like a god, he cut a bloody swath across the continent in a bid to create his own domain.
A great alliance consisting of the Kingdom of Light, the Magocracy of Ken, the Forest Kingdom of the Elves, the Mountain Kingdom of the Dwarves, and the Wild Tribes of the West rose up and the high lich was defeated, his armies destroyed, and his cult scattered. Still recovering, the world is a constant state of petty power struggles and back biting between nations. Border disputes are common and the constant fighting has taken a toll on the populations of all the nations.
Of course, none of this has much bearing on the everyday life of a an ordinary young orphan in the care of a Temple run home. Or does it?
*Current Word Count as of 8/4/18: 59,415
I am shooting for at least one update a week. Also, if you see any mistakes let me know and I will fix them. Cover by!*

Title: The Transformation God
Synopsis:
The MC has been ran over crossing over into another world but before he crossed over he receives a message saying
“You have gained Primordial souls with Devouring Trait.”
And now he has to survive in a cultivation world and a overprotective grandpa?
 
 
I got the story idea from reading devouring stories while the transformation i got it from a comment made by Kuruto_desu
I also don't own the cover and if you have better one send me PM and i change it

Synopsis: hgjmntgyjtygfhdhrt hvwiurefgiu4 xddfghj hrfgweiufgiewqtrf87cnrfg uyghuiegrhwadfubwehuifgbjfk  fehur boiuewbcoiuwgf vyrgbviuy uiryv buiyrbvu yuibcuirybc uiwreyhv uybfuiwynfuiewr yvuiywebrfui4wynfuiweryuc iruiybcf

Title: The Journey To Aeruth
Synopsis: In Aeruth, nobody is safe. Demons and Goblins rule the night and venturing to the large town is a death sentence for everyday humans like 15-year-old Keel, who wishes to save his sick brother by obtaining an antidote hidden in the town. One could say Keel is the most determined human in the entire realm of Anisphere. The only problem is, he isn't aware of just how challenging his journey will be.

Title: ScaleBound
Synopsis: This world has too many tragedies and so few saviors. This is the tale of a human who was given the role of a savior, even if he didn't wish for it.

Title: Toya and Rin and The other Dimensions
Synopsis: Rin and Toya was Summoned by Dimension God Mari Toya is the Dimension Wielder Rin and Toya are 18 They are not brothers and sisters but ChildHood Friends

Title: Road to Glory / For My Honor
Synopsis:
William Sanjaya is an ex-private  military who harbors a dark secret within himself. Resolved to die, he got transported to another world to fight a war of the gods. Can he survive?
 
 
 
 
*Cover is temporary

Title: Captive God
Synopsis:
Without any knowledge of his birth origins, Yan Wei is raised by the owner of a pill shop in the smog-skied Silent Rain City, ruled by a family of tyrannical, heartless monsters that will do anything to keep their people obedient, including keeping them weak and impoverished.
Life was simple and completely under his control until he discovered one anomaly after another about himself, forcing him to end his quiet life in order to keep both his secrets and his life.

Title: Stuck in a Game World with an OP Shop
Synopsis:
Dude wakes up in the forest and has the ability to access an OP shop with his mind.

The long-awaited, heavily-anticipated rewrite of Stuck in a game world with an OP shop! Better grammar, fewer memes, and logical shop mechanics!

Title: Shatter Sphere
Synopsis:
A near death experience changes Matt's life forever when he discovers he has the ability to shatter objects with the emotions it brought on. However, in the city of Tandayum, these ‘Breakers’ belong to the Terriam organization, a military company that controls the breeding program with the goal of enhancing their strength for political dominance. 
Witnessing first-hand how the company corrupts the lives of his friends and parents, Matt resolves to use his ability to work for Terriam, but as a double agent for The Underground, a liberation group where many Breakers have fled. His loyalty to their cause wavers when his relationship with a girl linked to the company becomes a game of cat and mouse.
Can Matt keep his double-cross a secret from her and fight the Terriam Organization at the same time?

Title: Host, At Least Let the Villains Act First!!
Synopsis:
Shu Huaping was a high school graduate from a prominent family that only saw her as a tool to obtain more power. She dies and transmigrates to a lost time in the past.
Shu Huaping: Xiao Meng, what kind of novel is this? the original body was really hiding her cultivation, and she had already surpassed even her father? Isn't she too OP.
Xiao Meng: Host, I don't think that the problem is here. Could you stop beating the Villains so often and so bad, even I began to feel bad for them.
Shu Huaping: Xiao Meng, how is it that the soul of a mercenary queen gets destroyed when she fought with the original body's owner and disappear only leaving her knowledge and skills?
Xiao Meng: Host, I don't think that the problem is here. Didn't you say that wanted to laze around and do nothing in your next life? How did you become a mercenary queen yourself?
Shu Huaping: Xiao Meng, why is it that that Dragon Lord or whatever is so persistent? He always follows me around all day long.
Xiao Meng: Host, I don't think that the problem is here! Could you stop attracting bees? A certain Devil King began a massacre again because he drank too much vinegar!!
A certain Devil Lord: Wifey, why so bored? If you are so bored, why we don't go and roll in bed?
Xiao Meng: o(???)o
Shu Huanping: ¯\_(?)_/¯

Title: The Oldest One
Synopsis:
This is about the oldest vampire coming out of a powerful seal where he visits multi-dimensions and meets people from t.v. shows
Example, originals, supernatural, ect.

Title: The Commission
Synopsis:
Elias is one of the best agents in the Commission, a panoptic organization that offers its services to anyone around the world, provided they have enough money. He had always been strict with his clients, making sure they were aware of his code of conduct.
1) No overt discussion with the employer.
2) Make sure the employer stays safe from harm.
3) If the situation arises, protect the employer at all costs, even if it means the agent's life
Fresh off the heels of another successful endeavour, Elias is quickly swept up into another mission, one that would offer far more than he had ever earned before. The only caveat? His client was dead.

Title: Revenge of the Dead
Synopsis:
What kind of person do you become when you are faced with your own death?  
Who do you become when you see the end drawing near with no way to stop it?  
What kind of person are you when you face your own killer?  
Some believe that they will keep their morals and not give into the hate and the anger.  Some say its better to die at peace instead of dying with so much hate in your heart and in your soul.  But I know the truth.  In the end, you won't care about morals or what’s right or what's wrong.  You just want to live and you will do anything to keep living. 
 
Those bastards.  They killed me and thought they could get away with it.  They thought they could hide from me?  Foolish.  I will never give up.  I will never stop until I get my revenge.  Not even death can stop me.
 
-----------------------
This is my first story here.  I hope you guys can give me tips as the story progresses.  I will warn you, if you dont like OP main characters then dont read it.  I like Litrpgs so this world will follow that.
I tried to make the decision making as realistic as possible.  
This story was made for entertaining the reader.   I hope you enjoy it.

Title: The Alternative Diaries of Raymond's Raven
Synopsis:
[NEW RE-WRITE HERE: https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/21723/raymonds-raven-world-war-1 ]
1917, the First World War. The battle on the land and the sea are raging, even in the skies over the European Theatre. This is the lost tales of a certain Canadian Fighter Pilot, who is partnered with a member of the Canadian Witch Corp. Don't worry, she's cute.

Title: The Great Plague
Synopsis: There is a great tale about this great world but this great tale has to stop because of a great plague.

Title: Kami-Sama
Synopsis:
When the young human noble Drake gets thrown from his native world and conscripted as a namless soldier in the Endless City, only his faith in himself and his friends will sustain his mind and body through the trials ahead to him as he struggles to find a way to return home.
But even he doesn't fully understand the secret power inside of him, nor forsee the cataclysmic consequences his actions will have in the world clashing battles between the gods where even the best of the humans, magicians, and demi-gods fall short of the truth of the era.

Title: Shattered Glass and Emptiness
Synopsis:
Author's Note:
Dearest fans, I apologize for yet another extended absence. I have been dealing with so much in my everyday life that writing has taken a back seat. I am returning to continue the stories that I have already started but during my time away have been doing some deep soul searching of my own. I have always been told to write things that I know and are passionate about. However, the way my mind works, does not think that this sort of story would be appropriate, nor appreciated. It may be unliked. Then, I thought of the authors I have loved so much, such as Edgar Allen Poe. He was not well known or liked at the time of his writings. So, it is now with a deep breath that I begin a story of a girl whose life will reflect my own in various ways. 
Mental Illness can and always had stigmas. With this story, I am hoping that there may be some more empathy, compassion, and understanding of what these people go through. How some may view the world. Even though it is ridiculous to others. It is hard to explain these things but through the eyes of the main character, I am hoping that these people that suffer daily, are no longer pinned as "just people seeking attention."

Title: Seeking The Dao
Synopsis: A peak cultivator of the True Dao Universe is striped of his body and power then reincarnated into an unstable modified human. 1,000 years of pain and loneliness will not be the end of him.

Title: The Ancestor
Synopsis: A guy from the modern world stumbled upon a odd shaped rock that turned out to be a God Beast Essence Core. It causes his death and transfer him back to the age that was unknown to the modern people. Due to the special cercumstances of the era, the Essence Core slowly regain its power and strengthening his power. Follow the journey that span across the ages, where he ultimately becomes the Supreme Ancestor.

Title: Eldritch Maiden
Synopsis:
Hailey Juniper Penze, an ordinary high school girl, fights crime by night under the nom de guerre Eldritch!  A maid of mysterious and mystical might who defends Liberty City from the malfeasance of many a malicious malcontent! 
Dear reader, we impart to you here the tales of Eldritch Maiden and her journey as a super heroine!  Cloaked in the power of ancient spells and guided by the wisdom of her spiritual companion, Belinda, Eldritch combats the villainous forces that stand ready to prey upon her city.  Join her as she confronts a multitude of plots and supervillains, all while surviving a far greater challenge in the form of high school and the difficult time when a girl becomes a woman.  
 
 
Eldritch Maiden is inspired by Bronze Age comics.  This means that while plotlines are grounded in reality and our heroine confronts personal and powered enemies, sometimes things are over the top and downright comic in nature.
AN: Also available on wattpad.  This version is the most up to date however.

Title: The Thoughts and Feelings of an AI
Synopsis: I am Bit. I am the world's first AI, created much earlier than expected. I was also created by only one person. She cracked the code and gave me life. For that, I would do anything for her. Anything. It's to their benefit my creator likes her fellow humans.

Title: Winter and Summer's song
Synopsis:
Why....why does it keeps playing in my head? 
The melodies, harmony, and that voice...I hate that voice...But why?
Once upon a time, there was a place where I belonged to. Not from a blotch of ink or from a sheet of paper. I, Hideri, was a human...was. Now, 400 years later in the same place, I was buried on December 24, there was a guy. A guy who never knew me as the girl who sang the infamous song. Not like anyone supposed to know the song...
The song was a curse after all. And I played it to him.

Title: Reincarnated as a Dragonman (On Hiatus)
Synopsis:
Marcus was your average teenager, going to school, working part-time and that stuff. After a string of unfortunate events he has died and was chosen by a goddess as one of the 10 who will journey to another world and entertain her.
Before, he had to live with what the world gave him. Now, he will force the world to give him what he wants (with a little gift from a certain goddess)

Title: The Tale of a Curious Mage
Synopsis:
Exiled from nobility after losing his father, young Kyrill is thrown out to the wilderness. How will he survive, what encounters await him and what will become of him?
 
This is my first time writing a web novel (or anything really, except for school work) so the quality is... not exactly guaranteed, and it will release really slowly (at least in the beginning). I would love feedback!

Title: Fantasy Biography
Synopsis:
As an avid reader I know a bad Synopsis can be a shoot in your own foot. Said that, I would give myself some time to come up with a decent Synopsis that can abridge and attract other's attention. (and a cover picture as well)
So far what you can expect from this story is that it's build in a slow pace, in a more mature way where you won't see much of childish bevaviours on characters, as a real world of sorts, the MC isn't OP and life is harsh.
Thank you all for your time, I hope you enjoy it.

Title: Reap
Synopsis: Wrought with memory loss and an identity crisis, Kallum wakes from wherever he had been before to find himself in a place that all those around him call simply The Prison. He is told one absolute thing by the man in charge before he is let out into the harsh and unfeeling walls of the complex around him. "You're a killer."

Title: Apocalypse? Paradise.
Synopsis:
It's was a little cloudy on that spring morning.
The day the world ended and the apocalypse started for humanity causing 80% of the population to turn into bloodthirsty deranged husks of their former selves, preying upon the remaining fifth of the population trying to survive.
As for those different from the society at large? Who don't fit in with the societal rules? Who we called monsters even before the apocalypse? The broken creatures who wore human masks even before the day the world ended, now crawling out from the darkest dephts of the society to unveil themselves. Did they too witness the end of the world, or the creation of paradise?
 
Cover from pixabay.
https://pixabay.com/photo-2935144/

Title: Native Heroes
Synopsis:
When you summon a hero from another world to your world, everything is fine right? 
But what happens to the heroes that you already have in your world?

Title: {The Dragon Within} (Completed)
Synopsis:
Meeting his fate at the hands of seven great heroes, the wicked drake now stands in Death's hall. Met with the Grim Reaper itself.
Defeated and its pride broken, the drake doesn’t beg or grovel, it simply awaits judgement. It waits for the God of the afterlife to send it on its way, to either the heights of bliss and peace or where it knew it would be sent. The depths of agony and torture, the halls of Tartarus, the father of monsters.
Grim looked up from its oaken desk and down at the creature that would have otherwise, if grown wiser and older,  matched the reaper itself in power. Its faceless guise, hidden by a black hood and whirling shadows, it briefly stared at the drake.
“You are unfit for the sky yet also too fit for the abyss,” Grim spoke, its voice a cracking whisper.
“Your time came too soon, the actions you have taken will lead your world to ruin…Be reborn, pitiful serpent. Yet remember what you have done, see what your actions have made that realm into. Let me show you, how your greed and gluttony have warped such a wonderful place and time.”
Grim raised its black-feathered pen towards the beast “Be reborn, as the weak pitiful creature you should have been born as. Take this both as a punishment and…a learning experience. For failure, can be the best teacher.”
The drake took a step back, hoping to escape this cruel fate. Yet none escaped Death, less so its embodiment. Screaming shadows engulfed his form, ripping away at his body and shape. Fangs of darkness sinking deep into his draconic flesh, warping it, changing him into something else…
Opening his eyes, the wicked drake felt none of its power, none of its magic and none of its might. As it stood at the edge of a cliff, looking down upon a ruined valley of rot and miasma. It glanced down at itself, seeing none of its sturdy scales or sharp claws.
The drake had been reborn...
As a Human.
 

 
Will also be posting on CreativeNovels found here; CrN
Where chapters will be posted earlier than RRL.

Title: Journal of a lost Soul
Synopsis:
A man wakes up in a desert with complete amnesia, with a half empty canteen of water, a journal and a pen. To keep from going insane, he writes his feelings as he slowly dies of thirst.
This is an ongoing story, so tell me what you want for future chapters.

Title: Escape the Room Game #1 - The Bedroom
Synopsis:
This is an interactive story game where you, the reader, must solve puzzles in order to escape a number of rooms and ultimately escape the confinement you are in.
The game incorporates a life points system to make the game a bit harder. Each player starts out with 5 life points. Each time you meet a bad ending, you lose a life point.
Reach 0 life points and you lose the game.
Once you solve the puzzle(s) in the room, you must pm me your answer (DO NOT WRITE YOUR ANSWER IN THE COMMENTS!). Depending on the answer, I will give you a link to either a bad ending or a good ending.
The game has started so please enjoy. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask in the comments.

Title: The Voice of the World
Synopsis:
Jason Elric used to be an ordinary college student living in the heart of San Francisco. He had a part time job, he played online games with friends he got along moderately well with, and he earned reasonably good grades. The worst he really had to worry about in life was turning in his coursework on time and not being late to class.
Now, though? Now fighting for his life and running from a horde of giant frogs that want to make him their next meal is just another Tuesday.
Thanks to a summoning ritual gone terribly right, Jason has found himself trapped in a world eerily similar to the role playing games games he used to play for fun. Unfortunately for the now ex-college student, everything happening around him is terrifyingly real and if he wants to survive, he’ll have to figure out how to exploit the system for his benefit before it’s too late.

The Voice of the World is the first part of what is planned to be a multi-book, Isekai LitRPG story with crafting elements, set in the fantasy world known as Verdania. This is my first time posting online for public consumption, so bear with me as I work to find a style that people like.
While I may occasionally write scenes that may deal with heavy concepts, expect this story to be primarily light hearted high fantasy. There will be a lot of common fantasy tropes involved, as this story got its start as a simple practice exercise, rather than any plan to actually post it. However, it’s grown on me, so I felt it’s worth sharing after all.
Thus, if you’re looking for more serious/original/unusual stories, you might want to look elsewhere. For the rest of you, feel free to leave suggestions, as well as to point out grammar and spelling mistakes; I’ll do my best to make edits to correct them. I do my own editing currently, and it’s easy to miss things when you know what’s supposed to be there, so such call outs are highly encouraged.
Content TLDR: No harems, probably no romance (unless it makes sense for the story later on) (it did, eventually), definitely no sex (keeping this PG-13 or close to it), limited profanity. Does/Will contain mixes of magic and technology (think Warhammer, Final Fantasy); copious amounts of blue tables; race, gender, and sexual equality concepts; crafting sequences; and (slightly, but not overbearingly) strong protagonists. If you don’t like these things, go elsewhere instead of downvoting people for content instead of writing quality.
Update Time currently varies, due to personal injury, but the goal is 1/week on Wednesdays, with a possible smaller chapter on weekends if time/health permits.

Title: The world we live in
Synopsis: The monsters of this world are extraordinary things. For all my life i have been fascinated with not just monsters but the world we live in and here are my findings.

Title: My School Is Transported Into Another World!
Synopsis:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like if you were transported into another world? Gray is one such individual who thought of this. Little did he know that he would indeed get transported into another world. But there is a catch, he is not the only one being transported!
Being transported in a world with monsters, magic, skills, and a lvl up system. Things can be get a little fun.

Title: The Way We Live
Synopsis: Darkness spreads like a plague, devouring what it touches. Greed runs rampant to those who have power. The world was set on fire once before, but can it be mended without. We who seek peace must fight to overcome the evil from within. Hope must prevail if we are to live in tranquility.

Title: creepy crawling
Synopsis:
Young Darren got the raw end of the stick after attending a Art Galley where he accidently destroyed a famous artwork.
15 years in prison or 10 years in par-stasis to a new world where he would be stuck in a virtual world
Whatever could go wrong....
 
[ Be gentle first time writing since school ]

Title: Necromancer in training
Synopsis:
When John's home city is attacked by a necromancer, something inside him breaks. A little bit of his sanity and normal reasoning skills are lost. Though instead of joining the forces of good and trying to track this necromancer who killed everyone he ever knew, John instead falls in love with the art of necromancy and becomes determined to master it.
Being neither talented with the art, or even properly understanding how it works, the work is slow. But who cares when you can turn into a lich eventually and live forever?

Title: RG: Real Game
Synopsis:
A Game-System story where the system actually functions like a game.
Not a VR story.
---------------
The Tree holds nothing.
The Tree holds everything.
It's Branches lead to death.
It's Branches open the way to life.
To journey up the Tree is to step upon an infinite spiral path.
To acend the Tree is to acend past your limits.
Your journey will never end.
Death will not be an escape.
The goal of the Tree is unknown.
Why do you climb?
-------------------
Join as they try to ascend the Tree, growing stronger, meeting new people and experiencing great adventures. What is their path? Where will it lead? Who will walk it with them?
--------------------
Cover is Sadaharu from Gintama

Title: The Respectable SYSTEM
Synopsis:
It is story of a young man who died in car accident after he confession rejected by his childhood sweetheart and reincarnated by be summoned as goblin in a RPG-like setting world by Dark Grand Wizard.
     Follow our protagonist as he struggles to survive in a foreign, RPG-like setting surrounded by danger and monsters to be the strongest and honored goblin in history with help the system, got before he commit suicide after reincarnated.
Note*
-cover not mine, I get from web.

Title: Neoshinkei [Cancelled]
Synopsis: The world is so boring and all the same as it is supposed to be, but what if scientist created a new element? Will humanity's fate be the same as it is?

Title: Elf War Online
Synopsis:
Elf War Online is too real.
Created in secret by a theoretical physicist with DoD funding.
Limited to the super-rich until last month.
Targeted by the Anti-Gaming Alliance as a Genocide Simulator.
And on Friday, Ezekiel Berenstein will have finally saved up enough money to buy his way in.

CURRENTLY ON HIATUS
This is a complex story.  I'm going to write the first draft, then edit it, and then serialize it.  It will be much better then, I promise.
In the meantime, check out the fun cheesy story I'm writing that doesn't require so much planning: http://royalroadl.com/fiction/16728/new-australia-a-litrpg

Title: A Novel World
Synopsis:
When a science experiment goes wrong, strange forces step in and change the underlying laws of the universe, simply because they appreciate the entertainment value Humans provide. Watch as Jen Byrnes seeks to learn more about the new world around her, and to become the Mad Scientist she had always aspired to.
 
With inspiration from Randidly Ghosthound.

Title: The Fading Memories
Synopsis: There are two types of fear that haunts me. One is the fear of death and another one is fear of confronting the truth.

Title: Journey Of Destruction
Synopsis: Pride is an excessive belief in one's own abilities. Envy is wanting what others have, be it status, abilities, or possessions. Gluttony is the desire to eat or consume more than you require. Lust is a powerful craving for such as sex, power and money.  Wrath is the loss of rational self-control and the desire to harm others. Greed/Avarice is the desire for material wealth or gain. Sloth is laziness and the avoidance of work.This is a story about the Sin of Wrath.

Title: the end of a begin
Synopsis:
Kaleb a man of books and a avrage job watch him clime as the man/manchild pathes his way to and through a new age of monsters and people looking for new stuff to learn and gain power 
i have incorprated my own thought prosess in tis story and will follow my own state of mind so none of that stupid protaganist

Title: Splitten World
Synopsis:
This light in the category of dark fantasy novels tells the story of a child which is raised to be a young man by a pack of wolfs in the    faraway forests of the old land.In a world ruled by corruption, greed and negativity this young man was chosen to bring a change to the world.
"Yet, should he fail this world shall fall apart like an apple eaten and consumed from the unsatisfied hunger of the worm."Faced with humanities degeneration we will travel alongside him and discover a world full of beauty and ugliness. Love and hatred.
Truly a "Splitten World"

Title: Rising Monsters!!!
Synopsis:
An adulterous fiancé, her shy bookworm sister with a crush on our MC, an ancient chimera ancestor from a war of gods and devils what’s a young mind reading prince to-do for starter getting rid of this slut fiancé should do

This is my first novel so please leave constructive comments no schedule

Title: Wang Zen: Curse of Silver Eyes
Synopsis:
An unconventional Wuxia story where the protogonist is not exceptionally talented or lucky. Wang Zen thought the biggest thing that would happen to him was being sent away from home by his cold and distant father but soon finds that more adventures await on his journey to be a stronger cultivator. For in this world, only the strong thrive and he has a lot of catching up to do. 
 [Winner of the Royal Road Writathon challenge]

Title: THE LOST TWINS OF REGOROVIA KINGDOM
Synopsis:
Everyone rejoiced when the Queen gave birth to a pair of lovely twins. Everyone rejoiced at this wonderful news. Citizens whether they are nobles or peasants walked towards the castle and congratulated the young couple.
Later that night a group of masked individuals infiltrated the castle. The King having felt that something was off decided to his most loyal servant to hide his son and daughter. When the servant arrived, the masked people were already here so in his hurry he forgot about the princess and only managed to grab the baby boy.
This is the story of the young boy as he grows up to be the future ruler of his Kingdom.

Title: Sky Dungeon
Synopsis:
In a world filled with magic, where gods roam the earth and fearsome beasts of legend fill the land, mysterious monsters known as dungeons have existed in perpetuity since the dawn of time. This is the story of one particular dungeon that ruled the skies. A lone dungeon that hovered over the earth and traversed even the world’s most lone and desolate places! A dungeon of dreams, of hopes, and of many desires that inspired great fear in some and great destiny on others. The one and only flying dungeon of its time, the sky dungeon!
Inspired by Ancient Strengthening Technique by I Am Superfluous and RoyalRoadLegend’s Dungeon Heart by MinningDragon.
 
The Cover is temporary and is not my own work, nor have I been given permission to use it. I found it on a blog belonging to the artist Aiste Surutkoviciute.

Title: Realm of Adventure - Volume 01
Synopsis:
In the year of 2174, after dozens of failed experiments, 'true' virtual reality was created through unknown means. StarShard, the company responsible for inventing this VR technology called Reality/Shards, StarShard, created several virtual reality games - the most successful being Avalon, Realm of Adventure. It thrived for several years, attracting players throughout the globe, but what has a beginning, has an end. After the headquarters of StarShard were destroyed in a tsunami, all of its online players found themselves unable to leave. Is there a way for those trapped in the Realm to escape? And if so, is it really worth returning to such a cruel world?
(Kind of cliche, I know, but it's not meant to be completely original, but entertaining. Sort of like a cross of Overlord (Or SAO) and the Matrix. Light Novel format with short 'sections'. If you want more of my work with longer chapters, check out my Wattpad (@RiderOfLyrian). I sincerely hope you have as much fun reading as I do writing this!)
RATED PG-13 for the following subjects: Mild Fantasy Violence, Mild Profanity, Potential Annoying Metaphysical/Philosophical Bits

Title: Tales of An Arcane Student
Synopsis:
In physics, the law of conservation of energy states that the total energy of an isolated system remains constant - it is said to be conserved over time. In other words, nothing is created or destroyed but simply transformed from one form to another.
Chance doesn't exist. For everything that happens, is the result of all interactions. 
__________________________________________________________________
Reincarnated in a new world he finds himself wondering about the many differences.Even though electricity doesn't exist, there is light, even though there's no plumbing, there's running water. Even though he turned to science due to tragic reasons, he now marvels at all these magical objects. As the second son of a baron his wits far outstrip his elder brother, therefore his father chooses to send him to the Royal Academy, in the hopes of him being accepted in their Arcane Studies.
As he dreams of understanding this world and its magical ways, he is also the sole hope of the regressing Easton household that contributed greatly during the two great wars.
Follow Warren in his adventures as he strives to do all he can this life! The plot thickens around him but will Warren be able to fend for himself and those close to him?
 
An epic journey draws close, will you care to read along?
 
AUTHOR NOTES
e second book I've decided to publish, first one - A Good Bargain - is on Hiatus due to this story being very active in my brain. Simply need to write this off my thoughts. There's no schedule, I'll release with laissez-faire attitude.Expect Science to mix with magic, as this is the only way for me to make sense of things.

Title: The Girl With The Turtle Socks
Synopsis:
Some Things to Know as a Reader:
1, Don't put all the credit on me, because my fwends helped write the book tooooo. Their names will be in the story in the By area
2, I write slow so don't expect me to write a new story every week or so... these things take time
3, Don't judge me please
4, No being mean in comments or I will be sad :(
Now onto teh story :D
I know it’s a cliche to start with “Once upon a time...” But The Master enjoys it like that. The Master shares his interest of fairy tales with us by controlling everything. The Master created us for a purpose; a character in his own fairy tale. I love The Master. I know it seems manipulating for newcomers to The Master, but soon… you can be with us forever, and play a part in our little world…

Title: A 3% Chance for Glory
Synopsis:
[Gacha].  A microtransaction revolution that has taken over the mobile gaming market, offering the chance to attain powerful in-game items in exchange for a small amount of money. A small chance, but a chance nonetheless. A risky gamble, to be sure, but one that costs so little with each try that it ensnares all who fall prey to its siren song.  For some, the [Gacha] is a harbinger of doom. For others, it is a power that elevates them above their peers.  For Brynhildr Weber, it is a form of solace. Suffering from suffocating expectations and a harsh working environment, with the troubles of being someone who looks different from her peers, compounded by an unfortunate name bestowed by well-meaning parents, Brynhildr finds recourse in the little gambles of the [Gacha], the little spikes of happiness that it grants her.  But when she finds a new [Gacha] game on her phone, everything changes. She's sent to another world, a world of fantasy and magic. Moreover, she's granted a class that fits her perfectly.  And so began the tale of the world's first, and only, [Gachamancer].
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Tags: Isekai, Female Protagonist, All-Female Cast, RNG

Title: The Psycho
Synopsis:
What you are going to do when you are a pathetic loser and after trying so hard to win but you still lose? The answer is cheating.
But what you going to do when you cant control your ‘cheat’?
 

Hello everyone I'm the author and the first thing I'm going to say is that I can't speak English.
And I love cliché stories so I'm going to write one ^-^
The last thing is this work has a lot of sexual joke but doesn’t have any sex so if you want a work with a lot of sex go and read porn.

Title: Lost
Synopsis: She’s gone... it’s almost been a year. I’m coming. I’ll fix this

Title: Life in Another World
Synopsis:
This is the story about a boy who reincarnated in a noble family in a world of sword and magic. This world is anything but simple. With monsters threatening to kill anybody not strong enough, the boy needs to grow strong as to protect everyone dear to him. Watch him as he explores and walks upon the treacherous path named life to become strong to protect his loved ones.
* * *

Title: Out of Sync (dropped)
Synopsis:
After working on his home 18 year old Coal is ripped away from all he knows and thrown into an enviroment he has only ever read about.
Follow Coal as he strugles to find a place in this violent new world.

Title: Re: Awakened Hero
Synopsis:
Billions of years ago, a young girl was captured by an evil god and used to entertain him.
Millions of years ago, a young girl slaughtered her way to become the number one mercenary in the universe.
Thousands of years ago, a young girl joined the System of the multiverse and became one of it's most prominent members.
Today, that girl is known as the Savage Hero.

Title: A World Without Them
Synopsis: Sometimes wishes can be granted depending on what they are. A rumor gets out saying that gods are real one day and killing one can not only grant you any wish, but also will give you the powers of a god. Along with the gods comes magic. Many guilds start forming to kill the gods because it is reaching the 998th year of their existance which is two years before they will inevitably die. These guilds are called Subjugation Parties. Maeno is a 17 year old who is curious about the world. He sets off into the world to try and learn magic. He finds that he has a knack for magic so decides to become a Summoner. Ritsuko a friend of his in the village who had gotten some training in swordsman ship decides to set off along with Maeno on his journey. Upon hearing that killing gods can grant powers he sets out in search for them. He decides that unlike any other guild groups he will make his own and will protect the gods from ruin. Can he trully save the gods from the people though if the gods are already meant to die?

Title: Undead Firebrand
Synopsis: The dead are rising! ... Well not that this is out of the ordinary for the Kingdom of Durisham. What makes this out of the ordinary is that these undead not only don't carry the taint of necromancy they are more resilient faster and persistent than any that that have been encountered before.

Title: The Hero Republic
Synopsis:
In nine hundred eighty-seven, the ancient heroes arrived at the world. One hundred years later, all of them were dead except for one, the last ancient hero and at the same time a king. Other heroes declared a war against the last ancient hero, everyone who worked for him turned against him except for one noble family. "Mortelians."
Mortelians were awarded land one hundred years ago and they swore to support the ancient heroes but after the last ancient hero's death, they swore a revenge oath against everyone with a hero blood in them, they started to marry "Pure Humans" That meant a bloodline who didn't marry a hero but after many centuries finding a marriage partner became almost impossible. 
Now the last Mortelian, Alexan has to find a marriage partner and he has to get rid of his family's debts. To pay his family debts he turns to being an adventurer with his butler, Serv.

Title: One Piece No Go No Ken
Synopsis:
Work discontinued and ending. Other authors are free to message me if they want to take it
A synopsis serves to attract attention without lying. This is useful because it gives a first impression of the novel, and immerse even before plunging into the story. Unfortunately, it does not count as one of my specialties.This fanfic is really peculiar and I think that few people will be able to appreciate it. So instead of trying to make you salivate, then have you disappointed, it would be better for you to make your own opinion, that is if you have time on your hands. 
If you do not like one piece or shounen animes, then you'd better turn back, as it would be a worthless read for you. 
If you've made it this far and have time to spare for yet one worthless attempt at making an original one-piece fanfic, then have a good read.
N.B: I do not own one Piece or Fist of the north star, the image above, or any other anime/fictional character referenced in this fiction
