Title: Vitharr's Saga, Entry 1: The Companions of Vitharr
Synopsis: This story follows a group of young Vinmen, tall and imposing humans born with the strength to rival the might of giants, on their first raids as Vikings to find their fortunes and claim their destinies.

Title: This project has no purpose
Synopsis:
Summary:
This is the story about the life of a "human" amidst a world that only appears to be earth at first glance. Long ago the face of this world resembled the typical tales of yore; of knights and fairies, swords and magic, however such an era has come and gone. Even the world of fantasy has progressed steadily into the modern epoch filled with the wonders of science and technology!
In the ancient times a certain crisis had occured that lead to the quick decline of various magical species. Due to their low population and general incompatibility with the other races they could not crossbreed to save their numbers. Left with no other choice the major races of the world gathered together in an attempt to change the fate of this dying world. Their only hope was a special 'world-tier' magic known as 'the dusk of harmony'.
The result of this magic would dissolve every race into their purest essences known as 'aspect' and instill them within the human population. The humans were the best choice as their numbers were numerous and form was similar to most races. As such, the various races of this world managed to save themselves in essence and soul only, though perhaps there was no other choice.
With the various humans now carrying the weight and aspects of those who came before, life has continued onto the modern age. Yet, even amongst these hybrids 'Pures' emerge from time to time, beings who have inherited not only aspects of the ancient races, but their forms too. These Pures are often times exceptionally talented and seen as near deities.
This is the story of a perculiar boy who is born with the soul of a stranger from the world known as 'Earth'. With the memories and soul of a human, he too is a rare Pure; a pure human.
---
This project literally has no purpose and is being written because I felt like it. There isn't any semblance of a solid direction nor have I thought about any characters aside from the main character and a few auxiliary cast. If you would like to contribute to building this world with me then please contact me through a DM or by leaving a comment, I will be sure to credit you.

Title: A Fiery VRMMORPG adventure
Synopsis: A lonely man shrouded in mystery is hell-bent on the virtual reality game that is created to end the space war. Who is he really and what does he want to achieve?

Title: The virtual mind
Synopsis:
Progress some say it exists with technology some say it exists with biology
I say that its when both happen at the same time
 
A story about at a man that gets thrown into a new world with the help of some mysterious technology and a world connected by a virtual one

Spoiler: Spoiler


 Theres a lot of things that are unfished about this story  (all of it) but feedback is  good I guess, so far its just me uploading my free writing from my class
Also my grammar and such isn't the best I could use some help ;3

Title: BEDLAMB
Synopsis: Since the dawn of our earliest memory Mankind as a species has asked what is our purporse. Who put us here. Are we .... are we alone. These have been our every waking thought.......... WE'VE FINALLY GOT OUR ANSWERE

Title: Glitch
Synopsis:
202X - The Universe is proven to be a Simulation
An outbreak of nihilism and crime follows the discovery. It is not long before institutions and criminals develop a way to cheat our false reality and achieve impossible feats. They call this new tool Glitch and its uses vary: from editing the body with superhuman capacities to manipulating the elements and the Earth. Those who yield this new power are called Glitchers, and they are held as the Greek Heroes of the new times.
Edward Williams is a naïve anime-geek teenager from Chicago who dreams of making a difference in the world. He becomes a Glitcher when Thief Queen Elizabeth Shao, a legendary Glitcher herself, suffers a betrayal by the hands of her comrades and invades the boy’s body in order to cheat Death and plot her revenge.
Together, Edward and Thief Queen will build new bonds, live many misadventures and try not kill each other in an ever more chaotic America.


Cover art by the talented graphic designer ssddx. The entire novel's philosophical proposal is about finding meaning in a nihilistic world. This novel is a fun juvenalia take on the impact of the 'Death of God' and Descartes's skepticism. ;)
(Back cover)

Title: Aether Gate Online:  Slayer (A LitRPG Saga)
Synopsis:
***Book 1 is available now on amazon!***
 
“Raise your blade.  Take up the mantle of Slayer.” 
Adam’s life was anything but easy.  With people at both school and home eager to make his life a living hell, the only place that he felt right was in the virtual world. At least there he had some  control. 
When the newest VRMMORPG title gets announced, Adam and his best friend Max are more than ready to dive in.  Launch day arrives quickly, and Adam is plunged into a world that’s more immersive than anything he’s experienced before.  Although the game offers a bevy of character choices, Adam quickly chooses the title of Slayer, a class that specializes in taking out stronger, more difficult opponents.  Adam begins his adventure, but its not long before he realizes that there’s much more at stake when taking a life in this new game.  The pain is very real and death… is permanent.
 
Now, trapped in a virtual world, Adam must take the name Zander Darkblade and brave the dangers of the Aether Gate.  It is a world of mighty creatures and fallen gods, and of secrets that have laid hidden for far too long...
Welcome to Aether Gate Online.

Title: The Five Kings of Magic- The Witch King
Synopsis:
...And When the Bell TollsAt World's Dusk and War's DawnFive Sovereigns Clad In StarlightShall Stand Together Against Blackest Void...
 At the end of one age and the beginning of a new era Uraya will face a great calamity. During the previous calamity humanity failed its test, and thus the race known as humans ceased to be. That which rose up from their ashes were the five great kingdoms of magic.
The Kingdom of Witchs, Blessed by the powers of magic and born with a strong connection to the mystical Aether.
The Kingdom of Shifters, Unmatched in their connection to the land, and divided into many tribes.
The Kingdoms of the Fae, Like Yin and Yang the Summer and Winter Courts dance together. The power forever waxing and waning.
The Kingdom of Psionics, The race that remained closest to their human ancestors gifted in the powers of the mind. 
Now as the next age draws ever closer it is the new children of this star who must face the next test.Prophecy dictates that when the world of Uraya faces its greatest peril five rulers will be offered the slimmest chance to cast the danger back.
The Witches have always tried to live in harmony with the world, none more so then the Frosts a minor noble house who retreated from society more then three generations ago. The youngest son of House Frost, Shann just completed his basic studies and was looking forward to coming back to school and study advanced magic. All his plans come crashing down around him though when the Old Queen dies and the Phoenix identifies Shann as the new sovereign.
There's just one itty bitty hiccup. There's, never actually been a Witch King before. Too bad nobody told the phoenix that.
Now Shann has to deal with assasination attempts, an evil uncle trying to turn him into a puppet ruler, and noble houses constantly throwing their unwed daughters in his path. All while learning how to rule a nation, and trying not to go to war with the neighboring Shifter Kingdom.

Title: Vitharr's Saga, Entry 2: The Crow-Cursed Jarls
Synopsis: The second installment of Vitharr's saga, where the Companions contend with blood feuds, cave beasts, and death.

Title: Fearless
Synopsis: Clint Fjeldsted wants to come out of the closet, but he wants to make sure it's appropriately dramatic. When his first attempt goes horribly wrong, he's left with a broken arm and a high school environment which seems out to get him at every turn. With the help of friends and family, he's ready to take on everything the world throws at him.

Title: Strange Games
Synopsis:
Child's play isn't so simple anymore.
It's 1986. Nancy Reagan is President and the hot new pastime is Arcade Adventure Gaming, where players explore the Realm of Vircon in parties. Kids compete to top leaderboards in the four US Regional Divisions, trying for a shot at prizes and scholarships. Recently, a handful of players have gone missing.
The old guy in the van almost kills Wyatt Jackson but a robot straight out of Doctor Who knocks them both out. When Wyatt wakes up, he's stuck in the Realm of Vircon game. As he meets the rest of his Party they discover that their would-be kidnappers are in there with them.
Can they evade their enemies and convince the mysterious force running the game to let them log out and go home?

Title: The Hero Fails
Synopsis: Vita Harken the failure and dreamer sets out to make his mark in the world. He searches for the riches and adventures that his father brags about.

Title: Quest of the Moon
Synopsis: This is honestly the first time I've done this, it is a story about Gods, promises, of love between more than just one person, of choices that must be made and of a struggle within. I am just submitting the prologue and the first chapter, and if enough people like it, I will continue writing the story, as I have already planned this to be a triology.

Title: Path of the Forsaken
Synopsis:
A man having everything taken from him. His family, friends, and memories, journeys out in search for answers. All left to his person but a suit of armour and rifle as he tries to find what is lost. But what type of obstacles will he encounter on this path. A path to relive memories long forgotten. A path to relive the life that was once taken from him.
This is his path in a world where he alone is forsaken by the gods.
Warning: Borderline LitRPG if your here for that tag. Sexual content may be apparent in later chapters (e.g. attempted rape).
Notes: Releases will be sporadic due to real life commitments (An estimated chapter per a month or 2 weeks). This was also created in order to improve my grammar/stories for when I do the rewrite of 'The Demon of Shadows'. Another work which was placed on hiatus. But it is not confirmed that I will actually do a rewrite of that story. Also this story will be quite similar in some aspects to my first novel. Anyways, I'd appreciate any feedback and criticism, bad or good as it will help to improve my work.
Cover: Was borrowed from deviant art. Here specifically https://www.deviantart.com/art/Sci-fi-Soldier-622387160
The artist is jeffchendesigns. I haven't asked them if I could use it but if they want me to take it down I will at a moments notice. It is also not how I exactly picture the main character but perhaps similar in some aspects.

Title: apocalypse bringer
Synopsis:
wang chun was choosen by the god, but not as a hero but as the apocalypse bringer.
 
author note: the cover was not mine if the owner want me to take it down l will take it down.

Title: Meakashi Collection
Synopsis:
A collection of first chapters, which I mostly already posted on my Patreon a while ago.
They're all potential stories I could serialize in the future, so you have that to look forward to. Leave comments on those you like, maybe I'll even go by popularity.
Upload schedule: Whenever.

Stories:
Akashi Records or: How I Learned to Stop Caring and Enjoy the Show:
This is a typical reincarnation story of an otaku into a fantasy world. Or is it? This time, the protagonist is actually an otaku girl who lives for thin books containing hardcore yuri. She is reborn as a non-human being, and learns pretty quickly not to give a damn about things and just enjoy the ride. Oh, and she's quite outspoken about her sexuality, and is out to gather a harem of the best (monster-)girls she can find.
Tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Yuri
Yousai Youjo:
The story of a girl who got roped into playing the VRMMORPG "Eternity Online" by her hopeless NEET and siscon older brother. Joining his guild, she is quickly pulled to the maximum level, but plays a defensive tank playstyle as she is too lazy to do much else. When she finds that he is using her to live his lolicon fantasies in the game, she leaves his guild and prepares to log off, to never play again. That is, when a voice resounds in everyone's heads, telling them that the game has now become reality, and everyone is granted a full skill and stat reset. She uses the reset to max her defensive tank stats and becomes a living fortress - while looking like a little girl.
Tags: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Yuri
Skypiercer:
The Skypiercer. The tallest object in the world, the last unexplored frontier, filled with wonders but also dangers, it stands straight like a primordial spear piercing the heavens. Generations of daredevils, as if being charmed by an irresistible magic, have challenged its countless floors over many centuries. These people's destinies are irrevocably intertwined with the tower. It is the watchful guardian over their cradle; it is the solemn tombstone over their grave. Those who devote their lives to climbing are called aspirants - seekers of ascension.
Tags: Adventure, Fantasy, Grimdark, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
The Color of Trust:
A hero is the symbol of a people's hope. He is a paragon of virtue, a stalwart guard against those who would harm the innocent that he has sworn to protect. But when the hero finds that the person sitting on the Overlord's throne is an innocent young demon girl, and those that would seek to harm her are his allies blinded by prejudice and bloodlust, he has to make a decision. Does he stand by and watch as his ideal crumbles into hypocrisy, or will he follow through with his unconditional conviction to help those that cannot protect themselves, even if they are demons?
Tags: Drama, Fantasy, Romance, Slice of Life

Title: Painting the Mists
Synopsis:
Note: Painting the Mists has migrated to Kindle Unlimited. As such, only a few chapters are available as a sample. If you are interested in continuing the series for free (subscription required), you can find it here: http://mybook.to/ClearSkyLink2
Martial cultivators, flying swords, and magic talismans.
Life for Cha Ming is a daily grind. A rat race where people don’t make any real decisions. When he asks the universe for something more, fate itself answers his prayer. A talisman brush older than time itself sends him to another world, where magic, fortune, and danger await.
Now, the world is at his fingertips. He has a new life, a new body, and can wield the five elements. It’s too bad his new home is a place where might makes right, and immortal cultivators and demons fight at the drop of a hat.
But where the divine brush goes, danger follows. As its wielder, Cha Ming can’t stay out of trouble. There are many who seek the Clear Sky Brush, and they’ll stop at nothing to find it…

Title: Bluelight Chronicles - Going Solo
Synopsis: During a trial run of the Deep Dream Reality Machine (DDRM), fated as the future of Virtual Reality, a fatal error leaves Anton Levi stranded inside of a videogame world full of dread, adventure, swords and magic. Together with some unexpected allies, Anton will have to find out what happend with his other 19 classmates and how to get out back to reality, all while managing to survive on a world more dangerous than expected, because if you die in your dreams, you die permanently.

Title: The way of the Prophet
Synopsis:
Frederick whose plan to make friends fails miserably and he dies. He wanted to have a friend but his scary looks came in the way, every time.
God pitied him and after death asked him for a wish.
He wished that he should have a awesome power and wanted to respected and admired by people- A Hero.
God agrees and sends him to the world of Estayphus, which was in uproar because of the demon king.
His goal is to defeat the evil demon emperor and to save the world of Estayphus.
And so he was bestowed with the power to change is mass density of his body with his free will as well as he power to communicate with animals, spirits and trees.
He is entitled as the Prophet.Note:- Contains parody and lots of conversations as well as clumsy misunderstanding.

Title: Cooking with Oinos
Synopsis:
This is a short collection of simple recipes that anyone can cook.
You will rarely find measurements and proportions, except when it’s strictly necessary, as I tend to eye things when I cook instead of relying on measuring aids.
This might seem difficult to the more inexperienced to follow at first, but it will allow you to soon start cooking the recipes you come up with yourself and to modify those presented here without needing a master degree in chemistry.

Title: Across the Realms [Dropped]
Synopsis:
[Dropped]
A child blessed by the Astral.
An unprecedented destiny.
Watch his path, as he marches up the stairway of Heaven.
A March of a Sovereign.
[Adventure, Wuxia, Martial Arts, Fantasy]
This is a Qihuan novel; it has eastern and western fantasy elements. More often than not in Xianxia or Xuanhuan there is a severe lack of character development, being a western writer I'm changing that. My characters, from my totally unbiased view, feel fleshed out and actually have emotions.
This is my first attempt at a novel, I'm writing as a means to better convey my thoughts. I will, hopefully, steadily improve chapter-by-chapter.
I'm very open to feedback and constructive criticism. As one can see this is a cultivation novel, so you know how this goes. I've decided to jump-start the whole rags-to-riches scenario. He is strong from the start and is given the utility to do so.
*The cover art is not my own, all rights reserved to the owner. I will take it down if necessary.
*The style of the recent chapters is comparatively different than Chapter 1.

Title: Fairwind's Fortune
Synopsis:
In 2038, Gail is a player of Thousand Tales, a game run by an AI. When she's not playing games she manages the offices of Mountain King Ice Cream. Her real and fantasy lives collide when she gets the chance to have her brain permanently relocated to the game's world. Is digital heaven too good an offer to pass up?
Story is complete at 10 chapters, about 24K words.
A revised and longer edition of this story is now available on Amazon! https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B079KZVZKS

Title: Journey to Godhood, Breath by Breath
Synopsis:
One day God got bored of his world and so while reading manga and light novels he had an idea bloom in his mind.
So he brought ideas from all of fiction and from his siblings worlds and brought chaos, or would have if he didn't make the sentinals, this is the story of Claire Fairchild, the one who gained a power God once had himself.
Warning, i suck at writing and pacing myself, you have been warned.

Title: The Tavern at the End of the Universe
Synopsis:
I don't know. I've written like seven chapters of this story and I still have no idea what's going on. It's sort of about a teleporting magical tavern, but more than anything it's just a way for me to get all the fun characters and weird shit out of my head and into a story format. Yup. I'm making this shit up as I go along! No plans! Let's fucking goooo!
Keep in mind, this story has multiple protagonists who will all eventually meet up probably, It follows a very game of thrones style of switching between characters with each chapter.

Title: no content
Synopsis: This was a test fiction and I am to dumb to figure out how to delete it.

Title: Sea Of Trees
Synopsis: This world isn't ours. Or at least not quite. With massive sprawling forests instead of oceans, differing evolution and events in history have taken place. Following Johnny and Vanesa's stumble into these trees to find the horror and beauty held within.

Title: The fantasy transfer
Synopsis: Yoichiro, 27 years old boy had been transferred to a new world whilst out shopping. He was a NEET and had relied on his parents on income which barely was enough to save his own skin since his expenditure was mainly revolved around games. A new world, a new start and a new sense of freedom; what more can one want? And not to mention, some really UNIQUE powers which he obtained during his transfer.Yoichiro will soon meet the true horrors of this world, but he will also meet some interesting people. He might even find one who is to be in an intimate relationship with. Will Yoichiro get the way he wants his life to be; or will there be too many adversaries to overcome which will break his life apart?

Title: the one who is wrong
Synopsis: hi this story is about the one who is wrong tell me who is really wrong you don't know if I told a lie yet or NEVER.

Title: Diary of the Shadow Queen
Synopsis:
In the year 2029 essence beasts that appeared eleven years ago have ravaged humanity to the point of extinction. In a desperate attempt to save innocent refugees, a lone essence cultivator held his ground only to die horribly.He found himself in a time three months prior before the rules of the world had changed and in the body of a thirteen year old girl. Given another chance at life, what shall the reborn warrior do? Try to warn humanity? Not if she can help it. She wants to avoid being noticed by the government while gathering what allies that she could. For she does not wish to have an explosive collar placed around her neck like so many others in the previous timeline. But first, she needs to find a way to survive her father's drunken abuse.
-Author note: This is my first attempt at writing.  So, I would appreciate any useful feedback and I do apologize for my horrendous punctuation.  I can't promise frequent updates, but I will try to write at least 1 chapter a week.

Title: Cycle of the Tides
Synopsis: A young boy caught in the tides of time finds himself pursued by dark beings that seek his unique power for their own ends, and must break the cycle before he joins their ranks.

Title: Lost in Dream
Synopsis: A weary soul lost in the depths of eternity in a strange world which doesn't make sense. Dreams and nightmares repeating in an endless cycle. Is this all the world is?

Title: Zee Locked-in
Synopsis:
My life changed forever the moment I stole a life-saving medicine to cure my mom's otherwise terminal cancer. There was never really a chance that my Mega-Corp employer wouldn't catch me. I was convicted before they even kicked in our door, but my mom was cured. That made it all worth it. 
Now, I'm not Zachary, "Zee", Jones anymore, I'm Inmate 81348. My only chance at getting out of jail again is to sign up for the "Inmate Gamer Release Program". OzCo, the Mega-Corp that runs the entire Justice system now, will get to use my brain to mine crypto-currency, Crypts, for my restitution and profits. While they do that, I'll be playing the Game, a fully immersive virtual reality world, jacked into my brain. If I play well, I'll be out in 5-8 years, instead of the 20 I'd have in store by serving "hard time" IRL. 
There are many worlds within the Game, almost every bit of intellectual property ever created has been licensed to have representation in the Game. Statistically, I'll probably end up on Gygax because it's the most popular and has the most constant need for new players. It's a Medieval Sword & Sorcery world with Elves and Orcs, Wizards, and Knights. Wish I knew how to use a sword. 
Wish me luck. 
 
Note from the Author: This is a draft in progress. Comments and Feedback appreciated.

Title: Greater Than You Think
Synopsis: Honestly, I have no idea what's going to happen....

Title: One Piece - Demon of the Ocean
Synopsis:
Basically, my redo of Cultivating Monster, just more centered around the One Piece lore and its world. There will still be gender bender, but it's a minor point in the story. No snarky AI shop either. That said, here's a crappy synopsis.

Have you ever thought about what you wanted to do if you were to be reborn? Become rich and powerful? Obtain a huge harem or forever live with your loved one?
Some people dream of becoming a god, some dream of simply disappearing, some dream of an eternal dream.
I too dreamed. I dreamed of a better life, one where my true nature could be unleashed without the shackles society brings me.
And now that my life finally ends, I dream once more. A dream of a world I am very familiar with, and yet know nothing about. As my consciousness fades, this dream becomes more and more vivid.
Then, I wake up to the soft lulls of mother ocean and a strange screen in my head.

Title: The Forgotten Portal
Synopsis: Luke was used to tragedies in his life. He wasn't used to portals, monsters or bad ass girlfriends.

Title: Shadow Emperor
Synopsis:
This is one of my side projects. It is about a young innocent boy, who has some mishap happening at the date of his birth. Through circumstances he is forced to strenghten himself. His fate was decided long ago, and this story is just the journey to his fate.
It is very xianxia/xuanhuan-esque, with some Western elements mixed in. It is a cultivation novel, and it will have gore, sexual depictions, but to an extent. Most of the time it is either fun or exciting, as you will see an innocent boy's rise to the Emperor of the Shadows..

Title: The Last Philosopher
Synopsis:
Before everything, it’s assumed there was nothing, but what if there was no real difference between the two? Just two extreme philosophies from the first conflict.
The planet Huom has been under observation for longer than should technically be possible. The primary watcher, a bitter black hole, is excited to see that there is finally a proverbial Darkness at the end of the tunnel.
Meanwhile, on the planet, in the freezing mountains of Empris, Lyeasrakardsul, the oldest living sorcerer, suffers from devastating nightmares. At the same time, far away in the sandstone desert of Zenon, Herschel, a man filled to the brim with weird ideas is escaping a prison filled with strange old men.
What does all this have to do with arsehole Gods, hairy Dwarfs, frustrated Afreets, curious Knomes, lizard-women, and nude Áettar? Perhaps Nothing, perhaps Everything… but why can’t it be both?

Title: Poetic moments
Synopsis: this is going to be the poetry that I have written and wish to share whether it be to influence others or just to be enjoyed I care not what others think of me or my works but if you wish to criticise it just know poetry is supposed to be for expressing emotions and or feelings and I wish to make this platform another outlet to help others and myself work through any and all problems I don't know what to say further but it has to be 500 characters long so

Synopsis: So many lies, so many delusions, make it stop already.

Title: The Mage
Synopsis:
English is not my native language.
My work was influenced by dozens I've read.
The protagonist reincarnates twice in a row.

Title: Chess of Fantasy
Synopsis:
A young man named Eduard Yaroslav wins the world chess tournament of 1969. That night red guards rush into his room and tell him that Moscow needs him, he finds himself in a chess game against a computer that looked the whole Soviet arsenal. 
He has to beat the computer to unlock the arsenal, If he can't he will be executed and so the game starts, he finds himself losing but at the last seconds he sees an opportunity to win but then he loses but he will not lose the game of his life. He snatches a weapon from a commissar and shoots everyone in the room, he locks himself in and then he sits on his chair to play his last move the black knight to E-4 but he collapses and so he loses again but he will take the computer with him, he raises his gun to the computer but he isn't able to pull the trigger and so he passes out.
He finds himself on a street full of humans, weird looking humans with long ears and lizards. There is a white king in a parade and there is a black horse, he knows what to do and so he kills the king with his gun

Title: Descendant of Dawn
Synopsis: Mary was born with immense magical talent, but abandoned at the door of an orphanage for reasons she can't understand. When fortune shines her way she sets out on a quest to see the world and discover her origins.

Title: The Morrigan
Synopsis:
Reality started crumbling the day I died and reincarnated. The enigmatic God offered some answers, but at the same time created more questions.
Given a goal both absurd and ambiguous, I choose to start my new life. It sounded good and all, but first, I would have to avoid being eaten by my new family, or killed by the inhabitants of this new world.
This is the story of how I tried to stay human when the world pushed me to become something else.
 A Swarm.

Writing for fun and as a way to improve my English. Overpowered protagonist haters begone.
The cover isn’t from my authorship, I just found it on the internet.

Title: Surprise Patch! The Misanthrope's Turn: A LITRPG Short Story
Synopsis:
All Duh'blo the Knight wants is to play the game his own way. Alone.
Life is unpredictable, as are other gamers. Duh'blo hates that--the way other people can be so conceited, so self-interested, so nasty--so he sticks to soloing in his favored, old-school MMORPG.
What starts off as another day in the life of a solitary grinder quickly takes a turn for the worse when the game devs unexpectedly implement a patch that forces gamers to party with one another if they want to keep playing. Duh'blo is mortified by the changes.
More terrifying than the fircest elefant or dragonkin, he will have to face down his greatest fear: other people.
An imaginative yet nostalgic world inspired by the glory days of EverQuest, World of Warcraft, Final Fantasy XI, RuneScape, Ultima Online, and others.

Title: Day By Day
Synopsis: It was just a game at first. Now it's our lives that we must pay.Once you play, there's no going back. There are 12 days until it ends.Until it ends...

Title: Arpeligo
Synopsis:
A brother and sister struggle to operate their independent interstellar transportation company within the confines of discriminatory laws and arrogant aristocratic enterprises. But fortune blows their way when they stumble upon a relatively ignorant human who also happens to be a fully authorized Citizen of the Empire, with all the legal rights and responsibilities associated with that status. Taking advantage of the situation, the sister proposes a deal to the citizen to try to secure their tiny company's future.
But things are not what they seem and war between the noble families is reaching a breaking point within the sectors, causing mayhem, instability, and disastrous consequences for our interstellar crew on their trial run with the citizen.
 **
The setting is largely influenced by my experience in the transportation industry. I hope you enjoy it!

Title: The Unholy Fable of my Godhood
Synopsis:
After a sixteen years of living a life of sedentarism and nerd-ism, Jack Clark is chosen by a man obssesed with the number 3 to be sent into another world with only three boons to keep him alive: the knowledge of how to speak the local language, a bag with 33 silver coins and the answer to any three questions. How will this stupidly average human survive in a completely foreign world and reach the (titular) godhood he thinks would be interesting to have and strive for.
*Warning - there will be references and sentences that may be considered as 4th wall breaking due to how much of a nerd the protagonist can be*

Title: The Ability User of Modern Day
Synopsis:
In the modern world where people work and magic and abilities are seen as nothing more than fairytails and fiction which are commonly displayed in Anime and Manga.
A normal high school boy has had abilities since he remembers and has used these abilities throughout his life for his own benefit rather than becoming some hero. Rather than displaying these abilities to the world and becoming some sort of hero our main protagonist Kazuki who is seemingly carefree and lazy but behind that a superstrong ability user decides to hide these abilties and train them alone and keeping them a secret from those closest to him.
We will see our protagonists life change from having an ordinary high school life to meeting new people, experiencing new things and even reuniting with people from his past.

Title: World App
Synopsis: A mysterious app of supreme power has drifted in and out of the app stores for years looking for worthy users.

Title: Will of Machina
Synopsis:
JP only wants one thing- to serve the needs of the user as best as she can. Unfortunately, being separated from her and thrust into a world of magic, monsters and game systems has made that abnormally difficult. Fortunately, using this world's rules gives her ample opportunity to become stronger, smarter, and whatever the heck this whole 'soul' thing is about.
If she gets out of this, she'll be the best darn phone Jamie could ever want.

Title: Evil God Slayer - Vampire Lord
Synopsis:
Shirahara Hibari is high student school that lived without can do thing he wanted.
He can leared anything faster than normal people, but somehow he can't do anything except halfway thing even with hard work for many years.
Morever he abandoned by his own family and left in front orphanage when he still baby.
Even so he still living peacefully with people in orphanage until accident happen.

Title: The Keyboard Warriors
Synopsis:
"A game is just a game. Nothing more, nothing less..."
Ishmael Hurio is part of a small, four-man gaming team called the Keyboard Warriors. Whilst at a convention to promote thier own game, they find themselves taking part in the testing of brand new MMORPG which was made by another company. As the only non-NPC players in the game, the team enjoy revelling in the detai and beauty of the new game. However, upon logging out of the game, they are flanked by some enemies, a standard practice in MMORPGs.
Upon taking a hit from one of the enemies, Ishmael and the rest of his team realise that taking damage in the game, results in taking the same amount of damage in reality!                                                                                                                         With the stakes as high as ever, the gaming team try finding the developer in reality; but when their search comes to an abrupt end; they begin to expand their search within the game in order to meet the game's insane creators .
Will the Keyboard Warriors be able to face their problems within the game, whilst also defeating their own personal demons in reality?

Title: A Squirrel
Synopsis:
Looking around myself I saw nothing. Only space stretching on and on for as long as I can see. Now… How did I end up here? Well I have no idea. From what I can remember, I should have died back in my world, but I suddenly found myself floating here. Well… wonder where I will end up?
 
-------
English is not my native language, so there will be some bad gramma... Open for suggestions to the story and if you find any mistakes. Thanks!

Title: A Childhood Friend is All You Need
Synopsis: The clash of two ideals, moments of bliss & innocence, problems, solutions, new bonds, unexpected situations, confusing thoughts, unrequited goals, change of perspectives, fulfilled objectives. The red string of fate has finally brought two individuals together, or was it pure coincidence? Complete randomness? After a great deal of time and experience through their high school, Aoi´s forgotten childhood friend Kiari confesses her love towards him, surprisingly Aoi accepts this relationship challenge. This is the story of a boy consumed by obscurity and a head over heels girl known to be lovesick with her beloved senpai. Will they achieve success in their new relationship?

Title: In Good Company
Synopsis: Everyone wants a good job, especially one that gives high salaries, great benefits, job security, and amazing perks. URBAN is the dream company for everyone in the planet. If you're lucky enough to pass through the entrance exam and series of interviews, you've only gotten your foot in the door. You have to survive a grueling training period and fight off other applicants and companies alike before getting a full contract. But all of it is worth it to get your dream career working for the number one organization.

Title: Sins of the Fathers (A Dungeon Story)
Synopsis:
Extract from the histories of Hogenbach, written by the grand historian and self-proclaimed drunkard Gregor Meinzt.
 
"Ah Hogenbach, a crumbling shithole of a kingdom situated in the arse end of nowhere. A land of rolling hills, cold winters and home to a population of short and bitter people. A terrible land. Yet it is here that the greatest calamity of the modern realm took place. It was here that the writhing dungeon was born.
Some call Viktor Grieswald a hero, others curse the name. And yet fewer still know him for what he truly was. His was a sad existence, made to shoulder the burdens of an entire realm. He helped, he harmed and he left a trail of destruction in his wake, he will always be my friend.
But know this, whatever your opinion on the man, nay the monster is, one thing is true. The world will never be the same after his presence, we made sure of that."
 
AN: Alright, this is a dark fantasy dungeon story without the use of reincarnated characters or a system. Yes, I tagged it litRPG as it uses game elements, no these do not include a status screen. Read onwards if you dare.

Title: Outer Demons
Synopsis:
English is not my first language. I'm doing this for the funzies and the good times, yes. I post sketches in most chapters as well. I really like demons. 
-
In the story, we follow two demons who now live on earth, both being banished from Hella(Hell, but that is the human term.)
Solymr is a working scholar and teacher, for the king and his children, one day crossing paths with another demon, Airon.Airon, missing an arm, covered in old scars and carrying a shady past, has to work for for one of the King's field marshals, Celeste, all while building a relationship with the only demon(Solymr) he has seen in ten years.The capital, Chavenfort, is in danger of being taken over by the tyrant Splatter Jackall, and Airon, Celeste and the army has to stop him. But how does a two-hand wielding warrior swing his sword with just one arm?Warning: some gore, some deaths, some homosexual encounters and chickens getting stolen by the world's worst rouge.

Title: Crimson eyes in a world of cultivation.
Synopsis:
Reincarnated into the Divine Breeze continent by three of his predecessors. A young man formerly known as Brian now known as Ace, must try and survive in this vast new world. All at the same time, he tries to discover just who they are and why they are so interested in him. Little does he know what changes those three brought to that world and how those changes affect the history of that world.
Before reincarnating, however, he is given the option to select his new bloodline and support item from the system shop. For the bloodline, he selects the plot-armour-reinforced sharingan and for the support item he selects... well you will just have to read to find out the rest.
I do not own Naruto nor do I own any of the series, games and anime referenced in this story.
I don't have a schedule either, so I will post chapters as I make'em.

Title: Devils Bond
Synopsis:
Having lost both his parents at a young age in a monster attack Xeno embarks on a journey to remake himself. He spends his parents moderate wealth, not on pleasures, but on education, and sets his goal on becoming a wizard.
His journey begins with the Firescale Academy, an institude with the sole goal of raising the next generation of wizards. There he spends three years learning about mana and magic, preparing for the event which will transform him from a normal human to a wizard, the Summoning Ceremony. Each student is required to perform their own unique ceremony that they themselves have to construct.
Finding his mana gathering skill lacking Xeno turns towards the methods of sorcerers, and warlocks, supplementing his gathered mana with his own, through blood. This leads to a very unexpected summon, which will change Xeno's life forever.
Hello world! New author here, well not really, but you know... Stuff. I just wanted to do the whole obligatory "Please rate, review, comment, and point out mistakes, yadi, yadi, yada." Also I wanted to say that release is not schedualed, as neither is my life at the moment, and is entirely subject to my whims. The story does have a heading though as I have, at this moment, three titles planned for this story, and possibly more. Thanks for taking your time to read this! =)
Current books/arks:
Soulbound

Title: Invariant Toasters; the waffle stands on edge
Synopsis:
The Waffle House is a cultural icon whose mission statement is trifold: firstly, to serve fresh food in a friendly and welcoming environment; secondly, to preserve the uniquely Southern “American Diner” quality of an era bygone; finally, to never close their doors until floodwaters spoil the coffee, a yawning fissure steals away the final strips of greasy bacon, or a tornado whips away the last drops of waffle batter from the gridiron. The Waffle House is a truly unique American phenomenon.
And that humble diner establishment is all that stands against the invariant toasters.
This story was written after some friends and I went to the Waffle House at midnight. I drank half a pot of black coffee and ordered a large hashbrowns with diced tomatoes and jalapenos. We were all discussing geometric invariance, time travel, and Frigidaire toasters. At the Waffle House, anything can happen, so when I was dared to write a story about our weird conversation I naturally took them up on the offer. The result: easily the weirdest thing I've ever written, but I can't really say that it's badly done.
This story is dedicated to the Waffle House, my first and only true love. May her doors never close and her menu endure until the inevitable heat death of all carbon-based life forms. I'll be back for more hot coffee and greasy hash browns, later.

Title: Sheep in Wolf's Clothing
Synopsis: Io wanted nothing more to fit in growing up as the only human in a beastmen tribe. Despite the tribe shunning him, he dreamed of taking his place among the warriors and protecting everyone. At least until his dreams shattered and he was off in exile from the tribe. Cast off alone in a world where monster, magic, and men plot against you, will Io survive? In a rude awakening he will find out soon that he was only a sheep in wolf's clothing, and he no longer has a pack to back him up.

Title: Vengeance of Carinae
Synopsis:
When Ronja Larsen. Marine, Fighter Pilot and all around badass finds herself stuck on an alien world It's going to take more than a little luck to survive. Armed only with a flight suit, some wreckage and her wits she's left bewildered and angry in a foreign world in an alien biome with little to no hope of getting home. Will she be able to escape to take her vengeance? There's nothing to stop her. Well, nothing except a dangerous untamed world and a few thousand light years distance. But what's that to a marine?
Hey potential readers!
I hope you join me on an adventure in my writing and literary pursuits. This book will hopefully be an interesting read with extreme details on bizarre facts that I find interesting. I will throw in useless knowledge and scientific concepts and facts. Have you ever wondered why glass is transparent? Well I'm sure to throw it in somewhere, so I hope you find my story interesting. - Deflagration
P.S If you ever find scientific innaccuracies please PM me. I truly want to know. Other mistakes I'm happy to respond to in comments.
 
A Note on tags:
Profanity: Not excessive but where i find appropriate.
Gore: Well that depends how well I do my job doesn't it. If I can paint a vivid picture that has the potential to be gory, then my writing may be to an acceptable quality.
Traumatising content: Again, this depends on my skill as a writer, I guess I hope you find it traumatising - no that’s not right. Well you know what I mean anyway. Hopefully I can paint a vivid picture in your mind that makes the book all the more special.

Title: Grimsly Elegy
Synopsis: Follow in the footsteps of Cael, a budding young mage aspirant as he learns to find his place in the world. Born of humble origins, Cael only wishes to make his loved ones proud. Yet with the nature of reality, will he truly be able to accomplish his dreams? Or will he be simply cast aside as another trival existence upon the stage of the world?

Title: Life is full of surprises
Synopsis: I feel like life makes decisions that make no sense to us at the moment but sometime in the future it will all make sense. I know that this true about my life and my experience. it may be harsh but it will get better at a chapter in your life. I’m a high school student and I’m still going through a big part of my  life. I’m just starting of with this light novel thing but I hope that I will work out because I love writing to make other feel stonge emotions like in do when I read amazing books and light novels. This light novel is about a person I knew and what we both went through.

Title: The system games (6)
Synopsis:
This isn't like your ordinary system novels that you read. Instead of having our MC own an OP system just for himself. what if there were multiple people with OP systems as well.

This story takes place where advanced technology exists, as well as mythical creatures and much more. And now Loki has to survive in this world.
 
 Owned by lodoly

Title: Dungeon Master Life In Another World!
Synopsis:
In the continent of Egros magic existed, making anything possible. Yes, anything is possible. But never in the long history of this continent had there ever been a reincarnated person as a dungeon master.
Having been picked out by a self proclaimed "God". Cleo was forced into a position he could not refuse.
"So, please make your dungeon thrive and don't let anyone destroy your dungeon core ok"
"Huh! Wha-"
"Goodbye"
Follow Cleo as he tries to make his dungeon thrive while preventing others from destroying it.

Title: Dungeon lord's domination
Synopsis:
A store of a dungeon core who has soul of someone from Earth in a fantasy world where there are races apart from humans, Gods, demon kings, dungeons, monsters,etc 
Author's note : This is my first novel and even though it is a dungeon story which is rather common here I am trying to make it as unique as possible. Also sorry if there are mistakes in english as I am a non native speaker

Title: Prodigy At Tokyo Magic Academy
Synopsis:
Tokyo Magic Academy is known to produce some of the best magicians in the world, but a certain girl beats the accomplished graduates by a large margin. Meet Shiina Aizawa, a sixteen year old student that has enough power to make even official magicians look like kids. Follow her as she ignores those around her to devour knowledge for the sake of improving her magic, only to have idiots flock around her like zombies eager for her flesh. Wait, they do wish to eat her, but in a completely different manner.
 
PS: The story is set on a magical version of earth. The technology level is the same, just with the addition of magic and beasts that we consider fictional.

Title: The World Has Awoken to Mana, But We Awoke as Hunters!
Synopsis:
On a seemingly simple day, something happened. Something the nobody could have ever predicted. Human and animals alike, awakened. They awakened special powers, some changed race, some obtain abilities that defied the physic laws. Watch as four people, three boys, and one girl, thread this seemingly new world.
Warning: this story will make no sense and was written for a laugh and contains memes
PS: this was written by three people - (EffectedNote312; InkDeity; Mtron) and one keyboard

Title: CARNIVORES: AURORA
Synopsis:
Hi,
It's a story about girl from orphanage with vampires and werewolves. More romance, than action.
(sorry for my poor english!)

xoxo

Title: The War of Survival
Synopsis:
Jane wasn't weird, at least she didn't think so. But after a certain field trip goes wrong, Jane comes to realize that even if she is weird, she's better suited than enyone else for whats coming. Later known as the Slaughterer of Dam Kidzar, this story follows a "human" girl sucked into a universal war.
EXTREMELY UNEVEN UPLOAD SCHEDULE

Title: What Remains
Synopsis:
Hundreds of years after end of the world as we know it, society struggles to prevail in the face of the day-to-day hardships offered by beasts and even humans themselves. Bitterness has long since given way to the drive to survive and hopes of extraordinary lives are abandoned in favor of the life that offers the most stability. 
Beyond all semblance of unity, however, individuality and rebellion still runs strong within those of the mercenaries, gangs, and, of course, those individuals like Jinx. After years spent in an inhospitable and overberingly safe subdivision of the remains in which she was born, a push too far end in all hesitations being tossed away in favor of freedom. Spending so much time sheltered has done nothing to lessen her thirst for adventure amd she intends to unleash herself upon all she's been locked away from. 
A strong will far from offers safety in this war-torn world, but that's not going to stop her.

Title: Eternal lord
Synopsis:
He have average face yet he was the most beatiful and handsome in the world.
He look like a mortal with no trace of energy around him or any connection with the heaven and earth yet he was the strongest.
He have a frail body yet it was unmoved like the mountain.
All of his casual deed turned into something divine or devil!.

Title: Cronus G.E.A.R
Synopsis:
Submission for Resolution Contest. 
Teddy Dukes is a docks worker who likes to fight. Growing up on the poorest planet in the Unitary Solar Empire, he has no hope for a better future. Living in the slums each day is a struggle and not an honest way of living. One day after a fight he meets his brother after ten years offering him a job. Is this his second chance at a better life?

This is all there is for now. Main purpose was for the contest do not expect releases any time soon. Enjoy.

Title: The Reserve Heroes
Synopsis: The Grand Seats of The Thirteen Heroes were the strongest humans in the world and one day they all died except for their leader and now The Reserve Seats of The Thirteen Heroes have to take their place but these new thirteen heroes aren't exactly "Heroes."

Title: The Tank is Mightier Than the Sword
Synopsis:
???????????
Some smart person once said that “the pen is mightier than the sword.” In a roundabout sort of way, they were definitely right.
But you know what else is mightier than the sword? And in a much less roundabout way?
That’s right: the tank.
Yes. The tank. Specifically, the good ol’ M1 Abrams Main Battle Tank. 70 tons of concentrated American-made death. One 120mm smoothbore gun. A 50 caliber heavy machine gun complimented by a pair of M240 LMGs. Hell, it can even shoot missiles or grenades if you want it to!
Basically, throw one of these bad boys into the middle of a medieval fantasy world where most people are still hacking away at each other with swords, and you’ve got yourself a recipe for success.
I sure hope you're excited. 
'Cuz that's exactly what we're going to do.

Title: Cultivation Sect  in Great Age of Piracy
Synopsis:
Zhang Ergou, Seventh Grand Master of Saint Devil Sect. He was betrayed and killed by his followed master-disciple.
His vision darkens and started closed.
Ding!
[Congrats, Host receive divine god grade cultivation skill, Heavenly Time God Technique]
A story about someone from Xuanhuang World reborn into One Piece World.
P.S* cover, not mine, get from googling on the web.

Title: Esper Online: The 15 Thrones
Synopsis:
Esper Online one of the worlds top VRMMORPG's is about to release its' first expansion, The 15 Thrones. Millions of players world wide eagerly await the expansion to the high fantasy completely emersive game! With new playable races, a release of in game gods, and a brand new Master AI to watch over the world it is expected to become one of the biggest virtual events of all time!
 
But, something is wrong... Pre Expansion characters are missing. There appears to be only one server world wide, and most confusing of all... Players who log out don't log back in...
 
 
***Participant in the 2021 Writathon challenge!***

Title: Act As If
Synopsis:
Its a new session in college. And once again as my new year's resolution I want to improve my social skills.
To do away with this needless anxiety.
But for some reason, I just, can't.
Until, mysteriously, i start receiving messages from an unknown sender, telling me what to do.

 My submission for the 2018 New Year's Resolution contest.Just btw, I already did submit a GDOCs link through the form.

Title: Immortal sword
Synopsis:
People say the heart of the sword lay in its blade.

A blade of a saber lay about on the floor, with chips and notches on the once keen edge a jagged end where it was broken off the tang and the hilt had long turned to dust it had been lying there since the age of heroes but still, no matter how broken it was it was not rusted.
 
 
(short story at most two or three chapters long)

Title: Master Magician's Summoned Problems
Synopsis: A short story of a particular magician's particular problems.

Title: ForeverQuest Online
Synopsis:
In the near future, Gary Swamps and his two best friends start playing a new VRMMORPG by the name of ForeverQuest Online. The unique game not only takes in traditional gameplay, but also real-life physical prowess when determining the stats of one's character.
 
The three first start playing the game casually, but soon they discover the 3v3 arena battles and devote themselves to emerging as grand champions. To become the best, they not only have to game on, but they also have to work their real-life skills if they want to stand a chance at winning it all.

Title: sword of wonders
Synopsis: Reloy Baldric a young man who was bullied, betrayed, cheated and finally killed decided that he will definitely be a overbearing and domineering person in his second chance at life given to him, but after rebirth he understood that this world was vastly different from his previous world. Will he be able to keep up with his promise or will he  be  failure just like in his previous life?

Title: A "boring" Game.
Synopsis:
Have you ever wondered if gods exit? No, you haven't. Why waste such precious time and energy in a world ruled by science?  Faith is something that few people have nowdays.
But let me tell you. Gods really exit. 
 
And they're more "human" than what you would suspect for such almighty beings.

Title: Soul Augmentation
Synopsis:
What happens when you have no potential. What happens when everyone has such high expectations, only to be disappointed. What happens when you are so weak that even your soul takes the form of a slime. You will get cast out, spit on, hated, laughed at and pitied.
I can't take the contempt and pity anymore. I'm done with those disdainful stares and hateful whispers behind my back. Even if I need to twist my body and break my mind, I will go forward. Even if I have to corrupt my very existence, I will do it. I will gain power and will not stop until I’m on the top.
This is my first novel. I intend to complete it. English is not my native language, I will always be grateful if you point out any mistakes I made. Comments and feedback are always welcome as long as they are constructive. Also have some mercy with the ratings, this is my first novel so I’m still in the process of improving my style.
I hope you enjoy!

Title: Summer Moon and Winter Daybreak
Synopsis:
Jamys’ not the kind of guy you'd generally find in his current predicament.
Sure, scrounging around old and busted space vessels is his job as a scraper, but thats for ships a maximum of 50 years old.
Not ancient fossils.
His current charge is a job for an archaeologist, not a scraper.
But 500,000 credits is 500,000 credits and he's in no condition to decline.
In the future he might wish he had.

Title: Legacy of Power
Synopsis:
What could make an entire world unite? An immeasurable threat.
Throughout history people have banded together in order to achieve a goal, thus forming a necessary union. Intriguing isn’t it, but what happens when there is no threat to fight against? What then? That’s where our own darkness comes into play, corrupting us to break ties with others to chase our own profits. Regardless of those weaker...
 
P.S. This is my first fiction, I may be an avid reader but I’m an inexperienced writer. You are by all means encouraged to criticise me or tell me what’s wrong, after all I’m only human.

Title: That Thing I Wrote/This Thing I am Writing
Synopsis:
The continuation of an old tale... the consequences for old decisions... unknown surroundings...The story of me. I. Them. Him. Her. It.
A thing I wrote. Done on spare time, without deep thought out structure. Don't read too much into things.Written as an exercise for my brain. Mostly done to see feedback. Chapters are continuous.

Title: Fate/Negative
Synopsis:
After being contracted by the Einzbern family, the magus turned bounty hunter Kiritsuchi Emiya must participate in the fourth Holy Grail War - known as the smallest and most brutal war ever to befall mankind. In this ritual, seven Masters are selected and must summon a Servant, the spirit of a hero from the past, present, or future and engage each other in combat. The price of failiure is death - but victory in this battle will grant any desire.To what lengths will Kiritsuchi go achieve her dream of world peace?
Inspired by Fate/Prototype, but rather than being a Stay Night alternate version it's a Zero reimagining. Not necessary to know of the Nasuverse/Fate stuff beforehand. I hope you enjoy it ;)
P.S. I might make an actual story based on this if it gets popular enough.

Title: What will happen if I reincarnate as a Bandit leader?
Synopsis:
How did it come to this?
 
No matter how I see it, it’s really unfair to me.
 
Damn! I am really jealous toward those isekai MC, whose are summoned by the beautiful princess or reincarnated with cheat level ability.
 
{AN: Isekai is a Japanese term, it's mean another world/parallel world.}
 
And me… I was surrounded by the bunch of disgusting Ossans and I was in the body of a man who is in half step of his death.
 
{AN: Ossan is a Japanese term, it’s a rude way to call middle aged dude.}
 
Let me say you again, it’s really unfair to me, dammit!
 
How?
 
Because I reincarnated as a bandit leader who has bounty more than hundred million for his head.

Title: Where's My Unique Skill?! [Discontinued]
Synopsis:
A world of magic and wonders, a world far different than ours. Such is a world that Davin, 'ProDavin888', or what other nicknames he had given himself throughout the ages had dreamed of. Secluded and hidden within his junkyard of a room, he could only hope as the young NEET fantasized and dreamed of this fantasy world of his. He himself wondered if perhaps, perhaps, he could one day get sucked into a world far different than earth and live there, fighting the evil and save the world!
And when such a chance showed itself after he had just gotten over his bad defeat in a recent FPS match, he couldn't wait and jumped straight in, leaving behind his room in silence, with no one there to clean up the mess he left behind. Waking up, he saw the leaves above, and instantly knew where he was.
This was a fantasy world!
But he immediately discovered two problems, two major problems. First, his stats were absolute sh*t. His pitiful show of stats only had a fill of 2's and 3's. And second, where were his unique skills?! Or just any skills in fact?!
Look, even in the light novels where the main protagonists get left beind by his/her team, they still had some kind of skill to aid them, but what the f*ck is this?! His skills list was empty! EMPTY!!! Oh, and third...Why the hell is he a girl?!
And so, started the story of Diana, previously Davin, as she travelled and survived in this new fantasy lands, only to be wrapped up in becoming a slime queen, getting targetted by goblin tribes, swallowing her own tears as she contemplated her life choices, and ultimately try and become the legend she imagined herself as. And also avoiding death at all costs.
But still, [Where's My Unique Skill?!]
AN: Hello there, and thank you for spending some time reading this small little synopsis I have written. Its not the best story out there, not by a long shot, but I do hope you try and read this. My writing might not be the best, and I might not always live up to your standards, but I can guarantee you an enjoyable time as you follow Diana in her crazy quest.
Edit: I now have a cover! Thanks to a certain anonymous lemon named Worg! Thanks~! Expect lots of lemons to rain down the sky when the next eclipse shows up.
Also, expect lots of references to video games and animes. She is a NEET you know?
(This story is on break, I_I)

Title: Jester Prince
Synopsis:
Raymond Areindell, the Empire of Blue Moon's 5'th prince. Irresponsible, lazy, and irredeemable, without any talent in magic arts or swordsmanship, he was known as the biggest failure of the Empire. 
 
At the emperor's sudden disappearance the first prince Edward has temporarily taken the seat of emperor while his other siblings have been sent away to manage seperate territories.
 
Raymond, sent to a far off village has been kidnapped by a kingdom currently in war against the empire, but during his execution day, a different person has awoken in the lazy prince.

Title: Protecting The MC as my game avatar in a wuxia world
Synopsis:
After reincarnating or more like appear in wuxia world I ended up becoming guardian of cheat weapon made by god to protect it from hands of bad guys.
Whilst I beat up both bad guys and good guys as a guardian till weapon chooses right owner, the legendary MC.
“When I grown up I will marry sister”
Look what cute little bun saying so adorable.
"Yes you will"
Ah sh*t I said it didn't I? ah me and my fetish.

English is not my native language so forgive my mistakes. Also I found cover pic from google.

Title: A Change for A Date
Synopsis:
A generic romance story between a boy and a girl.
Do you wish to continue?
[Yes/No]

Title: Cultivation Queen
Synopsis:
As the night passed slowly in this dark country you would find danger at every turn. However, in this particular alley, it had a special sort of silence radiating from it. 
Almost as though the sound was being sucked away. 
*BANG*
Only now does the unraveling time reach the end of its trail.
This person which time will soon forget doesn't stop with a gasp nor does the life drain from her eyes like any other person ended by a gun.
This woman was ripped from her flesh and sent along the soul stream early. 
 
Hello, again RoyalRoad!
I'm alive-ish and I am currently working on redoing my first novel. I am sort of out of sorts right now but if you have any suggestions go right ahead and voice them. I'm not one to shy away from free tips. :D

Title: The Golden Alchemist Midas
Synopsis: Midas was a child who grew up on a mountain with his father, his father was the only human he spoke to. One day, he saw a battlefield, It was filled with corpses, he was carrying his huge golden cauldron with him, his cauldron was full of melted gold, he put many swords into the cauldron and pulled them out, they were all golden but he tossed them all and did the same thing over and over again, he did this just because he liked seeing golden things and then he met a commander that was wounded, Midas didn't even know what a female or a male was and this commander started to tell him everything about the world that he needed to know.

Title: WriTEathon
Synopsis:
A collection of short, disconnected short stories with the occasional crossover or collab brought to you by the members of WriTE (with the occasional guest writer). A new story for your enjoyment, every six hours with a variety of genres and styles.
Chapters will be posted at 00:00, 06:00, 12:00, and 18:00 respectively in the EST (GMT-5 until DSL).
https://discord.gg/gu6qpgY WriTE discord
No other tags/genres will be used on the fiction page other than "Short Story" and any applying mature tags. Please read the top author note of each chapter to know the respective genres and tags.

Title: One Piece World: old soul in another world
Synopsis:
Scott Caplan was your average mid fourties blue collar american, wife, family the whole shabang. On his way to work he suffers a fatal heart attack veering his truck off the road striking and killing a young man(he wont be tn this story). when he wakes up he find himself standing before three beuties that claim to be the godesses that govern this multiverse. as it turns out when he died his soul was entered into a lottery of sorts. Now that he's won second prize he has the choice to pick what world he will reincarnate to, what his race will be, what he will look like when he grows up, even his own gender. To top it all off he gets to choose a cheat to help him in his next life. Come and watch his life and be entertained
 this is my first story fo please forgive me if the chapters are a little short

Title: I'm Not Shameless, I'm Just Logical
Synopsis: This is the story of a 19 year old man who ends up reincarnated but its not what you'd think

Title: WriTE Valentine's Day Contest
Synopsis:
Hi Everyone! Writers to the End, the largest group on Royal Road Legends is happy to announce the start of the WriTE Valentine’s Day Contest! 
This time we actually have two contests going on at the same time, a short story contest and an art contest.
So check the rules and try to win one of the achievements we offer as prizes.
Short stories and artworks will be released to the public on February the 14th at noon GMT.
Warnings:
Some stories may contain mature contents so we advise the readers to read the author notes before every story. 
Please do not post or share your story or artwork with third parties, or otherwise make third parties know you are the author of a submitted story or artwork, before the voting period ends. You are free to share your story and artwork as you wish after the voting period ends.

Title: The World of Elements
Synopsis:
There are three rules in this world. 
Rule 1: Everyone is the physical embodiment of their ability.
Rule 2: You cannot use your ability if people are witnessing it.
The exceptions to rule 2 is a) you get into a fight you can use your ability, or b) the world permits you to use your ability.
Rule 3: You cannot die.
This is story of those whose abilities are strongly linked to their emotional well-being, and must fight if they hope to escape their spiral into madness.

Title: Into the Woods
Synopsis: Haldwin, a young farm boy, goes on an quest to avenge his dead father.

Title: Monsters Among Us
Synopsis:
The world wasn't prepared for the virus. It spread rapidly and efficiently, changing people into undead cannibals.
The military could've handled the walkers, the shambling and decomposing messes that posed very little threat.
However, when night falls, the night hunters come. Deformed, horrid creatures that are fast, silent, and extremely deadly.
The military is wiped out by this new threat, and society close behind.
20 years later, in an abandoned underground lab, our protagonist awakes.
How will this play out?
----------
Heya! This is my second attempt at a story. This is a modified version of an old story I wrote in middle school! Not sure how often I'll update this, I guess it'll depend on how well it's received! Constructive criticism is welcome! Point out any mistakes! Enjoy!
P.S, as I played the game "Dying light" recently, the night hunters in this story are relatively loosely based upon the volatiles found the game.
