Synopsis: There was a lonely motherless boy who had no loved ones. He had the mind to see the world's ugliness but not past it. He had a lot of fantasies and he liked video games a lot. He wanted the two to merge to form a portal into some unrealistic utopia where he could live like royalty. His father tried to reach out to him.

Title: The Chronicles of Damia - The first world
Synopsis:
Issei Yuuko, a 14 year old demihuman that has insane magical and physical ability, tries to change a world where power means nothing. This doesn't go well for him, and on his way to the execution platform a truck hits him and is transferred to another world! In this world, he discovers that he was teleported to the wrong timeline, and that he was a side character from an anime! How did he get there? Why is god named truck? Why is the 4th wall so easy to break? He'll have to answer these questions as he sets out on a journey to find meaning to his life.
 
 
 
Disclaimer: TCOD: Skyfall does not have much to offer. If you're interested in a good story, this one's not a good thing to turn to. Also, there's no set release schedule, so if you do read you might wait a long time for updates.
T/N: This is my first web novel, i've only produced manga up to this point, I hope this goes well? Don't expect this to go on long, it's a test run for storywriting techniques, it may end up being discontinued to lack of interest. If someone could take this source material and make it better, it would be appreciated?

Title: The Diamond Of Eve
Synopsis:
A Teenage boy who has grown up with a childhood bully living the normal and dull school life suddenly falls into a distorted space, with this new world he will have to face new challenges as he learns more about the dreadful and dog eat dog world alongside the bully. 
Note: This is a draft story and just me testing and improving my skills as a writer, I don't often post and I don't expect this story to be any better than your common piece of a shit story someone abandons because he has no time whatsoever so please be advised. I have 1 other story on the road, I won't even mention the name but if you find it congrats lol.. anyways enjoy. Ah and lastly, I wanted to add tragedy because something does happen but I only had room for romance, don't expect it to be all lovey-dovey.

Title: The Crystal Dungeon (Rewrite)
Synopsis:
A life ends, but the wheel keeps turning. He was expecting to live out the rest of his time happily, and finally get around to doing all the things he had planned to do, but life had different plans. 
A new soul takes his first step onto the endless cycle of reincarnation and is reborn as... a dungeon? Well, it's not like he got out much anyways...

Title: The First Evoker
Synopsis:
Thousands of years after humanities demise on earth, life has continued on in a virtual universe intended to keep the human race going. This universe was meant to be as similar to the past world as possible, with countless AIs used to mimic different facets of existence.
However, with minutes left before the end of times the man in charge of leading this effort added a few new rules to the system: magic, mythical beasts, gods, and a few more surprises.
 Through these changes humans were given a set of rules mirroring that of an RPG, with levels, skills, and Archetypes that would determine the power available to them.
 A young man, the first in the history of Tierrus, is assigned the Archetype of Evoker, one able to summon forth and shape entities from different realms of existence to aide him. With this power, he must defeat a force that is more sinister and powerful then he could ever imagine.

Title: A Students Gate to Hell
Synopsis: Our story follows us in the land of Japan, from the eyes of Yukimura Arata and his friend Akane Kaito. Our two main characters are both otakus and have enjoyed reading manga and watching anime. The story turns grim when a new school is built in their region, and the main characters start attending this school. The horrors that reveal themselves the longer they stay at this school, it feels just like out of a nighmare.

Title: My Life as a Dragon's Assistant
Synopsis:
Sealed away in the back of a remote church, he was raised to be the offering.
Every few generations, the dragon required an assistant. 
He wasn't ready.

Title: The Strongest Armor
Synopsis:
(Warning: xuanhuan with gaming elements. No harem. Warnings just in case)
(Warning: author is extremely lazy)
Li Zimu????? lived a life like a joke, born with a joke of a name, died a joke of a death. Unbeknownst to his unfortunate existence, the god above was giggling so hard snot was coming out of his nose! 
Feeling this entertainme- cough poor unfortunate existence should be given a second chance, his soul was brought up and given one wish before he was to be sent off to his next life. 
“I don’t want to die so meaninglessly again, I want to live a proper life. I wish for the strongest armor!” 
Ding! Wish granted!
 
[Schedule: 2+ Chapters a week]

Title: Journey Of The Reincarnated Necromancer
Synopsis: Will Brown was you average day high school kid, If you can count a psychopath as normal, going around torturing and murdering animals which he found fascinating. One day Will kidnapped a cat that he found on the streets and brought it to where his other 'Victims' where, he did his usual daily ritual and went back home, but as luck would have it he was murdered in the night by a robber who broke-in. When he came to he was standing in front of a being that many would call a God and got sentenced to live a life of suffering when he reincarnates, deciding against that Will made a deal with the Devil and became a necromancer to cause havoc across the world. What will happen in will's adventures?

Title: I Didn't Even Want to Live, But God Forced Me to Reincarnate!
Synopsis:
A duke’s daughter wanted nothing in her life but the sweet nothingness of death, as she felt like her life served no purpose. Her wish was granted when she was killed in an unfortunate accident, yet in a sudden turn of events, she was forced to reincarnate.
As fate has it, she was reborn in her original world, but not directly after her death. As she is living her new life, she tries to forget the pain of her old life. But, what exactly is behind her reincarnation? Will she be able to live her new life to the fullest?
This is a slow-paced life journey of a reincarnated girl who's trying to find the meaning behind her past life and reincarnation.
This novel is heavily influenced with Japanese LN/WNs, so there will be the use of Japanese suffix (-sama, -san) and terms!
 
Note :
- This novel is originally posted in my site. If you're not sure you're reading the most up-to-date chapter, feel free to check there. If you want to support this series, gain access to rewards such as advanced chapters, and help in increasing this series' update rate, please check my Patreon page~.
- Thanks for reading! Please don't hesitate to leave a comment and review, especially if you enjoy it, as it will boost my motivation ^^

Title: Demon's tale of Retaliation
Synopsis:
What doesn't kill you...
Will be your nightmare...
It will haunt you on the rest of your waking moment...
The only way to stop it...
Is to make them regret not killing you before...

Title: Re: Seven Lives
Synopsis: Seven lives and increasing difficulty, meet a person who have lived through six and is now ready for what's next to come

Title: Not Dead, Not Alive
Synopsis: This is a poem I wrote when I felt really depressed...I hope you like it!

Title: Legendary System
Synopsis:
Follow Hu Xia, our 14 years old female MC venture to the unknown Planet called Oiphus.
As she gains money with the System help and grows stronger!
"System, How can I do this again?"

Title: Once A Tale
Synopsis:
Once upon a time a snow king fell for an apathetic servant, then a prince-turned-bear found true love in a fellow prince who almost shot him in the face. Only almost. Don't worry, he didn't actually get him and they found their happily ever after (oops, spoilers).
Every fairy tale has their happy end but it looks as though these ones had to take detours and backtrack on the way to theirs... oh well!
As long as it ends well, who cares if it's a little bit odd.

Title: The Booster
Synopsis: When you are in need of a rank boost, just hire the booster.

Title: A Clash In Love
Synopsis: A widowed college student tries to gather himself after the death of his wife, rebuilding what he had lost in the meantime but can't find any reason to. After a college friend of his calls to invite him for a night out with some of her friends, he meets the people who will help and change his perspective on living forever.

Title: Metahuman Maiden
Synopsis:
Jace has travelled a long way through space to find his destiny.  His ambition is to become a metahuman warrior, but first he must withstand a series of tests set by the beautiful metahuman maiden Elthera, an officer on the decaying Lighthouse space station - the last bastion of Earthly habitation before the dark wilderness of space.
But forces of evil and darkness surround the station.  Jace may have more than he bargained for.  Can he prove himself to Elthera when they are both faced with the most dire peril of all?  And can romance blossom between mentor and mentee?

Title: Phantom!
Synopsis: Kimura Yuno's brother has been missing for two years. Suddenly, a man claiming to be his best friend and knowing where he is comes and asks Yuno a question: Won't you follow in your brothers footsteps? The only thing is, Yuno's brother is a phantom thief.

Title: Hit It Very Hard
Synopsis:
When offered the chance to be someone else, to live as a fantasy character, people invariably gravitate towards a style of play centred on fancy maneuvres and flashy spellcraft that take multiple strategic steps to outwit opponents and win glory.
Why not just cut out the middleman with a large axe and be done with it?

Title: Immortal Shards
Synopsis:
In the boundless multiverse, all possibilities, no matter how remote, exist somewhere. Universes are born, or are created, and die, or do not. In the vast Myriad Heavens Cosmos, a reality far away from our own, a mysterious energy called Mana provides the basis for both physical techniques and magical techniques, and interweaves and is part of all matter, all spirits, and all energy. Mana is the lifeblood of the world, and those who channel and cultivate its power are called cultivators, for they strive to grow along the myriad paths of power and enlightenment. There are many such paths, known as Dao, but they all feature Shards!
 
When a being, man, beast, or otherwise, gains a large enough Mana sea in their body, a crystal core, known as a shard,containing the essence of their power, the ideals and emotions that motivate them, and the essence of their soul will form. A beast which cultivates to the level of forming a shard is called a Magical Beast. A human or other being that does is known as a Mystic. 
 
 A shard may be a Mage Shard, allowing one to use mana to attack with the elements and produce fantastical, reality bending spells. A shard may also be a Warrior shard, channeling elemental and mana power into one’s physical form, shaped into projectiles, or various other uses; or it can be a Immortal Shard, with the abilities of a Warrior and Mage shard both, and others besides. Anyone who forms an Immortal Shard has the potential to shock the vast planes of reality! In the eternal struggle between the living, who will gain advantage, and for how long? Who will live and who will die? Who will protect and guide the commoners, and fight rogue Mystics and Beasts? Into this world, a child with a potential beyond his wildest imaginations is born. But on the journey of cultivation, there are no guarantees! Will he reach his fated glory, or will he die an ignoble death? This is the story of Alexander Grandstar, and even the gods may not know where it goes!
Current release schedule is 1 chapter a week, on whatever day I decide to place it (usually Saturday or Sunday)

Title: Crimson Snow
Synopsis:
Now going by the name of Grimhilde, an ancient witch is in a new world and is chosen by a widowed king to be his new queen. She suffers through her marriage for a short time before the king is taken care of and Grimhilde is left to take care of her step daughter, Snow White, and the kingdom. It doesn't take long for everything to go very very wrong. 
 ON HIATUS
*parody of the classic Snow White fairy tale 
*this is first draft and I am always open to critisism on how I may aprove.

Title: The Book of Flame
Synopsis:
The great Forgemaster of the Imperium has disappeared. Her personal forge, the Crucible of Allyn, erupted in a conflagration that consumed its host city overnight. Now her children have risen in rebellion against the Empress, guided by an unseen hand known only to Imperial citizenry as the Cabal. The Books of the Forge, a set of seven texts the Cabal claims to have been authored by the great Forgemaster, have emerged as weapons used to turn brave, loyal citizens into slavering hounds baying for blood and fire.
The Chief Librarian dispatched a brave team of warriors and scholars to Ironwrought lands seeking to recover the books that they might be translated and the lies they contain corrected. At the cost of many lives, this small group managed to acquire and transport the most important text, the Book of Flame, safely to Imperial hands.
Upon translating and reading the book, Chief Librarian Auron Lightkeeper realized the Empire's foes were not at all what they seemed.

Title: Kyōshi no pōn
Synopsis: A few years ago, a highschool that goes by the name of Shindoshi Highschool, suddenly changed to become one of the most horrifying school's in the world. The cause of this drastic change was the new headmaster himself. The headmaster has proposed a more revamped school system in which it would focus on a more physical way to teach the students how to behave in school. On the day of the change the final few students have just arrived at the school grounds. The students are starting off the new school year with little to no knowledge of what is actually going to happen to them. Soon after the gates of the school shut close, all the parents of the students were informed that theyr children will spend the next 3 years living there.

Title: God´s Games
Synopsis:
A soul lost in total darkness hears a voice and follows it. That's the start of a new adventure, in another world with many surprises, that are still to come.
Follow the story of the lost soul, who became a new person in another world full of magic and swords.
To find out the rest see the story of the Soul, that became a Legend to be told.
 
Author Note:
Hello, guys, this novel will get updated daily so do check it from time to time.
Thanks for your time and hope you enjoy the story.

Title: Adventure of li yuan
Synopsis: After undergoing his tribulation he somehow got sent into the legendary plane known as war ground plane. This plane was full of risk and opportunity but only those that was fated can step their foot in this plane. This story was the adventure of li yuan from the moment he got sent into the war ground plane.

Title: Silent Kingdoms
Synopsis:
What would happen if the Earth became over populated? You would want to decrease the population, or move some of them elsewhere, right? Seems like it would solve things. What if the governments of the world decided to get rid of the trash of society? That seems fair. What if they decided you were the trash? Not so fun now, huh?
Welcome to the world of Aezorish. This world is one created in cyberspace, full of magic, fantasy, and splendor. This cyberspace world is completely independent from Earth, no servers required. It is incredible, not to mention it was created by the top name in VR gaming, Nervous Products Interactive. However, unbeknownst to its players, this world will serve as their new home, as the governments of Earth have decided this to be their soultion to the overpopulatiion problem.
Enter Jack Frost, no not the fiction character, just someone who lives with the name. He is lonely gamer. He has no family, hardly any friends, he only has one thing going for him, his job. He spends all his money on his one joy in life, gaming. No he is trapped in this world, this Aezorish, whatever will he do?

Title: The God Hunter
Synopsis: The vast realm had no end. The dragons soared across the clouds, proudly looking down on all. Grand Immortals left behind destruction during their disputes. Laughter would be heard when the Gods exterminate worlds.  A young orphan finds himself under the care of a treacherous bounty hunter. Although his talent was questionable, his ambition to survive will live on. Following the steps of his teacher, he enters the cruel world as a bounty hunter.

Title: God of Mischief
Synopsis:
After a great war between gods I, Orlus the god of mischief was heavily wounded, my faction was wiped out and i was forced to flee.
I went to hiding in a random solar system that had an inhabited world.
 
I'll mess with the natives while I recover.

Title: New Year's Resolution (One Shot - Short Story)
Synopsis:
This was a short story submission for the New Year's Resolution contest.
Tim was a bit of a nerd and lived a reclusive life, until one day something happened. It was New Year's Day, and the start of his new life. A life he didn't realize he was actually waiting for.

Title: Just a thing I wrote a while back
Synopsis: I was going through my google docs folder and found this, gimi opinions plz

Title: What Famine Does To Someone
Synopsis: A short story about observation and surivival.

Title: Deleted
Synopsis: Was--->(First book by the by) Just thought id try my luck It was horrific.

Title: Shards of Arcine
Synopsis:
This story is rated PG-13+, and may demonstrate some more mature themes over the course of the story.
Sixty two years had passed since a near cataclysmic event had taken place, and countless tales from those times and times before have been written into history. History, in of itself, is an excellent teacher to those from many backgrounds, but at the same time, it can teach those with malevolent intent to learn from the mistakes made by collegues and similar historical figures.
History can inspire to do good whilist preventing evil, yet at the same time, can inspire evil to become smarter, and more skillful in its ways.
An adventurer, accompanied by a protective guardian, had set out on a journey to explore the world of Aequiria, inspired by the thousands of tales formed previously, to forge a tale of their own through iron and strife.
. . .
A force known as the Aegi-Machina, souls bound to mechanical suits of armor powered by magic was formed by a figure known only as the "Golden General" during the times of strife sixty years ago. Their mission is to prevent those with power from becoming too powerful and causing another cataclysmic event, and to protect the weak from tyrannical entities. A report has shown that a powerful source of energy was found to the eastern regions of Eyr, and to fufil their mission; they must contain it.

Spoiler: Spoiler


 This is one of my first times publically showing off one of my stories, and I hope not to disappoint. Thank you for taking the time reading it!

Title: Assassin's Child
Synopsis:
An ice cold boy enters the city of the dungeon. Told by his father that his place is there he arrives enter the cycle of the dungeoneer. But an unknown history starts putting him in the spotlight, and his deceased father. What will he do when he is faced with deeds done before his birth.
 
I plan on releasing one chapter a month. This is going to be a back up story when I can't think of anything for my first one.

Title: Cold
Synopsis:
The cold is everywhere
we try to survive yet all eventually reterns to it

Title: The Dungeon Calls for a Sage
Synopsis:
Archimedes was the ego behind one of the most powerful dungeons ever created. He grew and developed his halls, filling them with powerful monsters and beasts, over the course of thousands of years. He was a grand structure of ten thousand floors which even heroes had failed to defeat.
However, an Evil God had come from another world, calling himself the Demon King, and a party of heroes were sent to do battle with it. Through their victory, they obtained enough strength to breeze through Archimedes' dungeon like it was nothing. Forseeing the end of his life, and realizing how pointless his pursuit of power had been, Archimedes destroyed himself, taking the heroes down with him. 
Still, Archimedes felt despair that he had lived a worthless life as something as pitiful and futile as a dungeon. Sensing his regret and potential, the voice of the world presented Archimedes with the chance to start anew and live a more meaningful life. Thrilled and hopeful for the first time in eons, Archimedes accepted the offer, only to be reborn again as a dungeon core with not a single room or monster to his name.
Just what was the meaning of this?!
Archimedes couldn't figure out what the voice of the world was thinking. Somehow, he would have to draw a sage into his dungeon to figure it out for him.
_______________________
DCS is now a member of the WriTEr's Pledge, which means I have sworn to see it through to a satisfying end.

Title: Advent of an Assassin
Synopsis: The first thing I remember was waking up in a room full of strangers. I don't know who I am and I don't know where I come from. In a world full of lies and deception, the only thing I know is that I am a hunter, a predator.

Title: Yora Chronicles
Synopsis:
NOTE- Based on an internal discussion, please be advised the earlier chapters of this novel [Arc 0 and Arc I] is going through a major revision and rewrite to gap the 8 years experience since the first draft of this novel.  

[Arc 0 - The Prologue] 
Airen and Yuelei Casteya - Two twins separated in act of revenge not of their own doing. One is sent to the frozen north, where she is adopted by a frost phoenix and taught to survive in the harshest of conditions, eventually meeting with the forces that govern nature itself. The other is sent to the southern deserts and is saved by a band of slaves-turned-raiders who take him in as one of their own, where he eventually came into contact with a being that calls herself the History Eater.
The two sought power and the forces of the world would soon listen, but not without their own aspirations.
And perhaps if the two were to meet again, they would be so warped by their own hands and would not even recognize the other.

[Arc 1 - Disciple of the History Eater & Knighthood]

Under the guidance of Fieluri, the whimsical being from the Archive, Airen moves south to the Red Slate Republic to attend Stonewall Military Academy. There, he finds himself wrapped up in the History Eater's ploys, and at the same time, learns of the somber side of society in the slave-driven republic. Eventually, under Fieluri's instruction, he descends into the depths of dungeons where he eventually reunites with an old acquaintance.
Yuelei, who has grown used to living in the snowy mountains, moves north to the Holy Land of Ecclisa to attend the Royal Knight Academy. After Lin leaves, she slowly adapts to living with humans again, but not without ceaseless caution. The thinly-veiled peace is eventually broken, for the monsters that haunted the nights in the Whitefrost Mountains are returning once more. In response, the Holy Land of Ecclisa slowly prepare for war, but Yuelei is not just a mere bystander.
All paths eventually leads to conflict. When it arrives, one can choose to deter it away, or to revel in it.

[Arc 2 - WIP]



© 2018 by Phyantasm. All Rights Reserved.

Title: Time frame
Synopsis:
A knife-wielding psychopath entering his room was the last thing Jordan Winters saw before his full-dive vr helmet booted up. His body now lies defenseless in the real world but there is a silver lining. The vr helmet has a “synapse boost” option that can make his brain process information faster for a limited time, which creates a time dilation effect. One second out there becomes a week inside.
Within this limited time frame, Jordan must enter his newly purchased game "Mesozoic Wars", a prehistoric themed vrmmorpg, find a way around the restrictive speech mechanics to communicate with other players and come up with strategy to deal with the intruder when he inevitably has to log out.
It doesn't help that the game is very hard due to realistic survival conditions and that time dilation becomes less effective during respawns...


(This is a first draft. Content is subject to change. Releases will be wildly irregular as this is not my main project. If your cool with that then welcome to Time frame.)

Title: The Huntress and the Demon
Synopsis: The human Jyl and the demon Arick meet on the battlefield. Though they were supposed to fight, as this was a war between humankind and demonkind, instead they spoke.

Title: All For My Valentine
Synopsis: Miki finally finds courage to give the boy she loved chocolates and confess her feelings. However...

Title: Steve's Suspicious School
Synopsis:
Synopsis: Steve is an ordinary guy, studying so that he may one day become an investment banker. However his life won't be as simple as he'd hoped. A mysterious everchanging fate awaits him. What path will you lead Steve down?
Note: This book will be shaped by you the reader. Polls will determine what happens and I will simply write to illustrate it, how Steve reacts to said event and how it will affect the world inside the book. Because of this; new tags may be added before each new chapter, so if you are avoiding say horror tag, be sure to check. For instance this book could easily go from comedy romance to horror thriller depending on how it goes. Regardless I'm sure this will be a fun expereince for all, except maybe Steve. 
Also do note that this is a work of fiction. Any resemblance to real people or places is purely coincidental. I do not own nor did I make the cover picture. If the owner would like me to remove it please do not hesitate to message me. The original can be found here: https://static.zerochan.net/Ian.Olympia.full.1001547.jpg

Title: Melvin The Necromancer
Synopsis:
Melvin is a D&D player that likes to go off on his own and kill everything in sight.  After losing his Paladin to a Vampire Lich, he and his friends go to a party for a night of hot girls and booze.  Since, they are underage they need to use fake IDs to get in the club.  
Things don't go well.  He takes a mixed bag of nearly every drug imaginable and goes berserk.  In his inebriated  state he is easy prey for an old fashion necromantic summoning and soul binding ritual.  
Now in a new world and a new body he has to cope with never getting laid as an undead Lich. 
Watch as he leads an uprising to break free of the necromancer's compound only to find a world that is unwelcoming to undead.  Prepare for brutality and memes as this sarcastic and angry player has to lead a bunch of noobs through a unforgiving world.  There will be blood, body parts, and lamentations.

Title: Reason
Synopsis:
[High fantasy reincarnation, Cunning pragmatic MC, Politics and Military]
My life ended, not by mistake, but by chance.
My life ended in some stupid circumstance.
My life started, not by chance, but by inevitability.
My life started anew in a twisted reality.

Genius girl with daddy issues gets reincarnated to another world with magic and guns, around 18th century ish?
NOT MEDIVEL because god knows we don't need ANOTHER one of those.

What I hate about novels, and what you'll hopefully not find in this novel:
- Lack of consistency
- Lack of an end goal, and instead getting an endless loop of challenge and powerup cycle, with the only goal of 'getting stronger, because'
- Lack of logic in world building. When you think about it, Adventurers are glorified hunters and mercenaries, and that an organized army is more profitable and manageable then random 'adventurers' running around your kingdom. I want to kill myself every time I hear that fucking word.
- 2 dimensional characters, or dumbing down everyone else but the main character to make her look smart.
- Illogical actions, over complex actions or just random actions. Actions should have a purpose and a reason.
- Stupid pretentious names like the "9 Purpule Ancient Emporer Heaven Piercing ThunderSrike Technique" ...That's just a sword swing...

Schedule is whenever I feel like it, because else it would become a chore, and we would both benefit if I enjoy writing.
First novel, English secondary language, so expect style changes and grammar fixes constantly throughout the series.

Title: Know who you hate
Synopsis:
Ever wondered what it would be like to meet someone who hates you but when met face to face doesn’t even know who you are? Ever wondered what it would be like to just go with something on a whim, and end up having the beast time you’ve had in a long time? This story isn’t just your typical summoned hero story. I don’t try and pretend that what I’m doing is original. There are many stories like it, yet I believe mine has something no others do. That something is my messed-up imagination.
I’m writing in Word so there shouldn’t be any major mistakes with spelling or grammar, but if the sentences themselves don’t make sense, that would be because English is not my first language. I know it well enough to have a conversation but some of the things I want to write don’t fall into things you pick up in daily conversations.
No set schedule because I do this on weekends and during school. So not exactly the most time in the world to be doing this. There will be more if I get some interested people by the next time I go to post.

Title: From Dusk
Synopsis:
Moonlight falls upon a sea of corpses,
All thats left are knights without horses.
They will not falter they will not run,
They fight to see the burning sun.

 
 
Hopefully this will be a short story which I successfully finish.
It is not fully fleshed out yet but I decided to do this for Lent and wanted to get something out
I will come back and review  and rework what I've done when I get the chance.

Title: Terrortorial
Synopsis:
Dead yet not dead. Blood but not mine.
Carnage all around, destruction throughout time.
I'll take this here land and put down a sign.
Fight if you want but this territory mine!
 
A simple verse that conveys my feelings, I'll protect what is mine regardless of the opposition. 
I am Z and I will thrive.

Title: Psychic desu ga, nani ka?
Synopsis:
I died and was reborn as a psychic. I've arrived in a harsh world. Here, great powers of mind, magic, and muscle are needed to survive amongst the monsters and hostile foot fungus that plague the land. 
Now, I can read your mind so I know what your thinking.  Your thinking, "Should I check this out? Also, I’m hungry.  Should I get some Indian food tonight?"  The answer is yes to both questions, but I warn you, both may cause extreme diarrhea.
 
Inspired by Kumo desu ga, Nani ka? and other LN, as well as Royalroadl litrpgs like Randidly Ghosthound and Arcane Emperor.

Title: Grinding to Become a Protagonist
Synopsis:
I was am a pathetic highschooler with a desire to change my life. Magic had always been my favorite hobby. Whether it was reading books on magic tricks, studying ancient texts that were posted online by high level druids, or watching anime with lolis smacking each other with colorful spells, I was dedicated in my pursuit of the ways of magic. Maybe a part of me thought that learning magic would add some meaning to my life? 
But there was one question I never asked myself: What would I do once I learned magic?
Follow my journey attempt to rise up from a low level noob to becoming an all powerful magician!

Title: The Pirates of Al Ghul
Synopsis:
Nowa Al Shams was born in the capital city of the country of 'Ardu Altanwir, Jalalat Alshams. Her family was mostly military, and she was the heir of the great Al Shams clan, one of the greatest family of knights in the world. However Nowa longed for adventure, and after her family has finally went too far in their controlling of her life she decided to fufill her dream of seeing the world. In the end though, the life of an adventurer didn't go so well for her and derailed her plans. she isn't alone in the ride, she would have the people she met during her journey along with her to support and fight alongside her during her journey out into sea.
SLOW BURN RELATIONSHIPS.
The story is going to be written whenever I have free time so please don't expect a consistent release schedule. 
Prologue only for now. Will be writing the next few chapters first before I post it.
Edit 7/5/2018: Right, so I'm probably going to have to rewrite everything from the beginning again cause I have added things into the lore that I didn't have before but it turned out quite important so I can't remove it and that ruined my whole timeline. So yea, back to the beginning of world building and timeline planning.
!DISCLAIMER! 
THIS STORY WILL HAVE LGBTQA+ (MOSTLY YURI) RELATIONSHIPS AND SEXUAL ORIENTATIONS. SLIGHT GORE AND SEXUAL SCENES (ALL MUCH LATER INTO THE STORY). I WILL ADD THOSE INTO THE CONTENT WARNING ONCE I CONFIRM THAT I WILL INDEED ADD THAT INTO THE STORY.

Title: King Slime:From an Experiment to A Ruler, Backstory of a Boss
Synopsis: No adventurer thinks that a monster has a backstory before they kill it, but every monster has something.  And even a lowly Slime may become a potent threat, given the right set of resources and a bit of luck.

Title: Gabriel "The Bastard Son"
Synopsis:
Gabriel is a young boy with very unique appearence and thus he is subjected to a lot of bullying,His only desire is for the days to pass so he can escape to his room.His days are quite normal except the fact that he suffers at the hands of other kids,that was the case untill his encounter with Kevin,a scientist with a dramatic backround and a will for revenge.Gabriel finds out that he is not a normal human and Kevin explains to him that various paranormal creatures roam the world,creatures from tales and myths are responsible for the most evil of crimes and Gabriel will use his powers alongside Kevin to bring justice to this so called "normal world".In his quest Gabriel will come across a lot of historic and mythical characters/beings that will help or oppose him...
 
Author's Note-
Gabriel's story is a very long one,the novel will go on for a long time,more and more chapters will be released that are going to explain the main plot of the story.The story will unfold slowly and the major parts will come soon enough.If you like the story,please rate and if your main issue is the bad writting,I apologize,I will try to improve as I go along.English isn't my mother language and I am taking lessons at the moment.Please be patient with me.

Title: Hero of two worlds
Synopsis:
This my first time actually writing a fan fiction and as English is not my native language please bare with me. This fanfiction is actually a little guilty pleasure of mine, and as I don’t really like angsty stories that just have the main character behaving like a child with the world out to get them there will be a few clichés and an overpowered main character. As I said I’m new to this whole writing thing so cut me some slack and constructive criticism is welcome. There won’t be much character interaction in this first chapter because I want to get some character building for Harry going before getting to the meat of things I intend to try finishing this fanfiction I don’t want to finish it halfway so please bear with m,e it will be slow build up at first and I suck at battle scenes I’ll try but this will mostly be him kicking ass. thank you.Then let’s get ready for the disclaimers;I do not own Harry Potter or the franchise as I am not J.K. Rowling
At age 7 Harry was a mature child he grew up being generally despised by his relatives and being treated like an indentured servant he was never physically abused but he was forced to do more chores for Less food. As usual on his birthdays hear the woman's voice reciting strange words that he couldn't understand fully. On that same day he awakens a strange ability anything he writes becomes reality. A week later and a plundered Library he unknowingly write a wish after bad argument with his relatives at the same time as a ritual was being carried out in another world and vanishes. Four years later he returns a fully accomplished hero and mage.

Title: The Chronicles of Artharian Dagworth
Synopsis:
Back in 2020 there were many theories on how the world would end. From the many religions apocalypses, nuclear wars that would leave the planet inhabitable, global warming doing the same, biological weapons getting out of control,  viruses mutating into unstoppable diseases to the dead raising to prey on humanity, either due to a virus or just because hell filled up. 
Also, aliens, from the war mongering kind to the ones so advanced they didn’t see us as more than worms. And of course there was the fail proof theory that the world would end when the sun died. In a bunch of billion years give or take. Althougth some new scientist were discussing if the end would be on the take side, since when the sun started dying things would go haywire on the entire solar system and we would collide with mercury or maybe mars way before the expanding sun engulfed earth. But I digress… 
Now, those were the mainstream theories that the everyday Joe, who didn’t know the big secret, worried about.
So, if you were to ask me which theory was correct I can tell you that I haven’t seen any little green man, at least not from another planet, and so far the sun is still shining, although it’s been only 9 years since everything went to hell, not the few billions (give or take) the scientist predicted, so that one isn’t ruled out yet. These two aside, I'd say all of them. 
 
Hey everyone, this is my first attempt at writing. I have been planning to do it for a really long time, and while this is not the one epic fantasy idea I ever wanted to write, I think it's a good one. The plan is to write an end of the world urban-fantasy series. Think a world like Dresden Files, Alex Verus, Iron druid, where magic is real but exist hidden from society meets the apocalypse. It will be written in first person in the Dresden Files style, no plans for other POV for now. As you probally alredy guessed from my style, english is not my first langague, so while google corrector helps, expect grammar errors, and I'd be gratefull for anyone to point them. 
I plan to write 2 to 3 chapters a week, 2000-4000 words each. Might change as I get more experience and depends on my free time.  
 Cover image from the colections of getwallpapers.com

Title: [Hiatus] God of Plants
Synopsis:
World A-13, a planet containing harsh jungles, smoldering volcanoes, and ice pillars all within miles of each other. On this planet, only those who live near oases survive while all others die due to the harsh environment outside of these safe havens. All of this stands true until Jean Kwon’s soul is transferred into A-13. Whether this event was for the higher beings’ entertainment or to create a catalyst for rebellion, Jean begins to explore the new world presented before him and traverses land that no other had dared to explore before. 
How does Jean do it? 
Plants.
Come, watch our main character ‘grow’ to become a God of Plants.

Title: Shattered Memories of a Broken Core
Synopsis: Life was never easy. He didn't know how or why, but it never was. And it most definitely didn't become any easier after what happened.Broken, fragmented, in pain and confused. That's all he knew. No inkling as to how or why. Only the nagging feeling that something was missing.A word. A name? Who's name? It didn't matter.It was his now.And sooner or later, what is missing will be his again as well.

Title: Lawless
Synopsis:
There was a war and there was death. Few survived, animals, plants, places and people. The war broke the earth forever and no one can fix it. But the living can still thrive.
There is a town were there is no such thing as law. 
When theft is a sign of appreciation...
When arson is another term for thanks...
When kidnapping is a way of showing compassion...
And when murder is a word for I love you.
In that town, you cannot trust a stranger, an acquaintance, a distant friend, a neighbor, a bethroved, a best friend, and you very own family. Death is a way of life there. Nothing can stop man from being ruthless. No one is normal anymore...
Except for the Notables.
They are people who are not like those heartless psychopaths.
 Jason is not a Notable... nor is he a Commoner. He is a nobody. All he wants to do is to destroy the town and save all Notables. He would literally kill for it.

Title: The Sword Mage
Synopsis:
Dragon Age: Origins fanfic featuring an original character whose life intersects with the Mage Warden's before the start of the game's events. Knowledge of the game is not needed, as most concepts are explained or can be puzzled out.
The son of a pig farmer gets taken to the tower where all mages are kept. Illiterate and quiet, he watches the lives of the mages from the sidelines and slowly learns the meaning behind the power that he had been given.
I'm posting this for archival purposes. I really enjoyed writing this a few years ago, and it's a shame to leave it to waste in my documents. There are 6 chapters / 12k words written, enough to pass a few hours if you like my writing, like slow-paced fantasy, or are bored enough.

Title: Nightmares
Synopsis:
Something is coming, and humanity isnt ready. The Gods were meant to prepare warriors in hopes of fighting It off. But there was a miscalculation. It would arrive centuries earlier than expected, and the army being built to stop it would not be complete when It arrives. So the Gods have activated a backup plan put in place in case of an emergency. They have activated an ancient system used long ago in an attempt to strngthen humanity for Its arrival. All of humanity will be thrusted into the nightmare system, and given the opportunity to strengthen themselves, or die against the new nightmares unleashed on earth.
 
*cover art is not mine*

Title: Antipode
Synopsis:
The world was thrown into chaos when the two alien ships landed, one in China and the other in Argentina. Massive earthquakes and power disruptions originating from the two vessels caused widespread destruction. It took the best efforts of the world's leaders to prevent war, and even then, there were a few rogue skirmishes. The United States and the Russian Federation had their nuclear missiles primed for launch. Fears of espionage surfaced, a cold war state reemerging in the world. Riots broke out in every country. The world came as close as it had ever been to total annihilation.
But somehow, the world restabilized. Over the years, with the two alien vessels remaining dormant, it slowly became clear there was no immediate threat. The world became more united than ever, with almost every nation working together to figure out what the purpose of the alien vessels was.
Five years after their arrival, Elysia discovered something amazing. She somehow knew how to understand the aliens; she could figure out what it was they wanted. There was only one thing in her way: she was a simple nobody, and she had to get into the two most heavily guarded military bases in the world, and then convince the world's leaders that what she knew was true.

Title: And Thus, We Hoped
Synopsis:
The sun was dying, and Earth slowly became a frozen wasteland.
Amidst the violence and the wars and the battles, a single ship was sent into the stars.
A vessel that contained the future of ?humanity?, built with the meager, remaining resources of a certain group.
A vessel built from the will of the people who wished for the human race to continue on.
What was the chance that it would complete its journey?
What was the chance that it would find a planet suited for life?
No one knew. And no one could guess.
And once the ship left, there was no more they could do.
And thus,?we?Hoped.

Title: A Wizard of the past
Synopsis:
The beast that he commanded was on the verge of escaping. In his final moments, he consumed all that he could muster to cast the spells that would cost him all that he had - his life. The first whisper bound the beast to the object of its demise, the second caused it to shatter and the third dispersed its remains throughout the world.
-
As time passed, the seals weakened. The power of the beast began to leak and corrupt the lands. In these times of choas, the world once again needed a savior, one that could command the beast.
 
Revised and rewritten as of 9/12/18.
Please understand that this work may change as ideas pop up and the impact of criticism from the readers will affect overall how things will pan out/change.

Title: brief
Synopsis:
A collection of brief writings.
 
All warnings applied because I might use them in the future.

Title: Ordeal
Synopsis: If the world goes great then we may one day create a wonderful game. This is what I imagine the game is going to be like. I am going to focus on two player who will come together and forge the start of the game.

Title: When The Cherries Blossom
Synopsis:
It all began in december. While Yuu and Aiko were moving from their parents house to a new complex. The complex had 2 seperate rooms, a shower, one kitchen and a living room.
While they were living together they started to get more comfortable with eachother by the day, since the were little kids Aiko has been in love with Yuu ignoring the fact that they are siblings. How will this effect their school life.

Title: Cultivation in the Tian Family
Synopsis:
This is a story, depicting a young boy who got adopted into the Tian Family. 
His experiences while cultivating himself, and how having a Godly family as your backing is just overpowered.
~ I will use the Tian Family name, same as BaiSiwa in N1UH does. I will use similar aspects as Sudra in tORC, but I'll try to give my own fantasies on top of that, not making it better, not using their actual characters, but simply using some of their concepts~
Oh, and yeah, go comment on what would be cool, cause it would actually be very cool, in your own story that is^^
I Tagged it as Wuxia, though I'll actually want to go into something similar to Xianxia, well that Tag doesn't exist, so I used the closest to it~

Title: The Salamanders
Synopsis:
Hadica was built around one of five Towers, an infinite structure filled with floors of monsters, magic, and treasures that the city plunders like clockwork. Most of the city, at least. Growing up in Westhill, Micah's family abstained from all of their Tower's bounties. He became an [Alchemist] at an age younger than most and just wanted to level in peace, but soon ran out of mundane ingredients to brew into potions. Ryan is a budding [Fighter] with the strange ability to mimic beasts, including monsters, but he doesn't understand it or even himself. After a Tower climb goes horribly wrong, their lives and the world around them begin to change as they try to figure out who they want to be.
The Salamanders is a slow-paced story about characters growing up in and exploring a fantasy setting. It updates sporadically. Please mind the tags.
Also, there is a Discord now! Click here.

Title: The transmigrated Emperor Of Mankind is a hikikomori girl?
Synopsis:
The 31st Millenium! 
 
Mankind spreads across the galaxy as the dominion of the Emperor Of Mankind! Everything is going nice and all, but, BAM! Horus, favored son of the Emperor himself, somehow got corrupted by the power of Chaos, began to betray the Emperor and the rest of Mankind, moving his legions of corrupted troops to strike at the back of his father! One thing after another, after their duel at the climax, Horus died, the Emperor did not fare better, staying half dead, connected to a life support device for eternity until he decides to wake up. Is that the end? It was supposed to be so, but... 
 
"where am I..." 
The girl slowly opened her eyes and muttered... then froze up for a good 5 seconds.
'Wait... what happened...? WAIT, SOMETHING DID HAPPENED. WHAT THE HECK!? EH!??? FOR REAL!??? EHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!?????" 
~
This is the tale of a transmigrated legendary being, the respected, powerful God Emperor himself, inside the body of a good-for-nothing-but-pretty college girl! How will the 31,000 years-old being, all by himself (herself) copes with society, school, peoples at least thirty thousand years younger than him (her) and his (her) similarly weirdo family?
 
_______________________________________________________
(The content of this novel could be intentionally confusing or not, as it is a project that just kind of happened after the author went through a 20 hour web novel binge reading marathon without any coffee)

Title: Mercenary King
Synopsis:
It was supposed to be an ordinary day for Edward James a PMC, it was the usual escort mission until a IED explodes and stops the vehicle he was in with the precious cargo. Thus the convoy is now in a gunfight with the local rebels, while Edward was trying to protect the precious cargo he gots shot but still manage to escape the kill zone with the precious cargo and his team but still dies from blood loss in he end.
Edward then appeares in a white space not knowing what to do then he hears a voice.
( ??? ): Hello Edward
 
P.S. This is my first novel and english isnt my first language, so expect to see some gramatical errors and missplled words.

Title: Song of the Silver Moon
Synopsis:
Ark is a Wolven pup taken hostage by the humans after a failed uprising. He finds himself alone in an unfamiliar environment, surrounded by those he was taught to hate and be wary of. 
And then everything changed when he forged a bond with the last person he expected of befriending him--the child of his father's killer.
What awaits the two unlikely friends?
...
Title and synopsis are to be edited in the near future.

Title: I am but Divine
Synopsis:
Being a god is a dream. A very big, ambitious dream that probably no one has ever achieved. In the world of Taerrea, there were a set amount of gods that ruled over the world; the god of war, the god of the skies, the god the earth, etc. and that the general rule of thumb was that the numbers of the gods could not be added nor removed. That changed after one fateful event.
Nemer, a Slayer, had died from a battle, and from a deal he made with a doubtedly wise god of wisdom and knowledge, Wize, he became the first ever lesser god.

Title: Krasnovaar
Synopsis:
What happens when gods abandon the world and wage wars between themselves? What happens when they die and abandon the world that so despererately needs them? Does the world perish or does it find a way to survive? 
This world was saved by creatures known as Deyras, avatars of their gods. But the world wasn't same. It was destroyed and perverted. But after some time they disappeared too, leaving broken world to all the mortals. 
As last resort, all mortals tried to summon heroes from another world. But this plan failed and made the world even worse.
However, this isn't story about someone being summoned in another world. This is a story about a certain boy, whose only goal in life is to survive.

Title: The Old Steward Journey in Cultivation World
Synopsis: Old man Wu has been living for more than 60 years old. In all his life he never been able to do something big, yet an encounter with a supreme individual change all that.

Title: Dawn of the Apocalypse
Synopsis:
The situation on Earth had always been the same. There were the rich who towered over everybody with their wealth and influence. The poor who had nothing to their name and were below the rest. Then there were those in the middle who were the majority, having money but not as much as those at the top of the hierarchy. 
This didn’t matter anymore as today the modern society would be abolished and a new society, one which was controlled by true power rather than money and connections would be born.
Even if someone in the past had the influence and money this would not matter if they could not adapt, they would simply perish if they were unable to leave behind what they had in the past and become strong enough to survive in the new world.
The same as the poor, if they were unable to seize the power to change their fate and remain as the ants in society they would also die, however if they were able to break away from the inferiority they felt in the past and gain true power to become strong enough to survive in this new world.
In this new world nobody held an advantage and it was those who took the risks and fought with everything on the line including their lives that reaped the rewards and benefits while those who hid away and risked nothing would in turn gain nothing and remain at the bottom of this new world unable to change their fate.
Whether they were a man or woman, rich or poor, a CEO or an employee all people within this new society were equal when the time would come and only those who were brave enough to control their fate would be able to stand on top of the world and claim whatever they wanted.

Title: A Contradictory Hero
Synopsis: Bored guy gets Reincarnated, This is the story of his adventure, to just fight, and of course make a harem along the way, this is a story with Isekai elements (Obviously), so yeah lots of anime-ish stuff, expect lots of funny moments (First story, please don't be gente)

Title: New Australia (A LitRPG)
Synopsis:
The game-like alternate dimension of New Australia teems with life: humongous beasts, flourishing civilizations, and a bewildering array of lush ecosystems.
The only problem (aside from the constant war that plagues most fantasy lands): humans.  The World Government is sending all its unwanted humans to New Australia.  Murderers. Political Dissidents.  Assorted felons.  It's not technically the death penalty, and it saves a bundle on prison expenditures.
Then there's Jerome, who just happened to be at the wrong place (sneaking into a top-secret government facility) at the wrong time (when it was guarded, aka all the time).
Can he make it in this fantastic new world?  More importantly, will he stay a child, or will he become the hero that New Australia needs?
-----
What should you expect?
* Tactical action scenes (LOADS of them)* Starts with some light-hearted comedy before getting serious* A mysterious world with bizarre but consistent internal logic* MC grows from bumbling idiot to whirlwind of death* Also some emotional character development, if you're into that kind of thing* Stat sheets!
-----
I have signed the pledge to finish this story.  All I had to do was give them a drop of blood and my true name "just in case".

Title: Apocalypse is Another Word for "Fun"
Synopsis: James led a fairly boring life, dabbling in some of the darker side of human sexuality but generally trying to be a decent person.  After the world ended with a series of man made virii being released among the power countries of the world killing and bringing back most of the population as walking dead he slowly begins to change.  He starts to realize the power that he holds as one of the only immune individuals who is completely ignored as potential lunch by the world of walking dead surrounding him.  Watch as James develops this power into getting everything he wants.  Just how dark can a person really go when they have no one but themselves to keep their actions in check?

Title: Necromancer of Valor
Synopsis:
Anastacia Mournvalley is a born and raised necromancer, and a powerful one at that. She had never liked the way necromancers lived and so escaped her home country with the aid of an adventurer called Gilbert, She had hoped to start a fresh life as an adventurer in the city of Valor. With her upbringing still haunting her it turns out to be a lot harder than she thought. Luckily she has a few new friends by her side.

Cover art by: Overcomplicated Appleπ
Go check out the rest of her art from the link!

Title: I am a Guardian in another world!?
Synopsis: Lawrence Carstein, a marketing executive from Singapore is a long time player of the VR MMORPG, Ever Dawn. However, a fatal electric surge sends him into another world, a world where he retains his character from Ever Dawn, a Level 99 Guardian in a world full of war, political intrigue and nobility!

Title: King Of The Broken World
Synopsis:
CURRENTLY ON HIATUS AND IT WILL GET A REWRITE SO DONT BOTHER READING YET

Fire King, Wind King, Iron King, Alchemy King, Martial King
For millennia the five kings have ruled the world while competing among themselves for territory and resources but the balance is broken when the world starts to break and the powerful energies of the nucleus are unleashed upon the surface, now the kings must fight for the few stable territories if their forces want to have any hopes of surviving
But among the leftovers of the destroyed lands the few survivors gather and become stronger until a new Shadow King emerges among their files, and when the Shadow King learns the truth behind the breaking world... the five kings will fear for their lives!
..................
Lionel is a small fry in a big world but even the small fry can dream, together with his sworn friends they have a plan to slowly build their strength and become respected names in the world through effort and dedication, they travel and train, they buy and sell, they work and fight aiming to become a great forger, a great alchemist and a great warrior, but when the world breaks and danger lurks everywhere the chances to die are as big as the chances to reach impossible heights
And when the world demands the birth of a new king; then a new king shall be born!
 
 
..................
 This is a story that develops many of the things I wanted to see in xianxia/xuanhuan (there is no xianxia tag so I went with wuxia) but never saw in a prominent role, or not prominent enough
There is development of magic technology like talismans and rationalizations to some aspects of cultivation
There are explanations to how a cultivation technique actually works… it works with magic but there are explanations of how that magic behaves
There is an answer to the nonsense of being eternally cultivating just to reach the next level
With armies fighting instead of lone murderhobos
With base building and technomagic production
In a setting that is a mixture of western and oriental fantasy so expect to see magical jades and adamantite weapons
The plot has already been plotted so the story has a clear direction and ending
 
I am in a dire need of an editor for some details that may and will slip as I’m not a native speaker

Title: Enyatta; Daughter of the Library
Synopsis:
This is a story. Although at the moment it is more of an info-dump. Its good info though. Promise. It details the journey of Enyatta, chosen one, master of chaos, ward/ kidnap victim of the Librarian as she attempts to find her way home to Earth. Or at least that is where she wants to go now. It could change. I (the author) am on this journey too. I invite you to join me in rooting for Enyatta as she tries to master her fate and find her family.
 
(This is my first story, like, ever. Keep it in mind.) ;-)
 
(Also, the image was found using a google image search for a picture without a license. Hopefully I won't get sued over it. If you want to sue me over it though, I would be happy to take it down. No need for drastic measures.)

Title: Trash Souls
Synopsis:
Everyone wants to write their own story eventually they want to share it this is mine
Danny is crushed by a trash truck and instead of dying he is transported to another plane. He has no idea what happened and wakes up into a world of trash and giant billowing smoke stacks slowly billowing into a green sky.
this story contains: Rape, Slavery And Cannibalism as well as many other things that shouldn't be mentioned in polite company

Title: A Skin-Changer's Tale
Synopsis: The tale of a boy, and the man he becomes. Wildling child to something... Greater? Raider, Herder, Trader, King-Beyond-The-Wall, Invader, Reaper, Raper, Pirate, Explorer, Husband, Father. 100% more wicked and cruel than Game of Thrones.

Title: The Entry Book
Synopsis: What can this person do to survive brutal death that may chase him from many different directions? Simply, 40 entries and a little thinking would help keep the soul intact to their body. Will this person get caught and killed? Who knows?

Title: Gods & Overlords: The Collector
Synopsis: WIP

Title: AEO  Alt Earth Online
Synopsis: A bleak future that was tempered with an online paradise, but all is not what it seems, signing up to be a miner for Evraz corp granted Lightborne with access to the Game played by millions.  However, it soon became clear that it was a trick, with no way out of the contract every missed quota meant another day added on.

Title: P.U.R.A.I.T
Synopsis: A World Of Magic where the soul's flame lets you use magic. The magic is called a Talon. The only catch? You can only learn the type of talons that your soul can synthesize with. Most humans can use three talons but the only problem is that the more types of talons you can use, the more the soul's flame burns the talons meaning that there's a chance you will lose the ability to use a talon. You can also choose to only learn one type of talon even if you can learn multiple but that magic will be significantly weaker by times how many other talents you can use. Eon Purait is a high school student that learns magic but one day, his class does an experiment to find out their talons. Eon is the last to find out what his talon is. He was hoping for something that could help humans but what he got was nothing. That nothing gave him a talon, that if used correctly, could end humanity.

Title: The Ten Realms
Synopsis:
People Started falling down in pain at first.
Then they saw screens and could sense an energy within them called mana by the screens.
These people could gain skills, cast magic and do the impossible.
Two weeks after, without fail, they disappear, never to be seen again.
It was called the two week curse.
Erik West was a combat medic, he was trying to save his friends lives, then he was blown up, leaving him with just one arm. At first he thought he had an infection, but then comes the news. He has the two week curse.
Let's just see if there is such a thing as healing magic.
 
Current release schedule:
3 chapters per week, coming out on Monday, Wednesday and Friday
 
Patreon supporters can read ahead as well get access to other benefits!
https://www.patreon.com/michaelchatfieldwrites

Title: Aquatic Breath
Synopsis:
Feng Li, a high-school dropout, spent his days and nights playing online games on his computer.With no directions in life, he had no motivation to continue studying or to search for a job.During a stormy evening, his apartment got struck by lighting and his proximity to the outlet caused him to get electrocuted.Fortunately for Feng Li, the cycle of life and death continues.  His spirit crosses over to a different place, to a world where magic exists and gods walk among mortals...However, karma strikes and Feng Li gets reincarnated into a... Fish?!

Dangers and treasures are only two sides of the same coin!This is a story of reincarnation and cultivation with start settings on Hardcore.Join Feng Li on his adventurous journey to become the greatest version of himself.

Title: Bad Company
Synopsis: The very thing every mother warns her children against.

Title: Gardener of Immortality
Synopsis:
All beg for his herbs. All praise his pills
Even the celestial emperor is courteous before him as he is the gardener of immortality
He was the Alchemy Emperor In the past life and now will conquer the universe I’m this one.
 
updates probably 1-3 times a week. Not devoted yet

Title: D-INJECT Second Birthday
Synopsis: Heaven's memory of the past three years has come to a close. The supernatural battles in Evo City have become few and far between. The Demons have resigned themselves to peace for the time being. But the silent peace of the last three years is torn apart when Nina launches a devastating attack that sets the eyes of the world upon Evo City. Now countless new enemies take their positions on the board, and in the midst of the coming battle, Heaven faces a truth that destroys him. He is left lost at a fork in the road. He can either fade away with the dying city, or change himself entirely. life.

Title: Grinding in Vast Martial World
Synopsis:
I loved the consept of Mr.Puddles4263-sama when he wrote Vast Martial World and wonted to continue it. but isnce I still have hope that it'll get continued I will have it start with a different person and different sect. 
 
-Real Synopsos
 
The story fallows young Patriarch Sam. A 12 year old homeschooled child with the habit of talking to himself, as he plays the new game Vast Martial World. After spinning the Lottery he gets the demon race Ivory Oni. Will he raise his sect to greatness or will it collapse under the weight of conflict both internal and external?
 
 
Author 
I'm bad at writting but want to get better. Please help me become a great author and I'll do my best to write good stories for you.

Title: Star Wars: Lost Hope
Synopsis:
Failure.
The REBEL ALLIANCE is on the verge of defeat. Following a daring mission to the Imperial research facility on Scarif, ROGUE ONE managed to capture the plans to the EMPIRE's new and powerful superweapon: the DEATH STAR. Putting the lives of the entire galaxy on the line, BAIL ORGANA entrusted the delivery of those plans to his daughter, Princess LEIA ORGANA.
However, the EMPEROR's apprentice, DARTH VADER, tracked the Princess and her ship, apprehending the rebels and confiscating the stolen plans aboard the TANTIVE IV. With the plans and the Princess in his possession, Darth Vader returned to the Death Star to destroy the Alliance's HOPE once and for all.
The fate of the galaxy and the balance of the FORCE are irrevocably changed as the Princess of Alderaan learns the true nature of the DARK SIDE....
 
(This story is a complete reworking of the entire Original Trilogy. I'm going to be borrowing material from both canon and legends because of it, but everything prior to A New Hope, including Rogue One and the Clone Wars, is all taken as true. 
This will be the first book in a trilogy I'm hoping to make, so stay tuned or leave some comments if you have any ideas on how I can improve!)

Title: Alternative: To Love–Ru
Synopsis:
He was just a normal kid. Living a normal life. Going to school, protecting his sister from bullies and studying. Things were so simple back then. It's amazing how fast it all spiraled out of control because of his curiosity.
But as they always say— Curiosity kills the cat.
Left trying to figure out this new, not-so normal life. Rito found himself becoming one of the most feared mercenary in the known universe. Yet just as he thought things were getting better, fate again decided to screw with him.
Only this time, the trouble it brought didn't come in the form of a high-tech, sphere-shaped, transformative weapon, but a weird, alien princess. The heir to the race known as [The Conqueror Race], the Devilukean.
—Lala Satalin Deviluke was her name.

Title: Steeled Heart
Synopsis:
We are the legion. Soldiers who’ve only pursued honour and service all our lives. We are the army elite, the bringers of cataclysmic horror on the battlefield. With cybernetics to suppress the irrelevant outbursts of our emotions, we feel no fear, no rage and no joy. We do not see beauty, only efficiency. A legionnaire could survive a year without food nor water. Traverse mountains and oceans without fatigue. We are the perfect soldiers.
Only by an equal or superior legionnaire may we die. But would I be satisfied? Living as a puppet my whole life knowing no love. Would I die a ghost of what once was?
I am Vane Kendryck, this is my story...
___________________
 
DISCLAIMER: The cover art used is not mine. I just found it on google.

Title: Star Siezing Monarch
Synopsis:
A hundred thousand years ago, the Ancient Wang Clan began their tyrannical conquest to rule the entire realm. They possessed a bloodline so terrifying it shook the world just by name, conquered secret realm after secret realm and enslaved everything in sight. Through war and blood, they became the supreme rulers of the Realm.
In no time, the entire Realm was unified under the Ancient Wang Clan’s name. But the Wang Clan's aspirations didn't end here; they wanted to ascend and attack the heavens themselves. However, the Wang Clan was exhausted and needed to gather their resources for such a mighty revolution. Yet, even the Heavens were fearful, and the Army of the Heavens unified and sealed the Wang Clan at their weakest moment- they were then banished to the darkest parts of space.
Yet, another heaven-shaking revolt later ensued, and the Wang Clan broke out and engaged in a fierce battle against their enemies. But, under the suppression of the Army, they decided to make a bold decision, one that had unforeseen consequences.
A hundred thousand years later, an amnesiac youth wanders the forest...awaiting his bloodline awakening.
 
Note: I post whenever I find the time to write. I will make a conscious effort to post more if I see a lot of activity on my novel and my greatest motivator is easily comments!

Title: Trials and Error(s)
Synopsis:
Dream Eaters: a devastating group that steals the souls of the people they target, or so people say. Avra isn't too sure about that, but she isn't one to take rumours without a grain of salt. As the only blacksmith and swordswoman around for miles, she has enough on her plate anyway without worrying about a mythical group.
The Whistlers: made to combat the Eaters, they're known as the saviours of the common folk and the bane of the government since they're also technically criminal by association. Mel didn't want to join them, but she owes the leader a debt that she needs to repay before she can go home. Also, she's worried about the elf who keeps trying to eat living armour.

Title: Hollow
Synopsis:
He let his flesh slip off.
He let his heart rot away.
 
He let the wind lick his bones.
 
He let the soil swallow him.
 
But he never let his soul go.
 
           - Children's stories you should really avoid reading, by Selah El Amir
 
 
I'm gonna try to update every Monday, at least. With as much effort as I can expend, I shall do my best to make this goal a reality.

Title: Endless
Synopsis:
Zortex has been unhappy for too long. Nothing feels really important to him and the people around him might as well be insects for how much he cares. But all of that is going to end soon. The moment his life will change has almost arrived. The door to immortality opens to him and he will have the opportunity to choose his own future.
There are many paths ahead, but which ones will lead him to become a legend?
Check the story of Zortex from his noob days to...we will see.
 
 
 
I'm trying to write a LitRPG story without falling into the normal cliche. Big and careful worldbuilding. Characters with a human side. MC not so OP that nothing can stand against him. Right time management (not everything will happen in a month). 
Cover by: https://opengameart.org/users/madjestiko

Title: Dragon Rising
Synopsis:
When dragons start to fight amongst themselves after millennia of peace, one bloody battle leaves young Aerith's dragon dead and her the sole survivor of her family. Her only hope of restoring balance is reviving the fallen Gisella, but with human civilisation collapsing and continuing bloodshed, she may be too late.
This work is also available in full on Wattpad and RadishFiction as "Rise of the Vengeful Dragon". Please note this is a first draft. All comments welcome and greatly appreciated.

Title: Again?!!
Synopsis: Another love story of a withdrawn-from-society kind-of person from their own P.O.V.

Title: Pound Of Joy
Synopsis: Traumatized by the death of his parents in a car accident,Chris all mired down into poignancy,and madness tries to find the truck driver named Aaric who's responsible for the accident; Leaving his elder brother Shimz behind,he travels from Winsconsin,Milwaukee to Ohio,Akron disguised under the name 'Clein'.His peculiar journey filled with anger,and insanity affects many innocent lives.

Title: My Hermit Life
Synopsis:
My name is Solomon Ars Regis I am a veteran who lost both legs while on duty. One day after I was released from physical therapy early I came home to find my girlfriend cheating on me with my brother, feeling betrayed I scream at them to leave my house. A few hours of brooding later I decide to go to sleep. When I wake up I am in a forest in a different world.
 
Hi this is my first story so please dont expect much.
Disclaimer - I say hermit in that he lives in a cave in a giant forest with his wife and and master with occasional visits from his parents or other creatures. I do not use hermit in a religious sense or in that he lives entirely alone. 
The first few chapters are worse than some later chapters. If you can get through to chapter 24 you will find that the quality increases. I will do a rewrite eventually so look forward to that . . . . . if you want.

Title: Code Red
Synopsis: Dropping this one sorry

Title: Secret Garden (Dungeon Story)
Synopsis:
What do you think would happen if a dungeon born in a city?
Authur Note: Hello to readers, this is my first try at dungeon story. I love these quite of stories so I want to write my version of it but English is never my thing. Actually no language is never my thing but I try to do my best to improve it.So give me a lot support! Thank You!

Title: Past apocalypse
Synopsis: 19 years ago the apocalypse happened and now humanity was on the verge of collapse, in order to prevent the destruction of humanity and all of human. human choose the 8 people and send them back to the past and l was one of them.

Title: The Elder of the New World
Synopsis: Dale was an ordinary high school student like the others, or so he thought. Everything in his life since his birth into this world until he entered high school, everything was as normal as it could be... until a dream unraveled in his mind. And with that, his life took a change for the worst or perhaps, for the better. Who knows except for he himself, right?

Title: The Dreamer
Synopsis: After a near-death experience, a young soldier with no dreams no ambitions who's everyday life is just about surviving in this harsh world, wakes up with memories and experience of a different person from a different world, how will he adapt with this new knowledge, how will this affect his future.

Title: shift.
Synopsis: Set in a fragmented land where mutant skinchangers known as 'shifters' walk amongst humans and work in tandem with them, the story follows the illustrious military base of Area 36 as they attempt to not only ward off an impending, dangerous threat across their borders but also balance the fragile peace between the non-powered humans and their own kind; the town of Pungdo, a sanctuary for the homeless and destitute; Poluo, a lone island said to be the origins of all shifterkind, and Salhae, a floating city governed by no laws beyond magic and their fists.

Title: Lily Bouquet - A Girls Love Anthology
Synopsis:
Lily Bouquet is a collection of different short stories with a common theme: they're all stories about love between girls.
The stories might vary in themes and genre, but they're all focused on the romantic relationship between two or more girls. While some stories might be a continuation of previous ones, this will be mentioned at the start, so any story can be read by itself.

Title: A Time of Tragedy
Synopsis: Alex Rose is just a normal guy, living a normal life, until one day he makes a decision that will forever alter his life and the lives of those he encounters. Read as Alex adventures through a surreal forest and finds people and places you'd never believe exist. Hope you enjoy!

Title: Slice of life: Amongst them, he lies
Synopsis: a 4 part short story, slice of life. following a young woman through four parts of her life.

Title: Experimental Wuxia Novel
Synopsis: Deep at night, high above the commoners, below a rift in space and time, a group of five work a summoning.

Title: RWBY: The Good Son
Synopsis:
In the world of Remnant, aura and semblances are a phenomena that reach across all continents. Granting unfathomable abilities. While on the other hand, Dust powers the world with its elemental properties. 
Whitley Schnee, son of one of the most powerful men in the Dust market, sees inconsistencies with his father’s work, and wants to become heir to the family business, to cleanse it of its dark past.
Across the world, in the more underclass of kingdoms, Grimm run amok, foul creatures that feed off negative energy, growing ever so potent as the brink of war nears. A war between Good, Evil, and Man.

Title: Experimental Dungeon Novel
Synopsis:
In which a necromancer brings to life a destroyed dungeon core.
 [participant in the Royal Road Writathon challenge]

Title: Necromancer's Pursuit
Synopsis:
It was merely a normal day at highschool for Scot. However, his daily boring routine was shattered that day, along with the common sense of the world. 
The apocalypse arrived.
With people dying left and right, will Scot be able to take advantage of this occurence to change his life? He might even be able to fulfill his dreams to be a necromancer, probably.
Sort of like any Apocalyptic story but with a trash new writer and his own delusions.

Title: Dauntless Star
Synopsis:
WWIII has come to pass and 91% of the Earth is left scorched and uninhabitable. From the ashes of WWIII two major powers emerged. The Southern Alliance (SA) and the Northern United Nations (NUN). The SA sought refuge in space devising devices to enhance the body and keep the mind occupied. This novel follows the journey of a young man named Crescent who saw the worst humanity had to offer in The Game and was given a second chance, traveling back in time when humanity first left for the stars. More importantly when The Game first started.
Hello Author here just thought I’d say hi. This is the first novel and there will more than likely be a lot of grammar mistakes and slow writing but together we can finish this novel. Any constructive feedback you can give or editing you can do will be very appreciated. So come join in a journey of sci-fi, fantasy, time travel and romance (hopefully). Damn single life ?
 
Ps if the cover artwork is yours and you can provide proof, I would be happy to take it down at your request as per you intellectual rights. If not thx

Title: Back to Day One (On Hiatus)
Synopsis:
Jaime Barrett is the last human on Earth, at least the only sane one.
After launching a suicide attack on an army of zombies, he finds himself back in school, the day the virus first came in contact with humanity.
He now has his former weak body and only the knowledge of his future to survive the apocalypse (which he survived once without anyways) without losing anyone important to himself.

Title: Spirit
Synopsis: In a world where creatures of another plane wage a war against all things living to consume them, a boy with a grudge and a shattered past joins Etheret, the Windrian academy of the arcane.

Title: Leaving Earth
Synopsis:
