Title: Lords and peasants
Synopsis: A man awakes to find himself in a brand new world, filled with death and despair. With the memories of what can be said to be a grand king, specifically a demon lords. He does not however take on the personality of a demon lord but strives keep his inner humanity alive. The story begins after around a year of living in this new body and mind. Read this humanistic demon lord rule his people and grow his kingdom from rubble to stone.

Title: A Place to Belong - A LitRPG Adventure
Synopsis:
Levi was happy with the life he had built for himself. He had a stable job, decent lodgings, and every weekend he alternated between hiking and biking in the mountains outside of town to keep in shape. There might have been downsides, like no real family or friends and an ex-girlfriend he would rather not think about, but he thought his dad would be proud of what he had done with his life. Levi was content with his prefect walled in regimented life, and even if there was a small part of him that wanted more, wanted actual meaningful relationships, he kept that part of him tightly locked away. Those relationships weren’t worth the pain they inevitably caused.
But when a powerful supernatural force sweeps through Earth, Levi finds himself forced into a new environment, the social mask he used before no longer valid. With no choice but to survive and grow, he now needs to confront those feelings he thought he locked away for good. He needs to not only figure out how to survive, but how to live, and what exactly it means to have a place to call home.

Title: Rhucon
Synopsis:
Waking up in a pit of death, a boy begins his journey.
A story of making new memories in a dangerous world. This is the life of Rhucon.
Chapters are sporadic. All depends on how much I'm motivated to write, as whichever of my many hobbies is my biggest interest at the time.

Title: Super Powerful Immortal Daoist
Synopsis:
Aiya, I, your father, in his entire 19 years of life has never faced such tribulations before in his entire life.
Getting killed by a truck in your previous and end up transmigrating into another body who just happens to look the same and has the same name seems to be common trend that's very hard to escape from.
I did not have the background of a cripple who was called trash everywhere, nor was this body formerly was a arrogant young master who was courting death and eventually probably would die at the hand of the Protangonist.
Instead I was a simple and humble village boy whose parents are practically nonexistent like most Japanese Protangonist.
On this road of life of mine, I eventually stumbled upon the path of Immortality and defying the heavens. But along the way I had acquired the mainstream cheats that all main characters get in another world such as:
Having a old grandpa ghost who was a formerly a supreme expert haunting you.
An System that gave me a gamer interface and exchange system and so forth.
Having a pearl that can refine mystical and powerful medicine and poison alike.
And much more cheats along the way.
Watch as I, Qin Feng, a Chinese Xianxia Protangonist goes about his way. Whether it is going through cliches or parodies or even just mainstream repetitive plots.




Author Note: I take inspirations from Coiling Dragon, Against the Gods, Strongest System, and some Xianxia basic stuff like Jindan (Golden Core) and Yuanying (Nascent Soul).
Warning: The story plot would begin slow.

Title: The Weavers
Synopsis:
The Elemental Lands are under constant threat from the beings that live in the Mountain. Every Land has to be on guard and ever vigilant to repel attacks that come from the lone figure. No one has heard of any attacks from the Mountain in the past ten years. Things have gotten lax for the people of the Elemental Lands, and that includes the military post Fort Gorgan in the Plains.
Is it too late for the people of the Elemental Lands or is it just the beginning of something bigger?

Title: Re:A Space Story.
Synopsis: Year 4026.After the hero 'plateau breaker' disappeared from the war-front,space had become more dangerous than ever.In the space where no one had any dreams or hopes left,there was only one light left for those who belived that their lives will become better one day.She was most popular idol of the space,Vaessa.But she retires to follow her 'dream' and study 'the ancient art of computer programming'.And on her new life she met new people and might even fall in love.But will the universe ever become peaceful again?Will the fallen hero ever rise up again?

Title: Rise of the Paladin (Dungeon Hero Book 1)
Synopsis:
Michael Peters had it all: a great group of gaming pals, a spot on the varsity track team, and a full-ride scholarship to a top ranked computer science program that would help carry him to his ultimate dream of making full-immersion VR games an actual reality.
But then the unthinkable happened. Both parents dead in a car crash in one afternoon. His 5-year old sister, Brianna, left with no one to care for her and no family to help. He had to choose: sacrifice his dreams to stay and care for Brianna, or follow his passion and lose the only family he had left?
Michael made the hard choice, and he never regretted his decision. Now, his sister is everything to him. But when Brianna goes missing at a local arcade with a strange new machine, nothing will stop him from finding and rescuing her, no matter where he has to follow to save her...

Title: The Island of Wolves
Synopsis:
Nina Sterling, despite her mother’s objections, is planning a gap year before starting university. She decides to take an internship at her local museum, when a professor there offers to pay her travel and accommodation expenses. In exchange, he asks her to chronicle the places she visits for his research project. Excited to be part of something big, she agrees, and sets off to explore every corner of her magical world.   
On her way east, her ship is attacked by a sea serpent and runs aground on an island, which may not be entirely uninhabited. From carnivorous animals, to blood-thirsty natives and even the island itself, it’s going to take everything Nina has in order to make it off the island alive.
 
The Island of Wolves is now available to purchase through Kindle.

Title: The Curse of The Lost Souls
Synopsis:
Fresh from college, Phillip fled his abusive, mage-hunting, law-enforcing family to hide in an FBI career. He impressed the wrong people and got fast-tracked through the Academy to join the Magical and Supernatural Analysis Unit. But, on the final Academy test, a fallen angel bent on saving humanity crushes Phillip's body and hijacks his soul. Confined to a wheelchair and to a lack of options, Phillip accepts a single assignment, a desperate attempt, a potential moment of greatness, a fleeting chance to prove what he could have been. The trail of bodies returns him to the desert southwest, to his family's compound, to their mage-murdering hunts. When his family is transformed into vampires, Phillip must finally make a stand against the deadliest enemy his family ever created, a mage his family let get away—his younger brother.
Discover the magic between Shadow and Night.

In hopes to bring out the truth of the nightmares he have seen before his eyes, he wish to spread the good word to the Churches and Allied Forces from behind enemy line. His name is Lieutenant Kurt Gerstein, an SS Officer working for the Confessing Churches... And being his shephard, is a woman who looks like a Tea Cup from a Chapel in Switzerland.

Synopsis: Adakontus is under the spell of monsters. His enigmatic masters groom him, and his comrades, for war. Their training is brutal. Their methods are unnatural. Will he be reforged into something greater, or something worse?

Title: The King of Desires
Synopsis: Escana is a world where war is but another round of a game, the Reign of Chaos, a game that the Gods have been playing for eons. On Escana, war is merely a form of entertainment for the Demon Lords to sate their hunger for destruction and their thirst for power. Escana is a place where peace is but an illusion, a calm before a storm, and the short breaks between the games. All mortals, human, dwarves, elves and the other races living on Escana, they are consigned to live inside that living hell from the moment of their birth.It should be just another unspectacular round of The Reign of Chaos. It should be just another dulled war among the great many that have been fought before this. It should be just another day and another year. And yet, in this newest round, appeared a prince who is prophesized to bring about an end to everything. Fearless is his name, a man of many identities. A jokester. A charlatan. A lover. An Ender. He is a self-proclaimed the-world-biggest-fool among the most foolish. He is the Prince among princes.

Title: El héroe del mundo al borde de la ruina [Spanish]
Synopsis: Un chico con una rara enfermedad terminal es invocado por un dios que controla las dimensiones para que sea el héroe de uno de los mundos que vigila ya que un demonio amenaza con destruirlo, a cambio, recibe una cura para su enfermedad y poderes que imitan el modelo de un videojuego, pero, ¿Será eso suficiente para rescatar un planeta que ademas de los demonios debe lidiar con muchos otros conflictos?

Title: Origin of Chaos (Rise of Anarchy Book 1)
Synopsis:
A stream of cataclysmic incidents. A tide of horror and sadness interspersed with small moments of light. What drives Nyx forward? Is it the need for revenge that haunts his dreams? Is it his beloved comrades he leaves behind, with the promise of returning? Is it the demons ravaging Earth, his homeworld he abandoned over five-hundred years prior?
When Nyx passes through realms in his return home, Chaos builds, and the balance is shifting. Unwittingly he becomes both its catalyst and harbinger.
This is his story.

 Note from Author: Things have come up irl so I have had to put the story on a (hopefully) short hiatus.

Title: Reborn loser

Title: Fate CON-trol
Synopsis:
Human lives are fragile like glass. Once it's broken, it can never be whole again.
But there is a solution, and that is 'Reincarnation'. Although the body is broken, the soul is preserved until a new body is created for it to inhabit, the cycle continues on and on and hence why humans multiply day by day.
'Reincarnation' is believed to be the work of the 'Gods' humans worship so much.
But is it true? 'Gods', 'Demons', 'Hell', 'Heaven', do they really exist? 
I for sure, do not believe in such things. After all, there is no concrete proof. 'Reincarnation', is what I believe in. Not only is it an interesting concept, but it is something I have experienced.
Every night, I have dreams of what I believe to be my previous lifetimes. Some memories are hopelessly vague but the others are incredibly vivid. The movie like scenes carve themselves into my head and the moment I open my eyes, the experiences stay permanently registered in my brain, and all the skills and abilities the person had will naturally come to me and it would feel as if they were my own. The memories of strange places, people, and events felt so foreign yet so familiar, it was contradicting.
I believe for 'Reincarnation' to be a natural law of the universe, rather than being managed by some 'Gods' that probably don't even exist.
'God' created humans? More like man created 'God'.
Enough with that, do you know what I detest the most? Humans.
Humans are greedy, selfish, cruel and all the horrible traits you can think of. Of course, they also have their good traits. But even so, it will never rid of my hate for humanity.
I myself am human, a cursed one at that. That is why, I hate myself just as much.
But even so, I decided to live a peaceful life, no matter how hateful the entire world can be.
But this wretched curse can never leave me alone.

When an opportunity with a high risk presents itself, Claude must use all his wit and skill to decide if the reward is worth the danger. Will he take the risk and face the consequences of his decision?

Title: Earth Warriors
Synopsis:
It is the year 2026, an alien race called the Zlocu are waging war across the stars, believing that the era of peace was slowing down the next step of universal evolution and now are determined to "awake" everyone to let them know how peace made them "weak". Planet Earth took one of the worst hits from their onslaught, given that they were recovering from a devastating global conflict. Despite the efforts of various governments, the Zlocu occupied 80% of Earth. Everything seemed hopeless until a group of celestial beings called "The Guardians" started to intervene in the conflict, as result of the discovery of the four physical incarnations that represent the principles of the Universe itself, all of them found on planet Earth.  Now, these four heroes and other factions must work together to defeat the Zlocu Empire and Malgan's reign of tyranny. But more than war, they also need to know what is the meaning of being a hero and a warrior in the modern world.
 
Cover from Shrutiluvbooks

Along came in a young boy who stumbled about the enchanted library. Indebted to death after being saved from an accident, the young boy must now pay back his debt by working in the library and assisting the 'Departing' souls.

Title: Spirit Warrior: Crumbling World

Now, he lives the single life that many dream of in America. However, in this fateful Saturday morning, everything will change, with a violent earthquake heralding the coming of new beginnings… as well the arrival of a terrible end.

Title: Tome of Stealth [A System Anti-Apocalypse]
Synopsis:
When the Passivity Precept takes over the world it snuffs out all brutality, leaving its MMO-like Violence Simulator as humanity's only source of physical violence. Knowing how much she can make from selling epic gear, Grace Winston enters the simulation and discovers that it's more than just a game. Somewhere in there are the answers to who started the fire that killed her father.
 For far too long, Lorevinel Silvercat has been stuck as the Ravenborn clan’s free-roaming prisoner. They’ve held a grudge against his clan and have used him to vent their hatred. Having planned his escape for several years, he has everything ready, but he needs a specific artifact from the Rogues Guild to finally start his journey. 
 Will Grace find her answers? Will Lore gain his freedom? Can these two unlikely people, both alien to each other, find common ground and work together while dealing with an unasked for soul bond?

ToS is a Lite LitRPG (meaning very few stats with a focus on story). Expect cursing, sexual tension, descriptions of breeding dungeon rats, and a little gore.
TL;DR- The System Anti-Apocalypse forces everyone to be peaceful and only commit violence inside its Magical VR game.

Title: Battle is an Art (Old)
Synopsis: (Outdated Version, new story is here)Herah was many things: a master artist, a zealot Cendruex, a brutal fighter, and now, an unwilling participant in a deadly game known as Recompense.As one of her Maker’s many gifted, Herah (alongside many others) has been summoned from her universes to complete a set of “acts”, with each act having its own task that must be completed.If won, Herah shall be granted a single wish with very little restrictions in what she can get, but if lost not only will she lose her home, her family, and her people but her entire universe.With this threat hanging over her head, her Maker playing her like a puppet, an antagonistic human leading her, and the demons of those around her popping up, Herah is in for the battle of her life.But Herah’s a master artist, and as far she’s concerned battle, no matter the type, is exactly that: an art.

Hide decides to pay Ken an early visit in the hospital. He cares too much to let his friend recover alone. A tiny change to the sequence of events, an entirely different story. Some bloody scenes, but no worse than the original story offered.

Title: The Galaxy's Unrelenting Force
Synopsis:
The story starts as Elijah wakes up a seemingly normal sunday morning; well normal in this case being so tired and exhausted that he would rather stay in bed. After all being the single most gifted student in his engineering class is not something one earns for free. Which he would very much wish, but as the saying instilled in him from an early age by his parents ''One must first provide, then enjoy'' he never slacked off, and always enjoyed his spoils after hard work. To say he liked the saying would not be quite true, but it had proved itself more than once so he couldn't complain that much; his roommate could actually learn a thing or two matter-of-factly.
This Sunday however is not as usual as it may seem, and Elijah is about to painfully find this out as his whole life and the life of everything and everyone he holds dear will forever be changed.
 
My first story so please be kind, kind reader. My main language is norwegian so pelase do bear with me i will try my best. Cover art is random image from google. Story draws inspiration from personal life, other works of fantasy both here and on what we call paperbooks. Hope you enjoy ??

Title: WriTE April Fools Contest
Synopsis:
April Fools is among us, it is time for Karen’s faithful to open up the altar to the public eye and prepare for a sacrifice. I, one of her apostles, have spoken with the fearsome kraken and she demands a contest between the greatest warriors of the land!
What does she want? This time she wants something to tickle her funny bone (er, tentacle?), and thus we have decided the theme!
Basically, we want you to write a short entry with the theme of ‘Comedy’. Make us laugh and you have a good chance of winning!

Title: Limitless Paradox System
Synopsis: Being abandoned by his parents at a very young age. He lives his life trying to find the answer why. During his life, he did everything to survive any obstacles that come his way. Helping others is a must that was his motto, and was also the cause of his demise. Regaining the ability to comprehend in an unusual place where darkness is everywhere. This is the void where the soul's of the dead wait for their trial. Every soul that comes here will be judged immediately but for an unknown reason, he was left here to wait. Seconds to Minutes, Minutes to Hours, Hours to Days, Days to Weeks, Weeks to Months, Months to Years, Years to Decades, Decades to Centuries, Centuries to Millenias. As time flew by he finally stopped counting and focused more on keeping his sanity. All of his emotions started fading away leaving only the sense of longing and loneliness the feeling of being alone. No matter what he did there was nothing he can do, there is only him and the darkness. 'If there is someone, something, somewhere in this empty abyss, please find me' he said. These words traveled across the void reaching the ears of destiny, making it glance at him fulfilling his wish. to his surprise vortex sucked his soul leading him to a long loop slowly recreating his body. Arriving at the core of a magical forest where demon beast so powerful lurks around even powerful cultivators fail to exterminate. Luckily he was forsaken by god knows what, he receives a system that transformed him from a mortal trash to someone who reached the apex of cultivation of this universe. Reaching the peak in the starting line wasn't fun at all leaving you bored as it was too easy. So he embarks on a journey to reach the apex of every other aspect and create the most powerful sect that will be carved on history for eternity to come. He left the forest with the words 'only those trustworthy are to be trusted' carved in his heart.

Title: Impera
Synopsis: Gaius is the Emperor of The Roman Empire, that is one of his own creation in Impera.   Ruling a massive empire, Gaius does what no other ever managed, uniting the entire world under the imperial banner.   Hailed as the World Conqueror, a series of events unfold such that Gaius is forced into a world shaped by his past actions. He will face the true burdens and benefits his position awards, embarking in a struggle far beyond his worst nightmares. In his journey, Gaius will understand what truly means to be an Emperor, and what it takes to rule.

Title: New Legends: A New Chapter in an Old Book
Synopsis:
Extra Tags: Age Progression, Kingdom Building, Kingdoms, Multiple Races/Nonhumans, Monsters, Political, Wars
----------
In the world of Ethel, sahir dominated. Towns, cities, regions, whole countries were engineered for the single purpose of producing malsirs. Their ability to wield sahir was paramount. Those who could wield it the best accomplished unimaginable feats. They shook the mountains, they froze the seas, they stilled the winds. They were legendary.Today however, those feats are mere myths. Malsirs no longer command the same strength. Sahir, as a result, was steadily losing its luster, losing the limelight. A new age, an age of industry, was on the horizon and it threatened to revolutionize the world. Sadly, there were many who would never see the benefits of this new age. Caught in between the new and the old, fitting into neither, they were cast aside. Left to wither and die, they begin a revolution of their own.Enter Kain Basileus, a boy who finds himself caught in the midst of these turbulent times. Ripped from the shadows he found comfort and thrust into the light, what story will he write?
----------
 
Updates Every Tuesday And Friday W/ Potential For More.

Title: Bleeding Blue and Blood Ink
Synopsis:
Surrounded by new students, Kateb tries to survive eleventh grade while trying to figure out the story he is working on.
Surrounded by Asuras, Orcbane tries to survive a catastrophic war while trying to figure out a way to end it.

This is my first story online (Yaaay!!!)
Please excuse any grammatical mistakes. I'm looking forward to your suggestions and comments.

Title: DESCRYER
Synopsis:
Miranda Russe is plagued with a brilliant gift: the ability to see what others cannot. No, she's not hallucinating, not a schizophrenic. She just knows that all her life she's been surrounded by the unnatural - like a golden fuzzball of a childhood companion she calls a faerie, or the fact that her estranged grandmother came to her as a ghost with a cryptic message - you know, the usual paranormal activities that she's done well to hide. 
And just when Miranda's finally got her sense of sanity downpact, her family uproots and moves into her dead grandmother's home and for reasons that just do not make sense.What's worse? How about a series of animal attacks on the town as soon as she arrives?  Add in her mother’s incessant nagging about Hindu faith, mediocre high school torment, a handsomely flirtatious tutor, and an obnoxious Sheriff who’s already got her pegged as the culprit behind these attacks, then it’s no wonder why all Miranda wants is to keep a low-profile.
But of course, life has other plans and Miranda's going to have to trust in her strange abilities in order to rise to challenge, otherwise fall victim to the chaos within her sanity and her reality.

Title: Supreme God
Synopsis: My name is Asura, I live in a totally decadent world of all possible morals, when I was born I did not understand because until my parents and my brothers were murdered in the worst possible way in front of me I do not understand why something like that happened. But from now on everything will tremble in the face, nothing will stand, gods, demons, legendary beings, holy women who think they are the best. They all kissed my feet. In this world where the strongest command, I will be the strongest. and I will command.

Title: The Day in Which  I Die
Synopsis: A LitRpg novel with a MC  who wishes not to be like the rest of humanity that existed in his old world but at the same time wants to reunite with his family what for him is the only valuable thing in that miserable world

Title: Murario 2177
Synopsis:
21-year-old Jackson Marmy knows how to play golf, make pleasant conversation, and wear fashionable clothes. All in all, he has a good life, and his only purpose is to dazzle trade emissaries with the glory that is Earth. So, it really comes to him as a surprise, when he is sent to Murario, a mining colony, to negotiate a trade agreement. Something doesn’t sit well with him about this mission, especially the fact that his protection is entrusted to a bodyguard who looks like a boy not a day over 16. Despite that he is packed full of weaponry, the guy’s effeminate features don’t seem to qualify him for his line of business.
Dana Drake is pretty confident she had never seen a guy more beautiful than Jackson Marmy, but, to her defense, she has never seen an Earthian in flesh and blood before. Although she’s a bit too sure that her weird hair makes her look ugly, she is surprised to get so many mixed signals from the handsome Earthian.
None of them knows what to make of the attraction that they sense happening between them. Between assassination attempts and conspiracies on an interplanetary scale, they don’t have time to set things straight, either.

Title: The Dungeon of Miracles
Synopsis:
A dungeon story that follows the story of an unfortunate peasant boy doing his best to survive. A combat focused and gritty story that ocassionally introduces magic. I appreciate all feedback!
I usually write when I can't sleep.

Title: Secrets of Ruin (Ruin Book 2)
Synopsis:
Jim, Alia, and the others continue their adventure in this, the second book of the "Ruin" universe.
The Prophetess' evil grasp is reaching slowly across the sands, and none can seem to stop her. But, in the south an ancient power is about to be unburied. Will it be the undoing of the Prophetess' armies or will all of Ruin burn? 
If you haven't read book one, find the unedited draft right here on RoyalRoad! Or, you can buy the finalized copy on Amazon.com!Royalroad Version
Amazon E-Book

Title: Your Sweet Heart
Synopsis:
Having had a tragic childhood, and wanting nothing more than a girlfriend, Belly swears to one day make Cassandra, the girl he loves, proud. However, that path is not going to be an easy one for someone like him. After finally awakening his magic, he manages to enroll himself into a prestigious knight academy, Arpie High. 
As Belly continues trying his best to make new friends and prove that he isn't worthless, he finds out about the horrible life Cassandra has been going through all alone, and the two eventually start living together. Belly is determined to not only save her, but to also save everyone from her father, The Demon King Allister.

Title: Magical Girl Gang Wars(Reboot)
Synopsis:
(Note: Rereleasing chapters as they are edited)
Before we begin please remember from this point forward those that have a weak heart should turn back now.
This won't be your average magical girl story.
In this story, there will be many things that people may or may not be comfortable with reading. This is a story that will descend into a madness of the highest order. The happy moments will be short and sweet with sadness flowing like an endless river.
From this point forward you have been warned and enjoy your stay.~
In the worlds where magical girls exist, wars are being fought on Earth and Astral. They fight against each other within the light of society and the darkness of the gang underworld. Men are at the lowest pecking order of such gangs treated like slaves to their overlords, the magical girls.
Warfare is being conducted all around the world with the regular police and military useless against the power of magical girls. Drug roads are fought for, men are traded as cattle, and corruption has reached an all-time high in the governments around the world. The world is edging ever closer to all-out interplanetary warfare. 
All signs are pointing at World War Three, better known as the Second Magical Girl War, being on the horizon ambitions are growing.
Our story takes place years before the Second Magical Girl War begins. Gangs have started sensing the change of the game and have decided to bolster their forces by hunting for new blood amongst the common folk.
----
Hey guyes if you wanna follow me on the grind and know when chapters will be released early follow me on Twitter and Facebook!

Title: Invoking Legends
Synopsis: 20 years ago, due to a cosmic event Earth underwent drastic changes. Spirit beasts that evolved from the normal flora and fauna roamed the world. and nature has created a game system for accommodating these changes.This is the story of Blake, who had just reached level 1, three years after all his peers. Follow his tale as he traverses the path to become a legendary spirit beast tamer.

Title: A Snail's Wisdom
Synopsis:
"To cultivate is to become one with the world, achieving a higher plane of existence."
What the hell? No, it isn't.
"Through diligent meditation and introspective enlightenment, one will be able to bridge the gap between himself and the center of the universe, achieving Immortality."
Where did you get this crap? Such nonsense!
Come, come, disciple. Follow your Snail-sensei here, and I will show you the quickest path to Immortality! It isn't all meditation and enlightenment like you imagine. If you aren't willing to risk your life, what makes you think you can avoid death? But don't worry! You have the Supreme Me. Your success is guaranteed!
Now just put this dress on and let's go.
What? Why are you looking at me like that? Don't point that sword at me!!!IMPORTANT AUTHOR'S NOTE:I have removed many of the earlier chapters due to an upcoming official publication through other channels. I have left the more recent chapters and will update in the future so that my current readers who have been with me since the beginning will get to witness the end of the current arc. All of your support is the reason I have gone forward with publishing my story, and I thank all of my beloved readers. <3 For any newcomers, I am sorry to have wasted your time with this front page. If you're truly interested in reading my story, please stay tuned for official publication as it will also be in a much more intriguing layout and pacing than what I originally published. If you are too impatient, I suppose you can search for some sites that pirated my book for now? Better get to them before I do :P

Title: Broken Reality
Synopsis:
The year is 2199; the American Commonwealth is the only powerhouse nation left standing after World War III. The world population is 1.5 billion from its previous 10 billion. The natural world is now almost  lifeless. The only plants left are those of the rich and privileged. Air is produced in factories paid for with compulsory taxes and humanity is retreating. Now instead of going to school like most, students and go to a privately run building that contains hundreds of the newest virtual reality dive capsules. Life in reality is fading to the manufactured worlds of the future. This is the world of the gamers.
This is my first book

Title: A Tale of Two Sisters
Synopsis:
Among the Order of Dragoons, Lauriel Perthesa is one of its most famous. Adored by the people and respected by the royal family, the knight is equally skilled with the halberd and with magic. Her fame and reputation precedes her nearly everywhere she goes, but she cares little for it. But when Lauriel once again heeds the call to arms to defend her kingdom's borders, a single mistake sends her life crashing down, reducing her to a cripple. Beset by mysterious, unreal nightmares and aching for redemption from her shame, the humbled warrior begins her own, solo adventure to reclaim her lost honor, one that may reveal pieces of a past and childhood long forgotten.
Schedule: One to two weeks, depending on real life circumstances or length of chapter, usually released Saturday night.

Title: Legacy of the Forgotten Continent
Synopsis:
In a fantasy world were humans,elves,dragons,orcs, and much more roam the magical world of Ragna. Scall, the strongest orc to ever exist, makes a deal with a demon to destroy all intelligent life on the continent in exchange for the greatest adventure of his life or the greatest loss of life the world has ever seen.
This story follows the two main characters Scall and Aaron on their journey to Revenge,Love,Pain,Adventure and Sacrifice
(my first story hope you like it despite my terrible spelling,punctuation,and english in general new chapters will be released as frequently as possible)

Title: August
Synopsis:
What is the meaning of August?
It is more than just the Eight Month of the Imperial Calendar, it is the Month that the Endless Demons were repelled, by the Constructs!
Then what does August truly mean?
It is the Term given to those 'respected and impressive' the greatest of those that pilot the Constructs that strive to retake the lands of Humanity!
Now a young boy wishes to become an August, yet with barely any Spiritual Energy, how will he?
By bashing the Endless Demons with his mere fists of course!

Title: Tale of the Star Chosen Villain
Synopsis: A tale of a villain that was supposed to be a hero. In a pantheon's game of representative to detrime the ranking, power and influence for the next eon. Young women and men taken form their world and put on the gods playground. This story will follow an expection to the norm of the usual hero. A villain, one who would enact evil deeds. A villain who would do good and evil as he sees fit in this game for a godess who gave him a new, wonderful life.

Title: Stories of the dark god
Synopsis:
*For all the new readers:
The story centers around the main protagonist, who is the beginning of everything. Life isn't easy, not even as a god. Everything has to start somewhere and will end somewhere. The only difference is the way you take. The storyline will often be told by the people around the MC because it makes the story more interesting this way.
It's the actual second season of my story, but can be viewed as an individual fiction. You don't have to read the first season, but you'd be missing out on a lot of information then.
 
*For everyone who follows me since season one:
The first part will continue from where they found Ryukai and will be told by him for the time being. I'm doing my best to quicken things up, cause you already know what happens from there on.
As promised, I increased the length of my chapters to about 2000 words. I'll try to post every Sunday at 5 pm, but my next two months will be hell. There's the chance that I will not manage that, but afterward, it will definitely be regular again.
 
Thank you for reading my stories. I appreciate every feedback and support.

Title: God's Territory
Synopsis:
What would you do to save the one you love?
How far would you go?
What would you do?
What would you Kill?

Title: The who that I really am
Synopsis:
Nystro of Din lives a normal life among humans. One day, on his normal routine, he is attacked by a demon, the human's natural enemy! That leads to him awakening a dark power to defeat it! But now everyone sees him as a monster and try to kill him as well? How will he deal with the betrayal from the humans?
(Please keep in mind that at the start I'm still getting the hang of it and only after a few chapter does the story actually get better) :D

Title: Waxing Silver
Synopsis:
The newborn Gods once thought, "Let's create a world."
And so, Origin, the first world, was created. Throughout the time the Gods looked after their creations, a conflict was born. However, even after countless centuries have passed, hatred grew between the Gods rather than peace. And so, as a result, they abandoned Origin and went their separate ways. 
Even so, even without a God to look after Origin, its residents remained.
And in this age, in the continent of Randia, and in the Kingdom of Laurel, a somewhat different girl existed.

Title: Weakest of the Weak
Synopsis:
Our main character Zach is enrolled to a highschool by his mysterious father that he had never met before. In this highschool you are taught magic and martial arts.
The school has a ranking system that measures your worth by testing your strength and wits to the limits.
But this school is an unforgiving school where the weak are bullied and the strong are followed. Zach constantly gets bullied because of this rule.
The weak and talentless Zach will try to survive as the weakest of the weakest in this new school he is enrolled in with the support of his friends and his perseverance.

Title: Excerpts from William's Autobiography
Synopsis: Journal of the universe and life as I know it. Follow along my notes as I ramble on in a hope that the works of my life will be carried on in the minds of others.

Title: In a medieval world,Why i got a malus instead of a cheat?
Synopsis:
I was reincarnated to another world due to a weird missunderstanding 
I wanted to be the best scientist in the world, but i got stuck in another world where i can't think about scientific invention
follow the story of a newborn named Xusphyr, and how he will be the most influent life form in this in this extremely vast planet 
A story written by Clément LAGATDU

Title: The Genesis System
Synopsis:
Genesis. It is the end of countless stories. The end of thousands of universes, billions of planets, and trillions of lives. But what is taken may also be given, as shown in the story of Cael King. A young man of Earth, knowing only a life of study and work in the relentless and endless pursuit of satisfaction. This is the origin of his story.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Inspired by the system used in The Legend of Randid.ly Ghosthound. The system is an homage but the characters, world, and story are unique. I will post as often as I can and, given that I am not starting work until July, that should be pretty frequently. If you have any suggestions or comments please feel free to leave them as this is my first story and I'd love to improve both it and my writing style.
This is my Patreon. Please join if you'd like to read a few chapters ahead and be part of an interactive community

Title: Purple Lightning Emperor
Synopsis:
This is a story about Shad, a young orphan who was struck by lightning. Instead of dying, he was reborn into another world known as Eidrin. The ambient mana on Eidrin is extremely dense and abundant, allowing mages to reign supreme over the rest of the populace. Follow Shad as he develops the strength to survive in this new world and reaches heights thought to be unattainable for mortals, all in a quest to learn the truth behind his reincarnation and the purple lightning that resides in his soul.

Title: Iverson's Pillar
Synopsis:
A man reincarnates, after a fatal accident, only to find himself in the body of a young boy.
After being left for dead by the 'SYSTEM' in a forest with deadly beasts and monsters, seemingly miles away from civilisation we watch as Michael attempts to survive the harsh jungle and all its dangerous tenants.

Title: Two.5 Heart Game
Synopsis:
(UPDATE) THIS IS A SERIES REBOOT. 
(After some thinking, I decided that I don't want to give up on this project. The story is already completed in my mind, but I still need to share it with everyone. Thus, I will reboot the series when I have smoothed out the details instead of writing and posting drafts that aren't thoroughly planned with care. Until then, all chapters will be deleted.)

Ok, do not panic, calm down and assess the situation....F$@# THAT. This would be a perfectly normal situation where I should panic...even though if I don't know if this qualifies as a NORMAL situation.
Ok, here's what I know (which isn't much)1. I died and got killed by Truck-kun (anime meme, look it up)2. I got reincarnated (Yay! Cool, another shot at life...but)3. In a reverse harem manga I was reading before I died (Awesome, handsome bishounens here I come!....but)4. BUT AS THE F$%@$#% RIVAL-CHAN!!!!
Before I died the manga I was reading called Cupid Lover: First Shot Ai or just First Shot Ai, finally updated its last few chapters. The story circles around the cute, cupid angel in training Usagi Hana-chan being assigned to pair cool;rebellious Kitsune Daiki. Eventually they fall in love after many obstacles and finally defeat me, the final boss, the anti-cupid who's sole goal is to ruin all relationships for god knows what reason, Amaya Raz(aline)-chan. (Name literally means mysterious night rain).
But Amaya just got booted from both the heavens and the human world and sent into exile in the Split between worlds...but...wait...a character died there..
NO.NO.NO. I don't wanna be exiled and die!!! I mean, uh..redemption right? The other characters got it!! I STILL HAVE TWO MORE CHAPTERS, C'MON GOODIE TWO SHOES USAGI OPEN YOUR DAMN HEART!!!! Two chapters...I still have hope....
No, I gotta take this into my own hands, like hell I'm going to get exiled and die. Go ahead and be lovey dovey on your own I'm going to go and travel the world or something!
 
Authors Notice:
(IMPORTANT AT THE END. PLS READ!!!)
There will be some anime references and other references. I’ll try to add the meanings in at the end of each chapter. 
I plan to make th story a slow progression type of story with a lot of details and a ratio of 3/5 inner dialogue 2/5 talking. I don’t plan on doing fillers and want to het straight to the point. 
A good example of these types of story styles is the one with Koushoin Reika. A lot a chapters, fun and interesting. 
Each character, moment, and thing is important and put in their for a reason.
MOST IMPORTANTLY. I like to draw (and fix my mistakes if they are pointed out to me.) so I will be going back and adding things on old chapters sometimes. If you want to see the drawing to help with visuals, go ahead and look. 
I cannot promise that they are good and may ruin what you think the characters should look like. 
- Remmie

Title: Elemental Chrysanthemum Homeland Online
Synopsis: Gaming company Heraldic Echo has launched their long-awaited VRMMO, Elemental Chrysanthemum Homeland Online, to much fanfare. But only the rich or truly dedicated can afford their own cutting-edge full immersion pods. Everyone else will have to make due with renting time at company-owned game centers in major cities around the world.Alexander and Alexandra are in the former category after a lucky lottery win catapulted them to the life, if not lifestyle, of the idle rich. They join the game on launch day, but circumstances and differing interests start them on completely different paths.Will the twins reunite in the game, or will they continue on their separate ways, only meeting across the dinner table outside virtual reality? Follow the protagonist as new friends are made and old friendships strengthened in this character-driven, slice-of-life LitRPG without all the overarching (and overbearing) plot points that weigh down other tales.Players don't face permadeath, nobody's trapped in the game, the real world isn't about to end, and power-levels don't start at massively overpowered as a baseline. Unique achievements and server firsts do abound, but the main characters only capture a few of them; they aren't the only players in the world, after all!    ----    Intended update schedule is currently the 10th, 20th, and 30th of each month once or twice a month, probably at irregular timing, but variable schedules and other commitments may interfere.

Title: Jogn's War
Synopsis: Having grown up in a rural town, Jogn had never witnessed any individual with superpowers before.  This has led to his own belief that they don't exist.  Now living in a big city, Jogn tries to live his life in the superpowered world while maintaining his ignorance of his own abilities at any cost.

Title: 13.AI
Synopsis:
AI means Artificial Intelligence.


 


But those words don't match Al, either of them. Neither Artificial, nor Intelligent.


 


At least not at the beginning. No, an AI requires input, trial & error, and careful observation. But at that point, what makes it any different than human? How are binary choices any different than the choices in a human life.


 


I wager that there is no difference. But what will he think?

Title: Heir to the Eternal Throne
Synopsis:
(Rated R for descriptive violence, dark themes, and some sexual content)
Aldrin is the oldest and firstborn of the Shadow-born Vampires, the heir to the Eternal Throne. He has lived a life of luxury and privilege, with servants to care for his every whim. He is the Elder of his own coven and devoted to the teachings of the Dark God, his father, mentor, and master.
Aldrin's life of comfort and security becomes threatened with the emergence of a mysterious woman he chose to save, and a desire to walk a different path than that of what the Dark God has chosen for him. Yet, unknown to him, there is another danger, as yet another is watching his every move. In order to survive, Aldrin must fight not only his destiny but his god.

Title: Needs More Monsters
Synopsis: Usually only considered as a last resort, artificially accelerating the creation of a dungeon core is not a task to be taken lightly. There's only one way for it to go right and a thousand and one ways for it to go wrong. Mess it up and, rather than some ancient spirit rendered little more than a beast by aeons spent dead, you might invoke the soul of a power hungry Warlock, still fully possessed of all his ambitions and now in control of one of the most dangerous artefacts in the known world. Your spectacular failure could result in the beginning of a new age of Darkness.Or you could get some milquetoast shlub who's more concerned about people falling down the ominous entrance stairs.Needs More Monsters is intended as a non-standard take on the usual Dungeon Core formula, inspired primarily by There is no Epic Loot here, Only Puns.

Title: Alice's Saga of Fire and Blood
Synopsis:
When a masked Jester performs an incredible feat of magic at the Annual Royal Demonstration of Magics, student Alice Pihl decides that she will be this man's apprentice, no matter the cost. She will no longer suffer her mother's beatings, the humiliation of her upbringing and her stagnating magical development.
"The road is irreversible and will consume every essence of your being", says the Jester, his face hidden behind an ornate mask.
Alice stares into his eyes, two swirling maelstroms of energy akin to the sun. Her decision was made years ago, and it was written in reinforced steel.
The Jester turns from her gaze. "Very well, we shall test your mettle with three tasks. If you survive all three, you will evolve to a state words cannot explain. And should you fail, you will simply be another farmer's daughter, dead and burried in an unmarked grave. Now follow me, we have a ways to travel."
Alice kept her icy gaze on the Jester, however inside she was as the first day of spring, the ice that had embraced her life for years was now finally melting away as sprouts of hope slowly made their way to the surface. Whatever these tasks, that manifested themselves as shadowy gateways in her mind, proved to be, she would prevail.
***********************************************
If you enjoy my work, consider visiting my patreon and supporting me!

Title: Fatherhood
Synopsis: So this story came to me in a dream, as most of them do. I wrote it out and then discovered that it was nothing more tha a short story, with nothing more than one chapter. Of course, i can always return to these characters in the future, maybe make a drama series out of it, but for the moment i'm satisfied with this.

Title: Earth 2.0
Synopsis:
**This is a system Apocalpse Novel. mostly**
Joe was living a comfortable life in the foothills of California after years in the military Joe just wanted to relax with his four dogs and maybe find a women who could put up with them.  Unfortunately this was not meant to be, Earth was about to be find itself the focus of an alien civilization, and he was living at ground zero.

Title: Louder
Synopsis: Written while listening to the song "Louder" hence the title, hope you enjoy

Title: Ocean's Prey
Synopsis: A short piece that expresses exactly why you should be afraid of what lurks beneath the surface

Title: Amongst the Stars
Synopsis:
It only takes a single moment, a wrong turn, a few minutes late, or even letting someone pull out in front of you can change your life forever.
In one Accident Matthew lost everything he loved, his parents, his legs, his scholarship, his life. He didn't die but felt like he had, when he was at his lowest moment all his “friends” abandoned him when they saw there was nothing left to gain.
Spending every second confined in a prison when you used to be the best, the fastest, but one mistake took it all away.
But who said moments only come once?
A new Hope, A new Dream, a new Life.

Title: Song of Tears
Synopsis: A short story that bares the smallest semblence to the little mermaid...

Title: Dis-abilities
Synopsis:
Ok so James isn't your average human, actually he's disabled. Unfortunatley he finds himself in a fantasy adventure clearly written for able-bodied teenagers with fantastic looks, but instead its him, and four other ugly (by his description not mine) disabled ones. How the hell is he supposed to survive?
 
My little brother has spinabifida, which is a birth defect that leaves him paralyzed from the waist down. When he first began to read I noticed that most books, videogames, entertainment, etc. rarely recognized disabilities in their content, and when they did it was always perfectly counteracted before the majority of the story (for example daredevil, blind but posesses the quirk of ecolocation) 
I decided to fix that by having a disabled MC that faced the same challenges as an able-bodied one, without a convenient handicap. So now i'm writing a YA novel that fits under that description, one that hopefully reaches at least the majority of the disabled teen population

Title: Wings of Revenge
Synopsis: A short tale of revenge and light torture..,

Title: A Monster by Other Men
Synopsis: A story I was asked to write for an assignment about if I thought torture was ever truly acceptable.

Title: A Line of Blood
Synopsis: Classic tale of messing with things you don't understand

Title: Tales of the Disappointing Knight
Synopsis: The acts of a Knight who does his duty in a rather unusual way.

Title: North Forest
Synopsis:
Its impossible for a lone person to survive the north forest.
Its impossible for a person to befriend the beasts.
its impossible to coexist.
It's impossible to thrive.
We'll see about that.
 
(This is a hobby work with little effort directed towards editing and proofreading. For a more satisfactory experience check out my other works.)

Title: Fantasy encyclopedia
Synopsis:
Honestly I'm bad at making stories without them being confusing and overpowered fast.
So I'm doing something that I'm a lot better at, making up a logical bases for fictional items.
Since I'm doing somewhat of an explainatory story rather than an action and fictional story, I have a discord channel in order to help fellow nerds connect and force them to help me make good items.

This story is aimed towards fantasy readers and D&D players who want a bit of spice in their games.
Inspiration is when I read a light novel and one of the reviews was that they were seeking an alchemic novel, however i'm trash at that so I'm making something easy.

Synopsis: Haphazardly thrown into another world, Robin finds herself tasked as a governor in the new world. Uniting kingdoms, managing her new domain, understanding fundamentals of magic, and ultimately overseeing for a higher god, is enough to cause more than a few strands of white hair.

He got lucky and his heart started again.
Now the system doesn't consider him dead or alive.

He's a DEADMAN

Title: Do You Wish For More?
Synopsis:
Dannick is just a super normal kind of guy, just like you and me, but he has alway wish for more. Anything! He just want some action in his poor, boring life. But one day, it all end. The life he so hate, was ripped from him by a simple, foolish and drunk retard that just BANG....... hit him with a traficked golf card attached to some kind of nitro. 
 
That was weird, even for him who read a lot of novel for passing time. The next thing he remember was waking up in a dark cave. Of course the first thing he though was "am I kidnapped" and "where am I?" But it all end the moment Dannick tried to speak. He know that he was in a teenager phase and his voice is pretty strange but, why can he not speak? Trying to touch his mouth, all he got was a clear "toc" "toc". Ok, that was beyond strange.
 
But that was he though, before seeing his bony hand.........
 
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hello everybody~~~! It's me! Zacky your kitty! That story is actually my second that I start writing while waiting for my other story to get published. I actually write the story that I (personnally) like the most.        Mostly non-human and all, but there is a small problem, it's my first non-human so i don't really know how to make him react
 
ps- I tagged it horror because of the people who believe raising the dead is pretty scary~~

Title: Symphony of gods
Synopsis:
When a mortal girl enters a gods domain she may not realize that she has crossed the boundary to another world. When a god decides to keep the girl he shows her a world that is beautiful and dazzling, full of wonder and death.
Gods, spirits and demons live together in the one city that houses them all. A city with as many names as there are beings inhibiting it- the city of a billion names!
Located inside this extraordinary city which few mortals ever sat a step into is a certain pub in a certain city with a certain god serving as both it's owner and bartender. What happens if this god decideds to keep a young woman that mistakenly entered his pub?
 
This is a repost of my Novel "A God's Pub", under a different name and with minor changes to the plot.

Title: The Celestial Scholar
Synopsis:
Only 2 months left before the Snowy Mountain Academy starts. Before that, Ye Xue needs to reach the middle-stage of the Intermediate Qi Gathering.
Being a mere mortal without any experience in cultivation, can Ye Xue really succeed? And How?
"Master alchemist? What a joke!"
"You dare to duel me? Try on!"
"You are looking down on me? You deserve a slap!"
This is the story of Ye Xue, a mortal aiming to become the strongest cultivator.
 
- Author Note -

Title: Second Life
Synopsis: This story is a spin off sequel type thing to The Mystic War. It does not go through the life of Yuki, but instead it goes through the new life of a girl named Ari. In this world, she befriends a girl named Touka and both set a goal they want to reach. The novel brings up parts of The Mystic War, but it isn't the main part of the story.

Title: Getting power IRL is expensive
Synopsis:
A 22 young man, can have any power he wishes for, for a price of course.
What will he do?

Title: The Foretold: Sun Child (Complete)
Synopsis:
If you read my story on any website besides Royal Road, the website has copied my story without my permission.
As a sixteen-year-old commoner, your future is bleak. Worse, your appearance sets you apart from others. Your only achievement so far is befriending the second son of the Lord of the Keep. He has been your only friend for eleven years, initially a partner in mischief and later your hunting companion and confidant.
Now your friendship is being torn asunder. He has turned eighteen and is being sent away to become a Judge Knight Aspirant. What is to become of you? Before your friend leaves, there is murder and conspiracy! Magic left the land hundreds of years ago. All you have is your bow and hunting skills. Nevertheless, you must fight to survive and save another to have any hope of a future!
Note: The graphic isn't mine; it is a reimagining of a few separate images. Any objections from original artists, let me know.
N.B. If you are looking for Sexual Content in every chapter or every second, third or fourth chapter, this isn't the story for you. The Sexual Content is required for a plot device, not a way of life, and the later chapters reflect that - please stop dropping Low Ratings when you feel I haven't met your idea of "fan service".
This is finished as much as a multi-book vision can be. At 750,000 words, give or take and a small readership, I can only blame myself. I have learnt a lot, possibly forgotten a lot as well! I will probably return to the Chapters at some point - a touch-up here and there. The second book, though, will likely remain in my head for a very long time, so yes, "cliffs", although I hope the characters and their motivations are developed enough that you can have a good guess at the content of Book Two and tell me so I can confirm or deny!

This isn't a LITRPG where classes are developed, and a hero of immense power defeats great foes. This story is based within (I hope) an authentic and consistent culture, leaving breadcrumbs for the reader to work out what is happening and why. This is a slow-burn story as the MC is stumbling around discovering her new place and role.
Author's Note (Apr 2021): I dropped the Fantasy Genre for the Mystery Genre because while the setting mentions magic, it is about past glories and trying to return to them. The MC from Chapter One doesn't understand her predicament and the range of mysteries she must solve to survive. If I have this wrong, PM me, and I will change this back.

Title: The Candidates
Synopsis: Something is testing them. People are waking up alone without their memories and faced with terrorfying challenges.

Title: The Earth Is Hell's Playground.
Synopsis:
Cassandra gets a new partner, her childhood friend Kai.
Going on assignments together and trying to find out what happened to her parents.
However, what happens when feelings start to develop? With lives on the line and supernatural creatures coming out the woodworks, will there be time for love to bloom?
And is someone jealous of Cassandra's and Kai's relationship? Plus it looks like someone has sold out the Hunters, who could it be? Yet not all are welcoming to her new (Lover?) and as internal friction arises, it becomes apparent a traitor may be right under their noses.
Also available on Wattpad

Title: Crimson Violet
Synopsis: This is a story of a military Colonel Taylor Davidson and his research team encountering an anomaly in the middle of the ocean, which caused numerous disturbances and incidents of ships and planes passing by the area. After years of research, the scientists could say only one thing for sure - this is a tare in reality. Today the research team issues their last experiment.

Title: Tinny's Magic Mart
Synopsis: Tinny, an orphan from Karnesia, was hired to work at a magic item shop. Every week she learns a new thing about the world of magic... all in the name of capitalism.  This is a light hearted story of a young girl hired by a grand wizard to work at his atelier. As the days pass, she learns about magic, interacted with silly customers, and even joined in some frivolous quest.

Title: Labyrinth of Anchored Moments
Synopsis:
While dreaming, a hard working family man is approached by a child-like god that has become bored of their custom created gaming world. Allowing the man to choose whatever 'Class' he wants, he chooses to become a 'Time Wizard'. He's dropped off in a city above a labyrinth with only this directive.
"You just have to play my game, which is styled after your world’s dungeon exploration RPGs, level up, and save the world. Or don’t. I don’t care."

Title: Bloody Grass
Synopsis:
Dorian had an accident, a stupid one at that, and he died.
He thought it was the end, that only darkness awaited him.
That was until he woke up, in a room full of babies, Orochimaru of the Sannin inspecting every newborn, to see his potential new recruits, that he knew his life was going to go from bad to worse.
(Cover is what I picture Dorian/Jin to look like when he'll be 15, It doesn't come from me, the character on it is from Tokyo Raven, a nice anime that I enjoyed watching)

Title: Starting A New Journey
Synopsis:
A  being awoken sitting upon a solitary throne sorrounded by broken and decayed corpses, sitting upon thrones similar to his own. 
A saddened and grief filled smile appeared upon his face, as memories of the comrades he had known since he and they were mere children, starts to reappear in his mind like movie with all it's good, bad, saddening and excitement filled moments. As the memories keeps flowing tears started to smear his youthful, rough and enlightened features.
As his tears start to lessen he mearly said "Possa la tua anima trovare la fine del nostro viaggio con soddisfazione e possa guidarti, mentre inizi un nuovo inizio.  Sic hoc est meum vale ad extremum omnis ex vobis, fratres et reges conservis meis sororibus in armis. Vale atque amicis meis epularer, Riposa in pace. "  slowly he rises from his throne as dust starts to fall off his body.
A blue screen appears and a female voice is heard followed by a male voice.
 

So here I am again with a new story that I am actually gonna finish.  Most of the story is mine but I will be using other peoples works as I see fit.  I will be adding their names in the synpiosis when I do use them.

Title: Even a Billion Stars Can't Match up to You.
Synopsis: Just a story about how I met the love of my life.

Title: Gluttony (Cardinal Sins)
Synopsis:
Dominic Anderson spent the last two years of his life in jail, trying to become something different.
Someone better.
But when he comes back to his hometown, all his good intentions, the prospects for a future devoid of bloodshed, are challenged by the reality of the situation he has to face.
He may have changed, but the Pits--the Ghetto where he used to live--hasn’t.
In the ruins of a city, a hellhole where life is worth nothing, there are no normal jobs for a ex-convinct.
But for a former hitman?
Way too many.
The only problem?
He swore he'd never kill again.
A promise that will be tested when Jackie, the psychotic boss of the Arian brotherhood, comes to knock at his door, asking to settle a debt Dominic has no way to repay.
And that’s when things start to get interesting.

Title: Tentacles
Synopsis: A tentacle creature with no guidance and no power has to somehow survive all alone within a cave, which it was abandoned in by its cruel and unforgiving creator. How could something as weak, and useless, as a low level tentacle monster survive within a cave that holds no human inhabitants, besides the casual adventurer that goes within it to kill and gain experience? It's simple, really. All it has to do is consume and eat. Consume everything it can find. whether it be the living, the dead, or human lust (Females specifically). And consuming human lust is exactly what it's going to do.

Title: The Evolution Assassin
Synopsis:
Colt was a world renown assassin who had a price on his head that could buy you nearly an entire nation, give or take a few trillion. His contracts always consisted of the top 1% in the world: Absolute power abusing patriarchs, "public servants" with more than a few nasty rumors floating around them and those just beginning their new lives into being nearly untouchable megalomaniacs . Most called him a monster and psycho for killing those that arguably changed many lives for the better but there were very few that had known the wicked sins of those he had murdered. Whether he was justified in his actions mattered little to both the powerful and afraid VIPs that wanted him gone.
 After his unfortunate end, Colt was greeted by nothing except darkness and the voice of what he believed to be a very old man. It demanded to be entertained and it was high time that Colt repaid the generosity given to him, the voice claimed. Constant intense flashes of blinding light mixed with the cursed demands from the voice brings Colt to shut down entirely. After what seems like a fever dream, Colt forces his heavy eyes open to find out that he was now in a vibrant forest with a much younger body that doesn't seem to be fully human. Without out even a sliver of advice or assistance from the voice, Colt must now understand the new possibilities(as well as the dangers) that this strange place has in store for him.
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

                Note---------- If you read "The Ash Eel" around 4 years ago and are hoping that it will follow the same MC as before, I am sorry to say that will not be the case for Colt 2.0. I want this character to have at least some sort of depth and likability, unlike Colt 1.0. Some ideas for power will stay and others have been scrapped due to how completely overpowered they are. Not to say he won't be strong later but a kid(In my opinion) isn't going to have the ability or strength to overpower an adult that can fight actually fight back, no matter what "gifts" or powers he/she may have.
The story will be much slower and drawn out compared to what was before to hopefully show just how strong these characters can become. I have hopes to make this a decently long read for those of you that enjoy.. well reading I guess.
FYI------ Still pretty new to actually making a story and trying to bring it life somehow so I would appreciate more critique than insults if possible. If there are any spelling mistakes you care to point out just lemme know and I'll get to it. 
I don't really have a schedule for this just yet but if it picks up in popularity and people really want more I'll probably try to set up some dates for the novel. With that, I thank you for giving my novel a quick read and I value your time as a giga chad/chadette novel enjoyer.

Before he was killed, he was suddenly transported into a world that is similar to the  "Naruto World" with chakra and a mix of magic and martial arts.

Title: The Battlefield of Mage and Dao
Synopsis:
Yao Xioabai one of the seven godlike players in VRMMORPG, Mage and Dao Era, was stabbed to death by one of his lovers.
 
     This novel tells about a godlike player reincarnated to the world Mage and Dao Era which two year before game started and the world will become a place of war of hundred tribes, strongest become king weak be a slave. Yao Xiaobai takes over the body of a teenager NPC who is born without Mana talent and Dao sea.
 
     After he died once he knew if he was dead again he probably did not reincarnation if there, probably a worse life than this, so Yao Xiaobai would do anything for the loved ones and himself would survive, because the chances coming maybe only one time.

Title: Wild Magic Online
Synopsis:
In the ten years since full sensory VR technology was developed, it has been plagued by controversy. Two of the most popular games have already had to be shut down prematurely, amidst accusations of the developers stealing people's thoughts. There was even an international watchdog organization created at some point. None of that has stopped people from flocking to the technology, naturally. Or really slowed them down at all. Or stopped them from gleefully extolling its virtues to the less fortunate.
After years of being denied access to the technology, one high school boy has finally managed to save up enough money to join in on the fun, using the newest fantasy MMO as his launching off point. When he logs in for the first time, though, his adventure starts before he's even fully in game, when the system automatically assigns him a female avatar. Now playing as River, she quickly learns that the greatest mysteries are sometimes not the game, but the other players themselves, and the greatest adventures can be those that take place inside the heart.
~ ~ ~
This is an extremely slow paced slice of life/adventure story set primarily in a fanstasy VR game. It contains some coarse language at parts, mild themes of sexuality, as well as mildly depressive themes. It is intended for a teen to young adult audience.

Title: My Papa is my Demon King
Synopsis:
A short story from the year where war hardly existed. a time where the world had peace with little to no conflict, but what did Leonardo Ajustus found when he was walking down an unpaved road. Crooked events and nostalgic scenes lurking behind him from the empty streets.

he came across a girl, both eyes covered with a ragged cloth, dirty hair which has withered either from the cold or lack of nutrition.

Leo picks it up and decided to take care of it... how will this fateful encounter turn up?

Title: True Daughter of Storm
Synopsis:
A girl diagnose with schizophrenia was admitted to the hospital for treatment, until someone notice an oddity with her disease. They exploited her for their own greed until she couldn't handle the pressure anymore. She gave into the enticement, following the lead of the voices one stormy night.
The girl woke up in a new body, in a new world, with a new start. Join Tempest Arashi Kataigida as she explored this new world, make friends, and become the greatest menace the world has ever seen. 
 
2 chapters a week every Tuesday and Thursday.  Extra = Friday

Title: Pandora: A New Beginning
Synopsis:
Alicia Gray had reached the top, she had put her all into the game, but she had lost something in the process.
She had sacrificed her family and friends in order to gain benefits in the game, neglecting the ones who loved her from her childhood, asking for products when she knew her family couldn't afford them, all so she could gain advantages in the game, watch as her life restarts and how she is given the chance to change everything she had done in the past.
Watch as she rejoins the world of:
Pandora

Title: Arch
Synopsis:
An archway that appeared out of nowhere in the middle of my bedroom. 
A portal to a twilight zone-like place that makes no sense at all.  And the potential for real power and resources to be found and exploited in this world.
At this rate I, Adrian Walker a dedicated and if not ‘mildly’ psychotic geek, might just end up ruling the pathetic and annoying human race after all.  That’s if I can survive the world beyond the Arch long enough and manage to unlock its secrets.

Title: Visaria Online: Exile
Synopsis:
Grind XP and loot in an ancient land of powerful magic, fierce warriors, fire-breathing dragons, deadly monsters and horny demons.
Join the noble Paladin Ajax and his two companions. One a goth chick turned Demon Mage, the other a kink loving succubus with whips and a tail, as they journey through the world of Visaria Online, gaining levels, abilities and phat loot.
The real world is a frozen wasteland. Humanity is exiled to Visaria Online, living under the game’s rules and the dreaded specter of its now-defunct pay to win cash shop. Conscripted into the war between the two Visarian factions, Ajax and his companions must survive the brutal player versus player battles and grow in power and prestige.
But as the two factions of the game launch massive simultaneous invasions of one another’s lands, a new threat looms on the horizon that threatens to destroy the exiled home of humanity.
Warning: contains violence, gore, numbers, hot goth chicks, a twenty foot tall angry woman (also hot), a goblin XP grind treadmill, gratuitous kissing and groping, an old dragon with an addiction to pickled figs, a kinky succubus who just won’t leave the main guy alone and a broken pineapple that may or may not be vendor trash.

His own son 
Damien.

Title: Balance
Synopsis: This is the story of a boy named Lawrence. On the night of his high school graduation, Lawrence along with 1/4 of the population of earth were taken to compete in a survival game. The stakes, the continued existence of the human race.In a world where one mistake can mean the death of yourself and all the people you love. In a world filled with game-like systems and quests. In a world that desperately needs a hero how will Lawrence fare? Because in this world of growing mystery and strangeness Lawrence knows one thing for certain. He is no hero.

Title: Tale of the Small Hero
Synopsis:
Follow Cattleya in her journey to become a hero!

Title: VOID LEGION: GAMEBORN
Synopsis:
After his father's death, sixteen year old Andre Taylor is forced to quit gaming, quit school, get a crappy job, and live in one of New New York's poorest neighborhoods. Life can't get worse.
Until a devastating car accident leaves his mother in a coma, her unborn twins clinging to life, and his sister a hostage. To save them, Dre must excel at Void Legion, the revolutionary update to the Virtual Reality Multiplayer Game, Ataxia Online.
Now, powerful factions want him dead. Genetically-enhanced Player Killers hunt him. And a legion of nightmare creatures have appeared in random places since the world-breaking passage of a voidstorm.
Can Dre adapt to a game beyond his imagination, survive long enough with meager skills against impossible odds, and unearth the secrets of the Void Legion? He must. Or a fate worse that death awaits.

Title: Loli Saga
Synopsis:
Years after being sent in the middle of a danger zone instead of becoming a hero like the rest, Amano Shun decides to meet his fellow classmates. There's just one problem: he's no longer the 'same' as before. 
 
WARNING: The pairing is F(M)xM.

Title: Partners In Death
Synopsis: Hoga Yasahiro, who wished for death as he lost all interest in life, comes to realize he's immortal as he fails his suicide attempt.  Isozaki Izumi who is so afraid of losing those around him, has a complicated past that led him to lead a simple life with simple goals as he struggles with attachment.  As events escalate, Yasahiro and Izumi find out that they share nothing but immortality; making their partnership very hard.  With no clue of how it happened, they start investigating and asking questions for very different reasons. Yasahiro wants to end it, and Izumi wants to make use of it.  They start sharing memories of dying, a heavy secret with traumatic effects, traumatic enough to unite them in the face of whatever that comes, as it won't be as bad as death itself, or so they thought..  A story of two immortals struggling to live many lives in a world that has more mysteries than they could ever imagine.

Title: Initium Vitae
Synopsis: Welcome to the world of Nix, a land that combines modern day comforts with magic and adventure. Our story is told through the eyes of five characters, all of whom attend Solaris Academy, a school for those talented in the application of magic. However, not everyone gets into Solaris on their first try, as we find our cast temporarily split, behind the scenes there are some evil workings in store and intend to take power for their own personal purposes.
