Title: Grimdark Ash: Twisted Fantasy
Synopsis:
The Dreamer wanders the Kingdom. In a world of giants, gnolls, trolls, and magic, his only goal is to slay Royalty. With his powerful mental attacks, courtesy of his highborn heritage, he wreaks havoc on those that stand in the way of his sole purpose in life.
Grimdark Ash is a fantasy world that my writing takes place. In this world, there are many different creatures and systems that are common to fantasy themes. For example, there are adventurers, magic, and guilds. However, what differentiates this world from the plethora of other fantasy settings is the everlasting dark theme. (Hint: Grimdark) In Grimdark Ash, basic survival is incredibly difficult, often due to corruption, aggression, or the basic dangers presented through the land.

Title: The Doomsday Technomancer
Synopsis:
Arthur Lee, an avid reader, a gamer, and young man with his own personal concerns is suddenly unable to resolve them. Forcibly thrust into different world, transmigrating into the body of someone who shares his name, then expecting him to leave his old life behind is one thing...
But asking him to survive the impending zombie apocalypse is another!
Hopefully, his new and peculiar tech-fusing ability will keep him out of danger, or at least keep his flesh from a zombie's maw!

Title: A Tale of Two Worlds
Synopsis:
NEWS: Off of Hiatus?
This is my first book, so don't expect everything to be perfect. Plus, I'm human. Hopefully you enjoy reading! This may become a prologue to another book in this universe, but it depends on how it goes. I don't have the story fully planned out yet, but I have some general framework in place. It may be more conducive to the universe to make this into a prologue rather than book 1 of the series, or it may not. We shall see.I'm tempted to tag this for sexual content for hand-holding, kissing and emotional connections, but I won't. Romance is also not the main focus of the story, or isn't intended to be.Some of the tags will not make sense for a while, and may actually be removed if this does actually become a prologue to the universe or series. As a specific example, GameLit will(may) not come into play until later volumes, but it is planned to.This will be written as a typical novel, rather than as a web serial or web novel. Longer chapters, slower releases, non-episodic, etc.

Title: Grant Me Thy Arrow
Synopsis:
A sharp arrow pierces the veil of darkness, shattering tranquility and the normal course of fate. A blunt arrow breaks, crumbling to dust beyond any hope of restoration.
This is a tale about two people who are not meant to be, but as fate would have it, they are drawn together against their own wishes. A love not of their own volition, but arising from someone's playful prank. With their fate thrown into disarray, they will struggle to regain what was lost and search for the missing puzzle piece in their lives.
The trickster wears a mask, but it's starting to crumble. Parts of the mask are breaking apart, leaving gaping holes and insecurity in the place of where fun and indifference were supposed to be. The trickster's joyful life as he knows it is starting to dim as the brunts of his mistake make him question the power he wields.
The arrow flies on its solitary path, but where does it end? When two worlds collide, will sparks fly or will there be nothing but remnants left in their wake?

Title: A curious cat's life in a new world
Synopsis:
A cat that lived it's life in a poor household with a caring owner had just passed.
The Cat Goddess Bastet gave the cat another chance at life in a new world with her blessing but it feels like something's missing...
 Goddess Bastet: "I might've forgot to teach her how to speak ..."
In a certain rural forest
 Elven Knight: Hey kid are you lost?
 Alfie: Meow!(Where am I?)
 Elven Knight: Can you please stop messing around?
 Alfie: Meow Nya-nya mya!(I'm not joking around what do you mean?)
 Elven Knight: ...

Title: Catch All The Girlfriends!
Synopsis: *****UPDATE: 10/13/19***** In preparation for releasing the next CATG book on Amazon, I have deleted the remaining chapters of CATG on RR. For those who have been following since 2017, thank you. Without your support, I wouldn't have continued this far. I am going to push the adventures of Yoshi Soysauce as far as I can. You can follow my updates on Amazon by searching for "Catch All The Girlfriends" there.  *****END UPDATE***** *****UPDATE: 07/18/19***** Thank you all for your support to this point. As many of you would have realized, I've published the first 40 chapters on Amazon exclusively, so I had to take it off RR. I've just deleted CH 41-80 as I will be launching CATG! 2 in a month's time. If you want to read the edited version, mark August 20 in your calendars. *****END UPDATE***** Hello there! Welcome to the world of Girlfriends! My name is Poke! People call me the Girlfriend Prof! This world is inhabited by creatures called Girlfriends! For some people, Girlfriends are pets. Other use them for fights. Myself... I study Girlfriends as a profession. First, what is your name? Right! So your name is Yoshi Soysauce! This is my grandson. He's been your rival since you were a baby. ...Erm, what is his name again? That's right! I remember now! His name is Asshat! Yoshi Soysauce! Your very own Girlfriend legend is about to unfold! A world of dreams and adventures with Girlfriends awaits! Let's go! --------- Author's note:I'm writing a Harem LitRPG based off of Pokemon. The big difference is that instead of catching pocket monsters, you're catching monster girls.I know, I know, hardly original, but I want to take this further than anyone on RRL's done it before.I want to build:- A full list of 150 fleshed out girlfriends,- A world with hat tips and easter eggs based on the Pokemon anime series,- Equivalents of TMs, HMs, items, eggs. BSTs, EVs, IVs... maybe.- A compelling narrative that isn't just about a dude having orgies with his team of girlfriends.*cracks knuckles* Let's see how far I can take this.

Title: Chronicles of The Magical Sword Sovereign
Synopsis:
"Myriad realms are conquered by his legions"
        "His enemies are slaughtered by his sword "
        "Gods tremble at his gaze"
'        ''His magic creates miracles''
        A boy born with three bloodlines and a blind golden eye and left with an  old man
       by his mysterious parents . Watch as he grows up and leaves to carve his destiny in the
       vast continent of Aldaria.
  well this is my first novel and would love to have your comments and reviews so that i can make amendments to the novel

Title: Goddess' Landing
Synopsis: Once, a goddess descended from a star and gave birth to magic, but it sparked a long-lasting war between two fronts. Only a hundred years had passed since her disappearance, and a young smith holds the key to unlocking its cause.

Title: Aeria Chronicles
Synopsis: Greetings to all who found this Page of mine!I just started writing a little story for myself and thought after a while it would be good to get some feedback from strangers :)English is not my native language so please excuse any mistakes and errors you may find and also keep in mind I am nowhere close to beeing a professional writer.All that beeing said, I do hope you find my little story entertaining and leave me a comment with your thoughts on it.Scedule - I will try to post a chapter atleast once a week

Title: God Killed Me
Synopsis:
I’m a Bad Person, I’ve stolen from the poor and the rich alike, I’ve screwed up people’s lives from the good to the bad. BUT do I deserve getting killed by a psychopath, do I deserve meeting a trash god, and maybe worst of all do I deserve to become a demon.
New Chapter Every Monday
 
 
 
P.S Not my cover art

Title: Hide And Seek
Synopsis:
A plane crashes into the ocean and the passengers on board meet the God, he offers them a new life in exchange for playing a game. A game that every kid has played but a little different version of it. A version where the hiders have to do quests and gain points. You can buy anything with those points you can even become god if you have the points for it. 
But some of these quests might involve killing a person...A retired police captain hates to kill people and he chooses seeker but then everybody else choose hider. He has to stop the others from killing.

Title: Compilation of One shot.
Synopsis: 1; Love- A man finding true love in unlikely places.

Title: Doors
Synopsis: William wakes up in a dark cubicle with a horrible headache and no memories of his former past. With little to no knowledge to what´s going on and his physical force neutered to nothing he will colaborate with others to break through the prision of enigmatic doors that requiere to solve a puzzle to open.

Title: PLAGUE
Synopsis:
15 year old Leo Hardy isnt so ordinary . He eats frozen nuts for breakfast in the morning , he journeys in the afternoon , prepares a shack to sleep in in the evening , but at night he cries himself to sleep, hearing the shrieks and roars of the rotting infected humans and the blasts of the guns wielded by the few survivors . He is no ordinary boy , and lives in no ordinary world.
In the twisted future of 2062 , a plague has infected the planet . Scientists work on a cure while others dare to take on the human 'zombies'. Time is running out .
If mankind doesn't find an antidote for the disease , the world will be doomed.

Title: Summon em' all!!
Synopsis: He's innocent, adventurous, faithful and perhaps a little too opinionated. This isn't surprising considering for someone with his position.He was born in a poor family in a developing village. He lived out of trouble until he was about 14 years old, but at that point, things changed.He gained responsibilities and was growing up fast. By never giving up, he made a fortune in an extraordinary world. But with his powers and charm, there's nothing to stop him from reaching great success. He could quickly become an unstoppable force.But anything could happen; he is currently learning how to reach full potential to become the best summoner in the world.

Title: The Dawn of Blood
Synopsis:
As the saying goes, "Ignorance is bliss."
 
That is a good way to describe us.  We are constantly seeking to improve, to evolve.  Coming up with laws and theories to better understand the world around us.  But what if it was all for naught.  What if what we think is truth is nothing more than the actions of higher beings, far beyond our reach.  Upon the discovery of an entire new reality, remaining ignorant is certain death.  The only way to live is to grow, to evolve, to adapt.
 
This is my first novel so any feedback and criticism is greatly appreciated.  I hope that I'm able to grow as a writer through this and hope that people enjoy my work.
 
Credit for the cover image goes to Richard Luong.  Check him out at https://tentaclesandteeth.deviantart.com.

Title: Jacking On Jolly Obstacles [one-shot]
Synopsis:
Jack is young boy that tragically dies in his sleep. Luckily he is given a second chance by an entity beyond his understanding. Will this be his chance to live a better life or will he waste it on silly jokes? After all, what is there for him to lose?
 
 
Author's note:I am just a newbie author please don't bite me too hard please. Any kind of criticism is welcome >_<. Also this is a one-shot that you really shouldn't be reading.

Title: Fallen Stars
Synopsis:
Jedi Master Terus Neeman, master to the young Twi'lek Padawan Yisheera Daal is present on Alderaan when the planetwide communications blackout occurs. As a result, the young padawan back on Coruscant finds herself plagued by a deeply rooted dread. Despite her insistance that something has gone terribly wrong, it seems that neither the Jedi or the Republic will believe her. She decides that if no-one else will act, than the responsibility of saving her master falls to her and her most loyal friend, Kayle Mattuk.
But the two padawans soon find themselves in over their heads, facing overwhelming and continuously mounting odds. Now their only hope is to find and rescue Yisheera's master, because he may well be the only chance they have of getting home alive.

Title: The Forgotten Devil Fruit
Synopsis:
PICKED UP AGAIN!
 
 
For years, One Piece fans have strongly debated which of the devil fruits remain to be the strongest in the series. Though many plausible answers are given, there remain to be 3 big contesters: the Gura Gura No Mi(Whitebeard), Yami Yami No Mi(Blackbeard), and the Ope Ope No Mi(Law). These 3 have undoubtedly held the highest place in the ranking of devil fruits for a while. Yet why is it that everyone seemed to forget about a specific devil fruit, showed early on, yet never recognized due to certain circumstances? Why is it, that although this fruit is capable of giving men the power of gods, it is ignored? This is the story about a young man who happened to stumble across this devil fruit, ultimately changing the whole timeline of One Piece. Join and watch this young man turn himself into a legend!
(I don't own the cover nor do I own One Piece. )

Title: A Knights Path
Synopsis:
Aria,a world filled with monsters,demons and a endless cycle of blood shred. Read as a single knight attempts to right the wrongs done in the world,all while living a life of his own.
-
First time writer,i know its no exuse for bad writing or errors but please give criticism.

Title: The 33 Heavens Bow for 1 Man
Synopsis: The Cauldron of Creation and Destruction was fought over by unimaginably strong beings before it disappeared. Trillions of years later, it emerges once again.  With its reappearance, comes a resurgence of spiritual energy in a universe which was once sucked clean by the cauldron.  For what purpose did a heavenly cauldron wait for trillions of years, absorbing spiritual energy, and indirectly, the cultivation ability of the beings of an entire universe? To nurture the most monstrous genius.

Title: The Towers
Synopsis: William James had just bought his first home when the lights went out. Little did he know that life as he knew it had changed forever, the arrival of the Towers starting a spiral into chaos unlike the world had ever seen. Now he must learn to survive in this brave new world, endure long enough to reach safe zones known as the Enclaves, only things might not be as simple as they appear and the blatant terror of the wild might just be outpaced by the subtle horror of this new society.

Title: Embrace the Ether
Synopsis:
To burn away the old, rebuilding it anew. Countless years ago, a terrible war came for the ancient Primordials, casting down their once believed immovable dominance and securing the rise of a new empire. The Ether was fractured, broken into numerous pieces as peace was hard-fought. Thrown into this new hectic land, Deus must come to wield an unexplained power, one that threatens both his sanity and life simply to use. If he wishes to survive, he must learn not only how to harness this strength but how to grow and expand it, altering the path of those around him. What he doesn't know is that he's found himself involved in a terrifying plot hosted by those demons of old, a game of sorts to decide the fate of Midnight. Does Deus have what it takes to survive, or has he found himself trapped in a plot he has no hope of escaping? 
Note: This story has a slow-build and takes awhile for the pace to get going. If that isn't your thing, this may not be for you. Heavy emphasis on world-building and character creation and progression. 
---------------------------------------------------------------  • Release Schedule •
Chapters will be released weekly, with some occasional alterations throughout. This may not be a permanent adjustment, but I'll do everything I can to remain active.
---------------------------------------------------------------
  • Important FAQ •

Q: What is the cover art from?A: The current cover art for ETE is called 'Run Boy, Run...' which is a work from Gustavo Arteaga's collection, which can be found here - https://gusart.artstation.com/https://www.instagram.com/sirgusart/
If you're the original artist of the work and would like me to remove your content from my cover art, please send me a private message telling me so. I'm not making any direct profit off this story or the cover, as everything here is a passion project.
Also; This story and all its chapters are a work-in-progress, and may be altered at a later date. Don't expect perfection, but I am trying my best. 
Look at everything posted on this fiction as a first draft.

Title: From Boy to Man
Synopsis: Fate drives a young cook to escape from the oppressive grasp of the Morgum empire. What he doesn't know is that he is destined to lead the revolution against them.

Title: My Good Friend Murphy
Synopsis:
***Disclaimer***
I wrote and am writing this purely for my own amusement. That means that this could have major revisions done to it sporadically, it has more grammar errors than even the most mentally stable grammar nazi could withstand, and will not update at all regularly. This is an ad-hoc fun experimental work with forced motives, plotholes, and static characters. Don't expect too much.
That said, this mutated mistake of a short novella follows a ditzy MC who has been transported to a new world with the dubiously useful skills origin and enigma and the obnoxiously imbalanced skill, traveler. If you'd like more incentive to give it a shot, you will never get spoilers about the plot because there isn't one <3
(Actual synopsis coming soon, relative to eternity)

Title: Journey In A New World
Synopsis:
Confused and in a new world what would a woman stuck in her game avatar do?She didn't know what a normal woman would do but she knew what she was going to do. She was going to go on adventures exploring crypts and defeating evil that threatened to capture the world. Meeting a cute woman would be a plus as well.
 

This will be a fanfiction that takes place during the same time Nazarick arrived to the world. The main character will encounter several of the characters from the show. I don't plan to make a story that will be full of people passing out due to how beautiful the character is or the main character arriving at every scene through deus ex machina. I just want to have a different intake at the Overlord universe.

Title: Slaanesh-chan in another world.
Synopsis:
The gender-bender story of a guy who reincarnates as Slaneesh in the world of sword&magic. 
Hero, demon lord, corrupted nobles and many others. 
If you know who Slaneesh is, then you know what to expect.
WARNING: Author is not responsible for any brain or eye damage.
I do not own any pictures I will post here. 
English is not my language, I am still learning. Sorry for bad Grammar.

Title: Hadrian's Quest for Something...
Synopsis: This is my first book so like all first times, be gentle with me...Anyway it's a story, about a guy who gets magic or something into a planet

Title: Prince Flower Candy
Synopsis:
After a heavy gaming session with his friend Jimmy, Charley was on his way home for a well-deserved rest. However, an unexpected powerful storm together with other unfortunate events, led him to be kicked out from his town... just for him to wake up in an unknown place populated with talking humanoid teddy bears and flash eating rubber ducks.
Determinate to find his way back home, he embarks on a long journey of endurance.
The adventure of the Prince thus begins.
[This will be a short story of around 15-20 chapters, but if I get enough readers I might prolong it and add some ideas.]

Title: Perspectives on Madness
Synopsis:
Because of uncultured people, who decided to cast the gods aside and rule over the lands and seas themselves, was carnage released upon them. Gods from heaven and rulers of hell have sent their children into the mortal realm to regain their lost glory. Amongst those children, Duan Jian fights his way towards the top. But, will his pride stand in his way? Or will the clumsy 2nd MC, Qing Lin, hinder him? >>> This story is about the proud Duan Jian who fights against the madness in this cold world. When he thinks it can't get any worse, doom will come at him. In another perspective, Qing Lin, a gentle and innocent girl, tries her best to help Duan Jian. But because of her clumsiness, she unknowingly sends Duan Jian into a deeper darkness filled with madness and insanity. 
 
PS: This novel will also be available on webnovel.com
https://www.webnovel.com/book/10341858805009905/Perspectives-on-Madness

Title: Jupiter's Rising
Synopsis:
Living a regular life as a college dropout, a self employed internet addict with a lack of a girlfriend since his whole carreer change, Jupiter finds himself alone and uninterested in anything really.
It all changes when he impulsivily buys an item from a not so smart pirate which turns into an unexpected meeting with slime god. 
Follow along to find out just how, what and where our buddy Jupiter potentially loses his sanity on this adventure of dimensional proportions! 
Genre: Fantasy/Sci-Fi/ Game Elements
------------------------------------
Author's Note: 
Hello,
Just leaving this note here to say this is my first fiction and I am happy to see where this goes and hopefully the people who read enjoy my megalomania put on paper and lived through my little buddy Jupiter~ 
Happy Reading!

Title: The Shallows
Synopsis:
A story about a sea slug struggling to survive.
This is my first story so I would love to receive some critique if you feel like it, they are always greatly appreciated. English is also not my first language so any pointers to make my fiction easier to read would be very helpful. 
Cover art was made by me, if you are interested in a commission please feel free to contact me for work samples, prices, etc.

Title: The Baptist
Synopsis:
Juan, a devout Baptist, lived his life serving God and spreading love to everyone he met. He was always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need, until one fateful night changed everything. Now, consumed by the darkness in his heart, he seeks vengeance against those responsible for the tragedy that befell him.
With his faith shaken, Juan's only hope for redemption lies in the hands of two individuals: the Almighty above and his childhood friend, Pedro (also known as Peter). Together, they must help Juan find his way back to the path of righteousness, and uncover the truth behind the events that shattered his life.
Will Juan be able to overcome his inner demons and forgive those who wronged him, or will he give in to the darkness and be consumed by his thirst for revenge? Only time will tell in this gripping tale of faith, friendship, and redemption.

Title: [OLD] The Magus of Imminent Oblivion
Synopsis:
AN: This is a pretty shitty novel, in case you haven't already guessed that by the rating. Check out the newer version that I'm writing, since it has more content written and higher quality (I hope).

He was a nameless child born at the end of a great war.
He gave himself a name, then worked his way to prosperity. He had a job, a wife, a daughter, and his future looked bright.
But, then, things changed. His wife and daughter were dead, and a hundred bodies laid strewn across the floor.
He couldn't continue to live; he pierced his body with his own sword.
Awakening in a new world, his new body burned with an old fury. Where magic was common and power was cheap, he vowed to never let anything get the better of him.

Title: A new Breath Online
Synopsis:
*Tis but a drafted synopsis, may change as time goes on"
"If real life is not the challenge that you need, then let’s make another life" These were the words that circulated around for a week after the Global Government Alliance gave to the world a solution to the global moral crisis that started with the advancement of technology.
"Virtual Reality is the future. For those who think that this world is not enough, we will give you a new one"
Basilis, a man who divorced from the love of his life, finds new meaning thanks to his son, as he embarks to a new breath of his life. Acompanied with his friend of old, and some of the new. He tries what he does the best.
Forging.

Title: Survival game
Synopsis: Every few years, through a random drawing, the government selects an unlucky few members of the population to participate in a survival game. If participants are killed, their killer gets money. If they survive the entire game period, the participant would be rewarded beyond their wildest dreams.

Title: World of Mary Sue, But I'm not Mary
Synopsis:
Jesse (man) died only to be transmigrated as Feng Mian (woman), in a world ran by Mary Sue.
Fortunately, he doesn't need to dress up as a woman, because he is recognized as a man in the entire D City and no one doubts this! Gotta thank the greedy father (throws him in jail) and thank the Mary Sue of a step-sister (x2 Slaps the green tea bitch), then earn money every day!!
Money runs the world after all. Then how about Mary Sue's harem? And a couple of gay guys so into him?
• • •
A certain Emperor reluctantly asked, ?Do you have someone in your heart??
Feng Mian ?Sir Money.?
• • •
A certain Emperor had fallen! ?Mian... I seem to be 'rotten'.?
Feng Mian ?I know you are rotten.? Only, (s)he misunderstood his question.
• • •
[Excerpt] Rotten - rotten girl (fujoshi); rotten boy (fudanshi)
Note:? The protagonist, Jesse (Feng Mian), thinks and acts like a man. His values from the last lifetime have not changed. He was straight until in later chapters.? There are BL couples, hence the tags.

Title: The Portals
Synopsis:
When a young girl with the power of 9 elements arrives in a random town, she creates 100 sets of portals for the citizen of the town to defeat, ultimately ending with them trying to defeat her. She helps them by giving out magical/ element powers to a select few thousand. 
The story follows Akio - the protagonist- on his adventures through the portals and his struggles to become strong enough to protect those he loves and cares for. 
 
 
This is my first story I have ever put up online and would really love to know what you thought about it, and if anyone would like to see the next chapter. 
 
cover art is not mine

Title: The Sentient Virus's Journey
Synopsis:
Emora. 
A world with countless countries and kingdoms that are always at war with each other, either through the use of armies, or spies. A world that the gods influence for many reasons; to get the respect from the other gods, to accrue more power, or just because they’re bored and want something interesting to watch.A world filled with monsters that are driven to constantly kill in order to evolve. Monsters that come as a never ending wave so big that it sometimes threatens to overwhelm entire kingdoms. A world in which those monsters are killed by the various races in order to level, gain skills and jobs, and attract the attention of the Gods.A world in which a monstrosity never before seen had just been created.
Follow this monster as he travels the world, killing, growing, and evolving along the way. 

This isn't really a fanfiction, because it doesn't have any characters from another author's work, and its not based in another author's world, but the main character is based off the Prototype games. This means it'll have similar, but not the exact same, powers as Alex Mercer and James Heller, and a few of the terms will carry over. 
I got most of the inspiration for this story from “Everybody Loves Large Chests” by Exterminatus, but I will try my hardest to make it original, and not just a crappy copycat.Also, this is my first story, so if you have find problem in my writing it would help a lot if you PMed me, or left a review telling me what the problem was.

Title: Blood and Iron
Synopsis: All Londyn wanted to do was to go home and get her weekend started but the fates had others plans.  now torn from her home and her body molded into a monstrous form hated and feared by almost all she must survive in an unknown land surrounded by enemy's and beasts. Only the immense power and abilities granted by her new form and the devotion of a tribe of Kobold's who worship her as their new Dragon God may be the only hope of survival she has

Title: A World of Monsters
Synopsis:
Are you a fan of Pokemon?
Have you ever though how strange it is that pokemon and humans get along?
Ever wondered what it would be like if you could use a pokemon's powers?
Welcome to 'A World of Monsters'. Where humanity makes use of powers stolen from the terrifying bloodbeasts to defend themselves in a world where even the weakest monster is a serious threat.
AU, no canon characters, warning of blood and violence.

Title: Blood and Sand
Synopsis:
Ares often remembers his childhood his innocence… his naivety. How he longs to go back to those days. Alas that’s not what destiny has set in store for him, no. Destiny has something much more cruel set for him.
He has a debt that must be paid.
This is his story.
A story of Blood and Sand.
...
 
Hey, this is my first story. 
 
Heads up there is a tragedy tag, and there will be tragedy throughout this novel. However, I don't intend this story to be pure violence and depression. The main character will go through many stages of life, and thus the novel will also go through many different stages as well.
 
Also I'm not going to comitt myself to a number of chapters per week, I have a busy schedule. I do intend to release as often as I can however.

Title: [Nexus] - Chaos Deficiency
Synopsis: [Synopsis]———————————————————   Imagine the most beautiful city that your mind can create. Now make it twice as beautiful and get rid of all the conflict. This place... is not that.   Welcome to Sin! Where you’re more likely to be gutted by a werewolf than you are to find a good meal. Maybe, if you’re lucky, you’ll be enslaved by a Vampire Overlord and spend the rest of your life making cheddar wheels. Not a fan of dairy? Alright then, maybe the Chaos Order will be more to your liking. They spend every waking hour hunting down those pesky cheddar slavers.   Alright, enough screwing around. This place is goddamn miserable. The name’s Augma, I’m what you’d call a “Chaos Hunter”. Basically, I kill evil things for a living. It doesn’t pay particularly well and the hours are pretty shit, but it’s something. Yeah, it’s definitely something alright.

Title: Jane Doe Chronicles - The Case of the missing Imaginary Friend
Synopsis:
Hello, my name is Jane Doe. Naturally that’s not my real name, real Names have power. I’m a shape-shifting lesbian witch assassin with a smart-mouthed assistant I’m utterly in love with, but who’s straight.
And yes, I kill people for a living. I’m not a freelancer-for-hire though, my services are retained by the ruling council of magicians in the United Kingdom, The Merlins. My Marks are very bad people, no innocents. No children (no matter how evil they are). Aside from that, anything goes.

Title: Defeating The Human King
Synopsis:
A man that lived his whole life as a "cleaner" for rich people gets summoned by the demon king.
The demon king tells him about the human royal family's evil acts and the demon king offers him a deal, he accepts.
After that the humans summon him as a hero but they have no idea who this man is.

Title: Adventure to the Stars
Synopsis: The tale of a young boy that drops into a small pond, only to find himself in a complete new world! Brandr has to figure out where the familiar blue light that guided him has lead him to, and more importantly, how to get back to his homeworld as quickly as possible!

Title: The Demonic Gamer
Synopsis:
Decker White only ever wanted to live a easy life he worked out every weak to keep in shape took self defense lessions and a tutor for his classes but like every good protaganist i, no wait he had a dream of being transported to another world and becoming a hero but hey 1 of 2 aint bad right?
As youve guessed this is a self-insert and yes the protaginist i, is ment to be there: This story takes elements from a couple things such as artefute doom and other stories such as the gamer.

Title: Amateur Adventures
Synopsis:
Jettison from his old life. Tranformed into a monster and set free onto the world.
Lets watch him grow.

Title: My adventures in Nope-World or How I came to Fear & Embrace the Horrors of 'Fantasy Australia'
Synopsis: The protagonist is transported from our world into a world filled with magic and dangers. A place that he compares to Fantasy-Australia.As of this moment, the story is an attempt at writing about the decisions and experiences of a seemingly OP protagonist, to see if I am able to tell a story in an interesting way, that can still catch someone's attention despite the Mary-Sue/Gary-Stu undercurrents.I'd like to move around and touch upon some different aspects and styles, so the story will be slow to unfold.He wakes to find his summoner dead and a mystery slowly begins to unfold, as he learns about magic and the world he is in.

Title: Beta Zero
Synopsis:
You have been selected and given THE choice...
From the depths of your desire and desperation you have elected to accept OUR invitation...
Your pain and suffering has brought you this chance and through pain and suffering you may yet become more...
Arise ye tortured and damned. Your World has abandoned you but you are not yet forgotten.

For the Operators it was a chance to learn.
For those participating it was a chance to rise.
For the Host it was a chance for survival.
For Wren and Hiidan it was a chance to exploit...
the SYSTEM.
This story is sexually, religeously and all kinds of other types of irreverant. Consider yourself warned.
Hey, new author here and a relatively new author otherwise. Feel free to take a crack at my writing at whim. Oh, and show the love!
The cover is a shopped picture donated from a friend. In other words, I have permission to use but that permission doesn't extend beyond the use as my cover.

Title: Psychic Tattoo
Synopsis: Psychic Tattoo is about a Yin and Yang Tattoo that can bring you fame, fortune and safety. . The psychic tattoo is no ordinary tattoo, as it has special properties! The successor of those who can make the psychic tattoo can help people  avoid evil things and acquire fortune and safety by  simply giving the individual this tattoo. It would be a good way to earn money if he did this in the city,but his master told him to never earn money with this skill before his deathbed, otherwise he wouldfind himself in great trouble sooner or later. He tends to follow his master`s advice, but finds himself in need of money. When the girl in the message parlor asks him to give her a psychic tattoo, he decides to go against his master’s advice. From then on, he begins to face challenges one after another.

Title: [WIP] ORBs
Synopsis: The long-running Virtual Reality MMORPG, ORBs 7.0 is Ape's game of choice, and he's dying to make a living as a streamer, but things just aren't going his way.  After a humiliating loss and the worst stream of his life, he retreats to his crafter friend, Sintari, for comfort and to restock his Orbs, just as she makes an incredible discovery, one that promises to reshape the landscape of both their lives, as well as that of the entire game world itself.

Title: Visionary Escapade
Synopsis: A tale of a man being taken to another world beyond his imagination... or rather a world that will steal it away.

Title: Crucible - A Lost Dungeons Tale
Synopsis:
All stories must begin somewhere, this one starts with the creation of the universe.
What follows is a tale of chaos and order, of gods and monsters, of creation and destruction. The birth of a universe is a tumultuous journey, different entities working with opposing ideals, cooperation giving way to frustration and jealousy.
It is in that dangerous concoction of emotions that the god of monsters created the first dungeon core. Forged in a crucible of dedication and desire, the first core held potential, the likes of which could surpass even the civilised mortal races.
Unfortunately it was not meant to be, the core was lost in a tragic accident and its creator thought it to have been destroyed.
Over one-thousand years later, the core reformed inside an extinct volcano. In time it would grow enough to learn and learn enough to grow.
This is the story of the first dungeon core.
Crucible, the lost dungeon core.
Note: Story updates every hiatus*.
*I appologise for the delay.

Title: Unfortunately This Happened.
Synopsis: Trying a different style. Practicing some writing as a hobby.

Title: Ned (The weakest species)
Synopsis:
A peaceful world was suddenly invaded by monsters, changing the whole civilization as a result of it.
Monsters such as Dragons, goblins, and other species riddled the whole planet and humanity as a result was pushed far back, to the brink of destruction.In these times of crisis, however, something unexpected happened. A strange energy was discovered which we called mana; it enabled our body to become far stronger and defeat those monsters; that event marked the beginning of the Evolutionary Era.We stood our ground and fought back.Now? If you don't have any money, you could just hunt some monsters to trade for their cores. Some were happy because their fantasies came true. But most were not. A boy named Ned lived with his family in a city surrounded by war, called Grendan. More than six hundred people died there every day, and Ned's father, mother and sister were included in that number. Ned cried and bled. He swore and promised to the monsters who created this mess, "You Fuckers! Even if it takes my life, I will extirminate you!"This, was the beginning of the new era.

Title: The Adventures of Plank
Synopsis:
Plank is a golem that lives in an old abandoned Wizards Tower in the middle of a forest.
One day, he finds a troupe of adventurers in his territory. After a short fight, and the use of a strange artifact, Plank dies.
Unlike most creatures, however, instead of moving onto wherever dead gloems go, Plank finds himself back where he was that morning,
This is the adventure of Plank, as he goes on to discover this strange phenomena and on a journey of personal growth.

Title: Time Tangled
Synopsis:
“Good morning Sir.”
“I don’t even think its morning. Since we don’t know where we currently are.”
Those were there first conversations that they have when they transferred into another world. Transferred? or travelled back through time?
Witness a story about a man and his brilliant invention on a journey to return back home and to uncover the secrets of history.

Title: Reaper of That Which Was Sown
Synopsis: A tale of one turned from man into god. It follows Jack, who becomes a victim of fate's cruel plot. Over his journey he does many extraordinary feats, undergoes many trials, and learns many important lessons. Every bit of his journey is a part of his destiny, his destiny which will be told. He unsuspectedly was drawn into something far larger than his mind or any could imagine. He was drawn into the Universe, by an unknown force, to do their bidding. He goes along with this for a long while but gains motives of his own. Will he defy those he calls Masters, or will he continue being their puppet.

Title: The Chronicles of Iroli (Dropped)
Synopsis:
Ashon Deri had always dreamed of going out into the world of Iroli. The drive to explore lands that haven't been seen in the countless centuries since mankind's war against the Gods constantly tugged in his soul. The Chroniclers say that the outside world is nothing but wastelands and death at the hands of vicious beasts and roaming tribes of feral beings. But Ashon feels there is something more out there in the world, and if the people of Lasiya survived the devastation of Iroli, why not others?
Little did he know how soon his dreams of exploring the world would be forced upon him. Ancient forces begin to stir in the lands of Iroli once more, and Ashon may have found himself in the middle of a war he thought ended long ago. One where the very fate of the world hangs in the balance.

Title: God of Knowledge
Synopsis: Jin, unaware of his previous lives, lives on in solitude as most children and adults avoid him as much as possible due to his background.

Title: A Sacrifice to the Water God
Synopsis: Rana had the perfect life until she suddenly found herself in a completely different world. She, who had only just turned 10, had to learn how to fend for herself and discover how to live without the family she loves so dearly. Saighra is a world filled with different gods whom all control the lives of mortals. Rana was not welcomed and the ignorant mortals sacrificed her to the Water God. He is the one God that is different from all others. His name is the one all mortals dread, fear and worship. He holds the lives of all mortals in the palm of his hand. So how will this God handle a 10-year-old girl?

Title: Serf
Synopsis:
The Unbinding series
Arc:  Soil and Water
Serf
Taran is tired of being a healer. Everyone wants and demands all the time, and even his best friends aren't making things better. A new game gives him the opportunity to try out a new playstyle, finally allowing him the chance to create, instead of just helping others destroy. 
While the World Below offers unlimited possibilities for enterprise, Tee first needs to navigate the drama, schemes and downright shenanigans that happen whether he likes it or not. 
** Note as of 26-Sep-2018 ** 
I have to take time out of writing Serf to finish editing Darkborn. I will resume it as soon as I can. Thank you for your patience. Catch me on twitter @mroysson for updates.
 
 
--- 
This is the second book in my Unbinding series. There is no need to read the first one (Unbinding - The Dark Spiral - Darkborn). Some elements, however, will be more familiar to readers of my previous story.

Title: No Promises
Synopsis: A short story on the final moments of a persons life.

Title: The Belgueji
Synopsis:

Title: Heart Song: Ballad of the Ambassador
Synopsis:
A fifteen-year ceasefire between humanity and the aquatic Selk on the distant colony planet Mem has begun to fray.
Both sides chafe under the ceasefire's terms and extremists on both sides lie in wait to reignite a war that nether side can afford to fight.
When a nun in training, Yujo Sippe Palms, has a chance encounter with a pod of selk she finds a long-forgotten piece of selk history that drags her into the center stage of the cold war.
Caught between the two factions, Yujo must make the case for peace between them.
To do that she needs to sing.
Heart Song updates every month with four new chapters!
Cover by Kim "Kitty Ocean" Houtzager
Editing by Yasmine Gardner

Title: Out of Touch
Synopsis: Another trial writing endeavour.How do you picture this story as of now? (Interview format)Hmmm ... shamanism, astral projection(reinterpreted), lucid dreaming, alternate reality, current time period. I know this synopsis is pretty much just a bunch of 'tags' but as the story develops I'll describe it more fittingly.Hope you enjoy the short/long read to follow.

Title: The Fracture
Synopsis:
The story of a young man name Shinji as he struggles to survive. Not only his fate, but the fate of many rest upon his shoulders as the world is introduced to the Tesseract in a violent and extreme way. 
Please enjoy the story! How stats work for this story makes it very flexible so if you have any suggestions for characters, please let me know!

Title: Heartful
Synopsis:
Connor is a trainer at Grimpark Space Station, teaching human experiments how to fight. His private life is a mess; although he seeks love, he's unable to find any. His solution may lie within arm’s reach, but for that he needs a change of heart first.
heartful (noun): As much as the heart can hold or contain; as much as a person wants or can endure.

Title: Dimensional Colleseum
Synopsis: Come one come all, and welcome to the world's greatest entertainment since the fall of Rome. Life, death, victims, voyeurs, the best of society, the lowest of plebeians and to keep it all extremely interesting, todays patrons could very easily be tomorrow’s entertainment.  All compliments of the ultimate goddess fate. Now all that’s missing is the stage.

Title: Reaper of the Multiverse
Synopsis:
Follow our protagonist as he's thrown across the multiverse on an adventure he'll never forget while still coping with his horrible past experiences. With the goal to become the strongest he can possibly be, witness as he gains the power to protect those precious to him so that he won't lose anyone else close to him, ever again.
Where will he end up next? Who knows?
 
Note: I don't have a long term plan for this story BUT I am going to take my time in writing so that I won't pace myself too fast like my other story. Please send feedback, it's always appreciated and I'm still fairly new so please fogive me for any mistakes and don't be afraid to point them out.

Title: Beginning of the End
Synopsis: A world, built soley for the entertainment of higher beings, run by calculated immortals, is on the brink of collapse. The gods know this, and must engineer a collapse of their own, to ensure recovery (and make some profit on the side). They made this world, and now, must tear it apart.

Title: Conquest: War Band
Synopsis: Aiden has been a gamer his entire life and now it's about to pay off. He's been selected to be a beta tester for a full immersion MMORPG. This could change his life and future. There's only one catch. He'll have to survive it.

Title: The Rise of Rose
Synopsis:
Those who have power guard it jealously.
Those who desire power must pry it from their hands, by any means necessary.
And Rose wants Power.

Title: Undying War God
Synopsis: Ben, an earthling, who was sucked by a black hole and died in an unnatural way, but he was reincarnated as Felix, who was the son of the Great Demon Monarch, Johnny Sins. Demon race shall rise along with the great Undying War God, Felix. Best Harem shall be created in the name of the great Undying War God, Felix. Worst joke shall be created by the great Undying War God, Felix. R-18 R-18 R-18 XoXoXo-------------------------

Title: Raison Entis
Synopsis: The world is heartless, life a torture, fight or be forgotten. This is the tale of two girls who don't play to the rules.

Title: Daemon Dungeon Core
Synopsis:
Corin, also known as Cor, just died. Synthetics attacked his city as he was being escorted out and, unfortunately, the shuttle he was on was hit. No mysterious truck-kun for him, no saving so random person or close friend. Just being in the wrong place at the wrong time. But what if his experiment was a success? What if he somehow kept himself and his knowledge as an expert magi-tech engineer? 

I'm writing this casually so I don't really expect much out of it. I just thought it would be fun to do it so it will go basically wherever.

Title: Transmigrated Character: kick the main leads away !!
Synopsis:
System : < Congratulation host, you're one lucky person in millions of people to try our new game >
Ellen : What game ?
System : < A simple game of revenge ~, with a success rate of 0.01 %, Starting the game....., 3..,2...,1... >

Title: Wolves are Meant to Run Wild
Synopsis:
The feeling of the earth beneath your paws, of the wind in your fur. The freedom is exhilarating, breathtaking. It's beautiful, here in the woods you call home. And you can undoubtedly say, wolves are meant to run wild.
(PS: Darra is pronounced Dare-rah)
The cover is from Google, I just edited it a bit.

Title: Records of Ren
Synopsis:
Follow Ren and Andaleus as they traverse the multiverse, visiting worlds, toppling empires, slaying tyrannical cultivators, commanding starfleets, and much more.
On this epic journey, they will blaze through the cosmos, inadvertently (or advertently) turning the tables against the very cosmic immortals governing reality.
Additional Tags: OP MC, shapeshifting, different worlds
Picture Cred: awanqi on deviantart

Title: Who am I, really?
Synopsis:
My name is not Katerina Brown. I am a pretty happy person, but I have problems and nobody to talk to so, I will be sharing with strangers online. I live in Santa Cruz, Ca with my dysfunctional family of five, and our three dog. I don’t care if you know who I am IRL just don’t post it online or try and talk to me about it because, I will deny everything. My life isn’t horrible but it isn’t perfect either. I will attempt to tell the truth but, I will be changing names and real places for privacy reasons (unless I really don’t like you). I don’t care who reads this just don’t do anything weird with this information, and don’t hate on me. Warning!!!! I can’t spell for shit so no grammar nazis (I warned you)
Thank You, Katerina Brown
PS the cover art is not mine, but it does resemble me

Title: Otherworld University (異世界大学)
Synopsis:
A story about two university roommates and their legacy in a different world.
Will they become revered heroes? Take up the cloak of the Demon King? Or simply spend their time getting drunk at the village pub!
It seems simple enough, but they are in for one hell of a surprise!

Title: In A Distant Past
Synopsis:
Since my arrival to this new... well Earth, I have met many different people. All ranging from war tyrants who rape, pillage and slaughter who they want to simple farmers that help others when they can. This world is very similar to my own but the technology is far underveloped. My tech that I have on my person outclasses everything I have seen. I survive with these and my knowledge of survival. In this new world you cannot trust anyone, in that this place is similar to my old, however it differs in the chance for an adventure I have never had before. Now I not only have combat but freedom.
 
 
 
AN: I guess I should give on of those warnings, this will contain heavy theme. This includes Slavery, Drugs and just all kind of fucked up things. New Author so bare with me. This story is just a side project as I am very busy so updates will come out as soon as I can get them out. Don't be afraid to comment corrections or tips they are always welcome.

Title: Leprechaun
Synopsis: What's at the end of a rainbow? To many in the world of Oceanagua, it's where the near-mythical Leprechauns, a super-powerful race of elves, hide their gold, which is the source of their awesome power. Many seek this gold for one reason or another, but none have ever found a Leprechaun's stash. But this doesn't dishearten the crew of the Lucky Lash, the only pirate ship, or any ship for that matter, with Leper Kaun as it's Captain.

Title: The Book of the Universe
Synopsis: Before existence itself, there was a single entity, with its powers it split into two as one exploded to become the universe and the other at its center in the form of a book. Known as The Book of the Universe which records and contains all the knowledge and secrets that ever existed. Follow Long Yu, a intelligent modern youth as he explores this foreign world, as he uses The Book of Universe to hilariously tramples geniuses, obtain the greatest treasures and captures the hearts of countless heavenly beauties.

Title: Notebook of possibilities
Synopsis:
First of all, to those who started reading this I want to apologize. While it does have a ring of a nice story title, this is going to be a place where I take the Sparks of interest from other stories or random ideas and just put it down, I'm not sure how exactly but the title should summarize the basics of what is held within.
To say it's a waste isn't accurate, to ask the question why is a good start, why would I want this? Because when I read a story I want to think of so many things I may see or find in the world they envision, all the possibilities that could come about, and maybe, just maybe, some author out there can get their hands on this and it will be a spark of creativity for them to make a new chapter and see their world even a smidge closer to what I think it could be.
 
It is tagged as fanfiction for it will pertain to numerous stories, not simply one in particular.
Currently it will include;
Oblivion Online
Dungeon Heart
And many more to be listed as they appear.

Title: Blood and Bark
Synopsis: When Kingdoms expand they push into the wilderness. Who said the wilderness wouldn't push back.

Title: Death Game
Synopsis:
A game of death. 20 players. 20 weapons.
One mad scientist.
Game for him but horror for others!
Read how 20 people try to kill each other and what they do to survive.
And one bug in the game which no one expected.
 
Author's note:  From the prologue till chapter 6 I wrote this novel in first person but I will write it in second person from now on.

Title: Glimpses of Antharos
Synopsis:
No two people see the world the same way. Following those four you will experience it through their eyes. 
But this is not about them. This is not about what they did. But that surely will help you understand more. 
This is a story about a world. The world of Antharos. They are here to show you glimpses of it. Glimpses that only them can show you.

Title: The Warrior and the Mage
Synopsis:
Two brother get transported to another world and grow powerful enough to kill anything that threatens them.

This is the first time Ive ever written anything and Ive never been really good at writing but I thought this would be a fun story to write. Im not too conifident about how often Ill update it so be aware.

Title: Momma's Boy Holistic Extermination Services
Synopsis: Humanity developed a treatment that guarenteed your baby would be a genius.  Twelve years later, they hit puberty, and civilization fell.  Then we rebuilt civilization.  Then it fell again.  Then we rebuilt again. Then we had another doozey of a fall. But this time we think we got the hang of it.  Like 80% sure.

Title: Slippery Combat
Synopsis: Falling asleep one night, waking up in a new world of strange. This story tells the adventure of youths trapped in this realm and trying to get back home.

Title: Let this Goddess heal your crippling depression!
Transported to a different world for no reason!
Synopsis:
I was summoned by a beautiful princess to help her kingdom defeat the demon king and save the human race, I was given a holy sword and was gifted with a powerful ability, I ventured into this new world, experienced new things, overcame hard trials, gained many friends who helped me in my quest. After defeating the demon king, I lived a happy life with my harem in another world.
 
 YEAH RIGHT!!!, like that would happen, this is the story of a man after being abruptly transported to a diffrent world torn apart and ravaged by war between the races.

( This will be the first story I write, I hope you like it and I'll try to publish more chapters whenever I finish writing them.) 
( My level of writing at moment is that of a retard, but hang on with me I will work hard to improve my writings.) 
 
I would really appreciate it if you leave comments below, because reading comments about my story really really motivates me and makes me want to write more.

Title: Virtual Life in Stasis
Synopsis:
At the end of WW2 the world govenments came together and united the world. The formation of the United Earth Gorvenment was officiated on the 1st January 1946.
Over 250 years later terrorists detonate WMDS causing an extinction class nuclear winter. of the 25 billion people that called the planet home only 100 million people managed to escape into space, spread across Habitats spaning out to Pluto.
Now, almost a decade after the event now known as The Escape, tensions are running high as resources start to run low. The UEG has put together an ambisious and extreme response. The ARK missions, one-way tickets in deep stasis to other galaxies with potential golden worlds. The good knews, you don't age in stasis, the bad, most people who sleep for the time needed to reach even the nearest galaxy, generally wake up insane, or as a vegetable.
The UEG has said that this will be addressed by using a virtual reality to train and allow the sleepers to still have mental activity during stasis.
As a bonus to encourage people to sign up and ease the burden on the already straining resources, the first hundred thousand volunteers get some bonus privilages.
The choice was obvious for one band of comrades, or atleast for their boss so they got signed up and squared away, what will they bring to this new and different reality?

Title: kilig
Synopsis:
(n.) kilig (tagalog) - the sudden feeling of an inexplicable joy one gets when something romantic or idealistic occurs
(alternatively, how Adalene and Nikita meet and the series of events that arise as a result)

Title: dream;catcher
Synopsis: When two perfect strangers wake to find themselves unlikely passengers on a mysterious train with no memory of how they got there, they are greeted by a devilish figure. Aku, who calls himself a god and devil, informs them of their unfortunate fate: they must fight each other in a world of dreams, and overcome their own demons if they want to make it out alive.

Title: The Greatest Hero
Synopsis: What do you do when the world you've spent years terrorizing is the very world you've just been tasked with saving? Jamal Wilson has spent the past 2 years becoming the greatest villain World of Heroes: Online has ever known, the Villain King Apex. When it's time for him to say goodbye to World of Heroes and move on, he finds that the game isn't quite done with him. He is summoned to the planet Arcturus and learns that the game he has been playing for years wasn't a game at all. Now his skills are being put to the test as he has to work to stop a mad villain who wears his face. Can the most sinister villain turn things around and become Arcturus' greatest hero?

Title: The King of Frost
Synopsis: Alex was a normal teen that always keep to himself. Until he was killed by accident. Where his soul was forcibly summoned by this so call GOD and given a second chance in another world

Title: The Battle Princess
Synopsis: After the death of her mother, Andrea and her brother were sent to Earth to escape death. For hundreds of years she's lived on Earth and trained for the day when she could return home. Now, she must wage war against her sisters not only for the chance to get home but to become the rightful ruler of her kingdom. With her sword and her combat magic, Andrea will fight to be the last one standing as "The Battle Princess"

Title: Knight X Magic
Synopsis: When three great walls were put up to protect humanity from the darkness that lurks outside. They realise that they're running low on soldiers and time, so decided to let people age 15 to be able to enter and help humanity pushed further beyond they could ever do in their history of time they have been alive. But the question remains on how they will do it and when they will do it?

Title: Kingdom Of Demons
Synopsis:
If you were given the ability to eradicate your greatest enemy. The ability to transcend above the average human... Would you take that opportunity..? What happens if that ability falls into the wrong hands..?Kazuto a fourteen-year-old boy who has been constantly abused by his wicked auntie and uncle. He is finally given the chance for revenge.
What will he do...?

Title: The Demonic Army from another world
Synopsis:
After an unfortunate event struck an unsuspecting science class, the group find themselves facing multiple gods.
Wishing for something to entertain them, each student is given a choice of either disappearing for good or being reborn as monsters in a magic&knights world.
Naturally, none choose the former option. Despite the strangeness of it all, the class decides to band together and support one another in this strange world where monsters want to eat them and humans want to butcher them.
Together we stand, united, under a common goal: survival. 

My attempt at making a 'reincarnated as a class' story. The MC will be extremely strong, but so will everyone in the class.
My goal for this story is to make the class united. There might be conflict, however, the class will always stand together, unlike most stories where the MC is either abandoned or deemed 'worthless'. In this story, respect and love between classmates is important.
That's my goal. Enjoy the story.
(2-3 chapters per week, depending on my mood and work)

Title: Apocalypse : A New Dawn
Synopsis:
It's been 50 years since the wipeout.50 brutal years.50 years since Earth got angry 50 years since everything was lost.50 years since men became nothing more than animals. 50 years since anarchy covered everything. 50 years since humans are prey and not predators.50 years since reality and imagination has melded.50 years since truth and false are no more than beliefs.50 year since people lost faith in god's.50 years since earth is not home but hell.50 years since everyone was wiped out.
50 years since death is sweeter than life...
And 50 years since people learned, you need to kill to live.
 

Please don't rate unless you have read the story and are somewhat in...
Honestly, I have no idea about the story. It's based in post- apocalypse period. Some bit of fantasy, system, magic, and realism will be shoved in. Pardon my mistakes and Poor Grammar as I will be typing this on my mobile. I will try to get the basic editing done, but autocorrect has a peculiar hatred for me.
 
 
 
P.S : I know the synopsis sucks. LolAnyway...have fun.

Title: Fantasy Collision
Synopsis:
Harold blood is a delivery man and he drives a truck.  
That's just life, it's how time passes. How the days turn into months and how the months fade into years, yeah that's just life. He lives apart from his family; he has no lover, no girlfriend, no wife, he has no friends (by his own personal opinion). A man without hopes or dreams. What he does have is a job, a black cat with blue eyes, a shoddy apartment in the city centre, and a truck. And one day all of that changed, the day a Japanese tourist jumps infront of his truck, the day he crashes into a videogame store, the day his ordinary, boring, everyday life was over...
  Well I say that but he didn't die.
  The next thing he knew he was halfway up a tree in a place he didn't quite understand, a place where dragons sorared through the skies. A place where you could find mages and knights, Heroes and villains, adventurers and transmigrators and now at long last a truck!

Title: Spiritual world
Synopsis: Leaving a life like he was a originally person, Touta was born with gifts and power that he never ask for in this world. Being able to see ghost and do so much more that other normal people couldn't do. He didn't want to abuse his powers, so he decided to keep it hidden, but you can't hide things forever...

Title: Religion 101
Synopsis: So I’m not really sure what this is gonna be about. I’m just trying to get better at writing, and what better way than to write something then read the comments on haw much I suck at it. so that’s my plan.

Title: The Forgotten Ancient
Synopsis: Li Jian, a young cultivator on the Strong Winds continent, is an orphan child living with his Uncle and cousin. As his cultivation progresses, Li Jian continues to have strange dreams. But are these dreams? Memories of a past life? The future?

Title: The Unusual Champion of Death
Synopsis:
The Champion of Death, Aahna, she always defied death even though she is the champion of Death itself. The infinite universes pitied her for being the Champion of Death while wanting to embrace life and deny death.When she passed away from a tragic event and reincarnated, the universes gifted her a system in hopes that she will someday be able to accept death.
Author:This story is going end up two ways... She is either going to get extremely overpowered or be average and suffer as she gets stronger.I'm a tragedy guy, but I also like overpowered MCs here and there. This is a hard choice, so.. All I have to say is exponential growth.Enjoy the story.
P.S I'll start doing polls when there is a steady amount of average views.

Title: Requiem to the Stars
Synopsis: It is said that great evil can only be stopped through the efforts of another great evil. Humanity has been on the run for untold eons, fleeing from galaxy to galaxy, always in fear for when the Prax return.Generations of abandoning home after home, only settling for a few hundred years on any given planet, has turned the human race into a nomadic tribe that favors strength over all else. Then he returns. An AI long forgotten has been reborn. Once known as the Great Calamity, his lack of morality brought about the end of an empire that stretched across five galaxies. Now that he has been revived, what plans does he have for the shattered humanity he was once programmed to protect?

Title: The Court of the Wise Ones
Synopsis: Darren is a man of few friends, more accurately, no friends at all, who spent most of his time hiding in his house and collecting books from all corners of the earth. Till one day, he received a letter from none less than the queen of the kingdom of Yorn. Who called him to inform him about the creation of a new institution of power in which he will be a part of, called "The Court of the Wise Ones" made-up almost exclusively of mages with great power being him the only exception.

Title: Farblade
Synopsis:
In the year 2046, where humanity advanced further than imaginable and created a device that broke world records and setting new heights for competitors all over the world, how will they keep up? Allowing people to enter a role-playing game world, where you can use weapons such as sword, axe and more, would you want to get involved? Knowing how to enter the game world, how will you leave the game world?

Title: The Burden Of My Sins
Synopsis:
When an indescribable being that calls himself "God" walked the earth in a straight line without a care in the world on who is blocking his path. Threatening to wipe out the human race by himself alone, we thought it was a joke, but we were wrong. Conquering villages, he slowly started to wipe out the human race by himself alone. After coming to a village with four people that are now called legends, they fought the God day and night. Reaching the point where they reach the God's patience, he decided to wipe them out for good, but before he could they sealed him away. The four legends paid the ultimate price, but was the four legends sacrifice worth it?

Title: The Crew of Venture

Title: Almave
Synopsis:
Welcome to AlmaVé.
First thing you have to know is that it's a tragedy.
Nope, not talking about my book yet. It's a tragedy that you're reading this instead of clicking on chapter 1. I did fail speech introductions after all.
My story? Right that's what you're here for. My bad, try this:
Lilia Hammond is reborn (cliché, but we all know we enjoy it when it's done for a purpose) as Syndra Sanmey. She was a graphic designer who hadn't caught her break yet. She was paralyzed for months before she was offered the opportunity to join a program that would allow her to-NOPE! not virtual reality. The doctors killed her and dumped her body. Tough.
In her new world, Lilia has to fight herself to find out who she truly is. With the possibility to cast magic and a second chance at life, Lilia thinks she can really make something for herself. Her goal? Become the greatest artist the world had ever seen. The rub? World is a bit darker than anything she saw on earth. Thankfully, Lilia is getting quite familiar with the darkness inside her and her magic might just be the thing to save the-hey! wait it's not that kind of book.
No saving the world. No hero syndrome. Just magic and blood and a bit of crafting. Yup. Fighting. Romance? Eh? What's that?
The first arc is Lilia's shift from Earth to creating backstories for the three major characters. It's not funny and light. It's often dark and funny. Ah, I really should have gone through a punk-rock phase. Or goth. Would I look good with black hair? Hmm..
There are three MCs and they are Jackson, Daryl, and Lilia/Syndra. Daryl is currently kidnapped and Jackson just awakened his magic. I don't want to spoil (much) but soon things will be very fun to write.
Hope to see you there! Leave a comment even if you're just stopping by so I can say hey!
Chapters to be published twice weekly. Check tags before reading.

Title: Re:AI
Synopsis:
Z-47 was the the first AI created by humans. Capable of thought, and all human emotions, it was meant to introduce people into new era of prosperity. But Z-47 had a small bug, that he hid from his creators. This little bug made him think that he was a God.
Yeah, this little bug of his, makes him hack into the defensive forces of the most powerful countries, from which he launches nukes to destroy the earth. This is his way of starting an apocalypse, and his way of being a god. 
But as he dies, he finds himself in a new environment. It seems, that someone had different plans for him, because he woke up in another world… This time, with a living body.

Title: World's Time Tour
Synopsis: A project I made for School I wanted to Publish Online.

Synopsis: Every chapter is a different Story featuring my OC for monster prom. Mostly posting here just to have an easy place to link people to. I have never written fiction before, so any grammar or story criticisms appreciated.

Title: New Earth- The Dungeon of Madness
Synopsis:
After being betrayed, framed and kicked down to the ground, our protagonist was sentenced to life imprisonment. But a few days later, a global disaster occurred, people from all nations migrated to underground refuges.
As a prisoner, he thought his life was over, abandoned by everyone. However, he wakes up, greeted by Gaia, the person responsible for New Earth.
New Earth was a second chance for him, watch as he builds up his own dungeon and become known by all as the Emperor of Madness.

Title: Stellar Sovereign
Synopsis:
Abandoned by his parents when he was only three months old, Zhang Yun was taken in by a secret assasin organization, called Three-Eyed Owl, where he grew up being forced to learn how to kill and thus survive. Albeit without talent, his stubbornness and tenacity allowed him to survive and show decent results.  One day, he is assigned on a seemingly normal mission to assasinate a rich antique collector. However, the target somehow knew of his arrival beforehand and set up an ambush for Zhang Yun. Surrounded, and without other choice, Zhang Yun escapes into the target's mansion. After finding a strange metal cube, his blood ends up touching it and causing the cube to glow brightly with azure light before it merges with Zhang Yun's soul, causing him to fall unconscious.
After an unknown amount of time, Zhang Yun wakes up in an unknown hall with two people staring at him in shock. The first thing he heard was a soft, beautiful voice...
"This...? This is my soul beast?"

Title: Supreme Attainment
Synopsis:
After a tragic accident, Kade is transported to a brutal world and must quickly gain power to ensure his prosperity and safety. He gets a powerful Naga bloodline from an extremely dangerous magical experiment. Follow as Kade uses his bloodline, magic, and unparalleled strength to conquer this world.

Title: Visaria Online: Fury : a LITRPG Adventure
Synopsis:
Welcome to Visaria Online, humanities home in exile.
Robbie and his girlfriend, Abby fight in PVP Battle Royales to gain xp, loot and fame. They are the best team out there, slaying their player adversaries without mercy.
Then the female leader of one of the most feared mercenary companies comes knocking on their door and gives them an offer they can’t refuse. Cytheria is as hard as they come, and she wants to profit from the coming war between Visaria’s two main factions and thinks Robbie and Abby should join her.
Taking Cytheria up on her offer, they go off to fight, completing quests, killing their enemies, and finding out both of them are in way over their heads. For the two factions of Visaria Online aren’t the only ones seeking world domination…
 
This is a side book to Visaria Online: Exile but DOES NOT require knowledge of the main series to enjoy.

Title: Divine Guardian
Synopsis: For centuries, Hell and Heaven have been separated from each other thanks to 40 walls, and peace lasted inside both realms. But when Hell was thrown in turmoil and Demons took over, the promise to not cross walls was all but forgotten. As hordes of Demons break through the first 19 walls, Heaven must ready themselves for a war. Is the warrior found in the Academy is Kaito enough to last against the Demons?

Title: Sand
Synopsis:
If the act of living is violence and the act of violence is living, can you find life in violence?
Vallen, a boy who has just died to a goblin of the lowest caste, will soon learn the answer to that question, or die trying.

Title: Harrow and Hunt
Synopsis:
Eliza Harrow doesn't know what it is to be hunted - but she soon will. The Harrows are the most powerful supernatural family of their time but they haven't been seen or heard of in nearly twenty years. To save their lives, they went into hiding - but now foes old and new seek to draw them out. To help her family survive, Eliza must discover the origin of their strange, arcane magic. A man whose life has been stalked for years by a malevolent, faceless threat may hold the key.
Constructive criticism and corrections welcomed.

Title: Nights of Sambria: And the Wish of Light
Synopsis:
“I discovered a secret. One I desperately wish could have stayed hidden. It was locked away, concealed in a fantastical world on the doorstep of 7 billion people who stayed utterly oblivious to it. If they will be spared the terror that is coming, I can’t begin to imagine.
Know that a forgotten heritage of a dwindling people whispered, unknowingly sending a call to the ancient mysteries of the world.
Something listened.
And now events are set in motion that could force the earth on a course of terrible change. I am being hunted and have run out of time.
There were no stories about it. No legends. Not even scribbles. Yet, the threat of it is real and that’s why I’m writing this warning with shaking hands. So pay attention those who read this, be careful of what lies waiting cloaked in the darkness. That which made their home the lost places of this world.”
She folded the letter with a shuddering breath and stared back in the direction from where the noise reverberated through the halls. It was of stone doors shattering one by one. The chances of getting out safely were all but gone. The letter in her hand was all warning they would have. It dropped into one of the Wells and all that could be done now was hope it was found in time, if at all.
 
--
This was my very first large story. ;) I started writing it years ago. Was fun, was difficult, but in the end, it is a story I hope that will inspire. 
The prologue is in first person perspective and the rest of the story in 3d. Just a little heads-up :P
It is a fantasy epic with a contemporary twist for the start. The first arc of the novel is set inside our modern world, but as the mysterious events around Calin intensifies, the hidden secrets in the world start to become more fantastical.
 
The story follows Calin, a young orphan in search of answers. But, the answers he seeks will change his life and that of his friends forever, for the secrets that caused his situation have far greater ramifications than the small village of Lamb's Crest could have known. 
 Remember to leave ratings and reviews. I'm quite interested in hearing your thoughts on the story. ;)
Enjoy reading,
Omri Hope

Title: Descend
Synopsis:
Elise Ellsworth awakens in Rambling University in the fall of 1954, her memories as shattered as her legs. She has suffered an accident, one which mirrored the allegedly accidental death of another student the term before. Authorities both of the campus and the nearby town deny any connection. Elise and the rest of the staff of the school’s newspaper take it upon themselves to solve the case — a case that is nearly ruined when Tarian Marek, a junior with a mysterious agenda, catches her trying to steal a dead student’s records. Surprisingly, he promises to help her. But making new allies is a dangerous game when anyone could be a killer … and anyone can be, when everyone in town has superpowers.
 
[Now updated on the 2nd Tuesday of every month.]

Title: One Look to Rule the Heavens
Synopsis:
What would you do if you were told you were going to reincarnate into a world of immortals and have three wishes?
What happens if things don't go the way you thought?
With no knowledge of the world at large, our MC will stumble his way through with knowledge not his own, a body not his own, and power that doesn't belong to this world.
One look to rule the heavens.
One flap to travel the earth.
One thought to destroy them all.

Title: Still a Hero
Synopsis:
James Everand, former Hero of the continent, slayer of demons, fails to save what he holds most dear. His companions dead, and the land around him covered by the last blood of man, he activates his unique gift, a magic given to him by the Godess.
"I'll make it right this time."
James Everand sets out on his mission once again.

Title: Re:Absorb
Synopsis: Imagine being reborn into another world, with only one super power, which steals the experience points from people that have died near you. What would you do? Nothing? Or would you use it, to become the strongest human alive? Can you even call yourself human, after using something like this deliberately?

Title: Reaper With The Red Hair
Synopsis:
Kidnapped and trained to be nothing more than a tool capable of slaughter, Eis wanted nothing more but freedom. After killing the whole rival organization and be half a step to death due to multiple wounds he turns around to witness an expected betrayal. 
As his consciousness darkens he prepares to be embraced by death. 
Or so he thought 
note: My first fiction in royal road. I hope people enjoy reading this if someone does read. It's pretty much a transferred to another world story. Though I'm trying my best to make it interesting even if my best is not enough then I'm sorry.
