Title: Saga of the Soul Dungeon - Old
Synopsis:
The new version of this is available here: https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/40181/saga-of-the-soul-dungeon
When Caden dies in a car crash he is put in a dungeon core in another world. The problem with that? He still has a conscience, but the original dungeon core is still there in his mind, and it doesn't...
Of course, other people add their own issues:
Two human nations gain access to the dungeon and are not particularly pleased to share.
A sentient plant race claims the dungeon as sacred ground.
And, amidst the chaos, teams of adventurers just want to make a living.

Title: The Stage
Synopsis: Cai Shengwei and three of his friends went to a haunted house, called Mystical Mansion. They sneered and jeered at all the attempts to scare them until they found a hidden room with a young woman inside, beckoning them to enter. Thinking it was all a part of a play, they advanced only to find out that the young woman was some type of witch.

Title: The Land of Irastel
Synopsis: James is a young man trying to live the best life possible in a small town in the moutnains. It's not all that bad, he has a beautiful woman he can call his own and soon a home! Untill the Orc's attacked and changed his life forever...

Title: Infinite Wishes
Synopsis: Daniel Nelvine Rosecrown, cough cough, i mean Kimy Shinguru, is just your ordinary super hardcore gamer, leaving his home to the outside world in order to replenish his food supply for another streak of nonstop gaming, suddenly dies a harsh death by arrows, just to meet god, whom said he killed him on purpose, and refused to give him life again on earth. God needed to transfer him to another world for an unknown reason, and as compensation, would not only make him younger and more OP, but grant him one wish, any wish. I truly do wonder what Kimy wished for...

Title: BLACK TIGER GOD (黑虎神)
Synopsis: After the death of his parents by the hand of the Wushi (Samurai-like warriors), Li Wei, his beast spirit Heihu, and his new friends embark on a journey to create peace.

Title: A Twist that Lead to the Fall
Synopsis: She only wanted to have a nice day with her friend. But a twist changed her life. She had to fall. And that fall changed everything. This is a tale of a young girl. Frail and confused, how will she survive this world full for dangers?

Title: The Disease
Synopsis:
A teenage boy, accustomed to being alone must change entirely, as something starts to go awry in his school. He must be careful as he is with two friends, and the love of his life as he must combat perhaps one of the biggest problems that he will ever have in his life (Especially...High School)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So, a little bit about me. I am a huge zombie aficionado, meaning I have watched and read a lot of zombie based stuff, so I definitely would know what people like, and dislike in these type of things. But this is my first serious look into a book, so I do apologize if certain things are misplaced, or simply don't make sense. It is still pretty early in the process, and I can almost guarentee to you that everything should be fixed by the end.

Title: Darkside of the Moon
Synopsis: I am walking around this world with no clue of who I am or what I used to be. It's a long road, and I am not going to lie, it's a scary world that we are stepping in and my sheer pressence just stirs up the field. Care to join me in the safety of my mind?

Title: Tales of My Ascension Have Been Exaggerated
Synopsis: When Val’s village finally makes peace with the inhuman raiders that have plagued them for years, she uncovers a scheme aiming to use the magical energies of countless kidnapped souls to change the world. Finding herself at odds with the ideology of sacrificing anyone, even to improve the world, Val aims to put a stop to those behind the plot and prevent their catastrophic changes from becoming reality.

Title: Les pirates les plus forts
Synopsis:
3 jeunes hommes vont être transporter dans un nouveau mondel ou regne la piraterie .
Découvrez comment 3 personnes vont changer a tout jamais le monde .
 
Je ne posede pas one piece 
 
C'est mon premier roman donc soyer sympa

Title: p r i m o r d i a l . 0
Synopsis: It's the end of days, and the only way to survive is for god to deem you worthy and competent to join his crusade of adventure in the sea of ancient relics with the most colorful cast a sit com has ever witnessed.

Title: Just another reincarnated story.
Synopsis: Upon a request i was told to continue this story.Note:The Author of this story is currently in hiatus.+ undergoing depression.

Title: The Blood Scaled Vampire Lordess And Her Undead Skeleton Summon
Synopsis:
Jack was summoned to another world that seems to resemble a lot to the Virtual Reality Massive Multiplayer Online Game that he is constantly playing, Yggdrasil Online.
The summoner was none other than Vampire Lordess Alexias de Astrid III. The daughter of Demon Marquis Raiou-jin and Southern Vampire Lordess Aeryn De Astrid. Watched as he slowly helps her to fight for the position of heir within the Noble Demon Family, and slowly conquer the entirety of the demon world.

Title: The Kiln
Synopsis: In a world governed by Fire, a band of adventurers must set out to prevent the fading of the flame. Should the flame be extinguished, all life will cease to exist. They must battle the coming of Darkness and keep the Fire alight, for the sake of all life.

Title: Rebirth of the Sword Emperor(Original version)
Synopsis:
This story is being rewritten. Check the new version here.
---------------------------------
Mark has reached the epitome of martial greatness, reaching level 400 and attaining the title Tier 6 Sword God. However, due to unknown circumstances, he is forcibly sent back into the past. Entering the "New Reality", Ashes of Gods, once again, Mark vows to reclaim his former glory and strives to reach unimaginable heights. Armed with mysterious battle techniques, advanced knowledge of gathering qi, and sophisticated dungeon conquering strategies, he sets out to accomplish legendary and unique quests. In this lifetime, he will serve no one, and he will never be underneath anybody. And thus begins the legend of a single man who defies fate and goes against the heavens.
*****
I found the cover in google, if the art is yours and you want to be credited, or want it to be removed, just pm me.

Title: The Magus of Imminent Oblivion
Synopsis:
In a world where supreme power is obtained through the circumstances of one's birth, a person's ethical upbringing has no bearing on their ability to act out their delusions.
Only the largest of civilizations can survive, and they are in constant risk of annihilation at the whim of a powerful magus.
Andric Avantus, a young man reincarnated into this world, strives to achieve ultimate power. But, he's born with an affinity for healing magic?

One chapter per week. Might do more if this gets enough traction.

Title: The Evolution of the Last Dragon
Synopsis:
A young boy receives a gift from the god that governs the world for the abilities of an ancient dragon, but what he doesn't know is that he gets more than just the abilities.
This is something I plan on writing in my free time, so there won't really be a scheduled release timetable.

Title: Bloodline: World Domination
Synopsis: The name [Silk] is a legendary name in the gaming world; it is a name feared by professional gamers, dreaded by his opponents, and loved by the masses. [Silk] is a mysterious gamer who appeared one day out of thin air and has crafted a long road filled with countless awe-inspiring achievements for himself since then. This legend, however, like a ghost, disappeared from the gaming world without any notice after spreading his name far and wide, leaving the world scratching their head in puzzlement. Four years after [Silk] disappeared from the gaming world, the world’s first VRMMO ‘Bloodline’ was released, changing the definition of gaming forever.

Title: New world
Synopsis: Guy meets god and goes to a Wuxia world

Title: [Don't Die!]
Synopsis: Our tale of thrilling heroics starts with one of our heroes face down in the dirt.It gets worse before it gets better.

Title: The Ones Among Us
Synopsis: Friends stumble onto something that redefines what it means to be a One Percenter.

Title: Elementia Online: Way of Aer
Synopsis:
Garrett, a thirteen-year-old with cystic fibrosis, is tired of laboring just to survive. And his fourteen-year-old sister, Nelly, is tired of watching him struggle. So when he gets slated for a lung transplant, Nelly offers Garrett the chance to jump into Elementia Online, despite it being dangerous for his health. He leaps at it. He’s always dreamed of entering Elementia, and with the looming operation, he’s finally ready to take the risk.
He’s ready to be a Drifter.
Entering the game world is everything Garrett dreamed it would be. As a Drifter, he can jump so high it almost feels like flying. He can bend the wind to his will and work magic of the sky, including calling lightning and storm clouds. And best of all, he can breathe. He soaks it all in. He finally feels that here in Elementia, he can become the person he’s always known he is.
But time's running out for him in real life. The operation looms, and Garrett feels like he's only just getting started. So when he hears that there might be the possibility to jump into Elementia Online forever, he can't help but seek it out...
For fans of Avatar: The Last Airbender and Final Fantasy!

Title: Blood of the Guardian
Synopsis:
Evil has arrived in Big City. People are going missing and nobody knows why but there are whispers of a mastermind behind it all. Only one person in the burgeoning metropolis has the skill and prowess to stop the thing. The Guardian. The mythical warrior that defends Big City with iron justice, a power higher than any court.
Yet the evil proves itself a formidable opponent and the Guardian quickly realizes that this is not a foe he can defeat by himself... if it can even be defeated at all. But defending Big City is his duty and as long as the citizens are in peril, defeat is not an option. Even if it means allying himself with the infamous group known as the Butchers.

Title: Second Reality: Against Fate Itself
Synopsis:
In the year 2051, a player entitled as "The Supreme King." An epic powerhouse existence in an MMORPG called <<>>. A true genius prodigy with inhuman hand speed, but one day, due to an accident, his prized hands became severely injured, preventing him to touch the keyboard ever again.
But with the advent of the first ever VRMMORPG <<>>, his desire to play grew and resolved himself to gain the achievements he deserves.
In this second reality, the figure of a forgotten king shall rise once again to reclaim his rightful throne, with the new class. Spirit Contractor!

Title: The Ancestor
Synopsis: A Novel fanatics, who's soul was atually transported to a world of "The Dao" ?

Title: Faithless
Synopsis:
An empire, bursting with newfound magic; A king beyond human, atop a bloodstained throne; A quartet of childhood friends turned angels of the apocalypse; And one girl, versus the world.
Lan has a mission - atone for her past mistakes, right the wrongs that now plague the hostile and unfamiliar nation of Nameria, and kill the god-king, the usurper Mallinder. The magic that seems to spring forth wherever he goes - Faith - that turns the beliefs of the masses into a force to be harnessed by those in the spotlight, even now twists the country to its breaking point. The four that follow him, his Pillars, the High Tetrad, seem an impossible barrier to overcome with their own divine powers. But, Lan knows a secret about the god-king: Something so monumental that the fate of the country could rest on it.
She knows what he is.

Title: Tale after get betrayed by them
Synopsis:
Hero, what the meaning of hero?
Princess : Hero? that is, u know Hero is someone who can get easy to being used, ofcourse by me.
King : Hero u say? That Hero just my pawn in war to take other land.
Soldier : Hero? ahh, Hero just meat shield for us.
Hero?: What the meaning Hero in this World? That is to get betrayed by them.
This Tale about the Hero after get btrayed by them after the hardwork he does.

Title: A Tale of a Certain Lolicon
Synopsis:
Kyoro was originally transported to another world, and when he returns, he learned that the other world that he transported in, visit his world.
But it’s not hidden, the whole world knows about it and currently raising their own Heroes and adopting with the new world they have.
But all of them don’t matter since this is a light hearted story about a Lolicon and his not so loli harem.
 
This is story is more focused on character relationships than action and battles.

Title: Conquest
Synopsis: People come and go, but what happens when it happens for no reason. No clues no evidence of crime... simply vanishing.

Title: Kano's Necromantic Comedy
Synopsis:
Humanity is extinct, leaving the world in the hands of mad biological craftsmen with miraculous technology. They were once humanity’s last hope for survival, but ultimately these necrotechs served only to speed its final destruction. Now their defective creations make up the last remnants of civilization, senselessly slaughtering each other as the necrotechs war for control of what little remains. 

Kano, a fractured soul born from the ashes of the old world, wallows in the lifeless wasteland. A shell of her former self, Kano now ranks amongst the worst of these new horrors. Caught up in the mad machinations of necrotechs, she stumbles upon helpless beings that force her to confront who she once was and how far she’s fallen.
Cover by Creadfectus on commission: https://www.artstation.com/creadfectus

Title: Tales of a Forgotten
Synopsis: Uma vez o mais forte, uma vez um herói, agora nosso MC foi libertado das correntes para continuar sua vida imortal.

Title: Ascending Elisian
Synopsis: Live to tell the taleOf cloudless skies, and dark ancient beingsStruggling in the crown of foreverIt is hard to imagine, what darkness behold It is hard to conquer the fear, delve deeperBorn in the darkness, soil and moldRouted by destiny to expound the summitWhere howling winds whip the empty nightNo fires or sunshine to show the way outThe past was guided through blood and tear Oh, what remains now is weakness and fear I will struggle and overcome the legionDrink the blood and overcome limitationThat I am a creature of the darkThe one who shall live to tell the taleIn a dark Elisian edifice *********************************************Elisian, the celestial pyramid housing mythical beings, trials, traps and unimaginable fortune on each floor....The higher you go, the harder the struggle Survival of the fittest is the rule...Becoming supreme is the dream...

Title: When the Heavens come crashing down
Synopsis: Lucifer has been preparing for something ever since the corruption took possession of God and many angels. The signs have started showing, visual anomalies and abnormal animal behaviour. These have the whole of humanity cautious and seeking answers, but for what they know not. The walls have been lowering for years and now Armageddon may be upon Earth.

Title: Physician of Legends
Synopsis: A boy accidentally gets himself stuck under a wagon of the imperial forces and is mauled to a point where most people would find it hard to stay alive. Yet he does not die. Instead, he discovers a strange power within, one that has not appeared in the world of the nine continents for a very, very long time.

Title: The First Non-Human
Synopsis:
Dr. Vitkor Pride, a genius generations ahead of his colleagues is genetic engineering and biological sciences, got more than he bargained for when he sets out create the first non-human sapient species in a act of extreme hubris, and actually succeeds in an accident that is more of a miracle than anything. He now has to raise a very unusual child while in hiding, figure out how to keep the authorities from dissecting him, and deal with the political fallout of his eventual reveal to the world. He also has to face his own faults and the philosophical ramifications of a non-human species that claims he was created not by him, but by God. They are both going to grow in ways they never imagined. 
Author Note: I have some experience with writing and English is my first language, but this is my first time writing an actual story and my grammer is probably not stellar, so please bear with me as I gain experience. This is my first time posting writing on this site, so any formating tips are welcome.

Title: A World Beyond
Synopsis:
Every century Arkadia is faced with a trial as the Demon King returns to wreak havoc upon the lands, and thus each century a Hero rises to take up the mantle of the Heroes of old as they pass on their strength and knowledge to the new Heroes so that they may defeat this ancient threat. But as the ninth Hero had defeated the Demon King once again after the sacrifice of his friends, and he too was ready to pass on he found himself inexplicably reborn as the tenth Hero with all his memories intact. 
However the birth of the Hero signfies one thing, the rise of a stronger more frightening Demon King. Perhaps now with these memories, there was hope of defeating the Demon King and releasing the world of this curse once and for all.

Title: Hound of War
Synopsis: Ryan is a normal guy caught in an abnormal game. A game played between gods on a gameboard planet known as Aurora! He's selected to be a Champion, a game piece for the goddess Luris. If he wins the game, she'll send him home. If he loses, he dies! Will Ryan survive his ordeal, or will he die trying? Find out in Hounds of War!

Title: Aspect of the Beast
Synopsis:
This story is being rewritten! The new version, A Price in Memory, can be found here. 

 I highly suggest you read the new version as this one won't be completed. Also, there has been a lot of changes so you won't be able to continue with the other where this one left off.

A soldier dies on a battlefield, his body broken but his mind at peace. He died for the only thing he truly cared about, his family.
In a different world a talented mage completes his life’s work, an entire rebuilding of one of the greatest ancient spells, resurrection. Bypassing the stringent requirements, he attempts to make this great magic accessible to the masses, and by doing so earn his place in history.
But lost to the passage of time is the reason for these requirements. Not to unnecessarily complicate this great magic, but to ensure the transfer of only mortal souls.
For there are things that dwell in the realm of the dead that should never be allowed to cross over.

Title: My daughter is a goddess?
Synopsis: Hentsem, is a researcher. His wife died long time ago, she left one daughter for him, Veny is his daughter's name. unfortunately, Hentsem relationship with Veny is like two strangers trapped in one roof. Until one day, his daugther suddenly possessed by a goddess. And the goddess promised Veny to fix the house situation. Will the house situation be better after the goddess joined the family?

Title: Corrupted
Synopsis:
Insanity runs deep, a corruption of the mind and soul. Follow the blood and toil of two individuals, a soldier's son who searches for his brother's corpse, and a noble girl who lost everything except her little brother. One path leads to strength and madness, and the other leads to self-discovery and heartbreak.
 
Author Note
Weekly Release.

Title: The Labyrinth
Synopsis: In the aftermath of a terrorist attack, an unlucky tourist finds that the world has changed around him. With an incomplete System to guide him, he must make his way through The Labyrinth and survive to find the core in order to make it back home. Maybe with some luck, Jake will live long enough to figure out who the players are in this new world. But they don't want to be found out just yet, nor do they want him to get back to Earth alive. And none of them understand what The Labyrinth really is, or what it wants.

Title: Unfathomable Doomsday (Copyright)
Synopsis:
First, this isn’t a story about how to seek survival during Doomsday! It’s rather about how to bring about the end of of times, to bring down the curtain on the world. It’s about how to set off a Zombie frenzy, how to lead the Devil into invasion, and how to guide the descent of Zerg! In this game of doom, I’m the source of everything!
Second, I need to thank those brethren who accompanied me until now. My thanks go to the Lich Monarch, Arthas Menethil (game: World of Warcraft), bringer of endless winter and death; to Alex Mercer (game: Prototype), who created life by consuming viruses; to the Worst Spirit Tokisaki Kurumi (Light Novel: Date a Live), controller of time; to the Magus Ascendant Xerath (Game: League of Legends), imprisoned by runes.
Ladies and Gentlemen, lets bring about a carnival of doom!

Title: Adventures of Lord Genesis
Synopsis:
The heavens celebrated the birth of Zhen Han, and so did the mortals and immortals. Everyone knew he was destined for greatness, but in a way they never imagined!
Zhen Han: "My mother once told me that a man should have grand aspirations. She told me to strive for the best in whatever I do.
To honor her words I became the strongest and richest cultivator in the world. To fulfill her dream of reaching greatness, I strive to achieve the biggest harem in the universe all so that she can have the best daughters-in-law in the universe. She wanted me to become the best in everything I strive for... so I became the most shameless scoundrel in the entire realm!"
Zhen Han's mother fainted out of shock!

Title: The Evolutionary Adventure of the Lil' Orphan Sea Turtle
Synopsis:
We live in a world of novels. A tale that is steadily being written, told among us as common folklore, myths, fairytales. And one such stories is 'The LiteratureRPG Adventures of the Lil' Orphan Sea Turtle'.
This story, however, follows the journey of a small orphan tortoise on his journey.

Title: A Moment
Synopsis: Hello everyone i have been a lurker on the site for a while, and now want a try at writing a contmporary short fiction. Apologies I do not have a synopsis ready yet, because honestly i am not sure how to describe it. Thanks for all the future hopefully constructive critism.

Title: Burra: Short Stories In the Shaper Universe
Synopsis: This is a collection of short story set in the Shaper Universe.  These stories are used to world build and flesh out various parts of the Shaper Universe.  Also, to explore some characters with abilities that are not directly combat related.  These stories are LitRPG, but they will be light on game mechanics versus the Shaper book, which is game mechanic heavy.

Title: The grand Library
Synopsis: A young man trapped in the void for an unknown amount of time forgets his name and in a desperate attempt to remember who he was he constructed a Grand library in his mind containing everything he remembered.

Title: N/A
Synopsis: N/A

Title: N/A
Synopsis: N/A

Title: N/A
Synopsis: N/A

Title: The Armori Throne
Synopsis: The Empire of Tavara, a grand and vast nation spanning whole continents in a world filled with many different races of legend and myth who live in an era similar to that of the Napoleonic of Earth. This vast empire is ruled by a wise and noble line of High Elves known as the Armori. Long have the Armori reigned, and long have their armies fought to defend and expand their holdings, and long have their neighbours plotted and waged countless wars against Tavara. With the golden age of the Empire slowly decaying, cracks have begun to appear in the form of power-hungry nobles who seek to overthrow the Armori Imperial family and claim the throne themselve. With the armies of Tavara busy with defending their homeland, the capital is laid bare and open to rebellion, and soon chaos and civil war shall threaten the one powerful Empire… And three young officers of the elite Tavaran Cuirassiers will experience the true horrors of this new age of civil war and chaos first hand...

Title: The Forgotten Emperor
Synopsis: A Ruler that conqueror kingdoms and built an Empire. A man second to none in battle. Respected and Feared throughout the land, his enemies shook with fear at the mention of his name. An Emperor that could rival a god in power......is knocking on death's door and he couldn't be happier.  Victor, Razel Avice Ronodee the third, had never feared death. In fact, he looked forward to it. Victor´s life had been filled with mistrust, betrayal and death. After 30 years of living in this way, he had given up on life and was happy to leave the world. Especially if it meant his niece, Ana would be given the edge she needed to be a good ruler for his kingdom. Drifting happily in the void, Victor finds himself once again living. In the body of a baby.  In this new and strange fantasy world, the former Emperor is finally given the chance to experience familiar love and a normal life. That is until the Fairys find him, and his peaceful life is ripped apart. He must now face new trails and memories while clinging to the feelings he had never thought would be his, hope, love and fear.

Title: God Of The New World
Synopsis:
It's the year of 200 in the Brightstar Kingdom; the Royal Family inspired with the discovery of foreign lands by their Southern Neighbors The Cranks quickly arrange for an erratic group of settlers composed of petty thieves to fallen nobility to help claim the land for themselves. This story focuses on the events that conspired within this new age and a God Eating Serpent who hopes to found a new legacy in this land of opportunities. "I will be God of This New World!"
 
(Evil Leaning Protagonist Warning.)

Title: Twin stars from Twinlight
Synopsis: The heirs of partnering families set out on the path to a grandiose future. Will they stick together or will they take separate paths as war signs threaten the peace they grow to appreciate?

Title: The Sinful Life of The Emperor
Synopsis:
In the age of mutants and technology, everyone is after power and eternal life, but our hero only lives for his dreams of sex and vanity!
A man who doesn't hesitate to steal others wife for an affair while their husbands die of envy and shame!
But can he achieve his dreams admist the global power struggle?

Title: Caveship
Synopsis: 18-year-old Nicholas Mason is a fairly average teenager from the small town of Aberdeen, Washington, in his final year of high school. When an earthquake awakens him after a senior party he attends with his two closest friends, they find themselves face-to-face with a powerful starship created by an ancient civilization - a Caveship. Taken aboard against their will, Nicholas and his friends find themselves traveling farther and farther away from Earth, while the starship automatically pilots itself toward some unknown destination. Now, they must work together to find a way back home, facing incredible dangers on strange alien worlds, all while at the mercy of a starship hellbent on reaching its target.

Title: Deadly Warfare - The War Between Great Nations
Synopsis: Wars can be fought for land, resources or simply nothing. -Paragonix

Title: Soldiers of Mana
Synopsis:
(I am currently in the process of rewriting the story. The rewritten chapters will be slowly added to my website. Once I catch up to the current amount of released chapters, then I will reupload them all here. Along with a brand new chapter.)
https://www.leeninnsocial.com/
----------------------------------------------------
In a place where factions fight for resources related to increasing technology, and military strength, they will do anything to develop the strongest fighting force possible. This leads the Sky Nation of Ailiven to take children from orphanages to raise them as weapons. Niko, a young boy who lost his parents, and was separated from his friends at the orphanage will have his life slowly morph into nothing but that of a weapon.

Title: Re:Naruto
Synopsis:
A soul of a man floats through endless darkness, awaiting its next reincarnation. The man remember nothing and knows little, but when his chance to reincarnate comes he will learn he has an abnormal amount of positive karma. Positive karma he can use to gain plenty of advantages in his next life. In fear of being powerless or becoming a pawn he makes full use of it, becoming someone who would surely leave a mark on the world he heads to. His destination? A world of ninja, shinobi. The world of Naruto.

I do no own Naruto nor anything else from the source material. This is only a fanfiction.

Title: G.R.U.U.U.L
Synopsis:
NOTE: after numerous tries, I could simply not think of a good way to keep this story going. I apologize to my readers. If anybody is willing to try and write on this story, PM me.
 
Guard and Restraint of the Unknown, Unkillable, and Unsafe Lifeforms. The organization predates time immemorial, and has protected unaware humanity from horrors that cannot be spoken of. Everything in humanity's arsenal is used to keep these anomalies at bay. Everything ranging from ghastly eidolons, space warping household items, elements that don't follow the laws of physics and world ending threats are housed in numerous facilities, but are mostly sealed off within the headquarters. Who is the person that keeps these supernatural threats on a tight leash?
Welcome to the Entries of Overseer S.

Title: Silence
Synopsis: David wasn't quite sure what he was. He wasn't invisible for people still saw him, and yet, he certainly wasn't all too visible either for no one really saw him until he wanted them to see him. Unsure of his past and uncertain of his future, he had lived whatever life he had known in the sprawling town of Haften within the lands of Ashen. Far away from the war with the Mortalis, shadowy mysterious creatures which launched an tireless assault on Ashen's northern border, David hoped to live an uneventful life using his semi-invisibility to steal however much he needed to subsist. However, as always, life had other plans for him.

Title: Storyteller: The Rich, The Richer, And The Abused
Synopsis:
A mysterious crystal, an old man, and an enthusiastic child. Why were they made? How were they made? And more importantly, what do they have to tell? Join and listen as the stories of a world long lost is recounted through a series of tales.
The first: The Rich, The Richer, And The Abused is about the unfortunate story of the slum dweller John. Raised in poverty during an unprecedented era of peace, John was content to subsist on his meager earnings for the rest of his life. As the threat of war loomed near, though, John's poverty worsened and his desperation increased. During this moment of crisis John is offered a deal too good to turn down. Or so he thought...

Title: Fear system
Synopsis:
When you are given a chance to live the life that you want. Will you leave everything else behind?
When you are reach the top and gain the power that allows you decide the life and death of others "alone". Will you find happiness?
Those are the questions that I asked myself before I left the world.
 
This is a story of a man who was given another chance and a system to change everything
 
This is only for fun, I don't own the copy rights of Nurarihyon no mago. It is purely fanfiction.

Title: The Mechanisms of Power
Synopsis:
Come read about the life of  Mark (a boy just turned 18), and how he will deal with all the new things he has gained that cannot be explained in normal reality and their consequences to his life.
This storie will deal with the effects that "superpowers" would have on your day to day life and also in depth explanations on both their uses and limitation, because remember: the laws of the universe are absolute (unless they contradict the natural laws in which case you better start running)
This is going to be a short story that i might extend further into if there is enough interest in  it

Title: Rebirth of the Entertainment Giant
Synopsis:
After the death of Zhang Xiaohua, he is reborn into a parallel world where the entertainment industry has become sluggish. Follow him as he begins his journey to form a world-class entertainment company, filled with; musicians, screenwriters, producers and directors. Watch him as he attempts to conquer the entertainment world by storm. 

*Get the first volume of the book on: Amazon ,  Google Play
*Get the second Volume of the book on: Amazon , Google Play
*Get the third Volume of the book on: Amazon , Google Play
*Get the fourth Volume of the book on: Amazon , Google Play

Title: Sect lord Lin Meng
Synopsis:
An anti social boy met an old man and went to another world after dying by a meteorite, He saw himself suddenly becoming a sect leader of a small sect.
Follow his story as he develops his sect to become one of the most terrifying superpowers in the realm

Title: Night of the Dragon
Synopsis: 10 years ago, a dragon suddenly appeared in the sky of the Kingdom of Axile and then began destroying the whole kingdom.Peoples and Adventurers unite themselves to fight the monster, but it's pointless. The dragon is too strong, even the strongest Adventurer can't defeat him.And then, the dragon destroyed the kingdom in one night and disappeared at the same time.People who call themselves the Dragon Slayer try to find the dragon, but there is no trace of it can be found.After that, the calamity was named as Night of Despair and Dragon called Dragon of Calamity

Title: Cultivator In The Magus World

Summoned to this world our hero will have to set out and find his way. The only problem is he can't use magic!!! Title: The Dragon Conquest
Synopsis:
Dragons roamed the land of Veran, dominating and conquering. The world was in chaos until everyone joined forces. The dragons were finally defeated and none were left.
As years passed, the mayhem the dragons had caused were replaced by another form of chaos: greed. This time by themselves. Two alliances against one another with their own, different beliefs.
Away from it the kingdom of Solaris stood, where Jacey Mura attended the Summoning, an event in which anyone past 16 gained the power to summon.
Fate would have it that she receive the rarest and strongest power of all...
The ability to summon a dragon.

Title: Far Strider
Synopsis:
A college student finds himself transported into a strange land with burgeoning magical powers, and is taken in by Ned Stark. Will he sink or swim in this medieval society, and will he ever get home?
======================
OC-insert without knowledge of Game of Thrones, new planeswalker. Slow power ramp.
Second crossover: Star Wars (around chapter 39).
=======================
As a note, I started this as a speed writing challenge to myself.  The challenge was successful, and I managed 100,000+ words (as well as some character sheets in excel and such) over 10.5 days.  Then I had to stop and let my hands recover from their burgeoning carpal tunnel syndrome. The story currently stands at around 150,000 words (or ~550 RRL pages) over 54 chapters; expect a chapter a day until I've caught up with the backlog.
The focus of this story was not quality writing, and that hasn't changed.  I mostly use it as my semi-guilty "I need to write something, but am not focused enough to write something good" story.  Expect self-indulgent writing in general, and a bit of OP (or, well, more than just a bit if we're being honest), especially later in the story as the protagonist matures into a more full-blown Planeswalker.
But if you're looking for something with a power-ramping protagonist romping around the place, something you'd be a bit embarrassed to admit liking (I know I am) but like anyways (and come on, this is RRL, so that probably describes just about everyone here who actually has shame), then this may be a nice bit of mental junk food for you.

Title: The Bride of the Sun
Synopsis: Mithra and her Sword's Sister seek help. She will find it on the Beggar's Hill among those who secretly govern upon people that are poor, sick, and in need. Title: A Taste for the Finer Things

Dave was shattered, emotionally and physically after a car accident destroyed his throat, and his dreams of being a singer. Title: The Five Lords

Despite these rumours, or perhaps precisely because of these rumours, Lord Corvus, Lord of the Realm of the Iron Raven has decreed that they proceed towards Drakenhold.......in force.

Title: The Great Realm Portal
Synopsis:
What you can expect from TGRP: Sci-fi, dark fantasy, horror, LitRpg, progression, reincarnation and more. 
Characters: Initially I wanted to create two main characters. David and Vivian. But after planning the story, I decided to focus only on David, and then with time create a different page on Royal Road telling Vivian's story. (It all depends if this story is well received.) So is up to you guys.
The story will have stats, but please be patient. I don’t want to rush things and that after a few chapters, things make no sense.


With his humble background, David Han was a police detective who cherished the happiness he found in his wife and kids. However, his wife was far from ordinary. The scarlet portal, a groundbreaking creation of Vivian’s, had the extraordinary ability to transport people and goods across the globe in mere seconds. The eve of the portal’s inauguration was a momentous occasion, as it was set to be showcased to the entire planet. David sacrifices himself to protect his family, and his consciousness seamlessly shifts into a newborn in a parallel universe. This alternate world closely resembles our own, but is filled with magic. However, technology is now beginning to dominate and control this once magical planet.
By entering the scarlet portal, Vivian is thrust into a demonic realm, where she must endure severe injuries and fight for her survival. Her determination is powered by her intense desire for vengeance.
David Han’s ultimate aim is to stay alive and unravel the mystery surrounding the true nature of the scarlet portal.

Title: Devil Cultivator in an Ability User World
Synopsis:
Lu Shu was a Devil Cultivator who by purely relying on his own strength and by overcoming countless obstacles, he reached the tribulation all Devil Cultivators must pass to become immortal, the "Death Tribulation", but when the last bolt was about to come down and he was about to achieve immortality he...! Died. Yes, the strongest man in all of Artronia, suddenly died while he was in a Tribulation.
Little did Lu Shu know that he was incredibly "lucky" and was chosen by a council Gods to reincarnate into a world of random choosing and it just so happened to be an Ability User World and in this world, he'll thrive once more and become the Devil King just like in his last life.
 
 
 
Disclaimer: I do not own the cover photo and if you are the one who owns it and do not want me to use it, pm me and I'll remove it.
Also this is my first novel, I wanna put all the ideas in my head into an actual story so I thought I'd give it a go, constructive criticism is welcome as long as it's helpful.
P.s I'm not doing a prologue mainly because all you need to know about how he died is in the Synopsis, I might do a chapter with the council of God's if people want it.

Everyone who goes there has to set their life on the line. But Yan Hao has no choice than to enter the Spirit Realms and fight, because the Phoenix Coin, which is located there, is the only thing which can save his ill sister.

These next stories and/or story shall be various works that I can imagine with neither rhyme nor reason. These short stories shall be disjointed at first until I can think up ways to combine them together as one or few.
I do so hope you readers can help me shape these works and any future works that I may write in the future, and as such am willing and welcome to all constructive criticism that you present.

An Indulging Hound

Title: Dungeon's Kingdom

Marcus Vitruvius, explorer, architect, and former noble of the Kingdom of Altaris had died. Unfortunately for him, however, the gods happened to have a plan for the man and have no intention of letting him rest in peace in the afterlife. After a forceful reincarnation as a dungeon, how will Marcus change his destiny?

Hello, Author here, this is a bit of a writing experiment for me. As the first real work of fiction I plan to put up for public viewing I hope that people can read and review it and help me learn what's good, bad or in between. So please leave any criticism you might have in the comments or on the reviews freely. Here's to learning together and hopefully making a fun and interesting piece of fiction!

Release Schedule "tbd" but hopefully once I get into full gear somewhere around 2.5 thousand words every 2 or 3 days.

Title: Shambala Sect
Synopsis:
Driven by the desire to meet a billion beauties from a million dwellings, Lirzod of the obscure Faceless Clan, a trusty youngster with a heart full of up-front feelings, embarks on an expedition together with two friends—or followers as he’d love to chaff around folks—to join a sect of repute and pick up his people’s place in the pecking order of earthly assemblies. On his extensive quest owing-to and for love, he discovers aplenty—the unkind darkness dancing amok under heaven, puppeteering cut-throat characters with undreamed-of abilities to act against the wellbeing of the wanting ones. How will Lirzod find his place let alone love in a realm largely ruled by reprobates and scallywags of sundry sorts? And what ensues from his endeavors? Hold your breath, and bear witness to his boundless undertakings.
 
      "When I flap my wings, my foes lose their feathers." 
                                                                                               — Lirzod Basha.

With the resurrected Sala, Avo left the comfort and familiarity of his planet on a long journey through space... All in order to learn the secrets of the Arcane.
 
ARC 1 - First encounter with the Namekian people. Chapter 1-7

Title: Shadows by the Sea
Synopsis: In order to live freely, you must have a name. But names in Samark aren't easy to come by, especially for those without money or family. And for the children willing to do anything to seize a name, sometimes their path leads them into the shadows.....

Title: Deep Sea Shark
Synopsis:
Shen is a young servant from an important family and he had managed to avoid the obligatory test to become a cultivator for five years.His life was already good enough and the world of cultivation was too harsh for him, who loved peace and did his best to avoid conflict.
However, his easygoing days came to an end when he became unable to avoid the test that year.
Shen soon learns that suffering is shared by humanity as a whole and he cannot escape that.
What is the cost of peace? How much is he willing to sacrifice for solitude? If he wants to achieve anything, he must get stronger and adapt.
Accompany Shen on his journey to become stronger and seek enlightenment.
Note: This story is undergoing a major revision. Thus far only chapters one to five are good to go.
I don't own the cover image. You can find the original here: https://www.deviantart.com/miuxu0602/art/Time-in-the-eyes-88849253

Title: Nothing
Synopsis: For it is nothing but questions until the end. The story is meaningless, for it was consumed from the very start.

Title: Badass
Synopsis:
At the end of everything, Taylor Hebert realized something.  She didn't want to be a superhero.  No, she wanted to be a badass. 
And then her prayers were answered.  Imbued with the power of mimetic badassery and the ability to channel a different real-life badass every week, she set out in search for all the best things in life - well, according to Conan, at least.
Modeling herself after Conan have been a mistake.
Join her on her high-octane, pulp-fiction journey for vengeance, adventure, victory and mayhem.
This isn't just uncensored.  It's anti-censored!
===========================
(Worm/Fate/Badass of the Week)
Warning: crack-taken-seriously, over-the-top pulp-fiction style violence, overpowered protagonist, banned on two other sites.  Hell, even the light-hearted omake jokes in this were considered too subversive to persist.
============================
AN: There’s this really, really excellent website called Badass of the Week.  I’ve wasted many an hour browsing through, marveling at all the crazy shit some humans are capable of.  Check it out, then come back and read this in a few days when the awesome starts to wear off.  It’s worth it (all 576 entries).
Back?  Good!
Anyways, I was looking through it recently while thinking about who I wanted to make expy’s of for my The Flying Dutchman quest ship captains (which now languishes in indefinite hiatus), and I had this idea.  What if Taylor, wanting to be a badass, triggered with the power to be a different Badass every week?  With a bit of Fate-style ability to draw on the tools associated with the legend (but to a  just marginally less ridiculous degree), and a drive and aura to be and do badass?  
And thus, Badass was born in it’s somewhat cracky glory.
Enjoy.

Magic reigns supreme in this world, and he has access to all of it. By using his programming knowledge, he can recreate any spell, or even create new ones with his ability "Programmica Magica".

This is a story about one of many of the Dungeon Aspirants. Follow Daniel as he sacrifices himself, to become something new, something other. Not all Dungeons are good, nor are they all evil. But Dungeons do serve a critical purpose, and the paths they can follow are many.

Title: Whisked Away With My Divorcée

War soon broke out between them. Magic was revived.-----------------------------------------------Release Frequency: Seven a Week My chapters are relatively short about 500 words a chapter. Thank you!-ChocoChip

Title: Cyberhawk
Synopsis: When Annah Krie lost her rebellion she was forced to go into hiding. Now she lives her life as a contract worker to pay the bills, but when a new contract uncovers a terrorist plot following in her rebellion's footsteps she must work with the government she despises in order to stop the terrorists from destroying the city in order to break free from the oppression they face.

Title: 1247th User Of The System
Synopsis: An extra curious guy gets a gaming system. Curiosity is the bane of all his problems.

Title: Red Thread of Fate
Synopsis:
F?ma Monou, a cold-blooded doctor, who had killed many people for revenge. F?ma no longer believed in others since the past events that happened to him, he didn't believe in love. But ... It all changed, when he picked up a little girl who looked like a "broken doll" with bruises and bandages all over her body.
 
Yuki, the little girl who had to face the bitter reality of her life. She was tortured, alienated and banished by her own family. She continued to believe that someday there would be someone who wanted and needed her. Even when she was in a dying state before being discovered by F?ma.
 
Since then, Yuki who initially only considered F?ma as her benefactor, was beginning to open up her heart to F?ma. Likewise, F?ma who initially picked Yuki just for his sake alone, now began to feel different things to the little girl who was growing up.
 
Nevertheless, both chose to hide their feelings which resulted in frequent misunderstandings between the two of them.
 
When they finally found out each others’ feelings, and F?ma started to believe in love, happiness, and sincerity. Destiny had another will ... It actually separated the two of them.
 
F?ma felt fooled by destiny. He vowed not to fall in love again and avenged Yuki's death.
 
But, once again destiny brought them together in the future. With new identities and new lives.
 
Will they finally be together?
Or will their love tragedy be repeated once again?

Title: The Thorn from the Mountain
Synopsis: A working title, formally 'A Forgotten Grimoire'. Ash, an orphan by age 8 and on the run by age 14.After fleeing from his vicious uncle and supposed caretaker, Lord Hendrik, he leaves behind the only place he had ever called home, a place now warped by misery and torture. A boon granted, by fate or pure chance, the boy stumbles upon something ancient and long forgotten. The boy must learn, grow and become more than he ever thought he could be.He must do more than simply surive if he wishes to make his own way in the world.****************Synopsis will likely end up being changed.Disclaimer, I'm a terrible 'writer', my grammar is poor to non-existant and my vocabulary is almost in the negative. I just wanted to tell a story that was floating around my head. Comment all you like, call me names and mock my scribblings, I'll surely weep myself to sleep over them.
