Title: The Guide to Understanding Woman.
Synopsis:
The Female population is a confusing thing. It's not easy to understand what goes on in the female brain. It is especially hard for males to understand and help the females around them. This guide will hopefully help you learn more about how women feel and what to do in certain situations you may find yourself in. I will cover romance, friendships, parenting and many others. This is not only for you but for the woman around you. And hopefully, at the end of it all, you'll learn just a little more about the female mindset.
 
  ( Hey, this is something that I think would be fun and informative to write. The Guide to Understanding Women. We girls are confusing. Often it’s hard to express what we're feeling and why. Most of this guide will be focused on the modern teenage girl because that is what I am currently. These chapters will be written in a more  ' I'm speaking to you'  kinda way.  You might be shocked at the truth, but know that girls are just as confused about boys.)
 
 GUYS! This is based on my opinion and my experiences and thoughts. I do not speak for every girl out there. I don't intend to give wrong information, but everyone different, so please don't be offended by anything I say.

Title: Do I look like a Demon to you?
Synopsis:
Markane is a 16 year old highschool student who plays way too many MMO games. Especially, his favourite game WorldEnding, one of the most popular games in the continent for it's open ended gameplay. However, when he logged in as his character, he didn't know that he'd one day be summoned to another world....
Meanwhile, cultists circle around the pentagram around the floor. Soon they would be able to summon the mighty Markanezaroth, Lord of Ruin. It was a difficult ritual, but once they succeeded, they could gain ultimate power....
This is a tale of how a mighty demon was summoned into the world and what can mere mortal heroes do in the face of the ultimate evil?

Title: A Wish For Power
Synopsis:
Blunt Key journey started out on a bad note. Having been duped by his girlfriend and losing all his possession. Not knowing what todo he made his way to a dock where he met a being that granted him a wish.
”What power do you want?” The being asked.
”Well, I want knowledge and controls over all the elements.” Blunt replies.
”Hais, another generic power-hungry fool-“
”So I can teach everyone.” Blunt spoke with the most conviction he had ever did in his life.

Title: Christopher's Kingdom
Synopsis: Christopher finds loopholes around the worldwide wizarding ban and finds himself in a different universe that has been expecting him for hundreds of centuries.

Title: Attached
Synopsis:
The Miller woods is a vast mysterious forest, known for numerous cold-case unsolved disappearances. Cory Dunn was only fourteen when he got lost in The Miller Woods, spending a night in it. He was the only one to return after several hours, ending up in a psychiatric ward when he reappeared the next day. After the incident, the local government issued the order that the woods are now off-limits to everybody. Questions still remain unanswered about what happened as large fences with barbed wire and electricity on it are needed to keep thrill-seekers out.
Now Cory is sixteen and rejoining society, starting school at Miller high, joining Sid and his friends in class. With his appearance, rumours start making their rounds again, about what supposedly happened to him.
Sid and his friends love anything that has to do with horror, thriller, and mystery. And Cory Dunn's story is filled with those elements, as the boy never told anyone what happened in the woods. Adamant about finding answers to the mystery, Sid and his friends use a major power outage all over town to sneak into the woods.
What they didn't anticipate on, is the fact something might follow them out of the woods...

Title: Female Immortal's Return to Earth

Title: My Perfect Lady
Synopsis: Mr. Jimmy Hunter is in a fix. He is the C.E.O. of the prestigious Hunter Corporation, currently at loggerheads with his father, Senior Mr. Hunter, the Chairman. Jimmy is the only heir, and yet his father refuses to grant him his inheritance. Unless, of course, he fulfills one condition - gets married before his next birthday! The clock is ticking, and the young master still hasn't found a bride. There's only twenty four hours left, and yet, there are plans to be made. Until with his two best friends, Jimmy comes up with an idea. One that would get him his 'perfect' bride, and help him get back at his father too! If only the bride would agree though... Enter Miya! She's strong, hard headed, foul mouthed and comes with a kid! And there's nothing that pisses her off more than an arrogant rich brat, who also happens to be a pervert. Oh well, she would teach him a lesson!

Title: Blood of an Inhuman Hitman (Rewrite)
Synopsis:

A real living legend, but even a legend has to start somewhere and this one starts in a cheap house in the ghetto. Follow our MC as he starts of as the trash of society to become it most influential figure’s.

Synopsis:
Qin after goign to other worlds has finally ended up in the one piece universe.
 
Can White beard stoop his OPness ? " NO "
Can the world government stop his OPness ? " NO " 
Is the world of One piece ready for QIN ? " NOOO OO "

Title: Starship Dungeon BK I - Recovery & Adjustment
Synopsis:
Edit: Now with Prologue!
When an unknown enemy fires a bizarre weapon at the Earth Defense Forces Naval Fleet in Sol system, a starship's AI attempts to sacrifice himself and his ship to block the weapon and protect the rest of the fleet. Afterward, he finds himself having become a Dungeon Core in another dimension, with no clue what he is doing. Fortunately, he has a dungeon fairy to guide him and a couple of friends who managed to come along for the ride. What follows is a journey that will forever change their new world in ways that nobody saw coming.
---
Updates Sundays.
---
Helpful comments, reviews, and general error checking would be much appreciated.
---
Author's Note: Three of the four main characters of this story are all important side characters from a story that I haven't written yet as my skills as an author are not yet up to the task. However, I do have enough of the story nailed down that no changes I make in that story should affect this one. That said, the purpose of this story is to both practice my writing and to generally have fun with my characters and the world around them.

Title: Reincarnated As A Sea Serpent
Synopsis:
Jereth was your usual university student who enjoyed rpg games and D&D. But one day he fell over a bridge while riding to work and drowned. Now he's back only to come back as a snake-like monster in another world. He will grow and consume until he becomes one of the most dangerous monsters in that world. 
Watch as the tale of this monster shakes the core of this world.

Title: Unfaithful - A MaNan FF
Synopsis: A girl sharing physical intimacy with the elder brother of her to be husband.

Title: The Headache Of My Life, But Damn If It Was Not Worth It
Synopsis:
I am a horny, sexually deprived, and pissed off Captain of the ship named UMN Lecherous Wench with seven more women in the same situation as I am in.
Sure we may have one male on this ship. But when we sure his package, we were more frustrated than before because a fucking pen was bigger than what he is carrying! Are only hope are the other ships in the navy full of men that we carry supplies to 4 times a year.
We tired to bring some toys back with us, but we are always denied as they do not last long in our hands.
it wasn't until we found a damn ship as we were being attacked by are enemies after first contact with them was disasterous 500 years ago. But damn if that ancient spaceman that was tucked away inside was not worth the frustration my crew and I had to face.
"Diana! Stop hogging all of the fucking creamy goodness you bitch!"
It is so hard being captain.

Synopsis: HI

Title: The RPG World
Synopsis: RPG worlds are all created diffrently. Some have a system that allows for fast growth and incrediple strength others like this one don't allow for such easy access to power. Rarely is someone born with a god level skills and never does someone stumble upon supremely OP weapons at starter level villages. No. Power is earned here.

Title: Star Child
Synopsis: Powers are determined by geographic birth locations, and only the rich and powerful are permitted access to prized sites. SC is the first person born in space.The punishment for unauthorized births is death. Out of fear, SC keeps his strange abilities as his darkest secret. He pretends to be nothing more than a mere Regular while his peers develop unique powers, varying from controlling lightning to producing diamond hard skin. But when his mother is kidnapped by an unknown organization, SC has no choice but to act.SC ventures into a school of talented students to learn to fight, where he must learn to master his powers without revealing their true nature. But soon he realizes that the school is more than it appears and that it may hold the secret to his missing mother. To rescue her, he will have to reveal powers never before seen in all of history.Written by award winning author Leonard Petracci.

Title: The Force Missileer
Synopsis: McOris Feils hears a soft chime from nowhere, and suddenly before him is a System Message, explaining that Earth has been brought into the system, and now everything is changing. This is the tale of his life, that of The Force Missileer.

Title: An Ode to the Birds
Synopsis:
The birds maybe are the wisest from every creation. They look from above and below. The greed of man and the harsh reality is what they see every day. Monster and People of the Races is just the same in their eyes. They flew high when the time came, and chirping night and day. Like a man who has lost his sense of direction, the world is endlessly circled the same place. And powers, light and dark, stirred the clouds. 
Only some who didn't stray.
Only some stay, to praise the birds.

Title: The Genius That Triumphs Over All
Synopsis:
Ling Tian, hailed as a genius as soon as he was born was happy spending his life cultivating and living with his family. However, one of his worst nightmares came true on his 13th birthday when he was informed by his parents that he had to go to school. He who is ignorant of the society, so much so that even a child could easily best him now has to face the outer world and the nightmares and fantasies surrounding it.
Frequency/2 chapters or more a week. Currently, there is no schedule as to what days of the week I would post.

Title: Bad Habits {V2 Out now!}
Synopsis:
Some people are lucky, others are unlucky, but a tiny bit of the population have it way worse than unlucky. Takumi Ishido (Red) is one of these people. Takumi’s father was the expected successor of the Ishido clan, a group of dangerous people doing dirty work all around Japan. 
 
But it went wrong. Instead of his father, his uncle took the role as leader of the Ishido Mafia. Both his parent’s disappeared from his life and he ended up in an Orphanage. Here he meets a group of people who had something similar happening to them. The first he knew was Ukato Takeshi. (Blue)
 
They quickly became friends, but the Orphanage started slowly to fill up with more. Later on Kuruka Zukaka (Green) joined the Orphan, following him up was Nokado Tatafu. (Yellow) The last two were brothers, the older brother was Rikishi Mika. (Pink) The younger one was Tado Mika. (Purple)
 
They all ended up becoming friends and after half a decade, they had one week left until they were allowed to leave the Orphanage and make their own future. The workers of the Orphan who took care of them: Ryan and Anne started to search a present for the boys. That is when the biggest change of their lives happened…

Title: The Showmen, The Bone-Wyvern, and The Proxy
Synopsis:
Hi,  With this novel I really just want to live up to the traumatising content tag and cause a twisted sense of the world in my readers. Basically, it's got elements of Yu-Yu Hakusho's tournament arc, believable characters reminiscent of Gantz, with a shot of Furutrma. It also moves at a snail's pace.  
I'll try to upload a new chapter every Sunday. Feel free to comment let me know what you think.

Title: Reflections: Memoirs of a Minder Book 1
Synopsis:
Hello everyone and welcome,
My name is Brett Tierney and you have just entered the Minder universe. A creation of mine inspired by the events throughout history greatly studied by the UFO community and conspiracy theorists alike. I have been fascinated by the idea of extraterrestrials and aliens. The thought of not being alone is comforting to me. Throughout the years i have tried to study and take in as much information as I could. From all angles, viewpoints, and beliefs. I have become extremely accepting of all ideas and possibilities. However, in late 2017 I heard the interview of a man named Dan Burisch. A microbiologist that used to work at Area 51, S4 division, who had an up close personal encounter with a Grey alien. During his 3 hour interview, he talked about a wide range of topics revolving the UFO phenomenon. However, it was the part about time, and the possibility that extra terrestrials could be humans from the future that inspired me to create this story. It is a story of great mystery, excitement, conflict, and discovery.
Here is a link to his interview.
This is a universe set in many times. However the primary setting is roughly 54,000 years into the future. Long after an event nearly eradicates man kind and they are forced to fight for their survival across the galaxy. Giving man enough time to evolve and develop major physiological and psychological changes. New civilizations have formed and the majority of human kind is still trying to return home to the beauty of Earth. While others, fight to keep things the way they are. They begin to travel through time to alter the course of history.
I started this as a blog series of my own creation before I heard about Royal Road Legends. The story follows the lives of six individuals as they unravel the mystery of the human race. I will be writing their stories in the form of a weekly series. A new chapter out every week.
I hope you enjoy the series and thanks for taking the time to check me out.

Title: Titan Warriors - A Mech LitRPg
Synopsis:
Sergeant Brandon Mc’Dew was an Airborne Ranger and a good one too. That is until he found that one mission that ended his career like so many other warriors before him.
But instead of pearly gates or red flames Brandon awoke in a white room full of ugly green chairs and an image of his brain floating in a tube.
The life he knew was a simulation to train rapid grown people. The universe he now finds himself in is a war torn far future where Humanity as dominated the stars. Enlisted against his better opinions he finds himself a fledgling Titan Jock in a minor noble House on a far off arm of the Milky Way.
Brandon is stuck trying to survive in this new world. A world where 100 meter tall robots of war dominate the battlefield, Kings and Queens rule from thrones upon high, uncaring of the people beneath them, and expendable people can be grown in a tube to fight a war they know nothing about.
 
 
***Authors Note***
This is a MEch or MEcca based light LitRPG. There will be stat sheets, skills, and gear, however it will not be the primary focus of the story. I will be looking for a lot of reader input, so if you have any themes you would like to see in the story let me know with PMs or comments. Finally, this is a early draft so let me know if you see any errors or mistakes. Thanks.
I will be releasing one chapter a week on Wednesdays. If you would like to get up to 3 early chapters ahead of time; or increase my release rate, please check out my Patron page.

Title: Nirvana
Synopsis: A young martial arts learner named Emile has been training with his father to grow stronger. His father has always forced him to keep improving or he will not have the strength to revive his family. Watch as Emile faces turbulent times and hardships, all correlated with the Virtual Reality game known as Nirvana.

Title: End of My Boring Life
Synopsis: On Earth, a boy named Zed Jiyoui leads a typical teenage life, and of course, he is a Sophomore in High School. Like any other average 16-year-old, Zed wakes up early every day; goes to school, likes playing video games, and hangs out with friends. But he had always thought that he is just leading an average boring life, and that's how it will be for the rest of his life. Until one day when he was sleeping a mysterious light appears out of nowhere. What might that light be? Does this mysterious light represent a turning point in Zed's life for better or worse? or is it something else.

Title: Midnight Run
Synopsis: Late night meeting with a stranger takes a suspicious turn, and there;s nowhere to run.

Title: Nameless
Synopsis: All their life they have waited for their heroes, waiting to be liberated from their shackles. They survived on the hope of new dawn until that very hope twisted them, made them somewhat less than humans. Their words became their curse, chaining them to their masters for 8000 years. They are called Nameless.This is the story of hope, of treachery and of sacrifice.

Title: Paragon Company
Synopsis:
Benjamin was just twenty-one years old and straight out of the police academy. Assigned to the Carlington area as a community officer alongside his childhood friend Daniel, they’re on their first day of work when they become embroiled in an armed police pursuit.
But when the police pursuit came to a successful finish rather than the usual joy of catching a criminal there was fear. Because they may have just confirmed the existence of other sentient beings. And perhaps changed the world irrevocably in ways they can’t even conceive!

This story is mostly being done on my phone so I will apologize in advance in case the formatting is poor.
All characters and places are made by me therefore any reference to real people or places are unintended.

Title: Mournebane: A world of swords, magic, monsters and dungeons
Synopsis:
The moment “He” awoke, everything changed. Modern cities collapsed, natural disasters fell upon the entire world. And then, in every persons vison, a choice appeared.
Would you like to transport to MOURNBANE?
